host_location: São Félix da Marinha, Porto, Portugal
host_about:
Olá o meu nome é Fábio Ramos tenho 32 anos.
Sou uma pessoa animada, divertida e altruísta, tenho inúmeros prazeres nesta vida um dos quais é viajar e conhecer pessoas de outras nacionalidades culturas. 
Enquanto anfitrião prometo ser o mais prestativo possível, tanto nos primeiros contactos como quando forem meus hóspedes, estarei sempre disponível para ajudar e dar todo o suporte necessário para que passa uma estadia super agradável e interessante na cidade do Porto.

Software developer from Sydney, Australia.

I am Ali, 33 years old and a Psychological Counceler - Teacher.  I am working at Secondary School. 
I like  meet with new people, chess, cinema and arts. I have blog about cinema and write critics sometimes. 

I like travel, I visited Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, England, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Kosovo, Macedonia, Netherlands, Portugal, Serbia, Spain and Ukraine. And I met many peaople in this countries, I think Airbnb is one of the best way to meet new people and share the life. So I opened my home for guests who is coming from the any part of the world.

Usualy I watch films, some of my favourite directors are Michael Haneke, Kim Ki Duk, Emir Kustarica, Lars Von Trier, Andrei Zyvanigitsev, Bahman Ghobadi, Majid Majidi, Abbas Kiyarüstemi, Ingmar Bergman, Stanley Kubrick etc. 

My favorite Tv Series are Prison Break, Breaking Bad, Better Call Soul, Mr. Robot, Black Mirror, Narcos, Intreatmant. 

I try to explain of me. You wellcome to my home.  My house is very safety, lovely and peaceful.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
My name is Barbara.
I'm an administrator and real state manager. I study photography.
I've always enjoyed showing Rio around and helping people take the most out of the city.
It has been seven years I share my love for Rio renting apartments for short period and helping my guests with hints on tourist spots.
I love cooking and It will be a pleasure to be able to help with information about restaurants, bars and gastronomy in general.
I love to make new friends and to know different cultures.
My husband Ricardo is  a chemical engeneer, a great companion, but not talkative as I'm.
Our daughter Alice is 8 years-old. She is into dancing classical ballet, jazz and loves to exchange experiences with people in general.
I look foward to having you at my place!

Seja bem vindo (a)! Meu nome é Bárbara, sou administradora de empresas e estudante de fotografia.
Há 7 anos eu compartilho o amor pela cidade do Rio de Janeiro alugando apartamentos por temporada e ajudando meus hóspedes com dicas sobre a cidade e pontos turísticos.
Uma das minhas paixões é cozinhar e será um prazer poder compartilhar dicas sobre restaurantes, bares e gastronomia em geral.
Adoro viajar, fazer novos amigos e conhecer diferentes culturas.
Se você ficar na minha casa também vai conhecer o meu marido Ricardo, que é engenheiro químico e meu grande parceiro na hospedagem, gente boa, mas não tão falante como eu. Nossa filha Alice tem 8 anos, dança ballet e jazz e  também adora conhecer novas pessoas e trocar experiências.
Também tenho apartamentos inteiros no Centro, Lapa e Zona Sul da cidade.
Seja bem vindo a um cantinho para chamar de seu. :)

I use a personal email address for correspondence associated with AirBnB and other websites to do with travel and administration.

My name is Aybike. I love to travel, to discover new places and to meet new people. I will be glad to hosting you in Istanbul at my place. My apartment is newly renovated, clean, cosy, comfortable, large enough for 8 people and is situated literally at the heart of Istanbul. As a traveller my wish is to make you feel at home; drink your morning coffee while listening to the sound of Istanbul then take your map, jump into the street with friendly neighbourhood,  and enjoy the city with walking, exploring, watching, reading and hearing. Hola, 

Somos Alexandra y Juan dos amigos que estamos enamorados de Barcelona, nuestras pasiones son viajar y conocer gente por lo que nos encantaría compartir con vosotros nuestros espacios  para que disfrutéis a vuestro gusto de toda la cultura, actualidad y diversidad de ofertas que la ciudad os ofrece.
Para nosotros lo mas importante es que nuestros huéspedes puedan aprovechar al máximo su estancia en Barcelona,  que viváis vuestra historia  reflejada en  rincones únicos de la ciudad y por supuesto nuestra mayor satisfacción es que os sintáis como en casa según lo que busquéis.

Hello, 

We are Alexandra and Juan two friends who are in love with Barcelona, our passion is to travel and meet new people so we would love to share our spaces with you and that you can enjoy the culture, the present and the diversity of offers that the city has to offer. 
For us the most important thing is that our guests can make the most of their stay in Barcelona, that you live our history full of unique places and of course our greatest satisfaction is that you feel as if you where at home according to what you are looking for.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Trabalho com locações de imóveis mobiliados há 7 anos e AMO ser HOST. 
Valorizo o conforto acima de tudo e tenho satisfação em buscar meus hóspedes no aeroporto, ajudar com pequenas mudanças; indicar restaurantes ou planejar passeios. Posso ajudar no que for preciso! 
Além de produtora de locações e mãe, faço trabalhos como curadora de arte e produzo a Organização Socio Cultural “VAGALUME O VERDE  - VOV” cujo BLOCO de CARNAVAL desfila há 14 anos na Rua Jardim Botânico, sempre às terças-feiras de carnaval. 
O VOV  nasceu no Horto Florestal e tem a sustentabilidade e preservação ambiental como diretrizes. Estudamos e pesquisamos diariamente como usar de maneira responsável o que a Natureza nos proporciona e deixar um LEGADO para gerações futuras. 
Além de equipe de coleta seletiva, plantio de mudas para neutralização do impacto gerado pelo desfile (compensação ambiental), mão de obra local e reutilização de materiais, 
em 2013 Implementamos a norma de certificação da “ISO 20121- Gestão em Eventos Sustentáveis”. 
Em 2015, recebemos o prêmio Serpentina de Ouro, por melhor organização. Em 2019 vamos estrear nosso novo maestro com uma bateria inovadora e arrepiante. Vem!

Originally from France, I have always been keen to discover new countries and cultures. I lived 2 years in Australia where I studied at the University of Southern Queensland. After that I headed back to Paris, thinking to settle down there. After some times I decided to change my life and landed in Porto. I have been living here since 2010.
Since then, I did not manage to get back and got in love with Porto. The seagulls, the Douro and the amazing color of the sun set, will without a doubt, make you also fall in love with this beautiful city.
Make sure that you check out the little guide! There is some nice place to visit!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Olá,

Estou no Airbnb desde 2011 e sou um grande fã da Plataforma. Tudo que conquistei foi graças ao sucesso no Airbnb!

Minha experiência começou quando recebi um flat da minha avó através de herança (em vida!!), investi pesado na reforma do apartamento para poder oferecer o maior conforto possível aos meus hóspedes. Comecei a administrar seu aluguel e o sucesso foi tão grande que mudou a minha vida!

Meus amigos e familiares viram como o meu “negócio” estava dando certo e começaram a pedir para que eu também administrasse o aluguel dos apartamentos deles (nessa época ainda não existia a figura do co-host). 

Topei o desafio e o número de apartamentos foi se multiplicando! O resultado foi ótimo e percebi que me sentia muito realizado com as experiências que estava ganhando como empreendedor e ao conhecer pessoas de tantos lugares do mundo! De tal maneira que decidi largar meu emprego como gestor em marketing para me dedicar exclusivamente a vocês!

Fiz um curso de guia de turismo para ter mais conhecimento sobre a cidade e abri a All in Rio, uma Agência de Turismo que oferece tours culturais, naturais e de aventura, além do aluguel de apartamentos de temporada.

Meu objetivo é oferecer uma estadia segura, confortável e poder fornecer todas as informações necessárias para você desfrutar ao máximo a sua experiência em nossa cidade maravilhosa! 

Obrigado pela atenção!

Fabio

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hi!

I've been on Airbnb since 2011 and I’m a big fan of the Platform. All I got was thanks to my success on Airbnb!

My experience began when I received a flat from my grandmother through inheritance (in life!!). I invested heavily in the renovation of the apartment to be able to offer the greatest comfort possible to my guests. I started managing the rent and the success was so amazing that it changed my life!

My friends and family noticed how well my "business" was going and started to ask me to manage their apartment’s rent too (at the time, the figure of  the co-host didn’t exist).

I accepted the challenge and the number of apartments was multiplying! The result was great and I realized that I felt very fulfilled with the experiences I was gaining as an entrepreneur and by meeting people from so many places in the world! So I decided to leave my job as a marketing manager to dedicate myself exclusively to you!

I took a tour guide course to gain more knowledge about the city and opened the All in Rio, a Tourism Agency that offers cultural, natural and adventure tours, as well as apartments for seasonal rents.

My goal is to offer you a safe and comfortable stay and to be able to provide all the information necessary so you can enjoy your experience in our wonderful city to the fullest!

Thank you for your time!

Fabio
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Comments from my guests:

Communicating with Fabio was super-easy. He was really responsive and helpful. We are missing it already!” - Ed Pilkington (UK)
“Fabio goes far and beyond the average host, my trip was a day earlier than I booked and I would have been stuck with no place to stay but Fabio personally went out of his way to get the place ready for me, great guy and will always go to him first when traveling to Rio. Thank again Fabio abs!!” - Darren Sanford (USA)
“O apartamento é lindo como nas fotos e a localização é perfeita! O Fábio é super atencioso e respondeu super rápido nossas dúvidas. Recomendo muito!” - Bruna Ferrary Deniz (Brasil)
“The apartment was better than we could have imagined. The photos don't do it justice. The place is huge, in a great location. Fabio was a very accommodating host. I would definitely stay there again.” - Jordan Giordano (USA)
“Our stay at Fabio’s place was fantastic! The apartment is simply beautiful and it made us feel at home. Super stylish and cozy. We are very particular about the properties we stay at, and this one exceeded our expectations The apartment description was very accurate! We loved being so close to the beach and all the great restaurants around. Thank you very much!”- Pablo Perez (Canadá)

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
I am an Englishman who has lived in Rio for 20 years now, and my two sons were born and raised here (they are now at university in England), and I work in the financial market. The Wonderful City of Rio has so much to offer as I have learned from my own experience, from the traditional Samba during Carnival to the less-known Parque das Ruinas in Santa Teresa (all close by the apartment). We never stop living and learning, and whatever you are planning on doing in Rio de Janeiro, you will continue on this path with an open mind in Rio, and add an important chapter to your personal travel memoire, just by absorbing a few of the experiences Rio has on offer. I have travelled most of the world, and still come alive to the sounds of the different rhythms, love the extraordinary food, and the warmth of the local "cariocas". I would say my favorite film so far this year is Intouchables. The apartments that I have to offer are fully equipped, well located, and I will personally make sure you enjoy your stay, without invading your space. I live close by, and can be reached almost any time of day or night.

I look forward to meeting you!

Carpe Diem

Sou Inglês, mais moro no Rio ha 20 anos, tenho dois filhos quem nasceram aqui (agora eles estão estudando fora), e trabalho no mercado financeiro. Acredito nessa cidade maravilhosa e as oportunidades que oferece no futuro - como certamente me passou nas ultimas duas décadas. A gente vive aprendendo, e para qualquer um de vocês planejando visitar Rio de Janeiro, eu diria para ficar com mente aberta, e você vai crescer como uma pessoa, absorvendo só um pouco da experiência Rio tem para lhe provar. Já viajei o mundo, e adoro o som dos ritmos diferentes, comida extraordinária e povo tão caloroso. Meu filme favorito no momento e os Intocáveis. Os apartamentos que tenho para lhe oferecer são bem equipados, localizados, e eu cuido da sua visita pessoalmente, sem invadir seu espaço. Qualquer ajuda, só preciso me ligar - moro bem perto.

As a Social Work Community Organizer, Educator and Activist, I spend most of my time working both locally and in other parts of the country/world.  I love the arts and have a background in theatre and music- and an interest in writing poetry. Although I dont drink or party, I am known to work it out on the dance floor! I talk on the phone a lot and am a morning gym person.

I grew up in the midwest and have lived in NYC for about 13 years. Ive been in my current (3 bedroom) apartment for about 12 years and have been doing airbnb for about half of that time! I am in my mid 30's, I work from home and enjoy a friendly, clean, peaceful environment.

If im home, Im often working in my room/home office. From time to time i host small meetings in my room or living room. Guests are welcome to come and go as they please. Since i have 2 rooms on airbnb i just ask folks to be mindful of other people, shared bathroom and kitchen, etc.  Although i dont normally get to spend a lot of time with guests, I truly enjoy meeting new people and it means so much to me for people to enjoy my home. Given the high rate of gentrification where i live, im also happy to share more about local businesses to support that invest in families who have historically lived in this neighborhood. Feel free to ask!

Coral is a local artist and Sunrise Shell jewelry designer. See (Website hidden by Airbnb) She loves gardening, reading, politics, and meeting people. Ian is a designer, builder and artist on a large scale. He loves hiking, ocean sports, history, politics and interacting with people too.

Cuando mi hija era pequeña todos sus amigos venian a casa antes de ir al cole, despues se marchaban juntos.
Lo que más me gusta es ir a patinar sobre hielo, cuando me pongo los patines parece que voy a volar.
Me gusta mucho leer
Amo a los animales, soy ecologista y casi vegetariana.

I am a first grade teacher who enjoys teaching young children. I grew up in the  the Mid-West and saw the beauty of living in California.  I was born in Venezuela and have always worked on both English and Spanish, and am able to teach both languages.  My dream was to have a home in Hawaii.  I've have spent the last few years traveling  between CA  and many of the Hawaiian Islands in search of the perfect home.  We are settling on the shores of this quaint village.  I am married with one 15 year old son, and one dog Max. I love to hike and the kings trail is close to this house. I love nature and there are wild goats over on Umi street. I love to watch movies and there is netflix at the house. I love geckos and there are brown and green ones at the house. I like deals and the Aloha Beach house is one! There is a king bed now in the master- everytime we go we make the house nicer! It's nicer than our house in California. The master bedroom downstairs is very large and has a queen bed and futon. House can accomodate large groups; I just have to charge extra due to utilities. We get lots of family groups!

This beach house has been a 30 year dream in the making!  It is always so incredible when you see your dreams come true with belief and hard work. Please come and share the  Fantastic Sunsets at  Makai Hideaway- The sunsets are phenomenal and the snorkeling / swimming hole is a two minute walk from the house. The beach is a 15 minute hike from the community center in Milolii. I just enjoyed Easter services with the local people and it was wonderful at the little yellow church in the village. It really is a special place set  near  the last hawaiian fishing village

I'm a travel lover living in Hong Kong. I always find it a wonderful experience meeting people from different culture. I have met some fabulous people and hosts who made my traveling experience especially memorable and sweet, and I would love to offer the same to those who visiting Hong Kong :)

Im an HR Professional currently working for a large not-for-profit organisation. 

We love living in the inner city and the convenience to the city as I tend to meet friends in town to catch up over a drink (cocktail for me) or try a new reataurant. 

In 2011, I started lindy-hop dancing (1930's-40s style) which I absolutely love and now do weekly. The community is great and I love dancing so a much easier way to get some excercise in. 

I also love the beach so do try to stop at the beach or pool on the way home in summer for a swim.

I love travelling and seeing new things - Ive seen a lot of eastern Australia and slowly getting through my large bucket list of things to see overseas.

I've been working as an actor in Istanbul State Theatre and also giving acting lessons in a university.  I am also acting in movies. I enjoy my house very much but need additional money from time to time and also this house very big for one person, so that's why I wanted to share my house with other friends.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: I enjoy meeting new people, I am very easy going and love to cook Italian food.  I welcome all my guests w a home cooked meal. I make really nice lasagna !  I work as a stand up comic and actor. I have few commercials on youtube. Love the Big Crunch and Joey Guacamole. My home is very colorful and full of good vibes. All my beds are comfortable with plenty of pillows. I give out subway maps and keys and explain to you how to get around the city. I will explain to you how to do 5 to 6 main attractions per day. This way you can really enjoy yourselves and take in the sites. A lot of free fun things to do. like walking over the Brooklyn Bridge,  and walking up into Chinatown and Little Italy.  Taking the free ferry to Staten Island, which takes you right by the Statue of Liberty ! Central Park and Times Square ! Museums and much much more. Fun and exciting. Pack your bags and welcome to my home. Happy Day !

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Welcome Everyone! Thank you for stopping by. 

I was born and raised in Manhattan and I am here to help  share the New York City Experience with others through Airbnb!  I am easy to connect with and very reachable and always willing to interact with people. 

I am big on cleanliness and hospitality. I strive on making Guests feel as comfortable as possible. 

I hope you would like to get a chance to visit my location and enjoy the hosting I provide. If you have any questions/ comments, feel free to contact me.

I'm a travel lover living in Hong Kong. I always find it a wonderful experience meeting people from different culture. I have met some fabulous people and hosts who made my traveling experience especially memorable and sweet, and I would love to offer the same to those who visiting Hong Kong :)

Hi,

We are a very small company that is using Airbnb to share our lovely apartments with travelers and adventurers heading to Barcelona. Our  company's journey began in 2013, when we carefully selected and purchased these apartments in barrio PobleSec. Each apartment has been renovated with our own hands, with careful attention to preserving some of the original features that make Barcelona architecture, and style famous. These apartments and the PobleSec barrio will make for a perfect base, for your own Barcelona adventure. 

Barcelona is a fantastic city with a dazzling combination of beach, culture, fascinating people, architecture, unique cuisine and artisans. This is a very rewarding place to live and an exciting city to visit. There is so much to see, taste and experience.  We are excited to host your stay in Barcelona, provide recommendations and help you to have the best experience this great city has to offer!


Safe travels :)

I am new in Airbnb and I am exited to host people. My full name is Enes Kutluca, you can always find me on social media @eneskutluca and have more idea about me.

I am young entrepreneur trying to change our world for a better place. I do own my own business "Biopipe" which is a waste water treatment pipe. 

I like creating, thinking differently and designing new things. 

I believe in sharing culture and I am here to offer my best in the town.

Barcelona Bedroom es una pequeña empresa familiar con más de 50 apartamentos propios repartidos por toda la cuidad de Barcelona.
Estaremos encantados de recibirte y ayudarte en todo lo necesario para que que tengas una agradable estancia. No dudes en contactar con nosotros. Gracias y esperamos verte pronto.


Un saludo!

Mi nombre es Isabel, pero me llamo Isa. Nací en Vigo (Galicia). Con 20 años me fuí a vivir a Madrid con intención de ser actriz; ahora resido en Barcelona desde los 28. Soy una joven de 43 años, cantante de Jazz. Me gusta salir, pero también quedarme en casa a leer o ver alguna buena película.
He compartido piso muchos años, pero estas serán mis primeras experiencias como anfitriona.

¡Sed bienvenidos!

(ES) Soy mujer, mamá y traductora. Me gusta tener tiempo para pensar, viajar, jugar con mis hijas y descubrir algo nuevo cada día. A veces por trabajo tengo que viajar, y entonces mi amiga Yamila, gran mujer y fantástica anfitriona, amante del campo y fotógrafa de profesión, me ayuda con los huéspedes.

(EN) I am a woman, a mother and a translator. I like having time to think, to travel, to play with my daughters and to discover something new every day. Sometimes I have to travel because of my job: in those occasions my friend Yamila, great woman and fantastic host, outdoor lover and photographer, helps me out with guests.

Hello, my name is Bugra. It will be pleasure to meet you while travelling to Istanbul where is the capital city of three successive Empires. 

On behalf of the staff and management, we would like to extend a warm welcome to you and congratulate you for choosing us. 

Warm smiles and friendly service is our policy everyday for every guest.  Our staff truly cares about all your travel needs making your visit comfortable and memorable.

I am a Brazilian/Italian national who has lived in London for the last 30 years. I speak English, Portuguese, Italian and Spanish fluently and like the rest of the world, I love travelling and meeting people from different parts of the world. Other interests include foreign film, reading, astrology and working out (pilates and yoga).

Hello I am Christophe, I am French and live in Barcelona since 8 years now. I know a reasonably well the city and I will be happy to advise you on places to visit, restaurant or where to have a nice drink. 

I work in sales and travel also a lot so I know the meaning of "feel like at home" when you travel somewhere.

I am the owner of Maui Vision Rental. Maui Vision became a reality and a business starting with my personal condo at the Kihei Akahi Resort C618.

Maui Vision is a business I love because I get to share the Aloha Spirit, the beauty of the land, and talk story with people from around the world. It is nice to know that we can contribute to someone’s Hawaiian vacation experience in a positive way. We love to hear back from our happy guests.

I used to live on the island of Oahu with my US Navy family when I was young.  We later moved to Southern California.  I knew one day I would return to Hawaii, the place I fell in love with long ago. I took a leap of faith and purchased my Maui condo June 2002 this was the beginning of fulfilling her prophecy to once again return to Hawaii soil.

I am a tropical expression artist who paints on canvas and etched metal.  My work is inspired by the beauty of the islands and has been displayed in several Maui art galleries over the years.  I am a writer and have my first book on Amazon.  I recently took up hula dancing and love to immerse myself in the culture and grace of this island.

I have over 25 years of business administration and customer service experience working for large corporations and high tech startups.

If you are in need of a caring Realtor here on Maui, please contact Kathy McCartney RS#77317 of La Costa Realty Hawai’i, LLC Brokerage Lic #18349 .

host_about:
Sou carioca, publicitaria, host do Airbnb desde 2011 .
Trabalho com administração de apartamentos por temporada e ajudo alguns anfitriões como cohost. 
Adoro fotografia e sou apaixonada por fotos de ambientes internos, sou fotógrafa também. 

Adoro viajar e uma vez por ano tiro alguns dias de férias para conhecer algum lugar do mundo afinal, é preciso saber viver e aproveitar a vida pra manter a alma em equilibro.  

Gosto muito desta atividade e você pode contar  comigo pra te ajudar a hospedar ou até mesmo para te hospedar :) 

Estamos aí! 


I'm from Rio de Janeiro, an advertising company, host of Airbnb since 2011.
I work with apartment management by season and I help some hosts like cohost.

I love photography and I'm in love with indoor photography, I'm a photographer too.

I love to travel and once a year I take a few days of vacation to know some place in the world after all, it is necessary to know how to live and enjoy life to keep the soul in balance.

I really like this activity and you can count on me to help you host or even to host you :)

See you soon!

Aloha! I’m Megan Love and I own a bed and breakfast in Kona, HI called The Megan Love House! It’s awesome and you should definitely come stay with us!  It’s a four bedroom four bathroom house in a beautiful gated community right by the beach. I live in the downstairs bedroom with my boyfriend Jacob and we are expecting a baby in May :) Our house is quite big and we have a lot of spaces to relax and unwind. I have the option of renting just one room or all three rooms either way we are always here and We love hosting and meeting new people. We are both great chefs and love impressing guests with our delicious healthy breakfasts. Jake and I don’t go on Vacays that often due to always (thankfully) being super busy with the bed and breakfast but we definitely want to travel more and see more of the islands and the world! In the mean time we will be here in Hawaii so come visit us and enjoy our home in paradise :) Aloha

Hawaii Beach Homes is a boutique agency that offers reservations for a small selection of beach front rentals on the beautiful island of Oahu.  

Hawaii Beach Homes is a travel agency licensed in the state of Hawaii. We specialize in booking beach homes for visitors, and are not a property management company. We carefully select each property we reserve for our clients. Our staff is familiar with every house, beach, and neighborhood on Oahu, and we love nothing more than helping you choose the perfect spot. We understand that a trip to Hawaii is an experience of a life time for many of our guests.  Our goal is to ensure that you feel truly at home while in Hawaii and to assist you in experiencing true Aloha.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: I have a love of travel and people and am excited when I get to meet good people and explore the world.  I have lived on 3 different continents and am eager to spend time on the other 4. We are a family of five with three grade school age children.   We are living out of the US for a couple of years and are happy to rent out our house when we are gone.   Fort Greene is an incredible neighborhood and we always love being able to give our guests a taste of "real life" in NYC.

Taking life break after 15 years studying and working in Australia. Enjoy and love to travel around and meet people, share culture differences. Learn new recipes, try on different kind of delicious food.

Conocer lugares nuevos es una de mis pasiones y sobretodo hacerlo a mi aire. Por eso en todos mis viajes me alojo en un apartamento. Esta es una de las razones por las que dejé mi trabajo en una importante empresa de servicios empresariales y ahora me dedico a seleccionar apartamentos y gestionarlos en mi ciudad. De esta forma puedo ofrecer a mis huéspedes los apartamentos del estilo que a busco cuando viajo! Espero que os gusten tanto como a mí!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Moro no Rio de Janeiro, nascida em Salvador. Resolvi alugar este apartamento,  principalmente por que gosto muito de viajar e quando viajo, prefiro alugar um espaço para ficar. Alugar um apartamento em outra cidade, outro país, além de ser mais barato do que hotel, possibilita uma maior interação com os moradores locais e um maior conhecimento sobre o seu modo de vida. Como são os supermercados e as padarias, o que vendem ali ? qual é o dia a dia da população?  Além disto não há horário para o café da manhã e posso fazer um lanche ou almoço se não quiser ir a um restaurante.
Procuro trazer as minhas experiências de hospedagem para o meu apartamento, pois quero que o hóspede se sinta confortável, em casa.
Além de gostar muito de viajar, adoro ler e ouvir música e pretendo com o dinheiro que ganho hospedando, poder me hospedar mais pelo mundo a fora.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
※ENGLISH※ESPAÑOL※FRANÇAIS

Hi there!

I`m Rafaela, a professional actress who loves the arts.

I have a degree in Theater Theory from the Federal University of the State of Rio de Janeiro.

I started receiving people through AirBnB at the 2016 Olympics and since then Edson, my co-host, and I have welcomed more than 500 guests from over 29 countries across 5 continents.

Thanks to AirBnB I discovered a new passion beyond the arts and traveling. I discovered the pleasure of learning new languages and being able to communicate with people from different cultures.

Maybe I will greeting you in your language. Who Knows?

Rio is amazing! Come see for yourself!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
¡Hola!

Soy Rafaela, una actriz profesional que ama el arte.

Tengo un título en Teoría del Teatro de la Universidad Federal del Estado de Río de Janeiro.

Comencé a recibir huéspedes a través del AirBnB en los Juegos Olímpicos de 2016  y desde entonces, yo y Edson, mi coanfitrión, hemos dado la bienvenida a más de 500 huéspedes de 29 países de los 5 continentes.

Gracias a AirBnB, descubrí una nueva pasión más allá del arte y los viajes. Descubrí el placer de aprender nuevos idiomas y poder comunicarme con personas de diferentes culturas.

Tal vez te saludo en tu idioma. ¿Quién sabe?

Rio es increíble! ¡Ven a verlo tu mismo!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Salut!

Je suis Rafaela, une actrice professionnelle qui aime les arts.

J'ai un diplôme en théorie du théâtre de l'Université Fédérale de l'État de Rio de Janeiro.

J'ai commencé à recevoir des invités par le biais d'AirBnB aux Jeux Olympiques de 2016 et depuis, Edson, mon co-hôte, et moi-même avons accueilli plus de 500 invités de plus de 29 pays sur les 5 continents.

Grâce à AirBnB, j'ai découvert une nouvelle passion au-delà des arts et des voyages. J'ai découvert le plaisir d'apprendre de nouvelles langues et de pouvoir communiquer avec des personnes de cultures différentes.

Peut-être que je vais vous saluer dans votre langue. Qui sait?

Rio est incroyable! Venez voir par vous-même!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Olá!!
Seja bem vindo!
Eu adoro conhecer novas pessoas, compartilhar ensinamentos e pontos de vista. 
Amo a natureza, respirar um puro ar e me sentir conectada a energia da terra.
Me sinto muito feliz em receber convidados simpáticos que desejam experimentar ótimos momentos no Rio e desfrutar das alegrias e belezas deste lugar que eu tanto amo.
Botafogo é um bairro  onde a vida histórica e contemporânea convivem com charme a harmonia. Rodeado por montanhas e ruas arborizadas, viver em  Botafogo tem custo mais baixo que os outros bairros da zona sul, aqui é repleto de restaurantes, bares, feiras, museus e eventos culturais que acontecem com muita frequência, o bairro fica a poucos minutos do centro do Rio e dos principais pontos turísticos. A vila onde a casa está localizada foi construída há quase 100 anos, tem muitas árvores que recebem a visita de adoráveis animais da Mata Atlântica.
  A poucos minutos de caminhada  você encontrará a "Praia de Botafogo" que compõem uma das vistas mais incríveis do Rio, se preferir pegue o caminho oposto e dê um pulinho na Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas, de lá aproveite pra curtir o por do sol no Arpoador.
  Durante muito anos o Rio de Janeiro foi a capital do Brasil, então imagine passear entre as centenárias ruas de paralelepípedos do Centro do Rio, rodeado por prédios memoráveis de  belíssima arquitetura do século 19. 
  O bairro da Urca, onde abriga o bondinho do Pão de Açúcar, está a menos de 15 minutos de ônibus ou táxi.
  O Cristo Redentor  pode ser visto da janela  e você pode chegar a subida do Morro do Corcovado em apenas 15 minutos de ônibus ou táxi.
 Será um prazer compartilhar todas as dicas e lugares especiais que conheci ao longo dos meus anos de vida nesta cidade maravilhosa.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Sou casado, tenho uma mulher muito especial e quatro filhos - dois casais. Os filhos moram fora do pais (USA) e as filhas - com os meus netos - vivem nesta cidade maravilhosa. A leitura. meu principal hobby, disputa a preferencia com o xadrez que jogo há muito tempo e agora por pura diversão. Morando ao lado da praia, as cidades hidrominerais em Minas e São Paulo são nossas constantes visitas, quando não estamos com os netos nos Estados Unidos. 
Meu neto de cinco anos adora o apto. que estamos alugando e desde pequenino já sabia quando estávamos chegando, dizendo - estamos na Barra, estamos na Barra...
O Airbnb é nossa primeira experiência, e estamos um pouco preocupados. Ficariamos muito contentes de alugar para pessoas que tivessem os mesmos cuidados e carinho pelo lugar onde moram.

We love travel, music, dance, family, growing food for ourselves and our community, sharing horse wisdom and skills with keiki and horse enthusiasts,  living in harmony with the Aina, and continually learning and growing with this beautiful Hawaiian community.  We are thankful to be living on 15 epic acres, pouring our hearts and souls into developing our organic gardens, orchards, medicinal herbal patches, forging pathways to our waterfalls and secret healing garden and spa.  We co-create with master artists, musicians and healers to realize our vision of providing a peaceful and inspiring landscape for earth travelers to come, rest, be nourished in so many ways and leave refreshed, inspired and hopefully with a deeper appreciation and love of this magical place we call home.

I'm a publisher and an author based in Paris. I have set up and managed the French office of Lonely Planet during 10 years. Beside the 6 years I've spent in New York where I worked for the United Nations, among other things, I have travelled all over the world. Especially in Asia. Three years ago, I fell in love with  Porto where I bought my house and renovated it. I love to go there whenever I have a chance. What makes me really happy ? Travelling, cooking, books and films and share time with my friends.

More about us below but First a Lava and Park Update as of 1.16.19
Hawaii Volcanoes National Park has reopened on Septemb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) However due to the Government shut down limited areas within the main Park are accessible. Still very much worth the visit.  The Kahuku Units remains open.

After three months of eruptions in lower Puna punctuated by a damaging wildfire that burned nearly 3,800 acres of forest on Mauna Loa and Hurricane Lane lashing the Island with heavy rains and strong winds at the end of August the Island of Hawaii is in recovery mode and regaining normalcy.  AND we have a new Black Sand Beach at Pohoiki which IS accessible.

The USGS and Hawaiian Volcano Observatory are reporting that sulfur dioxide emissions at Kilauea summit and in the Lower East Rift Zone in Puna, where lava flows were occurring, have fallen drastically since the start of August and are at their lowest combined level in more than a decade.

Kilauea's latest eruption began May 3 with lava flowing continuously until Aug. 6. The affected Puna area, in the southeast corner of the island comprises one percent of the island of Hawaii, which is larger than all of the other Hawaiian Islands combined.  We are in Upper Puna and were not affected by the flow.
Visit Hawaii Volcanoes National Park   OR  USGS Kilauea for future updates.

KAEO is an enthusiastic gardener,occasional travel agent, sometimes Hula Girl, Hawaii born, ambassador to the culture, caregiver, former Ad exec and sometimes 'pretty good cook'.  She has lived on Oahu, Maui and now the "best"-Island of Hawaii.  I've hiked hundreds on miles on ALL the islands, in past days:  Mauna Loa, Waimanu, Polipoli, Waihee, Wailau, Hauula, the Koolaus & Wainae Mountains.  A kayak trip to Kalalau circumvented the difficult 10.8m hike.  KARL is a master tile setter and works on all phases of the Carpentry, Remodel & Building Industry.  He built Eco Hale; we estimate using at least 60% re-purposed materials.  He also built our home in Mountain View and worked with his family numerous times on the Mainland and Hawaii to build their homes.  He is a Huge sports fan (Raiders in particular).  Karl comes from a family that simply needs their toothbrush when someone announces "Road Trip"; hence thousands of miles visiting U.S. parks, cities and sights.  Our romance began on the island of Maui and our adventure, commitment and curiosity to/for one another continues.
We love the entrepreneurial, independent alternative lifestyle and very much enjoy sharing our slice of paradise in the rain forest.  Our lives have been enriched by the many guests from around the world who enjoy privacy and nature.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Olá, Sou o Armando Machado.

Sou carioca, apaixonado pelas cidades do Rio de Janeiro e de Florianópolis. Sou amante de viagens, e gosto de andar de moto e fazer Snowboard. 

O projeto do Jurerê Loft nasceu de muitas idas à Ilha da Magia, e decidi que precisava de um bom motivo para voltar mais vezes. Decidi investir nos apartamentos assim que os vi. O Alex me apresentou cada um dos 4, me apaixonei e pensei: Porquê não transformar esses lofts em uma experiência mágica para os hóspedes do mundo todo? Até hoje o Alex me ajuda com a gestão do Airbnb e a cada comentário elogiando o local e nosso atendimento, me sinto de fato realizado.

Tudo que temos aprendido nesse tempo de Airbnb tem nos ensinado muito, e espero sempre oferecer uma excelente experiência na estadia dos nossos hóspedes!

Estou sempre disponível para dúvidas sobre qualquer uma das cidades, dicas e sugestões (Sempre bem vindas).

Um Grande Abraço!
____________________________________

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
In truth, I started with airbnb to bring in some additional funds.  In reality, I never knew this could be so much fun!  I love meeting people from all over the states and all over the world, including Croatia, Germany, Israel and Vermont!  

If you're renting one bedroom from me, my bedroom/bathroom are upstairs, so you'll see me around breakfast; but, I work a lot and want you to feel like the place is your own - to enjoy the tv/stereo in the living room, to cook meals in the kitchen, and to come and go without feeling like you need to check in.  At the same time, if you need anything from me, please let me know and I'll do my best to make it happen!

If you're renting the full place, I know you will enjoy your yourselves.  The apartment is big (even by non-NYC standards); comfortable, but not pretentious.  And, of course, there's Allie the cat, who is totally sweet and very people-friendly (though, sadly, she doesn't like other critters).

Let me know if you have questions.  I'll be happy to host you!

I am a retired solicitor living in our home with my wife Judith who is a high school French teacher. Currently two of our three grown-up children live with us and we have a spare room. We have always had guests in our house since the children were very little and it is something that we would like to continue doing as I believe connecting with other people and learning about different cultures is wonderful. 
We love film, food, travel and music. This is a very musical household. Sport is also a very big thing- you will always find somebody watching the tennis/cricket/football on the television or going for a wok or bike ride. 
We ourselves love Airbnb and have used it all over the world in recent years. In Canada, France, South America and of course all around here in Australia. 
My life motto: you could die tomorrow so live life to the full!

Hey! I'm A, absolutely love travelling, eating carbs with some good wine and helping people. 
First encounter with Airbnb was in Japan and loved the concept, our hosts helped us through and through. 
I thought to myself, why not help people with their holidays in my favourite city in the world, Sydney!! So here i am!! I will do my very best to make sure you enjoy your stay!! One Love! x

Hi there,

My name is Enrique and I am a Barcelona Local. I have always loved traveling myself, but also sharing the beauty and wonders of Barcelona with others, so a few years ago I started renting out 2 apartments to travelers coming to the city, always meeting everyone in person so I could share my insights and hidden secrets about Barcelona :)

Now I rent out a few more apartments and it is no longer just me, but we are a small team of people managing the apartments together, but with the same focus on personal and attentive services in authentic apartments that allow for the genuine Barcelona feel for your trip! We call our little team Stay U-nique, because of this focus on a unique feeling when staying with us.

If you have any questions, want to hear about an apartment or just say hi, don´t hesitate to reach out :)

Have a great day!
Enrique

Aloha,
Here at Punahoa Oceanfront Vacation Rental's in Kihei, Maui Hawaii.  We offer Studios, One bedrooms, Two bedrooms, and One Bedroom Penthouses that is Ocean front and located right on the beach!  The amenities we provide in Punahoa is FREE PARKING, FREE WIFI INTERNET ACCESS CODE, & FULLY EQUIPPED KITCHEN / KITCHENETTES.  
Inside the units additional amenities such as:

- Hair dryer, Shampoo, Conditioner.

-Small cooler for your usage to take out and enjoy/travel beach or long drive around Maui.

-Beach chair & beach towels

On property we have two outside shower stalls to rinse off after enjoying your time at the beach.

We also have a gas barbecue grill.

Spectacular sunsets and perfect location for surfer's, stand up paddle boarding, and kayak.  Snorkeling from the Cove beach to Charley Young's beach is a must!  We frequently have visits from tired Honu's (Hawaiian sea turtles) resting on our shores / beach.  

***Please be respectful and DO NOT TOUCH/ FEED/ OR BOTHER THE HAWAIIAN SEA TURTLES & HAWAIIAN MONK SEALS!***

Send us a message or any inquires for additional information, we would love to welcome you to be our guest, stay with us here at Punahoa oceanfront vacation rentals, in Kihei Maui Hawaii!  Aloha nui loa!

- Zaldy 

Within walking distances from Fresh local farmers market and produces, outlets and little boutiques, variety of restaurants and bars, rent stand up paddle boards, boogie boards, and snorkeling gears.  Located right on the beach between Maui's famous Charley Young's beach & The Cove.  Close by Kalama beach park and playground.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Minhas viagens favoritas? Todas as que me emocionam. De Cancún a um pulo em Petrópolis, cada uma é única :)

Impossível definir as minhas músicas favoritas, pois cada uma me toca de maneira diferente de acordo com o momento ou como estou me sentindo. Minha playlist atual no carro tem: Muse, Great American Songbook, One Republic, Mads Langer, Florence, etc. 

Falando sobre comida... é mais fácil dizer o q não gosto: dobradinha, mocotó e bife de fígado (mto embora o cheiro seeempre me deixe com água na boca... pena q o gosto não é igual ao cheiro rrssss), simplificando, comer é, definitivamente, um dos meus prazeres.

Hello, I am responsible for the reservations of that property. 
The apartments are very clean and well equipped; however feel free to ask any item you could miss, or cannot find. We will try to provided it during your stay. 
The properties are rented in whole, No sharing with other guests or owner. 
I live in O Porto and i will be always available to take care of your check in and assist you during your stay. 
Looking forward to have the pleasure to welcome you and provide you a memorable stay! 

I speak fluently English, Portuguese and a little bit of  Spanish. 
I take your reservation very seriously and I never cancel. 
Please make first an inquiry clicking on the button: "contact me" 
Than I will reply to your request with a accurate offer. At this point you are free to book it on line. 
I do not advise you to press the button "book it" because some dates may have 5 nights minimum stay policy or are on hold. 
I did decline some reservations 24 hours after the guest book it, but I never cancelled it. 
Kind regards, Bruno

Je vous propose une location de vacances au Sunset Suites, le choix parfait pour le temps libre des voyageurs qui veulent le confort d’un atmosphère a la maison loin de chez eux avec les services d’un hôtel. Sunset Suites satisfait principalement les voyageurs de longue durée (7 jours ou plus), mais je fais de mon mieux pour héberger les voyageurs recherchant un séjour de 3 jours minimum.

ALOHA !  E komo mai . . . and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!  

Captain Cook Resorts manages over 140 privately owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu).  Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!  

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

Provided with your rental:

• Bed linens, bath, beach & kitchen towels, dishes, silverware, cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
• Beach chairs
• Hair dryer, iron & ironing board
• Several days’ supply of coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, 2oz shampoo & 2oz conditioner, paper goods (paper towels, tissue, toilet paper), and basic cleaning supplies. Additional sundry and food items are available local markets and grocery stores, for example, Safeway, at 888 Kapahulu Avenue, or Costco at 525 Alakawa Street (between the airport and Waikiki).
 
Not provided with your rental:
 
• Beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Zip-Lock baggies, coffee, condiments, seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, bleach, and hand lotion.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

Aloha: This Kihei Bay Surf spacious, comfortable studio suite is across the street from the ocean. Its ideal location in North Kihei is close to restaurants, many beaches, and interesting activities. From your lanai, you will see an ancient Hawaiian fish pond where green sea turtles sometimes come to bask; there is a quiet, shaded park, the Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale National Marine Sanctuary (the only sanctuary dedicated to to humpback whales), and an awesome Indian restaurant right on the ocean. Located near the beginning of the longest uninterrupted white sand beach in the whole state, you can run (or walk) from our unit all the way (six miles -in front of Kihei Canoe Club, Maui Canoe Club and a few condos to the protected area along the Kealia Pond National Wildlife Refuge and board walk) to Maalaea Harbor (with the excellent Maui Ocean Center, Maui Golf & Sports park for the kids, many restaurants, Pacific Whale Foundation - and a bus stop to deliver you back in front of Kihei Bay Surf. Our complex has a good swimming pool, hot jacuzzi, tennis courts, BBQ area, and clean laundry facilities. 

Our corner unit is bigger and has more light than most of the other units in our complex. The wrap-around lanai offers more space than the other units as well. It has a queen bed and a sofa couch for sleeping. The unit has been renovated and upgraded several times since my mom first lived there when she arrived on Maui from Chicago in 1985 to teach English at Maui College. She loved her job and Kihei -- and she met a nice, handsome counsellor working at the college. They got married - and had me. 

And I just got married in August to my beautiful bride, who has a 8-year-old son. We feel very blessed. And we hope to share our love of place with you. 

At KBS, you will be close to Kihei Canoe Club, where both my mom and I have done competitive outrigger canoe paddling. You can experience being out on the water if you go to the KCC Visitor Paddle on Tuesday or Thursday morning. Get there by 7:15 am to make sure you get a spot. During the winter, you may see whales while you are on the water. Allow a couple of hours for the experience. My mom is a volunteer for the HIHWNMS - the free museum and whale sanctuary across the street. On Tuesdays and Thursdays, you can hear a free lecture from 11am until noon about the Humpback Whales. The museum is open from 10am-3pm, Monday-Friday, and on the last Saturday of the month from 10am-1pm. The mission is to educate the public and protect humpback whales and other marine life and our environment. 

Another activity that is nearby is Hawaiian singing, ukulele, and hula on Thursday nights from 7-8:30 pm. at the Keolahou Church, 177 S. Kihei Rd. It is joyful - and a glimpse of Hawaiian culture. 

Come stay. We think you will have a wonderful time.

Retired, father of four, with five grand children. Enjoy hiking, reading, travel, sing in a men's quartet and Denver First Universalist Church choir, active in Jefferson Chapter of American Humanist Association. Own second home on Kona Coast of the Big Island of Hawaii. Sell jewelry at library conferences in seven states to support libraries in emerging countries. Enjoy movies and  cooking. I travel every spring with my wife, Nancy Bolt, to Bulgaria and one other European destination.  We love to attend shows on Broadway. We try to spend three or four months of each year in Hawaii to avoid cold Colorado winters.  Nancy is a retired librarian but is still active in the American Library Assn. and the International Federation of Library Associations.  She also creates jewelry to sell at various farmer's markets in Hawaii. We love movies, and engage in funding and campaigning for Democratic political candidates at all levels of government.

Good luck to all of you who is reading this profile writing! :)

ALOHA and WELCOME to Waikiki, Honolulu on Oahu!  Thank you for your interest in one of our vacation rentals.  We are a TEAM of professionals who manage individually owned condo apartments for the owners when they aren't using them within several different condo / hotel buildings in Waikiki.   We offer a range of accommodations types from small studio apartments (with or without kitchenettes) to 2 bedroom residences with full kitchens.  

We want your stay to be an enjoyable one and finding the right match for you is key.  As a general guideline, there are many different types of buildings and hotel-type of arrangements.  For those doing Hawaii on a budget, studios offer the best of both worlds providing a clean, private place to stay within walking distance to the BEACH at affordable prices (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities).   For those looking for nicer or larger accommodations, then you should target $150/night off season to $250/night peak season (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities, building amenities, parking included).  If you are looking for an Ocean-front experience, then target $350- $400/night and for a luxury experience, $500 to over $1000/night.  Hawaii offers something for everyone at every price point!  

Our vacation rental units are privately owned and managed.  We offer an alternative to the hotel experience allowing our guests to “live like a local” in paradise whether be for a few days, a few weeks or a few months.  Our units are well maintained, repaired when necessary and treated routinely with pest control services.  We try not to interrupt our guests during their stay, and if the unexpected happens, we do our best to resolve it quickly with the least inconvenience to our guests.   Upon arrival, we try to meet all our guests personally to register, check-in, and answer any questions.  And if you’re running late don’t worry, we can make arrangements no matter the hour and register you in the office the next day.  

Stop by our real estate office, ground floor of Kuhio Village.  We are there daily to assist and share this incredibly beautiful island, local eateries, activities and entertainment found in Waikiki and around the island.  We look forward to hosting you in one of our vacation rental units and helping to make your stay a fantastic one.  A hui hou (until we meet again)!

Aloha & Mahalo nui loa (Hello/Goodbye & Thank you very much),
Hawaii Dream Realty Team, Hi’ilani, Luise & Theresa
Hawaii Dream Realty LLC RB-19373, Theresa Harden PB (R) RB-19372

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Photographer/Developer. 
I enjoy NYC tremendously but love traveling and have visited
over 40 countries. My house is filled with artwork from those travels.
I work my photography business from my home studio, in a restored 1890 landmark townhouse with all the modern amenities.
My house has been used for filming scenes for Sex & The City, The Sopranos, Gossip Girl & White Collar.
My photography column,"Orestes'LIC", appears every month in the local paper.
I love Asian, Spanish & Cuban food, along with a good bottle of red wine.
Talking about travel, art, design and photograph,is my favorite pastime. Sorry,I dont shop or know where the best electronics bargains are located ! 
I love giving great walking tour information of different parts of NYC, and info on non-touristy places to eat real food in the area.
I will provide you the privacy level you require to make your stay here is as comfortable as possible.
Enjoy a great, clean, stylish place to stay, only 7 minutes from Manhattan!

Hello, I'm originally from the LA area but have been back in Hong Kong for about 6 years. I also spent some time on the east coast of the U.S. in the Washington, D.C. area. I teach middle school math at an international school here in Hong Kong and have enjoyed the lifestyle of living and working in this vibrant city. 

Hong Kong has always had plenty of options to stay active. I've played in an expat softball league here for many years and still try to get out as much as I can. When I first arrived, I did a few of the popular hikes, but not so much anymore unfortunately. There are still some places in Hong Kong that I would like to explore and I also find the city to be a great hub for travelling throughout southeast Asia. 

I'm new to Airbnb and open to suggestions on making your stay in Hong Kong an enjoyable experience. Nice to meet you!

My team and I at The Apartment Service are proud to have been helping people with short and long stay apartment rentals across Sydney since 1989. 

Property professionals say location is everything and we believe that a convenient location is essential, especially in the rental market. We can offer you some of the best locations accross all the major areas of Sydney, and all of our  apartments are carefully selected for their proximity to cafes, key business and retail districts, public transport, and tourist hotspots.

Furnished apartments are a cost-effective alternative to five star hotels and have the added advantage of feeling like you are staying in your own home with separate lounges, kitchens and laundries, and modern appliances.

We've found Airbnb to be a perfect fit for our apartments and we're proud to have achieved a high volume of 5 star reviews consistently since joining. 

Please don't hesitate to view our 150+ properties listed on Airbnb across all areas of Sydney, and do get in touch for quick and friendly assistance.
I love beautiful Sydney and would like to show all my clients how wonderful Sydney is.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
I'm a 52-year old Brazilian guy, who is truly having a great time being a host in Rio! A little about me: I was born in small town who came to Rio to study Engineering and have been living here for the past 35 years. I love this city and know it quite well, please give me a chance to show it to you. For 25 years I have worked in Finance and Mine Engineering, now I'm at a phase of better life quality, working as a consultant from my home office. I live in a big penthouse, which I'm gradually improving. I've tried Airbnb before as a guest and since mid-2014 I've been a host. I try to become a friend to my guests, helping them to take the best of my wonderful city with safety and comfort. I speak fluent English, Spanish, Portuguese (of course), but I also understand German and other Latin-based languages. I have a young mind, love outdoors activity, bike, running at the beach, but also reading, music (from rock to opera) and travel. I'm quite easygoing, sociable and talkative. Hope to see you soon in Rio!



Ich bin 52 Jahre alt, Brasilianer, von einem kleiner Stadt wer kommte nach Rio um Inginieurswissenschaft studieren und hier geblieben. Für 25 Jahre, arbeitete ich mit Finanz und auch im Bergbau,  jetzt bin ich ein Früh-Rentner, mit meinen einigen Büro zur Hause. Ich wohne in Copacabana in einem grosser Wohnung und habe neulich etwa Rennovierung gemacht. Ich hoffe dass Sie mir eine Chance geben eine Chance um Sie meine schöne Stadt zu zeigen! Ich bin sehr lebhafter, radfahre im Strand jeden Morgen, spreche flüssig Englisch + Spanisch (und natürlich Portugiesisch), verstehe auch andere Sprache. Es gefällt mir zuviel yu reisen, ich bin schon in vielen Länder gewesen, so ich galube ich verstehe was Sie brauchen für die beste Reise nach Rio erleben. Wilkommen Sie, es freut mich Ihre Bekanntschaft zu machen!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Leonardo was born and raised in Rio de Janeiro, along with his multilingual skills, has enabled Leonardo to form an international career.  He speaks English, French, Spanish, German, his native Portuguese and a little bit of mandarin, and has travelled to over 50 countries - dealing with many different cultures, people and markets - where he has given marketing and sales lectures, presentations, all the while developing his own sales strategies.  Leonardo lived in Switzerland working in the fashion industry, and upon returning to Brazil he worked for Brazil's top multinational jeweler in a sales capacity, 2 years of which was managing its international store about the Queen Mary 2 luxury cruise ship.  
Leonardo and Archanjo are together for the last twenty one  years.
Archanjo was Advertisement/Marketing Execute Manager and Teacher of the biggest private University in Brazil.
 He taught several disciplines such as Creation, Art Direction, Experimental Projects Orientation, Graphic Computing, Strategy Plans, Sales, CRM, Customers Behavior, etc. He speaks English, Spanish, French and Italian.
His career was developed since a trainee to the High Administration of the University.
They did decide to join in the segment of rentals like partners.
Both of them are graduated in Publicity and Media, MBA in Marketing and Executive Management experience.
'We don't sale a simple stay. We provide excellent experiences.'

Four friends, a lot of dreams, a common path

Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends: Rosa, Tania, Igor and Nuno. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privelege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Quatro amigos, muitos sonhos, um caminho em comum

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos: a Rosa, a Tânia, o Igor e o Nuno. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

We live in Sydney and run an executive accommodation business in Sydney and Brisbane. All our apartments are located in high-demand inner-city locations, a short distance from the CBD. Whether you’re on a business trip or vacation for a few days, or are after a longer stay due to relocating or home renovations, we have executive accommodation to suit your needs. Our apartments offer everything you require for a short-term or long-term stay. All our apartments are fully furnished and have a fully equipped kitchen (complete with all kitchenware), a washing machine and dryer, a brand new flatscreen tv and a Nespresso coffee machine, along with an initial supply of capsules for you to enjoy. We provide linen and towels, platinum Foxtel (cable tv) access and free wifi in every apartment. We pride ourselves on our customer service, ensuring that your stay is a uniquely positive experience. We encourage guests to provide feedback, and regularly update our apartments and services based on your recommendations. We look forward to having you to stay and aim to ensure you keep coming back.

I am a citizen of Porto.
I have lived in other places and knew different cities in the world, but Porto is the place that attracts me to live the most.

My basic background is in applied mathematics, subsequently I took the option to continue the family business in the area of restoration and trade of antiques, activity that I still keep. 
Interior decoration is also an area that interests me.

I have no training on the tourism sector, so, my interpretation in this project, is to welcome and host according to the traditions of Porto, while sharing a characteristic family house and its pieces of art.

Joanne – I’ve always loved to travel and even though my three boys now keep me closer to my home in Sydney’s Inner West, I take every opportunity to enjoy family holidays in apartments and houses booked online throughout Australia and New Zealand.

Ali – I’ve been living in the Blue Mountains since 1993, so I could be called a local! This means I have a wealth of knowledge about this amazing part of Australia that I have decided to call home. It also means that I have the opportunity to stay in some of the most beautiful and unique houses in the world.
This was our home and we loved living here, however we have extended our family and now have a little boy so we decided to move into a slightly bigger house on Maui.

The Porto Concierge ajuda  os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

Wahoo! Celebrating over SEVEN YEARS of hosting over 2,500 people from dozens of nations! Yay!! Superhosts! Committed to giving you the best stay possible at an affordable price.

Chris:  Wishes she could live outside, 80% of the time. Happy, pleasant, and harmonious. Collects Christmas ornaments, and new plants. Married to an ambitious artist; cares for two sweet puppy dogs.
Loves...
- lists ;)
- miniature pigs, goats, chickens (I hope to have a mini farm one day!!) 
- to run, do yoga, and lift weights
- write
- sew 
- anything relating to the great outdoors
- gardening in our backyard and making our block even more beautiful
- flowers
- family

Zach: originally from Texas. Artist, likes cheese, his pups, and New York. Works from home part time, an adjunct professor part-time, a website manager part-time and as an assistant part-time, and loves to visit galleries and hear artists' lectures. Lots of odd jobs, and lots of hustle in this city, chasing our passions. 

We love helping people navigate the city by sharing useful tips and recommendations of places to eat and see! Hosting on Airbnb is a great experience, as we get to meet so many wonderful people from around the world. We love to learn about other cultures and share ours as well! 

We have over 1700 bookings in nearly 8 years!! We have met over 2,500 different travelers! What a great experience! 

In our minds, a great guest is someone who first feels welcome in our home, and treats it as they would their own. A great guest treats others as they want to be treated, and leaves a shared space just as they found it, if not better! A great guest doesn't hesitate to speak up when in need. A great guest knows we are human, imperfect, and not a five star hotel, but two folks just trying to do our best to give you the most comfortable vacation accommodations ever. 

When we travel on Airbnb, we strive to be these guests who make someone's home a better place! We hope to stay with you soon.

Bonjour!

Je suis bibliothécaire et étudiante à la maitrise. J'habite un joli 5 1/2 en plein coeur d'Outremont, à deux pas du Mile End, à proximité de cafés, boulangeries, restaurants et du fameux St-Viateur Bagel! Une station de Métro est a 5 minutes de marche. 

Je serai prête à vous guider vers les endroits gourmands intéressants à Montréal et peux très bien vous assister dans vos recherches (c'est ma spécialité) de trucs à voir.

Je travaille le plus souvent de la maison, sur mon mémoire.
Voyageurs d'affaire bienvenus!

-----

Hello!

I'm a librarian and master student. I live in a cosy 5 1/2 in the heart of Outremont, close to Mile End and the famous St-Viateur bagels. On the street you can find cafés, bakeries, restaurants with terrasses. The closest subway station is a 5 minutes walk away.

I can surely guide you and help you find any activities you'd like to do while in Montreal. I mostly work on my thesis from home.

Imagine the ultimate lifestyle that comes with combining the ultimate destinations and a unique vacation home, allowing you to wake up to a new scenery outside your private veranda anytime you wish.

That is what life is like when you are staying with HOMES IN BLUE, a rental company that started in Barcelona and offers you exclusive short and long term rentals that seeks to recreate the feeling of being at home, despite being in another city. We like to make you discover all the comforts of your own home, including the highest standards of quality and comfort - the enjoyment of all services that provide a superior hotel in a unique private living space. In addition we offer a inside look of the most updated chic restaurants, shops, local delicatessen, VIP areas, trendy bars, etc., according to the latest urban trends and the coolest cities on the planet. Our urbanite taste and character makes each singular living space a place capable of harmonizing art, technology and design. The exquisite selection of details that decorate our rooms naturally integrates the latest technology with a unique modern taste. 

Residents & guests enjoy extensive time in each destination, expert guides and in-depth expeditions to dense cities, ancient archeological wonders and modern-day marvels like anything you could experience elsewhere.

Our idea is to create something unique that makes the world special. Don’t miss this window of opportunity to witness our spectacular collection of unique homes and lifestyle.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We are a gay couple in our 30s looking to share our home with folks of any race, sexual orientation & gender. We also have 2 super friendly cats. 

I (Lori-on the right, with sunglasses) work as a 1 on 1 for preschool children with special needs (SEIT). I travel all over Brooklyn and Manhattan with my backpack full of crayons, stickers and games, helping one kid at a time. I'm a big foodie and even grow some of my own organic herbs in the apartment. I love to cook & bake and typically prepare paleo and whole30 approved meals.  

I (Jen-on the left) am a teacher and artist who wears many hats in the dance field. I work with middle school, high school and college students of all levels as well as present my work throughout NY and beyond. I also enjoy cooking and have a special knack for organizing. 

Typically we hang with friends, go to shows or enjoy a meal together a few nights a week. When nothing is planned, you'll find us reading, listening to music, watching TV or catching up on paperwork.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Originally from Hong Kong. An aspired child psychiatrist just graduated from Columbia University. I am currently working as a medical interpreter at Mount Sinai hospitals, and doing research at the New York Psychiatric Institute, while preparing for the Medical College Admission Test in a few months. 

I have been living in the city for 3 years, and I am enjoying every moment here. I like to travel the world and being around different people; and I love food/cooking, the sun, outdoor activities, jazz, my Ducati Monster and beer.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: I am a pianist and have been studying at The Juilliard School, Yale University, and Johns Hopkins University. I love to travel to concerts/music festivals around the world and enjoy to meet new friends and experience different cultures. I also love to welcome you to stay in my lovely apartments each in one of the best neighborhoods in New York and Baltimore, hope you may enjoy these two cities as much as I do!

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Entrepreneur and tech enthusiast raised in Queens, NY. Lover of nature, biking, DIY projects, and whole foods. Positive vibes :) 

When I travel I hope to see glimpses of new beauty in new places. 

As a host I'm pretty hands off, though I'm always available if you need suggestions on things to do or where to catch a bite to eat. My places have everything you need; just bring your clothes. 

Welcome!

I have lived and worked at many places around the world and nothing enhance my experience more than a comfortable home away from home; somewhere I can work, study, relax and recharge. This is why I aim to make my place a clean, safe, comfortable and convenient home for you. 

You can expect arrive to a clean, well maintained and equipped accommodation, where you can settle in right away. 

My accommodations are strategically located at heart of the city; it is minutes to major transportation like MTR and buses stations, shops, restaurants and supermarkets etc., which makes living and commuting so much more effortless. 

My accommodations are fairly new and have mostly been under long term rental, hence the relatively few reviews; however, you can see more guests experience with other accommodations that I have.

Silencioso apartamento amplamente arejado e com sol da manhã.  Área total de 40m² que acomoda 4 pessoas confortavelmente.  Dispõe de quarto, sala, cozinha e banheiro.  Cem por cento mobiliado com móveis Italínea (armários e escritório), frigobar, cooktop, microondas, depurador de ar, chuveiro, box com vidro temperado, mesa para quatro pessoas, sofá cama, cama de casal, ar condicionado, TV e escritório. Utensílios de cozinha e limpeza disponíveis além de roupa de cama, mesa e banho.  Prédio com serviço de lavanderia e portaria 24h. Estacionamento 24h pago (não incluso) a menos de 200 metros do apartamento.  Embaixada Americana a 15minutos a pé do apartamento e atrações turísticas como Sambódromo e Maracanã a menos de 20minutos de metrô. No coração da Lapa, o apartamento fica localizado próximo às principais atrações noturnas da região além de contar com um ponto final de ônibus que oferece linhas para Copacabana, Ipanema, Botafogo e Leblon. Além do mais, com 10 minutos de caminhada você chega na Estação Carioca de Metrô que te da acesso as demais regiões do Rio de Janeiro. Wifi grátis.

The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

I live in Barcelona, a city that has captivated me from the start for its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Aspasios and couldn’t think of a better job: at Aspasios we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us, and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Aspasios, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleagues Jesus, Vanessa, Yenai, Paola and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Barcelona. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guide books!

My wife and I have traveled to Maui for years to escape the cold St. Louis winters. We have enjoyed Wailea's luxury resort properties. When we started our family, it was no longer practical to stay in hotels with limited space, compromise security with two separate hotel rooms and incur the food and beverage costs of our growing children. As business travelers we have had the opportunity to visit some of the most amazing cities but none of these locations have come close to the feeling of peace and serenity that we have found in Wailea. Grand Champions Villas is hands down the greatest value in all of Wailea. The central location, beautifully maintained grounds, security and space within the villas cannot be beat. The villa is perfected by a truly beautiful interior with a fresh, relaxing vibe. It was our goal to bring the beauty we saw in the grounds of Wailea to the interior of the villa where we spend time with our family creating cherished memories. We would love to share this magical place with you. Hula On In to Beach House Chic Style. With warmest aloha, Paul
