Aloha, My name is Brandyn. I am so blessed to offer people from all around the world the chance to experience the breath taking scenery and beautiful culture of an island paradise I have called home for my entire life. My family has been in the vacation rental business for over 30 years and it all started with my grandmother Kay (hence Kay's Ali'i Vacation Rental). Now myself, my mother Brenda, my wife Kristina, and my aunt Lucy have taken over the reins and are continuing the legacy my grandmother started. 

Our families journey in the vacation rental industry started with one small simple unit and slowly evolved into something special for generations to come. We now we have 3 vacation rental properties in Kailua with multiple units on each. Our goal is to offer parties of all sizes the chance to visit our island paradise without having to break their bank accounts. We have 2, 3, & 4 bedroom units for larger groups or extended family getaways. We have 1 bedroom units & large studios for our guests who are traveling with their immediate family and we also have a private rooms for those of our guests who want to get away by themselves or with their significant other to relax and enjoy our beautiful Hawaiian weather. No matter what group size you have we can accommodate you. Take a look at our listing and feel free to message us. We look forward to hearing from you soon. :-)

ALOHA !  E komo mai . . . and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!  

Captain Cook Resorts manages over 140 privately owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu).  Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!  

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

Provided with your rental:

• Bed linens, bath, beach & kitchen towels, dishes, silverware, cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
• Beach chairs
• Hair dryer, iron & ironing board
• Several days’ supply of coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, 2oz shampoo & 2oz conditioner, paper goods (paper towels, tissue, toilet paper), and basic cleaning supplies. Additional sundry and food items are available local markets and grocery stores, for example, Safeway, at 888 Kapahulu Avenue, or Costco at 525 Alakawa Street (between the airport and Waikiki).
 
Not provided with your rental:
 
• Beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Zip-Lock baggies, coffee, condiments, seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, bleach, and hand lotion.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

I am from Adana, a town in old Cilicia, have been living in Istanbul for quite a while. I have worked in tourism sector for a long time now I am retired and want to know new people. I can speak english and I can join you through your visit to show Istanbul or giving you some local information.

host_location: Lake Havasu City, Arizona, United States
host_about: I am currently a 6th grade math teacher and competitive baton twirling coach.  I fell in love with Maui and the Valley Isle Resort over 7 years ago.  I have an amazing husband, 2 daughters with great husbands, and 3 grandchildren.  I have a love for the island and the culture of Hawaii!

Lucky we live Hawaii. Friends often describe me as eclectic. I am easy going. Love to play tennis, surf, & hike. I've traveled extensively, for short vacations and long periods of time. I've been know to stay at 5 diamond hotels, my tent, in the open air on my white water raft or in my 88 VW bus in the wilderness. I farm my own land for profit.  You won't find me sitting inside watching TV. I find my peace outside. "Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit, and as vital to our lives as water and good bread."  Edward Abbey
Olá, o meu nome é Jorge. Nascido e criado no Porto, sou um amante desta cidade.

The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

We've been helping clients list, buy, and sell beautiful real estate of every kind throughout the Hawaiian Islands, with a focus on Oahu and Maui and now Kauai and the Big Island. Our professional doors are open 24/7 for you to contact me: online via our website or by email or by phone message at any time. I would love to work for you and find you the best sell or buy deal you desire and which I know I can find you in Hawaii!

I am Mark G. Howard, the Principal Broker, President and founder of Hawaii Americana Realty, located in beautiful Waikiki, Hawaii. For years we've been serving all the real estate needs of our customers in Hawaii and beyond. And it gives us great joy to do so! Our focus has been high-rise, condo, townhouse, and the single-family home market throughout Oahu and Maui, and now also the Big Island and the garden island of Kauai. We handle buying and selling of all kinds of real estate in Hawaii, however, including business and commercial property. We can find it for you or sell it for you, but always we make sure you get the best and most lucrative deal possible!

I don't mind saying that For the past 14+ years I have practiced my skills and expertise as a licensed Realtor in Santa Fe, New Mexico, then Las Vegas, Nevada, and am very proud to now own and operate Hawaii Americana Realty, in Honolulu, Hawaii. I have gained a very respected reputation and competitive edge in the Hawaii real estate market and accomplished this by earning my status as a company Broker and Accredited Buyer’s Representative (ABR).

I have known much success in what I do. And that success I can't wait to share with you! This I will accomplish by providing you the topnotch, unequaled real estate service you desire and deserve. I will find and facilitate the best sell or buy deal possible. The smile on my face will reflect your own... and it will be one of mutual success!

Our professional doors are open 24/7 for you to contact me: online via our website or by email or by phone message at any time. The Hawaiian real estate market I excitingly remind you is the place to sell, buy, and invest in now. Be it a condo or small family home, a huge estate or upscale commercial property, you name it! No matter where you live in the world, you can contact Hawaii Americana Realty and we can find you the property of your dreams, or help you sell or invest in a prime piece of island real estate paradise!

Professional.  I live in the adjoining home and take care of the property and grounds myself.  Interests are travel, hiking, sailing, wheel-thrown ceramics.  Favorite destinations are Bhutan and Antarctica.  Since the AirBNB home is a historic home, I love to tell the history of the important 19th century family who built it and their connection to the Hawaiian Kingdom.  There is a published book about the family's history in Hawaii and guests can read the book and hear stories of the family.  One chapter is about the construction of this house.  
Motto:  Life is too short not to be happy.

I am the owner of Maui Vision Rental. Maui Vision became a reality and a business starting with my personal condo at the Kihei Akahi Resort C618.

Maui Vision is a business I love because I get to share the Aloha Spirit, the beauty of the land, and talk story with people from around the world. It is nice to know that we can contribute to someone’s Hawaiian vacation experience in a positive way. We love to hear back from our happy guests.

I used to live on the island of Oahu with my US Navy family when I was young.  We later moved to Southern California.  I knew one day I would return to Hawaii, the place I fell in love with long ago. I took a leap of faith and purchased my Maui condo June 2002 this was the beginning of fulfilling her prophecy to once again return to Hawaii soil.

I am a tropical expression artist who paints on canvas and etched metal.  My work is inspired by the beauty of the islands and has been displayed in several Maui art galleries over the years.  I am a writer and have my first book on Amazon.  I recently took up hula dancing and love to immerse myself in the culture and grace of this island.

I have over 25 years of business administration and customer service experience working for large corporations and high tech startups.

If you are in need of a caring Realtor here on Maui, please contact Kathy McCartney RS#77317 of La Costa Realty Hawai’i, LLC Brokerage Lic #18349 .

Adoro esportes, boa leitura, música, culinária, viajar, bem-estar, educação, respeito ao próximo e viver. Sou uma jovem "senhora de chapéu", como brinco com meus filhos. : )

o/

We offer professional service and rent lovely refurbished apartments in Barcelona and Sitges for short and long term stays.

Our Serviced Apartments in Barcelona are located in one of the best areas of the city, right between the Barceloneta beach and the Gothic/Born quarter. Furthermore, they are in walking distance to major tourist attractions such as the Picasso Museum, the Old Port, Ramblas and the Santa Maria del Mar cathedral.
To round up the experience we invite all our guests to enjoy lunch and dinners in our Posta ristorante & pizzeria and Aperol Spritz Bar at the ground floor .

In Sitges our apartments enjoy a special location. Already leaving the house you can see the sea and you only need 1 minute to go to the beach. Moreover, everything is in walking distance, a perfect location to fully enjoy the town. Additionally, the Miramar restaurant, which is directly in front the house, offers you a great variety of healthy and delicious food and drinks.

Hi!  I'm Benny.  I hope you'll feel comfortable in my beautiful loft apartment and enjoy all of the amazing things Bushwick, Brooklyn, Manhattan and all of New York City has to offer!

A native New Yorker, I have deep roots in this city.  Both of my parents are New Yorkers, and my grandfather was born in Williamsburg!  I love sharing this city with guests, it's one of the most dynamic and exciting places in the world.  New York has character.  

I'm a singer, guitarist, and songwriter, focusing on bossa nova music from Brazil.  I love to make music, read, learn more about my Japanese and Jewish ancestral culture, discover new things and meet new people from all walks of life.  My goal is to provide the best experience possible in an inviting, relaxing, and creative environment.

Four friends, a lot of dreams, a common path

Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends: Rosa, Tania, Igor and Nuno. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privelege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Quatro amigos, muitos sonhos, um caminho em comum

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos: a Rosa, a Tânia, o Igor e o Nuno. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

Why stay in a hotel when you can enjoy the space and amenity of a designer home?

Luxico manages designer and luxury homes across Melbourne, Sydney, Palm Beach, Byron Bay, Noosa and the Mornington Peninsula with many new locations coming in 2018.

All Luxico homes are  fully equipped with 5-star linens, towels, luxury toiletries, gourmet welcome hampers, free Wi-Fi and all the essential items that you will require during your stay.

Luxico's Housekeeping and Concierge Services teams are on hand to assist with airport transfers, grocery deliveries, catering, extra cleaning and anything else you might require.

Guests travelling with children can request toys, activities, travel cots and high chairs, whilst pet owners have a number of great properties to choose from with doggy beds, water bowls and other items provided to minimize your luggage.

Hey!
My name is Raul and I live in Porto, the best city of Portugal and the World! :)

I love to travel and I am lucky to do most of the trips with my long time girlfriend, who became my wife in 2014! 
Together we have already traveled in Argentina, Austria, Belgium, Bosnia, Brazil, Bulgaria, Croatia, England, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Lithuania, Netherlands, Romania, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, USA and are always looking for the next destination.

I will be very happy to welcome you in the lovely Porto!

I cannot live without food. The beach is my favorite place to relax. I  like a bit of everything. Love to try foods from all around the world which actually can be found in NYC!
I can be the social or just respect your privacy.  Love to give people their own space whenever they want it. Friendly and peaceful as anyone can be.
And oh and I am saving money to put out a music album ;)  Youtube: Si Ludi, (Website hidden by Airbnb) 
Don't forget to subscribe :)

Booking tip: I encourage you to book asap if the days in calendar are open or as soon as I reply to you. I don't know how the guest part system works. But I've had people who send inquiries to whom I've sent pre-approved responses. This doesn't mean anything until you actually book (make the payment). During this time I can still pre-approve other people and even other guests can go ahead of you and our previous conversations and book! They will actually get the booking. Sorry in advance for any inconveniences, but at least I am giving you heads up.
Best,

Silvia

Hi there,

My name's Wayne. I live in Sydney, Australia with my fiancé, Kate.

I'm a management consultant, an author, a commercial helicopter pilot and I've recently developed a real love of travel with time in LA, Turkey, Greece, London, Vietnam, Thailand, Camboodia, Bali, Hong Kong and France all in the last 12 months.

Wayne and Kate

Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Olá, seja bem-vindo! 

O Airbnb tem sido uma excelente experiência de vida para todos nós. Iniciamos em Junho de 2016 alugando um quartinho na nossa casa, e hoje administramos outras propriedades de amigos e vizinhos.

Amamos praia, viajar, cinema, leitura, conhecer diferentes culturas , fazer novos amigos e compartilhar experiências. Adoramos uma boa culinária, um bom vinho, boa música e filmes... Nós gostamos de ter a nossa casa cheia de alegria e amigos, acolhendo pessoas agradáveis, com boas vibrações, interessantes e honestas!

Teremos muito prazer em tê-lo como nosso convidado!

-----------------------

Hello and Welcome! 

Airbnb has been a great experience in our lives. We started in June/2016, renting a small bedroom at our house, and now we take care of friends and neighbours properties.

We love to go to the beach, travel, reading, experience different cultures, make new friends, share experiences and values. We love good food, good wine, good music and movies...

We like to have our house filled with joy and friends, welcoming nice people with good vibes, interesting and honest!

We look forward to have you as our guest! 

Be my guest and live like a  carioca!

Aloha, 
I am a middle school teacher born and raised in Kailua.  I love reading and the outdoors.  In my spare time I enjoy hiking, fishing, taking my dog Liko on adventures, and of course traveling!

Hi! My name is Ilam :)
I'm a student in communication, I also work at a café-resto, I love reading, painting, music, dancing (when no one sees me) cooking and eating, laughing, movies, talking and simply sharing life with others! 
I live with my boyfriend Fred who studies environmental science and is also a certified cabinet maker. We love sharing experiences and knowledge, we have hosted a great many people and have thus made our home a fun and harmonious  environment to be in!

Somos mãe e filha, Margarida e Filipa. Uma é médica, a outra tem uma oficina de cerâmica, desenho e gravura aberta ao público no centro do Porto (Oficina Gato Bravo - são benvindos!). Adoramos esta terceira atividade, é um óptimo desafio e oportunidade para conhecer pessoas interessantes, e proporcionar-lhes tudo para uma estadia perfeita na nossa cidade.

We are mother and daughter, Margarida and Filipa. One is a doctor, the other has a ceramics, drawing and printing workshop in the city center (Oficina Gato Bravo - you're welcome to visit!). We also love to work as hosts, it's a great challenge and an opportunity to meet interesting people, and give them everything for a perfect stay in our city.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Tenho 64 anos, sou divorciado, tenho duas filhas, um filho, todos adultos, e uma neta adolescente.
Sou músico amador, das rodas de samba e de chorinho, pratico esportes, principalmente canoagem, natação e hidroginástica. Tenho dois caiaques oceânicos e é um grande prazer remar com amigos ou sozinho. 
Minhas atividades preferidas são fotografar e escrever.
Gosto de aprofundar conhecimentos sobre literatura, arte, história, meio-ambiente e música, principalmente tendo o Rio de Janeiro como tema. Possuo uma página de entretenimento no (Hidden by Airbnb) , voltada para essas atividades.
Faço parte de um coral, gosto de cantar, mas podem ficar tranquilos porque eu raramente canto em casa. haha 
Gosto de cinema, shows, bares e de frequentar festas com amigos.
Gosto de pessoas alegres, divertidas e de bem com a vida, da mesma forma como procuro me manter.
Sou carioca, conheço muito bem a cidade, e posso dar ótimas dicas para quem nos visita interessado em praias, vida noturna, diversão, Carnaval, Réveillon, roteiros culturais, passeios turísticos e passeios ecológicos.
Aqui praticamos a reciclagem, evitamos o desperdício e o descarte irresponsável, sem abrir mão do conforto e das comodidades modernas. Procuramos fazer a nossa parte.
Venham, porque o Rio de Janeiro é uma Cidade Maravilhosa.

Young professional working in the insurance/advocacy field. I work to live and never the other way around!

I love to travel and meet new people. Favourite destination so far has been Argentina!  

I try to be very respectful as a guest. I will treat your  property the way I wish for mine to be treated.

Je suis une étudiante uqamienne de 25 ans très enjouée mais plutôt calme. Les valeurs écologiques sont primordiales dans mon mode de vie! Je suis passionnée de musique et de bonne bouffe. J’ADORE les jeux de société (et je joue à certains jeux vidéos). J’ai pas mal voyagé, j’aime découvrir plein de choses et je suis très curieuse…

I'm a really cheerful - but quiet calm - 25 years old UQAM student. Ecological values ​​occupy a primary part of my lifestyle. I'm passionate about music and good food (yes, I'm a foodie!). I love playing board games (and some video games as well). I have traveled a lot and I'm very curious about nearly everything; I love exchanging new experiences and discovering some new things.
I can be very outgoing and talkative, but I also appreciate "me times", and I am pretty independent. 
Have a good stay!!

Me gustaría practicar mi español también!

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: Easy going and hard worker!!

I've often thought that one of the best things about traveling the world is getting to meet new people with exciting stories and backgrounds. Hosting on Airbnb gives me the chance to do that every day! 

I love traveling, playing guitar and drums, playing all kinds of sports, cooking, going to the beach, learning about everything I can, and pursuing new business ideas! And traveling! 

Let me know when you are coming to Hong Kong and I will do my best to help make arrangements for you! This an amazing city, and whether you are coming for the first time or the fiftieth, you can always find something new! 

See you soon and safe travels! 

-Mark

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: Originally from Melbourne, I moved to New York six years ago for a job in banking. Since then I have lived in Paris (learning French and writing), briefly returned to Melbourne to live, and finally, I came back to my favorite city of them all: New York. Currently I work at JP Morgan and this fall I will start an MFA in Creative Writing at Columbia University. I love traveling, being social and meeting new people.  In terms of my West Village apartment, I'm pretty laid back, clean/tidy and respectful of others. I like to be social sometimes, and sometimes switch off and read/write. As long as we're cognizant of each other's mood and needs for space and quiet time, I don't mind a bit of noise/activity in the apartment (preferably not when I have work the next morning). I'm not strict at all, and I like it when people around me are enjoying themselves.

My wife, Rachel, and I first visited Kauai in the early eighties and just got hooked. We bought our first vacation rental property in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) at Sandpiper Village in Princeville and spent about 5-1/2 months renovating it.  We dreamed that one day we might be able to make Kauai our permanent home, and we were fortunate to actually make this happen in January of (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) We bought our second vacation rental property at Puamana in August of last year (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , as our second vacation rental property. and after a renovation period, placed it on line as a 3 bedroom 2 bath townhouse vacation rental.
My wife still works as a flight attendant and I am retired (for all the guys out there, I'll be writing a book soon about how to make that happen).  However, I keep busy managing both properties, when we're not dancing, playing softball/tennis, or at the beach.  One of the advantages of living here on Kauai and offering vacation properties for rent is that any issues with units that may arise are addressed immediately and decisively through direct communication between the guests and me, the owner. There is no go-between management company in the loop to delay any action that may be required.  It's a win-win for everyone.
Mahalo for visiting AirBNB and if you have any questions, call me at home (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) or cell (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 
Karl & Rachel Forer

Suite Paradise has 100's of vacation rental properties to choose from across several of the best resorts in the Poipu Beach area of Kauai. Choose from five beautiful and luxurious beach resorts on Kauai’s spectacular South Shore – Poipu Kai  Resorts: Kahala,Makanui,Manualoha, Poipu Sands, Regency and Regency Villas one of Kauai’s most prestigious beachfront resorts, Nihi Kai Villas, a comfortable and quiet beach resort, Poipu Crater, exotically nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater, Lawai Beach, luxurious oceanfront condos located on the best snorkeling spot on the island, and Poipu Kapili, a beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property and Pili Mai, nestled among a championship golf course, Pili Mai is set in an ideal location on the island of Kauai’s south shore in Poipu Beach. This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums. This central Poipu location offers ocean, golf course, and mountain views and is within walking distance to additional dining, shopping, and entertainment at Poipu Shopping Village and a short distance to world famous Poipu Beach.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: Live, laugh, love :-)

Me:
I'm Brazilian living in Australia since 2010. I speak Portuguese and English and I love meeting new people from different cultures and languages!

As host:
I hosted over 80 people in 2 years of Airbnb and we earned Super Hosts status 2 years in a row! 
My husband Claudio is Italian and I'm Brazilian. We work from home and we are very fast replying guest messages when we are not here to answer in person. Despite our apartment being small, we have a comfortable size bedroom with a double bed and many cosy pillows so you can relax and rest after exploring Sydney! Also, we are 15 minutes walking distance to Coogee Beach (our favourite!).

As a traveller: 
I prefer quiet and relaxing homes and when travelling I barely stay on my Airbnb room as I am constantly exploring. I like to chat with my hosts to find out the best places to eat and see from a local's point of view as well as building friendship with my hosts.
I either travel alone or with my Italian husband Claudio.

J’ai eu la chance de me balader en Europe, en Asie et dans les Caraïbes. À mon avis, c’est dans le rapprochement avec les habitants de chaque pays, ville ou village que j’ai visités que mes voyages ont pris leur plus grande valeur.

J’essaie de vivre intensément chance journée et de savoir saisir l'instant…

We have together and individually traveled to a lot of countries all around the world. We love interacting with locals for local foods, traditions, music etc. to further understand ourselves and import new meanings to our own lives, which, in turn, enriches everybody around us.

We have hosted wonderful people. None caused big issues, and none had issues with us. We are more prone to sharing experiences, rather than doing business, because, I guess we are early adopters of Airbnb. Our house is not like an hotel room. With us generally around, you will make the most out of the neighborhood, perhaps İstanbul and maybe even Turkey.

We are also very understanding guests with usually basic needs; but with the taste of certain sociocultural rules, mixed with a certain amount of humor. We basically expect what is written on your page to be correct; because then, we will be aware of the shortcomings as well, and act accordingly.

ı am Alper )) my all rooms are near the grandbazaar and also to sultanahmet by walk. it is not a hotel. ı can help your all questions. you can call me 7/24 .


when you make reservation,please send me names about who will stay here. and when you arrive here ı will check it. ı dont accept to you meet a guy or girl on internet and bring to my place. here is a big city there are all kid of people. in my building other guests are staying too. ı want to every one be in SAFE here. 

How to get The here

To get The my building from Ataturk Istanbul Airport

1- from ATATURK AIRPORT ( IST), you can take either a taxi (about € 15) or take the METRO transfer to the tram in ZEYTINBURNU station ( direction to KABATAS or EMINONU) and get off at Beyazıt tram stop.

2- I can arrange shuttle service for you, more comfortable than public transportation ,  20.00 EUR/ one way . Please note that the car can take up to 3 people
If sounds good for you, please send me your flight details with the airport details.Then I will send you confirmation.

To get The MY Building from Sabiha Gökcen Istanbul Airport ;

1- You can take a taxi from S.Airport to here and cost will be around 200.00 TL ( around 40 EUR /one way.)

2- To reach here from SABIHA GOKCEN AIRPORT (SAW); you can take the HAVATAS bus to TAKSIM. From TAKSIM,The easiest way is to taking a taxi ( 8 EUR app.) or take the FUNIKULER ( subway) to KABATAS, change to TRAM and get off at BEYAZIT tram stop. If you are 3 people, taking the taxi from TAKSIM costs the same amount by taking the public transportation.   

3- I can arrange shuttle service for you, more comfortable than public transportation ,  45 EUR/ one way . Please note that the car can take up to 3 people

If sounds good for you, please send me your flight details with the airport details.Then we will send you confirmation.

To reach the here from the Bus Terminal (Otogar), you can take the metro from the bus terminal to Aksaray, and transfer to the tram ( direction to KABATAS or EMINONU) and get off at BEYAZIT tram stop.

From the BEYAZIT tram station it is about 200 m walk. The tram service stops at midnight.

My husband and I have been together for 26 yrs. We came to visit Hawaii over 20yrs ago, fell in love with the islands, sold everything we had and moved! The thought was if we fail, no harm done! I feel blessed every day to call Hawaii home. Although I do miss my family on the mainland, I (we) have our other half with us here, Mother and Father in law moved here 12+ yrs  and my Brother and sister in law just 2+ years ago! Being able to get together every Sunday to cook and enjoy each other is something I don’t take for granted.  Love the ocean, with my favorite past time now which is stand up paddle boarding. I was a Dental Assistant for a total of 18 yrs, then quit to help my husband run his construction company. Never did I think I would be doing a bnb, (always have done long term) but oh how I enjoy it!! Love people and enjoy them seeing the islands for their first time or coming back for more to do something they missed or needs repeating...never can one see it all. I hope you will come and enjoy our little slice of Hawaii here on the west side of the island.

Somos uma empresa especializada na gestão de alojamento local. Tratamos cada propriedade como se fosse nossa, porque queremos que os hóspedes se sintam em casa – acreditamos que só assim faz sentido!

Como bons portuenses, somos excelentes anfitriões e sugerimos dicas especiais para que os nossos convidados possam aproveitar a estadia ao máximo, desde visitas a museus aos restaurantes imperdíveis. Partilhamos segredos que fazem do Porto uma cidade mágica. 

Aos proprietários, e nossos parceiros nesta aventura, prometemos experiência, conhecimento e dedicação, com o objetivo de rentabilizar ao máximo cada propriedade. 

We are a company that specialises in managing short term rental properties in Porto, Portugal.

We take care of our managed properties as if they were our own because we want our guests to feel at home and not have to worry about anything when they visit.
 
Just like the inhabitants of Porto, we are friendly hosts and can provide tips for our guests to make the most of their stay. We can recommend museums, restaurants, bars and can provide suggestions on alternative things to do (river cruises, football matches, etc...) As long term residents of the city we can share those hidden gems that make Porto such a magical city.
 
For home owners and potential business partners, we promise a professional service, expertise and dedication that will help you to maximise your returns.
Home Me – Making You Feel Good

Erin: Professionally, during the day I am the head of engineering at The New York Times' Beta department, In the afternoons, I teach at Cooper Union, and in the evening I do fun side-projects with my brother. In my free time though (usually during the summer) I enjoy traveling a lot, with both family and friends: paris, london, tokyo, delhi, berlin, etc.

Marla:  I'm a veteran teacher/librarian in the New York City public schools.  I teach in a dual-language Spanish/English school and use my spare time to quilt, cook, read, and bike. Elite Pacific Properties is the leading luxury real estate brokerage and vacation rental firm in Hawaii, with over 100 agents statewide offering everything from luxury residential property sales to multi-unit projects/developer sales, to luxury vacation rentals. Elite Pacific Properties was founded in 2005 and is the only luxury real estate firm with staffed offices on each of Oahu, Maui, Kauai, and the Big Island.

Elite Pacific Properties is a member of Who’s Who In Luxury Real Estate, an exclusive organization of the top luxury brokers in the world; has been named to Inc. Active Member of:

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Welcome home! 

As someone who loves traveling, I can appreciate when wanderlust hits. Some of my special voyages include: my first solo overseas trip to Paris; backcountry trips to Glacier National Park in Montana; Gongga Shan in Sichuan, China; a tango excursion in Buenos Aires; 8 months living in a village in Madagascar; a summer in Costa Rica next to Corcovado National Park. 

Now, I am planting roots in the Big Apple because its eclectic energy makes it a daily adventure every time I step out my door. We are thrilled to be able to share our vibrant city and our lovely space with people from all over the planet. We are excited to meet you!

***NEW HOSTS*** 
If you desire some pointers in successfully getting started as a host, I would be delighted to refer you as well as share my insights and strategies.
www.airbnb.com/r/isabellal221

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Retired, fun-loving, outgoing, compassionate.  Love to entertain and show people the wonderment of Harlem and NYC.
I love to travel and recently went on a yoga retreat to Roatan.  Read the Untethered Mind by Richard Smith as recommended before the retreat.  It was an awesome read. I am also a lover of everything entertaining!
I am a fantastic hostess because I enjoy turning folks on to things most tourist would never see.  One Sunday as I was walking to church a French family asked me for directions to one of the popular churches near City University.  I talked them into coming to my church which has a fantastic a cappella choir and they had so much fun we all went to a jazz brunch afterwards where my good friend is the vocalist.  People often gravitate to my spirit which is always welcoming and receiving.

Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.

Aloha kakou (Hello to all):
The owner, Marc, fell in love with the Big Island in 1982 and bought this coffee farm in 2008 after living in several locations around the island.  He spends  about 65% of his time here on this island paradise which he considers "home".  The farm offers him and his guests, a peaceful, quiet, farm stay on aina (land) that is deeply rooted in the old Hawaiian traditions and ways of Aloha. He danced hula with Halau 'O KeikiAli'i and grows gourds for making Ipu Heke (gourd implements used by hula dancers). He starts most every day with a great swim at one of the many bays in South Kona.
Considero-me uma pessoa aberta, muito sociavel e que gosta muito de viajar e conhecer novas pessoas.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: Hey, I'm a Hungarian guy from Budapest who has lived a few years in London and moved to New York in the winter of 2013. I like travelling, hiking, biking, and getting to know new people.

We are an Anglo Turkish family run business, renting out refurbished apartments tastefully decorated to a high standard. 

Our 19th century apartments are situated among 18th century Armenian architecture, where churches and mosques mingle. You can feel the energy and pulse of this unique area. As a person who enjoys photography this is the area for you to explore and wander. Staying at our apartments you have a range of amenities right on your doorstep. Taksim underground metro station is within easy walking distance, putting the whole of Istanbul at your disposal.

We would like to offer our guests a comfortable and cultural stay with either long or short term agreements in the historical Tarlabashi district in the heart of Istanbul.

Porto City Hosts is a professional tourism management team. All our collaborators are committed Porto citizens who welcome the guests with professional quality and local charm. We make guests feel well accompanied during their stay and we help them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences.
 We are also passionate about travel and new places! We like to know new cultures, landscapes, palates and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, to share new sensations with our suggestions, lived in the first person.
 There are walks by the sea, or boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river, walks through the old streets of Oporto. You can listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, where the Harry Potter writer was inspired, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat francesinha, tripas à moda do Porto, bacalhau or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the Port wine.

host_location: St Peters, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
Inveterate traveller who has spent a great proportion of my life on the road benefiting from the kindness of strangers - hitched, trekked, bicycled, motorcycled and trained independently to all sorts of far flung and unpronounceable points of the globe. Sometimes for years at a stretch. Extreme tourist as defined by Wikipedia. In between times a performer and photographer and occasionally all of the above simultaneously as photojournalist or touring actor.
I like to think I can tell great stories but I may be wrong...

During my idle hours I enjoy backpacking through universities collecting degrees and living a full life of adventure, discovery and art so if your interests and/or qualifications run to theatre, literature, fine arts, art history or the law then you've a ready partner for intellectual discussion.
A well stocked library is assured for convenient reference.

As you can probably tell I'm more than just a little bit xenophilic, enjoying the company of travellers, creative spirits and those just enjoying the freedom and discovery of the road.

My home is a sprawling quirkily evolving eclectic canvas; part tropical greenhouse and jungle, part improvisation workshop, part art studio, all of a slightly anarchic constantly changing composition. (I would never consider shopping at Ikea or watching any TV program involving adversarial reality and/or bogan house make overs, although I'm always enthralled and inspired by Kevin McCloud and Grand Designs.)

My place is a patchwork of sprawling, overgrown alternative comfortable anarchy.
If you insist on lovely suburban tidy townness, neatly trimmed herbaceous borders, minimalist generic and tediously `nice` hotel decor, or twee boutique pensions this may not be the place for you, but then again you probably should be reconsidering staying in and about Newtown on that criteria.
Our fantastically artistic and creative surrounds are one of the funkiest hubs of Australia, a rare inner city island resounding with alternative anti-gentrification energy and and sans bourgeoisie vitality - we live here because we love the community and our home is emblematic of that.
The vast majority of those who chose to stay with us seem to love it that way.

In any case hopefully our genuine hospitality and relaxed easy welcome will allow you to overlook some rougher edges in evolution and allow us to reciprocate the marvelous generosity we've benefited from in our travels.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you are a new Airbnb member, we have a few recommendations.
These three steps can be done by going to the main page after you login,
click on your name on the top menu for a drop down menu.
Select 'Edit Profile', and then:

1. Submit a photo of yourself on your profile.
2. Submit a phone number (mobile), email address and verify some form of identification [See https://www.airbnb.com/help/question/450 for more information about Verified ID].
3. Fill out information about yourself so we know who to expect.

Thank you.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you are yet to join Airbnb, but are just browsing our place for an affordable place to stay close to Newtown, you should follow this link www.airbnb.com.au/c/smenteith to join up. You will get some free Airbnb travel credit for your second trip and we'll get some Airbnb travel credit too.

I enjoy surfing, scuba diving, paddle boarding, snorkeling, hiking, and more. Which makes Hawaii the perfect place to live.  After living in various locations all over the world I am happy to call Hawaii home.

My wife Dianne and I have travelled the world  together for over 30 years. Now that we are hosting with airbnb we hope to create the character, convenience and comfort of the  accommodation that we liked in places as diverse as Bali, Provence, Andalusia, Kyoto, Marrakesh and Sicily.

Hello, 
If you like to feel the history of the istanbul while you are in home, let us accommodate you in one of my appartments. You can also enjoy neiborhood Beyoglu while you are out for dining clubing or museums and art galeries, they are only minutes away from your appartment. You can also ccok in as you will have fully equiped kitchen. This is not an hotel, this is your home in istanbul.

I can offer you 1 bedroom flat or studios in the center of the istanbul,at the location Taksim square meets. For surroundings please give me couple of minutes by reading below.

History of the Location of the apartment: 

The main thoroughfare is İstiklâl Caddesi, running into the neighbourhood from Taksim Square, a pedestrianised 300meter of shops, cafés, patisseries, restaurants, pubs, wine houses and clubs, as well as bookshops, theatres, cinemas and art galleries. Some of İstiklâl has a 19th century metropolitan character, and the avenue is lined with Neoclassical and Art Nouveau buildings.[citation needed] The nostalgic tram which runs on İstiklal Avenue, between Taksim Square and Tünel, was also re-installed in the early 1990s with the aim of reviving the historic atmosphere of the district. 
Some of the city's historic pubs and winehouses are located in the areas around İstiklal Avenue in Beyoğlu. The 19th century Çiçek Pasajı (literally Flower Passage in Turkish, or Cité de Péra in French, opened in 1876) on İstiklal Avenue can be described as a miniature version of the famous Galleria in Milan, Italy, and has rows of historic pubs, winehouses and restaurants

host_about: I'm a finance professional in NYC, and I've traveled to over 30 cities so far! I've hosted via other channels, but this is my first time hosting on the airbnb website. I've used airbnb as a traveler countless times!

Hi, my name is Nadine! My husband and I are Wyndham Vacation Club owners and we find their resorts to be among some of the best we've stayed at as well as extremely convenient and comfortable . Recently, we've had two children and are unable to use all our points for our own travel, which means we can offer them at a great deal to others! We are often able to book multiple units as well so dont hesitate to ask for what you need, even if it is not directly listed. Booking multiple condos at our wyndham resorts is our favorite ways to get family and friends together, whether we are celebrating or simply spending time together! Book with us for your next vacation -  Treveling only expands one's horizons.

host_location: Saint Ives, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
I'm from the UK originally but love the Aussie life with my Queenslander hubby. We have two small children so travel has become expensive in recent years, and Airbnb is a great help towards the cost of a holiday for us. 

We're clean and tidy people by nature but having kids, two dogs and three chickens means we know all about getting mucky too and enjoying an outdoor life. We feel very lucky to have a home where we never run out of activities to keep the kids happy. There's enough space to play games in the garden, swimming is always an option and the indoor space is open plan so it's easy to keep an eye on everyone!
Bienvenue à Montréal !

Greetings from Team Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hawaii, LLC! Yes, we're a professional property management company—but we're also real people, trusted by the owners of vacation homes to take care of all the heavy lifting like housekeeping, reservations, maintenance, and guest care. (Because, to be honest, renting out a vacation home really can be a full-time job!)


We have local teams on the ground to take care of our homes and our guests. We like to think of it as the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, only without compromising on service and convenience. You can trust that your home will be cleaned by professional housekeepers, and your calls will be answered (right away, around the clock!) by our dedicated Guest Services team.

I’m an avid decorator and love taking on my next DIY. I’m obsessed with cinnamon, avocados, and lavender. I have traveled around North America,  France, Norway, Japan, and Southeast Asia. Where should I go next?

I am very picky with my guests as you are staying in my personal space, so please be mindful of what you share in your request so I can get to know you and your reason for visiting NYC! Happy and safe travels!

host_about:
Hey I'm Daniel. Originally from Chicago but have been living in NYC for 5 years now. I was extremely lucky to have found the apartment I am living in now. I have been here since I moved and don't have any plans to leave. I'm excited to to share it with cool, like minded people from all over the world. 

It really is a special apartment and could not be better located. I've put a lot of effort into making my bedroom and the apartment as a whole comfortable and beautiful.

Aloha!

I love meeting new people and traveling! I came to this beautiful island over ten years ago on vacation. I quickly fell in love with the island and decided to not fly back! The people and culture here are unlike any other. I love it, especially here in Waikiki. There is always something new going on, which is why I love living here. I started bartending and quickly got to know a lot of the insurance and outs of Oahu. My career has brought me so much joy, and introduced me to some of the best people on Earth. It  has blessed me so much, and  I am very thankful to be here making an impact on people's lives. Now I am Food and Beverage Manager for a 5 star Resort.

For fun besides traveling, I enjoy practicing Capoeira (Brazilian martial art) , dancing, working out, speaking Japanese, reading, showing people a good time, relaxing on the beach, and of course hiking!

As a host I will provide you with all the info to have a great time in beautiful Waikiki. I'll make sure you enjoy your stay. Whether its just to relax, or have an adventure, I give you the aloha spirit that makes our little island a great place to be in. Let's have some fun!

Thank you for checking my home; My name is Mike, and I've been living in Hawaii for 28 years.

Enjoy life to the max when you can.  
 
--Mike

ALOHA and WELCOME to Waikiki, Honolulu on Oahu!  Thank you for your interest in one of our vacation rentals.  We are a TEAM of professionals who manage individually owned condo apartments for the owners when they aren't using them within several different condo / hotel buildings in Waikiki.   We offer a range of accommodations types from small studio apartments (with or without kitchenettes) to 2 bedroom residences with full kitchens.  

We want your stay to be an enjoyable one and finding the right match for you is key.  As a general guideline, there are many different types of buildings and hotel-type of arrangements.  For those doing Hawaii on a budget, studios offer the best of both worlds providing a clean, private place to stay within walking distance to the BEACH at affordable prices (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities).   For those looking for nicer or larger accommodations, then you should target $150/night off season to $250/night peak season (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities, building amenities, parking included).  If you are looking for an Ocean-front experience, then target $350- $400/night and for a luxury experience, $500 to over $1000/night.  Hawaii offers something for everyone at every price point!  

Our vacation rental units are privately owned and managed.  We offer an alternative to the hotel experience allowing our guests to “live like a local” in paradise whether be for a few days, a few weeks or a few months.  Our units are well maintained, repaired when necessary and treated routinely with pest control services.  We try not to interrupt our guests during their stay, and if the unexpected happens, we do our best to resolve it quickly with the least inconvenience to our guests.   Upon arrival, we try to meet all our guests personally to register, check-in, and answer any questions.  And if you’re running late don’t worry, we can make arrangements no matter the hour and register you in the office the next day.  

Stop by our real estate office, ground floor of Kuhio Village.  We are there daily to assist and share this incredibly beautiful island, local eateries, activities and entertainment found in Waikiki and around the island.  We look forward to hosting you in one of our vacation rental units and helping to make your stay a fantastic one.  A hui hou (until we meet again)!

Aloha & Mahalo nui loa (Hello/Goodbye & Thank you very much),
Hawaii Dream Realty Team, Hi’ilani, Luise & Theresa
Hawaii Dream Realty LLC RB-19373, Theresa Harden PB (R) RB-19372

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about: Sou nascido e criado em Santa Teresa e adoro este bairro. Tive a oportunidade de viajar bastante pelo meu trabalho, tendo morado na França e nos Emirados Árabes Unidos. Quando voltei dos Emirados, comprei essa casa e reformei seu interior, para dividí-la em aprtamentos menores. A inspiração foi nos 'Studios' de Paris e quis criar espaços funcionais e charmosos, onde duas pessoas possam viver confortavelmente. O projeto deu tão certo que a grande maioria dos meus hóspedes ficam mêses, às vêzes anos, em seus apartamentos ! Contudo, gosto de deixar sempre um apartamento reservado para acolher o viajante que vem só por alguns dias. Esses 'visitantes' ajudam manter o clima de aubergue e enriquecem a dinâmica da casa. Sejam bem-vindos!

My main hobby is searching; I search about everything related to life-style, design, arquitecture, decoration, fashion, restaurants, shops, cool places in general and, I confess, gossip!
Poker was a mix of hobby and profession, it came to me by fun, playing online but, started to met people in the real world, and
writing for magazines and websites. During 8 years I had an weekly column in J magazine, what ended with an invitation to cooperate with BetClick for the Poker section in their Portuguese branch office. 
To handle my Poker consulting business, I founded "Coisas do Poker" ("Things about Poker). 
But, my real passion is interior design and receive people.
Until now, I only practiced in in-house projects, for personal needs, in the different appartments where I lived.
For eight years, I lived in Luxembourg, where I worked in the headquarters of the European Community Parliament, revising texts for the Portuguese publications.
After a short return to Portugal, I went to Brazil for one year, this time, just for fun, where I lived in Araras and Rio de Janeiro.
Now I've embraced, somehow, professional projects in these areas, like this WBwGG" (White Basement with Green Garden", the "Caramba!" and the "WHwTG" (White House with Tasca Gourmet).
The "Caramba!" is an, already running, project with my friend Marina where we convert old fashioned furniture, and objects, into cool stuff.
Most of my parent's furniture will be the guinea pig and, once transformed, will be exposed in hot spots in the city but, also, in the house, where guests can see and even use.
The "WHwTG" is on his half way to launch, it's also a guest house but in the countryside, in Póvoa da Raínha, a very small place on the way to Serra da Estrela.
This is my grandparent's house, a typical old stone house of the Portuguese countryside, which I've adapted to be comfortable but keeping the original trace.
The purpose here is, not only, receive guests but, also, open the "tasca gourmet" to serve, and sell, regional food and beverage and promote tasting events.
With luck, the project in Póvoa da Raínha can be extended for the family lands that will face the water mirror of the future Girabolhos dam, under construction and, expected to be finished in one, or two years.

Here is a little of myself, what I've been doing and future projects but, here, may main goal is to have the chance to receive, the best possible, everyone who decides to visit us; that will be an enormous pleasure!

Hello, 

KeyBarcelona we are a vacation apartment and short-term rental agency in Barcelona, Spain. After ten years in the Hospitality and Tourism business, we founded Key Barcelona in order to offer you the best possible conditions for your stay.

We have carefully selected centrally located properties in the heart of Barcelona, completely furnished and equipped so that you enjoy all the necessary comforts during your stay in the Catalan capital. We offer a diverse range of apartments including studios for couples, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments for families, and apartments with up to 6 bedrooms for groups of friends. We can also house larger groups in multiple apartments located in the same building or neighborhood.

We strive to offer consistently high quality in our apartments. The availability, engagement, and reliability of our team distinguishes us from the rest.

Contact us for your next escape to Barcelona.


The Key Barcelona team.

host_about: Hanno is Dutch, born in Indonesia, married to Maria, Brazilian, from Goias, with four children, two of whom live in Holland. Our youngest daughter is 13 years old. Três jovens com fibra, juntam-se para contrariar a conjuntura! 
Numa época em que faculdade já não é rede de segurança para quase ninguém, decidimos que o nosso currículo não nos define e o diploma não nos faz maiores que ninguém! 
Junta-se portanto uma Criminóloga com dois Licenciados em Solicitadoria, que têm para além da amizade e a garra da juventude, algo que os une:
Paixão por viajar, conhecer pessoas, culturas e acima de tudo,dar a conhecer este nosso Grandioso País plantado à beira mar!

Apaixonados por Turismo e pelo Mundo, convidamos cada um de vós, a viver momentos mágicos,a ouvir o canto das gaivotas, passear por ruas e ruelas mágicas, rio e mar, sentir esta beleza que nos rodeia, repleta de História e Cultura, e claro, degustar de uma das melhores e mais diversificadas gastronomias, a mediterrânica, com sabores e aromas que nos remontam à doce infância, às avós! 

Venha sonhar e descobrir O Porto, desfrute da nossa estadia , relaxe num dos nossos apartamentos e deixe-se encantar ! 

Sendme2Portugal - Alojamento Local ,vai adorar tê-lo por cá!

We came from California 14 years ago.  Glenn is a handyman, and has done an amazing job of saving this 104 year old home, originally built for sugar plantation workers.  I am a recently retired special education preschool teacher.  I love to garden and have tried to add as many native Hawaiian.  lei making plants and fruit trees as possible.  We try to be very respectful of Hawaiian culture and history.  We would be happy to share what we know with you.

¡Hola a todos! Soy Claudia Castillo y formo parte del equipo de Friendly Rentals. Una empresa con sede en Barcelona especializada en el alquiler de apartamentos vacacionales. Llevamos 14 años trabajando con un claro objetivo: ofrecer a nuestros clientes la mejor selección de apartamentos a precios competitivos. Garantizamos además la calidad de los mismos y el trato más Friendly. Actualmente contamos con apartamentos en 23 ciudades alrededor del mundo y estamos continuamente ampliando nuestras ofertas y destinos. 

El equipo de Friendly Rentals es joven y dinámico, tan sólo en nuestra sede en Barcelona disponemos de más de 60 personas que hablan español, catalán, inglés, francés, italiano, alemán y holandés. Siempre ofrecemos una atención personalizada a todos nuestros clientes y disponemos de equipos locales en todos nuestros destinos, de este modo somos capaces de ofrecer una atención personalizada 24 horas al día, los 7 días de la semana. 

Por supuesto, somos expertos en turismo así que sea cuál sea tu duda coméntanosla ¡estaremos encantados de ayudarte a preparar tu estancia! Te ofreceremos todo tipo de consejos y sugerencias, los mejores lugares para comer, visitas imprescindibles, actividades recomendadas si viajas con niños… ¡toda la información que pueda serte de utilidad! Queremos que tu estancia con nosotros sea realmente fantástica, ¡nuestra casa es tu casa! ¡Te esperamos! 





--------------------------------------


Hi, everyone! My name is Claudia Castillo and I’m part of the Friendly Rentals team. Friendly Rentals is a company based in Barcelona that specializes in holiday rental apartments. Over the past 14 years, we’ve been working hard with a clear goal in mind: providing our customers with the best selection of apartments at the most competitive prices. We guarantee quality apartments and a friendly service at all times.

We currently have apartments in 23 cities worldwide and we are constantly adding new destinations and offers.
Friendly Rentals’ team is young and dynamic. In Barcelona alone, we have more than 60 employees who speak Spanish, Catalan, English, French, Italian, German and Dutch. We have local representatives in all our cities, which allows us to provide a personalized customer service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

As trusted tourism experts, we can help you out with any questions you may have! We offer you the best travel tips, recommendations on where to eat, best places to visit, activities for children… all the information you need to plan your trip! We want your stay with us to be one you remember; our home is your home: we look forward to welcoming you!

I am very inquisitive, enjoy reading, cooking and hanging out with friends over a glass of wine. I can't live without cheese or taking pictures and I have the worst sweet tooth. I enjoy learning new things every day and trying new foods. I work for a Canadian satellite TV provider so if I am not busy with work youll find me out in the city doing various activities, relaxing with Netflix or reading a book.

As a guest: I am respectful, adaptable and clean. When I travel I spend most of my days outside exploring, though I enjoy a good chat with the host.

As a host: Easy going, I give guests their space and I appreciate a good communication between host/guest so I can better accommodate you. I love to cook and will be happy to share a meal or a drink with you.

Looking forward to meeting you!
~ioni

Te ofreceremos todo tipo de consejos y sugerencias, los mejores lugares para comer, visitas imprescindibles, actividades recomendadas si viajas con niños… ¡toda la información que pueda serte de utilidad! Queremos que tu estancia con nosotros sea realmente fantástica, ¡nuestra casa es tu casa! ¡Te esperamos! 





--------------------------------------


Hi, everyone! My name is Claudia Castillo and I’m part of the Friendly Rentals team. Friendly Rentals is a company based in Barcelona that specializes in holiday rental apartments. Over the past 14 years, we’ve been working hard with a clear goal in mind: providing our customers with the best selection of apartments at the most competitive prices. We guarantee quality apartments and a friendly service at all times.

We currently have apartments in 23 cities worldwide and we are constantly adding new destinations and offers.
Friendly Rentals’ team is young and dynamic. In Barcelona alone, we have more than 60 employees who speak Spanish, Catalan, English, French, Italian, German and Dutch. We have local representatives in all our cities, which allows us to provide a personalized customer service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

As trusted tourism experts, we can help you out with any questions you may have! We offer you the best travel tips, recommendations on where to eat, best places to visit, activities for children… all the information you need to plan your trip! We want your stay with us to be one you remember; our home is your home: we look forward to welcoming you!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Minha mãe, Da. Lu mora no apartamento e tem uma suíte disponível para receber hóspedes.
Sou brasileira e ela é portuguesa, adoramos receber.
Será um prazer fornecer dicas de lugares, praias do que fazer no Rio de Janeiro. Estaremos a sua disposição para qualquer informação ou apenas para um bate papo.
Seja bem vindo ao Rio de Janeiro.

We are a family with 2 beautiful teens. We love travelling on family holidays, cruises and especially to new places overseas. 
We are a busy family with work, sport and planning for our next family holiday. :)

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Olá, sou formado em administração de empresas. Trabalho no ramo da saúde a mais de 10 anos. Em 2012 comecei a gerenciar apartamentos e por isso, ofereço por aqui apartamentos por temporada no Rio de Janeiro, localizados na zona sul, próximo a praia. Chamamos nosso grupo de Rio Habitat.
Nosso objetivo é oferecer um lugar muito agradável e estamos em desenvolvimento de uma estrutura ao turista.
O grande bacana é que estou começando a conhecer pessoas por aqui.
Essa comunidade tem tudo a ver com o conceito que tento trazer para a minha vida pessoal e empresarial.
Não estou sozinho operando os apartamentos. Posso contar com uma equipe que me ajudam no dia-a-dia.
Então, não se surpreenda se falar com os três na sua hospedagem.
Adoro tecnologia e espero que isso seja o nosso grande diferencial. 
Iremos recebê-los com grande prazer.

Hi, my names Keith and I’m 33 yrs old. Myself and my fiancée,Danielle are from the UK and we’ve lived in Sydney for 3 and a half years. 
I work in construction and Danielle works in insurance. 

We absolutely love to travel and want to see as much as we can before we settle down.

We are Eva & Jacques and we work in the travel and tourism industry. Our company is AB Apartment Barcelona. What we aim to do is offer each of our guests the best Barcelona experience, from start to finish. So as soon as you begin to book your stay right up until the moment you leave Barcelona, my team and I will be available to help you with any questions you might have, or even just to offer you some friendly advice. 

We have one office open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, meaning you can contact us anytime you want, day or night. We looking forward to meeting you soon!

host_location: Hawi, HI & Santa Monica Ca United States
host_about: I'm the creator of Puakea Ranch in Hawi, HI.  We purchased the ranch in 2006 and restored all the historic homes and brought the property back to life. Now people can enjoy a more authentic and unique Hawaiian vacation. My vision was to create a relaxing, comfortable & eco friendly environment in this rugged Hawaiian landscape.  We are a great fit for adventurous travelers who also appreciate life's little luxires, like pressed sheets, sharp knives and farm fresh eggs.

Chase ‘N Rainbows (CNR) Real Estate, Inc. is a Maui-based, family-owned company established in 1980 with two divisions: vacation rental management and real estate sales. For the past twenty years, CNR has been offering visitors and Kama’aina alike, affordable and luxury accommodations at a very competitive price. All of its vacation rental units are carefully selected, meticulously inspected, attractively furnished and well maintained to the highest standards. CNR is committed to providing the finest product and unsurpassed personalized service in the industry. These condominiums come highly recommended by leisure, business, and family travelers with distinctive tastes. A significant number of satisfied, return guests speak for the company’s service commitment and quality product. Chase ‘N Rainbows is a proud member of the Hawaii Visitors & Convention Bureau (HVCB), The American Society of Travel Agents (ASTA), Maui Visitors Bureau (MVB), Hawaii Association of Realtors, Maui Chamber of Commerce, and Vacation Rental Managers Association (VRMA).

*Please note we are a licensed and bonded professional management company and we DO NOT advertise on Craig s List

host_about:
Adventurous, light-hearted spirit who loves travel, good people, good music, food, and wine - the simple pleasures!  :)

I work remotely and get to travel a lot. I also have the good fortune to spend the rest of my time in NYC, the greatest city in the world...

I speak a little Italian, Portuguese and Spanish and enjoy practicing languages when I host and travel. Hope to meet you here in NYC or somewhere else around the world!

Greetings from Istanbul :) This is Emre, born in İstanbul. I have been through many areas of tourism business and currently engaged in both being a travel consultant and a host here at Airbnb. At our various rooms in Asia and Europe area, I'd be delighted to guest you at one of our accommodations. With years of guest satisfaction and understanding of hospitality, I am sure you will be enjoying your stay with us.

I, myself, like to travel single and explore on my own without any hassle, taste different things, travel to quiet locations and get away from the crowds much as possible. In Istanbul, whichever type of traveler you might be, you can always find an aspect suitable for yourselves. Just come over here and discover this beautiful city. If you would need any suggestions, I and my colleagues at the accommodations will be happy to assist you.

I have a dwelling in Bondi Beach and live with my partner. I am often out trying new cafes, restaurants and bars throughout the city. In summer I love swimming at Ice Bergs pool or in one of the  many amazing beach and harbours in Sydney. I am passionate about local and handmade clothing and homeware products. I  frequent local organic farmers markets mostly Bondi beach and Double Bay, but also like The Carriage Works markets. When I am not attending to guests, I enjoy hand making my own clothing and tending to my honey bee hive. 

I am available to guests within 20 minutes from their property. I provide a 24 hour point of contact for guests. I do my best to keep the place perfectly maintained and hire professional cleaners  to make sure the place is in impeccable condition for incoming guests.

I have always worked on multicultural environments. At first, as representative in Europe of portuguese textile companies; then, as owner of a textile decoration company where I had the opportunity to meet pleople from every part of the globe, as Fabric Purchasing Manager of a US-based company, and presently as owner of a translation & webdesign company which clients are located worldwide. I love to meet culturally different people and learn a bit more about their countries and their travel experiences.

Bonjour!  J'ai grandit à Montréal et j'adore faire découvrir ma ville et rencontrer de nouvelles cultures. Je m’intéresse à l'entrepreneuriat, à l'enseignement du yoga, aux dynamiques de groupe et au bonheur en entreprise. 

En général j'aime parler de tout, et particulièrement de questions fondamentales concernant la société, l'innovation, le développement personnel, la philosophie et les arts.
--

Hi! I grew up in Montreal and I like to help visitors discover my city, and to meet different cultures. I'm interested in entrepreneurship, yoga teachings, group dynamics and happiness in the workplace. 

I like to talk about everything, and especially fundamental questions about society, innovation, personnal development, philosophy and arts.

Dizem que minha principal característica é estar sempre pronta para ajudar.  Sempre gostei de ter a casa cheia de familiares e amigos meus e dos meus filhos.
Então, 
Sejam bem-vindos!!

host_location: Rouse Hill, New South Wales, Australia
host_about: I am a nurse, mother/grandmother, reader, traveller, lover of the great outdoors, culture and life in general. My partner, Mike loves motorcycling, history and movies. We enjoy meeting new people  from all over the world and learning about their experiences.

We are friendly, fun, hardworking people happy to share our beautiful piece of paradise with you. host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Hello! I'm Yara, a born and raised New Yorker from Brooklyn.  After studying and working in the entertainment industry in Los Angeles, I moved back to further my dance studies (I'm an Argentine Tango performer). I'm pretty free spirited and try to enjoy all the perks of living in Inwood! I love to hike difficult trails and like buying clothes to hike in -- although I might like buying the clothes more than hiking sometimes!   : )

I'm a huge fan of Inwood Park. It's not like Central Park at all (not that CP is bad but Inwood Park wasn't man-made). There are fewer people and it's a great place to be alone and think.  You can go to the weekly farmers market which is across the street every Saturday morning and then go on a morning hike, play tennis, basketball or soccer before finally laying out to work on your tan. Later you can watch the sunset over the Hudson River or perhaps go on a sunset hike. It really is nice up here! Come see what I see!! 

I also co-run THRIFTAHOLICS com & NYC GRINDHOUSE com with my boyfriend Michael. If you like thrifting, or want to do things in NYC cheaply, or even for FREE when you get here, you should definitely check out our site. We can get you very cheap tickets to Broadway shows! 

Have a Great Visit to the Big Apple. I hope to hear from you!!!

Hi there!

My name's Brock.  I'm a down to earth Aussie dude who has lived in all different parts of Australia ( Sydney, Townsville, Melbourne, Adelaide, and rural NSW) but have now decided to call Sydney home.

I am passionate about travelling and learning more about the world and like to go on holidays every chance I get!  I also love introducing people to this beautiful country of ours and hope they enjoy it as much as I do!

I've been hosting for a while on Airbnb and have travelled as a guest with Airbnb many times. I love the platform and the opportunity it gives you to connect with new people from all over the world!

Come and stay at my place!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Falar de nós mesmo soa falso....Corremos o risco de exagerar as virtudes e minorar os defeitos.....Porém para que os nossos amigos tenham uma idéia da nossa personalidade, tentaremos de alguma forma falar de nós por nós mesmos......Independentes sempre....Prezamos a capacidade do ser humano de ir além dos seus limites, reconhecer um erro pedir perdão e perdoar.....Oferecer alento estender a mão, compartilhar o bom e o belo, aprender constantemente com quem tem muito a ensinar...Ser o Sol da nossa família isto sim nos dá prazer e orgulho, estarmos e sermos para eles e por eles acima de tudo, Renunciarmos o que nos causa dor o que nos faz mal, não gostamos do desgaste da teimosia diante do incontestável, mas vamos adiante em nossos propósitos se eles realmente valerem a pena, raramente voltamos atrás em nossas decisões, pois pensamos muito antes de (Website hidden by Airbnb) conseqüências são assumidas com a maturidade adquirida. Amar e sermos amado, pois o amor é fundamental em nossas vidas.

 (Hidden by Airbnb) : @verofabris

Looking for a perfect stay with a host that understands your needs? 

Welcome to Loftel and Simplissimmo, Montreal based companies established over 10 years ago, that are operated by young and motivated team with a strong and valuable hospitality experience. 

We manage more than 200 properties and are fully dedicated to make every client’s stay unique and memorable. We’re always there to help, answer questions and provide the best services. So don’t hesitate and go ahead, and challenge us :)

Ridge Realty/Rentals LLC is the oldest, family owned real estate brokerage which specializes in properties at The Kapalua® Resort. For over thirty years we have maintained a solid track record, generating a customer loyalty that is second to none.  

When planning your next Maui dream vacation, do not make the mistake of staying in a hotel, most of which are small, overcrowded and overpriced. Start your vacation off right, and book your stay in one of our affordable spacious properties. All our properties come fully furnished and offer free high speed wireless internet, fully stocked kitchens, a starter supply of towels, soap/shampoo and laundry detergent, plus linens and all the other comforts of home.

Our clientele enjoy personal, around-the-clock service; staff are on-site, 24 hours a day.  Clients deserve the best and we deliver.  Allow our team to enhance your vacation with special touches; we will stock your pantry, arrange a limo service from the airport, or even create that perfect romantic atmosphere, just for your arrival – no matter the request, it is our pleasure the be there for you. We go the extra mile to ensure that your stay with Ridge Realty/Rentals is nothing short of extraordinary. Our number one priority is to accommodate you in creating a personalized, dream vacation that is as much stress free as it is memorable.

Kapalua® is fortunate to be able to claim three, world-class beaches. Kapalua Bay (rated the “number one beach in the world," by Conde Nast), Oneloa Bay and D.T. Fleming Beach are just a quick walk from all of our properties. Do not worry about parking or long drives; the best beaches in the world are just out your door!
All Kapalua® Resort activities and amenities are conveniently located within walking distance from all of our properties.  You do not feel like walking? No problem! The resort's complimentary shuttle will pick you up at your door, and then transport you to anywhere on the resort grounds.

At Ridge Realty/Rentals we feel fortunate to call Maui our home, and want nothing more than to share this beautiful paradise with you. With the warm sand between your toes, the sun upon your face and the soft trade winds at your back, you will discover an island way of living, offering the peaceful simplicity you have been searching for. We take pride in serving each and every one of our clients with the warmth of the Aloha Spirit.
 
Mahalo for your interest and we look forward to seeing you soon!
