Hi! I'm 38 years old and live with my partner in inner Sydney. I work as a psychologist and love nature, travelling and spending time with friends.

I love to create beautiful spaces for humans which delight and deliver peace, comfort, privacy and efficiency with a sense of fun.  As a seasoned business traveller who's spent far too much time in hotels,  I've developed an aversion to  giant towels marinated in fabric softener, mean little shards of shrink-wrapped soap, toilet paper origami,  shower gels that could degrease a sea otter, coat hangers that require Tetris-like manipulations to unleash their hanging power and bio-hazardous pillow shams.   With this in mind, I've put a lot of thought into creating an accommodation experience that avoids inflicting these hospitality sins on my guests.

The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

Relax & Recharge at our Kaanapali Coast Oceanfront Condo Resort

It’s all about the West Maui view and vibe. In the heart of the Kaanapali Coast, oceanfront Paki Maui Condo Resort raises the bar to epic levels with a beautiful Pacific Ocean panorama spanning across the Hawaiian islands of Molokai and Lanai. Individually appointed suites let you slide from simply vacationing into truly living the good life on Maui.

Paki Maui puts you at the ocean’s edge for enjoying Hawaii’s legendary sunsets and winter whale watching from your suite or the hotel’s landscaped grounds. Our prime location between lively Lahaina Town and the famous snorkeling bays of Napili and Kapalua puts West Maui’s most coveted recreation at your doorstep.

Your Paki Maui oceanfront vacation home invites you to soak in the splendor from a private lanai with an ocean or tropical courtyard view. You’ll also enjoy hotel amenities like our oceanfront swimming pool with jet spa, picnic area, barbecue grills, laundry facilities, and Free parking.

I am a retired lawyer. I live in Sydney, Australia. I was born in Tasmania and lived there until I moved to Sydney 25 years ago. I live in Glebe, an older and early suburb of Sydney west of and close to the city. It is close to public transport - light rail and buses - and is between 15 to 35 minutes from the city depending on whether you bus or train or walk. My house is close to Blackwattle Bay an arm of Sydney Harbour.
I have travelled and intend to travel in the future. I usually travel alone or with my partner a pharmaceutical representative.
We love food, music and theatre and experiencing the joys and wonders of different cities and places. Our favourite places have been Asia, Europe and USA.
We are friendly, personable and considerate with a clean and tidy attitude.

My partner Steve and I are originally from the north of England, but have been in Australia for over 12 years now. We are new to hosting on Air BnB but have used it as guests and thoroughly loved it.

Bonjour! je m'appelle Laurence et j'adore mon quartier et Montréal!! Je travaille dans le domaine de l'emploi   et j'ai fait des études en anthropologie et en commerce international.  Je  suis une passionnée des voyages, de la lecture  et du cinéma! J'adore rencontrer des gens d'ailleurs et en apprendre plus sur leur culture et coutumes.  J'ai d'ailleurs passé une année  en Argentine dans le cadre de mes études, expérience que  j'ai adoré !! Je reviens récemment de l'Inde et du Brésil  que j'ai adorés. J'ai également voyagé en Europe, Japon, Chine et Tunisie mais j'avoue que mon coup de coeur demeure l'Amérique du Sud! 
Je suis très accueillante et amicale, et j'adore faire plaisir aux gens et leur faire de petites attentions spéciales. Je vous laisserai toujours des brochures, cartes et livres sur la ville pour que vous puissiez plus facilement vous retrouver. Je serai tout près de l'appartement,  durant votre séjour si vous avez des questions ou autre.  
Je parle couramment le français, l'anglais et l'espagnol et je serais ravie de vous donner des conseils touristiques sur mon quartier et ma ville! Mon condo  est  très accueillant et je suis sûre que vous apprécierez votre séjour chez moi! 

----------
Hi! My name is Laurence and really love my neighbourhood and Montreal!! I am currently working in the employment field  and  I graduated in anthropology and international commerce.  I am   passionnate about travels, reading  and cinema!  I love to meet people from all over the world and learn more about the culture. I lived one year abroad in Argentina and just loved it! I just came back from India and Brazil   that I loved!! I also went to China, Japan, Europe and Tunisie, but my favorite place is South America, especially Bolivia!
You always will find in my house a little gift for you, flyers and maps of the town !
 I speak French, English and Spanish and I would be more than happy to give you more  information and tips about my city and  neighbourhood!
During your stay, I will live less than 15 minutes from the appartment if you have any doubt or questions. 
My appartment is really homy and I am pretty sure  that you will really enjoy it as much as I do!  I am looking forward to meeting you!

host_about: We are in our early 30s and love to travel and explore new cities and areas. We have 2 dogs Darla and Swifty and try to bring them on every new adventure we go on. We are happy to share our home in NYC, a city we both love dearly. We have lived here for 13 years and have lived in multiple neighborhoods so please ask any questions you have about your trip! :)

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Hello! We are Rossy, Carmen, (and Juan). Our nice family home in the Bronx allows you to enjoy the NYC without the NYC cost! We love to host and meet travelers from around the world (look at our welcome board). HABLAMOS  ESPAÑOL también. We live on the property but our rooms also give you some privacy so that you can relax and enjoy the city!

Rossy- I'm your main point of contact. A librarian and a backpacker that wants to hit all continents by the time am 40 and is serious about that. I LOVE to meet travelers and in fact, hosted travelers for free for several years before joining this community. 

David- my other half and co-host. Also pretty friendly and loves people.

Carmen is my mother. You will see her keeping the place clean or checking you in. She has lived abroad and loves to meet guests. 

Juan- My brother Juan has moved into his own place! However, he might be around if I'm not available. He is an energetic outgoing guy who has good advice about where to eat or dance. 

We believe in providing a comfortable and pleasant stay where you feel at home. Ask us about what to do in the city!

For 45years I've loved living in awesome North Kohala,fell in love with my special property when I first saw it in 1974,raised 3 children "roughing it" but loving adventures in a rural community,adopted 6 and fostered 7,taught school as a sub, K-12 ,painted landscapes in oil around the island before the family expanded to 9+ diverse kids,now want to resume my passion for creativity,hosted many musicians and folks interested in sustainable living,healthy choices,loving each other,God and country, and  appreciation for our uniquely wonderful treasures  here at the end of the rainbow.
I've really enjoyed meeting guests from all over the world and have made some lifetime friendships.Come visit,we hope you'll fall in love with the joys of North Kohala too,create wonderful memories with family and friends,(even business partners) and return for many visits!  My daughter reminds me to "always keep smiling"…it's catching!

Hi there,

My name is Enrique and I am a Barcelona Local. I have always loved traveling myself, but also sharing the beauty and wonders of Barcelona with others, so a few years ago I started renting out 2 apartments to travelers coming to the city, always meeting everyone in person so I could share my insights and hidden secrets about Barcelona :)

Now I rent out a few more apartments and it is no longer just me, but we are a small team of people managing the apartments together, but with the same focus on personal and attentive services in authentic apartments that allow for the genuine Barcelona feel for your trip! We call our little team Stay U-nique, because of this focus on a unique feeling when staying with us.

If you have any questions, want to hear about an apartment or just say hi, don´t hesitate to reach out :)

Have a great day!

ALOHA !  E komo mai . . . and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!  

Captain Cook Resorts manages over 140 privately owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu).  Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!  

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

Provided with your rental:

• Bed linens, bath, beach & kitchen towels, dishes, silverware, cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
• Beach chairs
• Hair dryer, iron & ironing board
• Several days’ supply of coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, 2oz shampoo & 2oz conditioner, paper goods (paper towels, tissue, toilet paper), and basic cleaning supplies. Additional sundry and food items are available local markets and grocery stores, for example, Safeway, at 888 Kapahulu Avenue, or Costco at 525 Alakawa Street (between the airport and Waikiki).
 
Not provided with your rental:
 
• Beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Zip-Lock baggies, coffee, condiments, seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, bleach, and hand lotion.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

Hi,我是Selena來自HK!旅行､美食､電影､音樂都是我生活的點點滴滴｡每到一座陌生的城市,走街串巷,逛逛當地的菜市場,鉆鉆當地的小巷子,吃吃路邊攤,逛逛自由市場,才能真正體驗當地人的生活,不虛此行!另外,去一些很少人知道的或者交通不那麽方便的地方玩一玩,會有完全不一樣的體驗和收穫｡我喜歡結交來自世界各地的朋友｡Airbnb提供給了我一個很好的平台和機會｡我個人有一些相當不錯的空房,我希望能提供給更多Airbnb的旅客,也希望每個人留在我們這裏都是非常愉快和舒服的｡當然啦,Selena的旅店是以結交來自世界各地朋友爲目的的平價旅店,成長路上難免有不足之處,望多一份溝通少一份誤解,Selena非常期待您和您的朋友光臨!
Realtor at Hayden Real Estate Group.  Live in NYC And Los Angeles.

We offer a private room at our flat, including a breakfast (croissants, butter, orange juice, coffee and tea), for guests who want to have a quiet and nice place in Barcelona. Our apartment have fast wi-fi connection, kitchen (to cook something fast, like pasta, sandwich, tea, coffee). I am Victoria, a young profesional in international economics, living with my boyfriend who is profesional in tourist services. Out flat is small, clean and it is located really really close to Sagrada Familia. I am in love with my city and I can offer you some place to visit. We also offer one day trips to RUPIT, BESALÚ, CAMINO DE RONDAS, CASTELLFOLLIT DE LA ROCA, CADAQUÉS, PORT AVENTURA, AIGÜESTORTES. Ask us any question on availability and price of the excursions , prices are starting from 150 € pp, including the whole day of activities, car transfer to the place and much fun! We are also offering discounts for many attractions in Barcelona (ask for that in advance). We really want you to fall in love with Barcelona and have perfect vacations here

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: Hey there, I'm a singer-songwriter. Welcome to my home!

We moved to Hong Kong from London in summer 2013, and this incredible city has been our home ever since. Ryan is from London and Krystal is originally from Hong Kong.

We both run our own businesses and travel regularly for our jobs and for leisure of course! Blessed with the proximity to other fantastic places nearby, we have been busy travelling extensively around Asia ever since we arrived in HK, including Tibet, Nepal, Cambodia, Vietnam, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, Bali etc. We will be more than happy to share travel tips if any guests are making a trip to other Asian countries too!

In our spare time, we enjoy going on the many fantastic hikes in HK, sipping iced tea and cold beer on the beach, yoga, jazz, good coffee, a good book, and spending time with our furry friend Lola. 

You may also meet our lovely helper Jay (she's is from Philippine and enjoys volleyball!), who helps us out when we are not around.

When we travel abroad we always use Airbnb. For us, a clean, comfortable and safe place to stay is essential. This is exactly what we offer to any guests staying with us. We hope that our place will be a little home-away-from-home for you during your time in HK.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I have been a host and a guest of airbnb since 2011.  Through airbnb I have met wonderful people from around the globe.  
Mainly, I work from home as a programmer/web developer, which takes most of my time.  Lately, I rescued a dog and decided to keep her, so now she has a home and lives here with me.  
I enjoy good movies, reading about world history, learning new languages or practicing the ones I know, having dinner with friends and travelling.
I enjoy hosting and hope to meet my guests expectations and standards.  
I am respectful of others privacy as I would like others  to be of mine.   I am a social person but I also like my quiet moments.

Archaeology expert, Antiquer, Painter and Writer.
My books about; Autobiography, Political History, Philosophy, Sociology and Psychology. I often travel abroad. (For this reason, I decided to rent my house for long-term trips.) I don't like people being restrict, but of course I also expect some rules to be followed. (This is a case of respect.) Books, music, cinema, sports and of course travel are indispensable for me. (I stayed almost 2 years in Africa). I have been in many countries of the world, with the exception of America and Far East countries. I always travel alone, I don't like connections that restrict my mobility. To see new countries, to recognize new cultures, to meet different people always carry a quality of discovery for me. I believe that life is not static and I constantly moving. 
Freedom is important than everything. 
Life is short, birds are flying :)

Hello fellow travelers!  

I'm a Montreal native who really loves discovering new cultures and cuisines, road tripping and meeting new people. I graduated in Clinical Exercise Physiology at Concordia University and am currently embarking on a masters in Vision Rehabilitation at University of Montreal. I've visited a few countries in Asia, and would love to travel in Nordic countries in the near future. Having been wandering around quite a bit, I've come to believe that having a comfortable and affordable place to stay is a major contributor to a memorable and stress-free journey! So all that said, I'll be more than happy to welcome you in my home and help you enjoy your stay in Montreal!
simple and easy-going....

After travelling from Ontario to Paris, Paris to Berlin, Berlin back to Ontario, we now call Montreal our home. host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I am a medical professionals living and working in Manhattan. I have a two bedroom apartment in uptown Manhattan.

I have been hosting on Airbnb for over five years. I hope to provide a clean and comfortable place to stay for tourists and other travelers that are visiting NYC.



This is a shared apartment and everything except your private bedroom is shared. If you have any questions, feel free to message us :)

I live in uptown Manhattan, just north of Central Park, and a block away from Morningside Park. 

The apartment is very centrally located, I am close to trains (subways), museums, Central Park and various bus routes, which makes living as a tourist very EASY. 

We hope you enjoy your stay in NYC; the best city in the world :)

Highlights:
•Secure and safe building
•Clean, furnished private rooms
•Queen Size Beds (comfortably accommodates 2 people), with option for another bed to sleep an extra 2 people. (4 people total)
•Free unlimited wifi/internet access
•Air-Conditioning/Heating 
•Easy walk to Central Park/Coffee Shops/Museums etc ... 
•Minutes walk to the train/subway/bus stations
•Free Coffee/Tea (Keurig)
•Clean bedding/linen/towels/toiletries provided upon check-in
•Free unlimited Kitchen use

Hablo español también :)

iTrip Vacations - Maui offers many Maui home rentals, all beautifully situated on the sparkling beaches of Kaanapali, Napili, Kapalua, Lahaina, Kihei, Wailea and Maalaea. Our Maui home rentals are beachfront style, offering activities like snorkeling, surfing, whale watching, hiking, and relaxing by the beach or pool. Not far from many of our Maui home rentals is Haleakalā National Park, an amazing destination for beautiful views, complete with a visitor center for educational information. Also near all of our Maui home rentals are a number of great shops and delicious restaurants for refueling after a long day at the beach. All of our Maui home rentals offer you all the comforts of home with the addition of luxurious amenities. Book one of iTrip Vacations' many beautiful Maui home rentals today for the trip of a lifetime!

Hi everyone!

We are Eva & Jacques and we work in the travel and tourism industry. Our company is AB Apartment Barcelona. What we aim to do is offer each of our guests the best Barcelona experience, from start to finish. So as soon as you begin to book your stay right up until the moment you leave Barcelona, my team and I will be available to help you with any questions you might have, or even just to offer you some friendly advice. 

We have one office open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, meaning you can contact us anytime you want, day or night. We speak many languages between us, and we’re all tourism professionals. Plus, we know all the best places to go in Barcelona, from sights and attractions to bars and restaurants (including where the locals go) so we can help you make your time in the city the most memorable with our insider tips ;)

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through me, you’ll be in safe hands.

We looking forward to meeting you soon!

Hi,大家好我是Visnon. 

我们喜欢旅行,爱住当地的老房子,逛当地的市场,喜欢色彩浓郁的国度,探索奇葩的民风! 

我们改造了一些老房子,并加入了有趣的想法｡ 
在分享前我们都会试住几天,确保一切安好,并在细节上做更人性化的调整｡ 

因为是老房子,它有温度又有些局限,希望能体谅它｡Visnon坚持选用五星酒店出身的专业管理团队来打理房间,使用星级酒店的床品,希望我的每个客人都能感受到放心和舒适｡ 

快来香港找我们玩吧! 
Visnon会在能力范围内Do my best for you! 
愿大家都有一个美好的假期回忆~ 

*请大家在预定的时候告诉我入住人数,大概的入住和退房时间,是来旅游还是本地居民,会不会有朋友来玩,是否带宝宝哦!

Ward
Manly
Ocean enthusiast
IT Weasel
Traveler

Aloha!
Im Sandi, my husband & I are the owners of this condo!  I am retired after 33 yrs of working in Supply Chain Management !  I have been married 48 yrs.  We have three adult sons, two daughter-in-laws and four BEAUTIFUL grandchildren!  I love to travel in my RV, spend lots of time with my family and LOVE being a Grandma!
This condo is our home away from home and I LOVE spending time there and sharing it with others when I'm not!  I take great pride in keeping it nice, comfy and affordable!  (my posted rates INCLUDE Maui's 14.41% tax rate!)
When I come to Kihei I absolutely LOVE spending time outdoors snorkeling, hiking and just enjoying ALL the beauty of the island.  I chose KGE(Kihei Garden Estates) based on it's location and how easy it is to access all the sights of Maui!  We have a very relaxed and non-commercial complex for our guests enjoyment.  I am very proud of my "home away from home" and LOVE sharing it with my guests!!!  Life is a vapor of smoke!  Enjoy every moment with your loved ones while you can!!

Hi, we are Rachael & William. We have been living in this lovely city of Sydney for more than half of our lives. 

We like trying out different cuisines, we love travelling and we also enjoy having a quite relaxing time at home. 

I have had many great experiences travelling and I am hoping that our guests staying in our places will experience the same excitement and magic in Sydney.

We'd love to meet you from the other side of the world and we'd love to talk with you about interesting things we had in this city. We look forward to hosting you soon!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Meu nome é Daniel, eu sou francês e moro no Brasil desde 2014. Tenho vários apartamentos que gero por conta de proprietários que também são amigos. 
Antes de me contatar, favor respeitar estes pequenos pontos para eu puder responder a todos da melhor maneira :
1 - Não pedir troca de contato ou vísita antes de reserva confirmada
2 - Favor verificar e atualizar seus dados de pagamento antes de mandar pedido 
3 - Não aceito pagamento por boleto
4 - Os valores são atualizados, favor não pedir desconto, sobretudo para estadia pequena

Por conta própria desde 2017, respondo rápido e tenho contato fácil para discutir com respeito e tentar acertar todas as partes. Podemos conversar em português, inglês, francês e espanhol.

My name is Daniel, I am French and I live in Brazil since 2014. I have few apartments for the account of owners who also are friends. 
In the aim to help people and to avoid confusions, thanks to agree between you before consulting me. In this way, I can help you and others persons better and deal faster :
1 - Don't ask ou give contact or visit before reservation confirmed
2 - Thanks to verify your payment form before to send offer
3 - I don' accept Boleto payment
4 - The prices are actualized, thanks no ask discount,above of all for short period

With own account since 2017, I answer quickly and I have an easy touch to discuss with respect and try to find best solution. We can talk in portuguese, english, french and spannish.

Je m´appelle Daniel, je suis français et je vis au Brésil depuis 2014. Je gère divers appartements pour le compte de propriétaires qui sont aussi des amis. 
Dans un souci d´aider le plus grand nombre et d´éviter confusions, merci de déjà vous accorder entre vous avant. De cette manière, je peux vous aider plus facilement et finaliser sans interférence :
1 - Ne pas demander ou passer de contact avant une réservation confirmée 
2 - Merci de vérifier et d'actualiser vos données bancaires avant d'envoyer une demande
3 - Je n'accepte pas de paiement par "boleto"
4 - Les valeurs sont actualisés, merci de ne pas demander de décompte, surtout pour courte durée

Pour compte propre depuis 2017, je réponds rapidement et j´ai le contact facile pour discuter dans le respect et tenter de répondre à vos demandes. Nous pouvons discuter en portugais, anglais, français et espagnol.

Comédien de profession; je suis curieux de nature. J'ai élargi mes compétences artistiques en étant aussi mannequin, modèle nu!! J'ai également été chroniqueur culturel en radio! J'ai pour passion le cinéma, les voyages (Cambodge, Vietnam, Australie, Italie, Espagne, Maroc, USA, Caraibes, Jamaique, Mexique, …) Je suis français et habite à Montreal depuis 10 ans! J'aime les langues, découvrir d'autres cultures et suis ouvert à tous sujets de discussion. Je ne peux pas vivre sans musique et les livres occupent une grande place dans ma vie, j ai d'ailleurs déjà écris quelques nouvelles. J'aime tous les plaisirs de la vie! Je suis très sociable, j'ai appris la patience et ne jure que dans les rapports honnêtes et respectueux. Je suis plutôt calme et me suis mis il y a quelques années au yoga et à la médication.  Ma devise serait : Profites de chaque moment que t'offres la vie car elle passe vite!

Hi,
I'm Sarah, french girl living in Montreal since 3 years!
I'm a graphic designer working in an Architecture agency.
For sure I love travelling and have the time of my life each time I discover new things, new cultures, new people... 
What I love the most in traveling is to get lost, and appropriate the place. My ultimate dream is to live on a boat, dive and observe fish all day long. 
I'm also crazy about local gastronomy, I love discover a country/city by eating all kind of food that I see. 

Most of the time I travel with my boyfriend Pierre-Luc, he is a designer, he creates all kind of things,with metal & wood furniture, he is so brillant. 
Our latest crazy move was to restore an old loft in one of the best Montreal's district. We created all the furniture by ourselves.
Thanks for reading me!

Sarah

J'ai 28 ans et je vis à Montréal depuis maintenant 6 ans. J'ai eu ma maitrise à Polytechnique de Montréal et depuis je travaille en tant qu'ingénieur dans des entreprises internationales. Hola me llamo Isabel soy una chica muy simpática me gusta el mar la montaña y conocer gente nueva
Soy una chica tranquila y espero que la paséis muy bien estando de visita en barcelona podéis  preguntarme acerca de la ciudad y sugerirme lo que necesitáis

I was born and raised in Switzerland, into a family of watchmakers, engineers, doctors, architects, artists, musicians, and missionaries. Uncles, aunts and cousins doing God's work all over the world, people not principally interested in money. Not to say that I do not approve of wealth and power. My grandfather, after all, was a wealthy man, founding a watch company more than 100 years ago, but let your good fortune be applied for a good purpose. 

Religion, however, is too confusing for me to understand, so I stick to nature. This is my guide in life. And it has worked very well for me so far. For these reasons, science, culture, politics. social justice, economics and all the things that make this world go round are of great interest to me. I'm green politically, blue in many ways, my eyes, my jeans, my bathroom towels, my mood once in a while, blue is good, I feel fine. Red and black attracts me, but generally, I will try to keep a cool head. White is beautiful, but what or who is spotless? Yellow and orange are great, who does not like sunshine? But I prefer gold. And silver would be my blue. It suites me better. I'll tell you more at a later point. 

Blond originally, but most hair that remains on my body is in all other places than on my head. I shave off the rest, with some stubble remaining once in a while when I'm just too lazy. I am a mountain person, strong, agile, in good shape. Style? Always appropriate for the occasion. Quality is what matters. And who does not recognize that, oh well, simply does not recognize it.

I have lived on Hawaii Island (the Big Island) for 17 years & I love our small community. I enjoy meeting people from all over the world & have lived & traveled in Europe, South America & went to Japan this year. 

I enjoy helping people find the things they want to do & see in our community & on our island. I love having my finger on the pulse of what's happening & if I can't answer your question right away, I can find out the answer quickly! I love connecting people with other people & helping in whatever way I can. I enjoy people from diverse backgrounds with interesting stories to share.

I speak Italian & German (although they are a bit rusty!) & I lived in both Italy & Germany, so I understand the challenges of traveling in another country & do what I can to ease things. I also speak a small amount of Spanish & French (can read it better than I speak!). I'm currently trying to learn a bit of Japanese (just getting started!) & have also studied a bit of Farsi!

My favorite things are Partner Dancing (Social Dance), such as Ballroom, Salsa, Swing & Argentine Tango. I love traveling & hope to one day see the Taj Mahal, Istanbul, Bali, Tahiti, Cordoba, Grenada, Malta, Vietnam, Thailand... well... I love to travel! I enjoy good wine & fine chocolate. I love sunsets at the beach... sunset is my favorite time of day & I try to see it each day. Surprising fact? I like old cars. 

Airbnb asked me for my life motto: How about Namaste? The good in me sees the good in you.

I'm a licensed realtor and have lived in Kona for more than 15 years.  I enjoy helping people get the most out of their time visiting the Big Island and having nice people to share my home with.  I love kids so they are always welcome as a second guest!

Hello! 

I was born and raised in Oahu, and I left for a few years to graduate from a mainland university. But during my years away, Hawaii has always called me home. I returned to Honolulu, Hawaii in 2013 and graduated from the University of Hawaii with my Master's degree.

My mom and I welcome travelers and families to our cozy apartment because we know that booking hotels can be expensive, stressful, and impersonal. We hope to make our guests’ stay in Hawaii memorable--whether it be for a quick getaway or for a few, relaxing weeks. 

Guests will have the opportunity to try different dining options, or shop at the local farmers’ market or grocery store and cook a private meal in the stocked kitchen. 

I check my phone and email throughout the day, so feel free to contact me whichever way is more convenient.

Me llamo Miguel, y tengo un  apartamento de alquiler económico que se encuentra a cinco minutos a pie de mi propia casa. En consecuencia, estoy disponible casi en todo momento para ayudarle durante su estancia.

Mi propiedad está asegurada,autorizada y registrada oficialmente en la "Direcció General de Turisme de Catalunya ' y en el Ayuntamiento de Barcelona.

También puedo organizar otras actividades, como, transportes al aeropuerto y desde el aeropuerto, y todo lo que necesiten y les interese para ahorrar dinero y tener una feliz estancia en Barcelona, por nombrar sólo unos pocos. Si necesita algo especial, sólo hay que preguntar y si puedo organizarlo para ti lo haré.

Si usted está buscando un lugar en Barcelona que se encuentra en el centro de la ciudad, y muy bien comunicado, pruebe mi apartamento y espero convencerlos.

We are avid travelors and enjoy staying at vacation rentals, like the one we have created here. We enjoy the experience because staying at a vacation rental gives one a sense of the character of the city and people you are visiting -- something you don't get from the "sterility" of the hotel stay.  In that light, we are proud to be able to offer our guests an opportunity to stay in an apartment that is typical of the sort built after the war to accomodate the returning service men and their families.  The neighborhood is very much residential and varied in population age wise and linguistically.  It is only a block away from a major commerical artery and very close to the metro system.

 About myself, I am a biologist who now works in education at a College in downtown montreal.  While I am very much anchored in the scientific mind set, my reading pleasure invariably centers around history -- mostly western civilization -- and art.   We enjoy living in Montreal because of its cultural richness, and benefit from all the opportunites ranging from theatre productions to museum exhibits, etc.  We also enjoy hiking through the Laurentians and the richness of the environment that surrounds Montreal, which is not that far away.

Whether you come to stay here or not, I think you will enjoy visiting this unique city in the North America.  Montreal is sure to satisfy you at many levels, and we wish you a pleasant stay.

Ray

We are 4 friends that love to travel, just like you. We are all born and raised in Porto. Even though, we travel constantly, for work or fun..., Porto is where home is! 

Our hosts across the world have made our journeys memorable - that hidden square, that restaurant with no english menus, unexpected block parties or that book left on the bedside table. Come visit us in Porto and we will return the favour! 

Most of the times, Filipe will be your host, but whenever possible João, Nuno & Melo will come to meet you too!

Ridge Realty/Rentals LLC is the oldest, family owned real estate brokerage which specializes in properties at The Kapalua® Resort. For over thirty years we have maintained a solid track record, generating a customer loyalty that is second to none.  

When planning your next Maui dream vacation, do not make the mistake of staying in a hotel, most of which are small, overcrowded and overpriced. Start your vacation off right, and book your stay in one of our affordable spacious properties. All our properties come fully furnished and offer free high speed wireless internet, fully stocked kitchens, a starter supply of towels, soap/shampoo and laundry detergent, plus linens and all the other comforts of home.

Our clientele enjoy personal, around-the-clock service; staff are on-site, 24 hours a day.  Clients deserve the best and we deliver.  Allow our team to enhance your vacation with special touches; we will stock your pantry, arrange a limo service from the airport, or even create that perfect romantic atmosphere, just for your arrival – no matter the request, it is our pleasure the be there for you. We go the extra mile to ensure that your stay with Ridge Realty/Rentals is nothing short of extraordinary. Our number one priority is to accommodate you in creating a personalized, dream vacation that is as much stress free as it is memorable.

Kapalua® is fortunate to be able to claim three, world-class beaches. Kapalua Bay (rated the “number one beach in the world," by Conde Nast), Oneloa Bay and D.T. Fleming Beach are just a quick walk from all of our properties. Do not worry about parking or long drives; the best beaches in the world are just out your door!
All Kapalua® Resort activities and amenities are conveniently located within walking distance from all of our properties.  You do not feel like walking? No problem! The resort's complimentary shuttle will pick you up at your door, and then transport you to anywhere on the resort grounds.

At Ridge Realty/Rentals we feel fortunate to call Maui our home, and want nothing more than to share this beautiful paradise with you. With the warm sand between your toes, the sun upon your face and the soft trade winds at your back, you will discover an island way of living, offering the peaceful simplicity you have been searching for. We take pride in serving each and every one of our clients with the warmth of the Aloha Spirit.
 
Mahalo for your interest and we look forward to seeing you soon!
I live in Barcelona for more than 10 years, I really love the city and its vibe! I hope to share this passion with you.

Martin

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about: I am a forty-year-old  physiotherapist who has been working as a Pilates instructor for 18 years. I was born in Rio de Janeiro and have already worked as a guide in the past in pair with Dad, who knows a lot of Rio, its culture and the most genuine and incredible places to visit besides the usual ones. I consider myself as a great hostess and I will do my very best in case of doubts or troubles if it happens. To deal with the stress, "I breath the roses and blow the candles"  several times if needed ;)

We can't live without sunshine, an open mind, kind hearted people, good food and our family. 
We are crazy about the artistry of food and always on the hunt for new creative food experiences, and the Surry Hills/Darlinghurst and CBD are sure bets for all foodies out there!
We love travelling, getting to know new cultures and people.
We try to make each day count. 
We choose to be happy. 
We love my Airbnb experience, both as a host and a traveller and cannot recommend it highly enough.

We are blessed with amazing opportunities everyday, and lucky enough to not work for anyone, instead we manage our own portfolio of properties and our clients'. We are providers of boutique executive and holiday accommodation in popular locations across the city. Our properties are selected for their style, features, luxury, amenities and convenient locations. Our aim is to provide a modern and vibrant approach to short term accommodation. 

We frequently service corporate relocations, business travellers, extended holiday makers and families that prefer “home-style” accommodation with kitchen and laundry facilities. Our properties come complete with linen, towels, kitchenware and free wifi internet.

If you are a property owner or would like to know more please contact us.

Located a block from the golden sands of Waikiki Beach is the Waikiki Grand Hotel. Submit to the easygoing lifestyle of Hawaii in one of our condominiums steps to the shore. Imagine a day-hike to the top of majestic Diamond Head Crater or a bike ride around Kapiolani Park. With the Pacific Ocean at your feet, anything is possible.

Waikiki Grand’s affordable vacation rentals occupy a location just at the edge of Kapiolani Park, home to the Honolulu Zoo and Waikiki Aquarium. We’re just steps to a broad stretch of sandy beach and Kapahulu Pier, which is known for great surfing and boogie boarding.

Whether wading in a calm ocean pool or exploring the urban landscape, there’s a ton to do in and out of the ocean.

- Catch a concert at the Waikiki Shell
- Snorkel with tropical fish at Sans Souci Beach
- Hit the trail to Diamond Head Lookout
- Learn to surf with the legendary Waikiki Beach Boys
- Check out live music along Kalakaua Avenue
- Dive into Waikiki’s sumptuous global cuisine scene
- Get the most value for your money, eat well and have fun

During your stay, you’ll explore a virtual buffet of international cuisine along Kalakaua Avenue. Cafes with macadamia nut pancakes, fresh mahi mahi, poke, and handmade noodles dot the streets. Stay nearby and grab Teddy’s Bigger Burgers, then cocktails with an ocean view at Hula’s Bar & Lei Stand.

Waikiki Grand Hotel is LGBT-friendly and TAG approved, offering an affordable price and a great location. Hawaii is a celebration of color and friendliness, and the place you stay should be, too.
Young spirited energetic senior. Immigrated from the Netherlands many years ago. Speaks Dutch, German and English.

host_about: We are a creative couple...I am a Fashion designer and Julien (my fiance) is an interior designer. We love traveling, meeting people and we are very easy going.

A proximité à pied de la nouvelle zone Commerciale à venir en 2018.
 

Construite dans la partie nord du projet Faubourg Contrecoeur et adossées à l'arrondissement Anjou, le quartier est très bien desservi, métro, aux abonnements de Car to Go et à Automobile, bus 141, 26 et 85, Ecole, Parc pour enfant, Commerçants à venir, plus ceux déjà existants. Il n'en demeure pas moins que ce quartier reste très calme.Cette maison unifamiliale propose un design urbain, propre au Faubourg Contrecoeur.

Cette maison propose une superficie 2184pi2 sur 2 étages. Le garage de 21x19, les 3chambres à coucher à l'étage, un foyer au gaz design 3 faces, Aménagement paysager, système d'irrigation automatique, bac à fleur ou potager, système d'alarme plus intercom avec caméra, une terrasse en béton 12X12 avec un grand terrain de 4 200pieds carrés.

À l'intérieur de la maison, les 2 planchers sont insonorisés, le sous-sol comprend une porte coupe son, il devient alors très intime. 

Vous êtes les bienvenues pour une visite préliminaire, mais l'emballement est garantie.

Hi I'm Alejandro, architect and pasionate apartment owner and manager. I work with my team to offer the best experiences in Barcelona and Pontevedra.
Under Archsense Apartments and ArchSense Barcelona brands, we are a young and dynamic company that is dedicated to personalized management of tourist apartments and houses in two diferent areas in Spain. In Barcelona  (Catalunya) and Pontevedra (Galicia).

Our management comprises different phases, from the initial search of clients, reception and accommodation in the apartment until his departure. We also take care of the apartment all clean and conditioning time, and to resolve any issues that may arise during a guest's stay.
The main goal of our management is twofold:

- Provide the owner a full service under which you can forget about the worries and concerns the operation of holiday rental, knowing that the investment in the business will bring greater benefits than the option of "traditional" rent.
- Get the highest customer satisfaction, ensuring their comfort, in order to make your stay in our apartments result in all the most pleasant time possible.

Our differences with other organizations dedicated to the tourist apartment sector lies in providing special pampering to the customer, feeling to be at their own home and have at all the time a "friend" of reference in the city. This person (me or some of my collaborators) speaks your language, and will help you to solve any questions or problems and looking for suggestions of leisure in the city. 
All this expertise  has allowed us to grow gradually, as the viral marketing has proven to be our best advertising tool, and thus many customers and many others have repeated recommend us to their family and friends. As an architect, different owners have also recommended us to their friends to transform their properties for holiday apartments.

Hi, we are Krystal and Eric, Texas natives but our hearts belong in Kauai, we literally fell in love with this Garden Isle the first time we visited in 2010. After returning just about every year since then, we are now blessed to own this villa here on the sunny South Shore of Kauai. We hope to live here full-time someday, but in the meantime, we are so happy to share our home and our love of Kauai with you!  As hosts, we strive to exceed your expectations and provide you with a joyful and memorable experience to last a lifetime. We hope you keep coming back year after year, just as we have! As a Nutritionist, Krystal owns her own Health & Wellness business with flexible hours to accommodate your needs. Eric works in IT and has provided this Kauai villa with some extra gadgets & devices to satisfy your technology needs. Our local, on-island representative, Heather, is willing and ready to answer your calls locally in any times of need. We are all just a phone call away!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Hi, 
These are Shushma e Nityam - Nityam is my son and together we manage quite a few properties in Rio.

I was named Shushma by my Spiritual teacher, Satyaprem, and this is how I wish to be called. My previous name was Lakini and for sometime you will still see reviews for my old name.
Nityam is my son and his name was also given by our teacher Satyaprem.

We live in Rio de Janeiro and we love this city!

Rio is a wonderful place to be, the nature, the beaches, bars, restaurants, the "carioca's" laid back style, the music, the dance , there is so much charm to it!!

We are advertising a few places here at AirBnB, so people can come and stay  in Rio according to their personal preferences, demands, needs and naturally to their own budgets.

Get in touch with us and our agency, Hot Spot Homes and we will do our best to help you find the right accommodation whether it is for your family, friends or other travel companions.

Airport pick ups, tour guides, house cleaning and babysitting can be arranged upon previous requirement at additional cost.

We are into meditation, healthy lifestyle, Arts and Traveling.
Nityam is a photographer and gymnast.

At work we enjoy making sure you get a nice, comfy and clean place to stay, we love welcoming people to our city and to our country. 
If you book one of our Hot Spots you will receive a list of suggestions of places to visit and tips how to make the most of your trip in Rio. 
We love decoration and providing a homy atmosphere to wherever we go.
Looking forward to be your next hosts in Rio ;)

Thank you!

Warm regards,

Shushma and Nityam



Dear guests, 

Please, make sure you get the correct rates for Special seasons, holidays and special events in town. Sometimes the rates may not be updated in some of the apartments, so please, inquire first.
NOTE: rates vary according to the different seasons.

Bank Holidays, New Year's, Carnival, summer days and Olympics have special rates. 
Please, keep this in mind!

Please, inquire before sending reservation requests. This is very important. Most apartments are being advertised on other sites too, unfortunately we do not have a tool to keep all the dates updated in all of them.

I will be glad to help you find the best suited location for you, your travel companions and family.

Warm regards from Rio de Janeiro,

Shushma

I’m Kalani, born and raised in Hawaii and proud of my Hawaiian heritage. Growing up here my Aunt had a beach home on the north shore of Oahu and it’s there l learned to be a fish. I’d spend all my free time fishing, diving for lobster and octopus, surfing waves, boating & beach-combing, A typical beach bum and my family worried for my future. I eventually found a job that turned into a career and would you guess .. YES it’s on the ocean and so I’ve been a professional mariner for past 20 years and it’s there where l feel my best being connected with the sea, sky and all of gods beautiful creations.

Nous sommes une famille avec deux enfants de 16 ans, nous avons fait l'acquisition du triplex et  l'avons totalement rénové. 
C'est la raison pour laquelle, nous préférons louer à des gens sérieux, respectueux et calmes. 
De plus, nous résidons au rez-de-chaussée.  ( juste en dessous de l'appartement. ) De ce fait, il nous est très facile de vous accueillir à n'importe quelle heure. Nous veillons à ce que vous vous sentiez bien chez nous, tout en respectant votre vie privée. 

Si vous avez des demandes particulières, des questions, n'hésitez pas. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------We are a family with two children, we bought the triplex and  completely renovated it last year.
This is why we prefer to rent to serious, respectful and quiet people .
In addition, we live on the ground floor. (Just under the apartment.) Therefore, it is very easy to welcome you at any time. We ensure that you will  feel at home, while respecting your privacy.

If you have any special requests, questions, do not hesitate.

Lives in Delhi, I am hosting around 100 + properties in major cities like New Delhi, Mumbai, Bengaluru and Singapore & Hong Kong provide with some amazing options to both leisure and corporate travelers. Having a good knowledge about all these cities, I will be here to assist you on finding the best restaurants, night-life, other services, etc. around you.

Worked with a luxury hotel group, Oberoi Hotels & Resorts I believe in “Guest is God” theory and treat my guests with same passion and dedication. Currently working with a UK based company where we manage stay solutions for London, Paris, New York and Dublin.

Hi, I'm Selena from HK! Travel, food, movies, music all my life bit by bit. I like to make friends from all over the world. Airbnb provides gave me a good platform and opportunity. Of course, Selena's hotel is to make friends from all over the world for the purpose of affordable hotel, we have been trying to do better, but we still have shortcomings, I hope every guest a little more of a communication misunderstanding, Selena is looking forward to you and your friends!///


Hi,我是Selena來自HK!旅行､美食､電影､音樂都是我生活的點點滴滴｡每到一座陌生的城市,走街串巷,逛逛當地的菜市場,鉆鉆當地的小巷子,吃吃路邊攤,逛逛自由市場,才能真正體驗當地人的生活,不虛此行!另外,去一些很少人知道的或者交通不那麽方便的地方玩一玩,會有完全不一樣的體驗和收穫｡我喜歡結交來自世界各地的朋友｡Airbnb提供給了我一個很好的平台和機會｡我個人有一些相當不錯的空房,我希望能提供給更多Airbnb的旅客,也希望每個人留在我們這裏都是非常愉快和舒服的｡當然啦,Selena的旅店是以結交來自世界各地朋友爲目的的平價旅店,成長路上難免有不足之處,望多一份溝通少一份誤解,Selena非常期待您和您的朋友光臨!

Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Olá, visitante! 

Se você chegou até aqui, significa que você está planejando visitar o Rio de Janeiro, a nossa Cidade Maravilhosa. Nós, do Estadia Carioca, damos boas-vindas a você e esperamos que sejamos a sua escolha de hospedagem nesta viagem.

Por que escolher a Estadia Carioca?

* Experiência 

Temos mais de 5 anos de atuação no ramo de aluguéis de temporada e receptivo com atuação em todo o território nacional. Desde 2012, já atendemos mais de 5 mil clientes de 43 países! Mas, ainda não estamos (Website hidden by Airbnb) a sua ajuda, queremos aumentar muito esses números. Queremos ser a sua escolha nº1 para hospedagem no Rio de Janeiro.

* Assistência Profissional 

Nossa equipe é composta por profissionais gabaritados (advogados, corretores e guias turísticos) para dar toda a assistência necessária aos viajantes. Os hóspedes podem contar com nossas dicas sobres os pontos turísticos mais famosos da cidade e também sobre quais cidades próximas os viajantes não podem deixar de visitar, como Búzios, Ilha Grande e Visconde Mauá.  


* Atendimento Diferenciado 

A Estadia Carioca é reconhecida por seu estilo e atendimento diferenciado e por sua confiabilidade, flexibilidade e expertise, garantindo sempre a satisfação e o conforto dos seus clientes, sejam eles proprietários de imóveis ou viajantes.

* Portfólio de Imóveis Diversificado

São diversas opções de imóveis, em localizações privilegiadas do Rio de Janeiro; com espaço, privacidade e todas as amenidades necessárias para que os hóspedes se sintam em casa. Nós ajudamos nossos clientes a fazer a melhor escolha de acordo com as suas necessidades, e pelo melhor preço possível.


* Segurança

Todos os imóveis em nossa listagem foram verificados, as fotos representam a realidade dos apartamentos, o visitante tem a tranquilidade de saber que não terá nenhuma surpresa desagradável ao chegar no imóvel.

 Conte com a Estadia Carioca para achar a sua melhor hospedagem!

English version:

Hello, traveller!

If you are here right now, it means that you are planning to visit Rio de Janeiro, our “Cidade Maravilhosa”.

We, from Estadia Carioca, welcome you and hope that we will be your choice of lodging on this trip.

Why should you choose Estadia Carioca?

* Experience

We have more than 6 years of activity in the business of vacation rentals with operations throughout the national territory. Since 2012, we have served over 5,000 customers from 43 countries! But we are still not satisfied. With your help, we want to greatly increase these numbers. We want to be your # 1 choice for housing in Rio de Janeiro.

* Professional Assistance

Our team is made up of qualified professionals (lawyers, brokers and tour guides) who are able give all the necessary assistance to travelers. Guests can count on us for tips on the most famous sights of the city and also on which nearby cities travelers can not miss, such as Búzios, Ilha Grande and Visconde Mauá.

* Special service

Estadia Carioca is renowned for its style and differentiated service and for its reliability, flexibility and expertise, always guaranteeing the satisfaction and comfort of its clients, whether they are property owners or guests.

* Diversified Portfolio

 We have several rental properties in privileged locations in Rio de Janeiro; with space, privacy and all the necessary amenities to make guests feel at home. We help our customers to make the best choice according to their needs, and for the best possible price.


* Safety

All the properties in our listing have been checked, the photos represent the reality of the apartments, the visitor has the peace of mind that will not have any unpleasant surprises upon arriving at the apartment.

 Count on Estadia Carioca to help you find your best possible housing option!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Olá, sou formado em administração de empresas. Trabalho no ramo da saúde a mais de 10 anos. Em 2012 comecei a gerenciar apartamentos e por isso, ofereço por aqui apartamentos por temporada no Rio de Janeiro, localizados na zona sul, próximo a praia. Chamamos nosso grupo de Rio Habitat.
Nosso objetivo é oferecer um lugar muito agradável e estamos em desenvolvimento de uma estrutura ao turista.
O grande bacana é que estou começando a conhecer pessoas por aqui.
Essa comunidade tem tudo a ver com o conceito que tento trazer para a minha vida pessoal e empresarial.
Não estou sozinho operando os apartamentos. Posso contar com uma equipe que me ajudam no dia-a-dia.
Então, não se surpreenda se falar com os três na sua hospedagem.
Adoro tecnologia e espero que isso seja o nosso grande diferencial. 
Iremos recebê-los com grande prazer.

Française d'origine, je vis au Québec depuis plus de 10 ans. J'aime voyager, rencontrer de nouvelles personnes et cultures. Je suis une amoureuse de plein air mais aussi très urbaine. Sportive et aussi pratiquante du 5 à 7, je suis toujours de bonne humeur. Je me ferais un plaisir de pouvoir vous faire découvrir tous les attraits que Montréal recèle et aussi les nombreuses activités et beautés des Laurentides et de l'Estrie.
Au plaisir de vous rencontrer...

Hello! I am both a host and guest here on Airbnb. I am an open-minded and easy going person, I like to share stories, put colors on lives, and simply make people happy along my life journey.

I was born and raised in Hong Kong, with also experiences living in the Netherlands (2008), Sweden (2010 to 2012), and Shanghai (2012 to now). I have a curiosity to differences, and a pursuit to be unique in order to bring diversity to the world.

Acadmically specialized in Economics and Statistics, I am now a risk management professional in a Fin-tech company. I love nature, and I like history, sports, salsa dancing, and traveling to new places. I enjoy diverse topics of conversations and reflections, ranging from cultural difference, economy and politics, traveling and foods, to simply life values and planning.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Somos um casal sem filhos caseiros e notívagos. Vivemos com simplicidade e gostamos de conforto. Amamos a natureza, plantas e animais.
Eu cursei Letras na Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro (URFJ) 
Sou culinarista, hostess e organizadora profissional.
Eu falo o que me vem á cabeça sou muito sincera direta e espirituosa. Gosto de ciências ligadas a área de saúde pública infectologia e microbiologia  
Meu marido Toni é hardware e tem interesse em todas as tecnologias ligadas a informática e softwares. Tem grande conhecimento em sistemas de sons música, eletrônica, política e geografia.  Ama futebol cinema música e tudo ligado a essas áreas.
Nós não podemos viver sem DEUS, sem paz, sem amizade, sem dignidade e sem privacidade. Viajar para conhecer o mundo todo faz parte dos nossos sonhos mas conhecer todo o nosso lindo Brasil já estaria de bom tamanho!
Amamos o nosso pais!
Conhecer pessoas de diferentes culturas recebê-las em nossa casa é muito gratificante! Não medimos esforços para deixar os nossos hóspedes o mais confortável possível, oferecendo um espaço muito limpo e organizado, respeitando-lhes sempre a privacidade e ajudando no que precisarem. 
Nossa casa é grande e tem uma localização privilegiada e segura na zona Sul do Rio de Janeiro Temos três excelentes cômodos para locação 
Eu costumo sempre lembrar que toda moeda tem dois lados. 
Nunca acho que o copo está metade vazio, mas sim metade cheio!  
Nós temos fé e quem anda com fé sabe que a fé não costuma falhar.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I moved to Manhattan almost  right after graduating college and have since lived in almost every neighborhood. I  am a member of several local organizations for more than a decade. I  own properties in 3 different Manhattan neighborhoods.
I enjoy skiing,boating, billiards and tennis and have recently enjoyed a beginning in yoga. I would like to re- take up racquetball and golf which I used to play when I had more time and I love to travel.

Lives in Delhi, I am hosting around 100 + properties in major cities like New Delhi, Mumbai, Bengaluru and Singapore & Hong Kong provide with some amazing options to both leisure and corporate travelers. Having a good knowledge about all these cities, I will be here to assist you on finding the best restaurants, night-life, other services, etc. around you.

Worked with a luxury hotel group, Oberoi Hotels & Resorts I believe in “Guest is God” theory and treat my guests with same passion and dedication. Currently working with a UK based company where we manage stay solutions for London, Paris, New York and Dublin.

host_location: Room with private bathron in penthouse in heart of Ipanema
host_about: Hi, my name is Rose. I'm a professional in Project Mgmt divorced and live with my son 19 y/o in Ipanema, Rio de Janeiro. I love rowing down the Lagoon, close to our address, cycling, working out and going to the beach, I am very easy going person, Buddhist of Nichiren Daishonin philosophy which our goal is treat people with kindness and respect!  And we love to meet different cultures... See you soon in Rio!

Someone who thinks positively,I would describe myself as someone who is honest, caring, hardworking, and ambitious. I have a great sense of humour. I am an easy going person & don’t get easily disturbed by up/ down’s in my life. I also enjoy travelling, watching movies, going out for dinner, and having great intellectual conversations!

Location of my guest accommodation is just a 2-minute walk from Gaudi’s iconic Sagrada Familia basilica, it is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district. It offers free Wi-Fi, free coffee and hot drinks, and is 300 m from Sagrada Familia Metro Station.

We offers simple and comfortable accommodation with private room and each room has central heating, and is equipped with a TV, wardrobe and desk. The rooms all have a shower and sink and some have a private bathroom.

The property offers free luggage storage, as well as free tourist information, maps and discounts.

The house is situated in a quiet area, ideal if you want to be out of the city centre, but have the city’s famous landmarks within easy reach.

The spectacular Hospital Sant Pau is just an 5-minute walk away, while the city centre can be reached by metro in 5 minutes from Sagrada Familia station. 

Eixample is a great choice for travellers interested in architecture, food and shopping.

This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews

I moved from Berlin to Rio in 2012. Davi and me bought this big old house that needed a lot of work to be done. We renovated it completely and tried to keep it as original as possible. We did most of the work ourselves, so it took about 4 years to complete it. Since we had more space than we needed, we decided to give Airbnb a try and it's being a really good experience since. We have been lucky to have nice guests that share many common interests and have a fun time in the city.

I work also with photography (artistic, street) and some graphic design. Davi works as a carpenter building furniture. Most of the house's furniture was made by him. If guests share these (or other) interests, we are always open to show and hand out, what we know about brazilian culture, habits, photographers, artists and etc.

WHO
Ariel Bercovich. Architect, designer and photographer. 

WHY
Son of a photographer and a school teacher, self-taught, the camera has been his lifelong companion, the eye through which his perception of reality is filtered and blended.

WHAT
In his latest work, he focuses on photographing urban spaces, landscapes and architecture, though he also enjoys doing portraits and taking part in spontaneous collaborations in the world of theatre and communications. 

HOW
His interdisciplinary background has culminated in a unique way of conceptualising space and a natural intuition for transmitting emotions. Ariel's work is characterized by a love for the details, a passion for capturing the essence of everything that moves him and a mastery of technical skills, which enable him to give each photograph an especially high-quality finish.

WHERE
Born in Buenos Aires. Lives in Barcelona. Inspiration: the world. 

More: Ariel Bercovich Photography
---------------

WHO
Ariel Bercovich. Arquitecto, diseñador y fotógrafo.

WHY
Hijo de padre fotógrafo y madre maestra. Autodidacta. La cámara ha sido desde siempre su compañera de vida, el ojo por el que filtrar y matizar su percepción de la realidad.

WHAT
Su obra reciente se enfoca hacia la fotografía de espacios urbanos, paisajes y arquitectura. Aunque disfruta con el retrato y efectuando colaboraciones espontáneas en el mundo del teatro y la comunicación.

HOW
La formación multidisciplinar le confiere una particular forma de conceptualizar el espacio y una intuición natural para transmitir emociones. El amor por los detalles y el interés por captar la esencia de todo aquello que le conmueve son los rasgos que definen su obra. Y su gran técnica, el instrumento que le permite otorgar, a cada fotografía, un acabado de grandísima calidad.

WHERE
Nacido en Buenos Aires. Vive en Barcelona. Inspiración: el mundo. 

Más: Ariel Bercovich Photography
---------------

QUI
Ariel Bercovich. Architecte, designer et photographe.

POURQUOI
Fils d'un photographe et d'un maître d'école, autodidacte, la caméra a été son compagnon de vie, l'œil à travers lequel sa perception de la réalité est filtré et mélangé.

QUOI
Dans son dernier ouvrage, il se concentre sur la photographie des espaces urbains, paysages et de l'architecture, mais il aime aussi faire des portraits et en prenant part à des collaborations spontanées dans le monde du théâtre et de la communication.

COMMENT
Sa formation interdisciplinaire a abouti à une façon unique de conceptualiser l'espace et l'intuition naturelle pour transmettre des émotions. Le travail d'Ariel se caractérise par un amour pour les détails, une passion pour capturer l'essence de tout ce qui pique sa curiosité et une maîtrise des compétences techniques, qui lui permettent de donner à chaque photo une finition particulière de haute qualité.

OÙ
Né à Buenos Aires. Vit à Barcelone. Inspiration: le monde.

Plus: Ariel Bercovich Photography

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Hi, I'm Carlyn! I moved to New York City in 2011 for graduate school (I got my masters in international affairs) and am now working in public policy in the amazing city of New York.  I've been lucky enough to have traveled and lived all around the world, and am always ready for my next adventure to a new place.  I love cooking, baking, eating food in general, hiking and outdoor adventuring and enjoying the unlimited and varied activities that New York has to offer. 

From my travels, I know that where you stay makes a big impact on your overall trip experience, and even how you view the city. Because of this, I aim to provide guests with a comfortable and relaxing stay with easy access to all the city's offerings, in hopes that you will enjoy your time in New York City as much as I do.  I am happy to help you navigate the city, figure out what to do and how to get there, and provide any other assistance I can offer.  I love hosting people (I hope to eventually open my own B&B), and meeting people from all around the world.  My roommates are amazing people that share the same outlook.  We look forward to hosting you!

Hello, I am a Certified Public Accountant/Certified Fraud Examiner during the day and a grand-vivant at night. I speak English, French and Spanish. I lived and visited Europe, Africa and few Caribbean’s islands. Asia is next on the list. So, be ready to share your travel stories with me. A few things your soon to be pad: Myrtle-Marcy area is an easy commute, very diverse and full of things to do. Walk for less than 5 minutes (3 blocks) to the G train and several bus lines taking you anywhere in NYC. Manhattan is 15 to 20 minutes away. The commute to both JFK, LaGuardia and Newark is very convenient. Several different types of restaurants and bars on Myrtle Avenue giving you a variety of choices of dishes: Asian, Spanish, Caribbean and American.
The apartment has hardwood floors. All new appliances and furniture! the living room has a large couch with a queen sized pull out bed. That creates an extra bed. Full kitchen with all brand-new appliances will allow for you to cook comfortably.
The house is quiet, clean, full of light, and currently occupied only by professionals. Feel like home.

At no charge, you will have a High-powered Wi-Fi, full cable, HBO, along with a DVR to play your own movies and a Chromecast device to cast on the TV what you want from your computer.

My main field of interests are philosophy, history, nature, art and the anthropology. I love living in the tropics of Hawaii with my husband, Scott. We love to travel the world, and I frequently lead medical and dental clinic trips to struggling, far-away countries and serve others in need. We are so blessed, and this is one way we give back. Born in Jamaica. Arrived in Australia (via London) as a child. Went Ketogenic in 2015. I’m studying Psychology full time and I work in the Personal/Professional Development field. I am a Effective Action Coach, working with large groups. I also run courses in Communication & Pain Free Presentation skills for adults & Confidence/Self esteem programs for young people and teens. I cant live without grass fed, grass finished meat, wild caught fish, pastured eggs & fresh sprouts, ferments, Kombucha, Kefir, my family & friends, beauty, great sounds & raw chocolate. I have traveled to over 30 countries. I speak excellent English, basic French & awesome body language. I am a quiet introvert, who loves reading, learning & pondering the possibilities of life... With our thoughts  ... we make our world... (Thank goodness)

Born and raised in China, educated and working in Hong Kong.
With an engineering background, always interested and enthusiastic in music, movies, literature, arts, gender studies, social science, earth science, etc. I am trying to travel more in my spare time and wish to have some working holidays in the future.
I would not say that I am extraverted, actually kind of slow-burn, but would always keep strong connections with people once we become friends, and I am always trying to stay rational (as trained to be an engineer), but sometimes could be quite emotional to certain topics.
I am currently learning Russian, Tibetan and German, since the regions where these languages are spoken are on my list to visit in the near future. I am always happy to exchange information with people about culture and music.

I am hospitality professional, who genuinely cares about creating great vacation experiences for our guests. Prior to assisting with vacation rentals, I worked for high end, well known hotel chains and private hotels for over 17 years. Hospitality is my passion, to ensure that our guests have a great booking and stay experience is always my priority.  
We offer discounted rental car reservations, travel insurance and concierge services to help you make the most of your Maui vacation. Our team of guest experience specialists consists of Paige, Carine, Taylor, Jennifer and Tim, they help me connect, respond and assist our guests 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. I am so proud that we are able to offer warm, friendly, professional and resort quality services in an un-hotel setting for our guests. 
I love to engage in all different forms of art in my spare time, I draw, dance and aspire to play the drums. I love Maui, it would be hard to imagine living at another place, other than paradise.
Mahalo for reading. I hope we get the opportunity to assist you with your next Maui vacation!

Bonjour à tous,
Je suis tombée amoureuse de Porto et j’ai donc décidé de venir m’y installer. Mon parcours hotelier m'a donné envie  de créer ma propre société Guest H4U.
C'est une belle aventure que je partage avec mon conjoint, Mathieu.
Nous vous accueillons comme à l'hotel dans chaque appartement. Nous avons développer des partenariats (chauffeurs privées, guide, chasse aux trésors, tour dans le Douro) qui vous permettrons de découvrir Porto comme les Portuenses!

Et d'ici là faites de beaux voyages!
Isabelle & Mathieu

Si tu es ouvert d'esprit, social, et que tu cherches à découvrir Montréal comme les locaux, avec les locaux, Le Bed & Cocktail est un chez-toi à l'étranger créé par l'équipe de La Distillerie à Montréal, Québec. Avec 3 bars à cocktails à son nom dans la ville, La Distillerie met davantage l'hospitalité de l'avant avec une auberge sociale ouverte à des invités venant de partout. Niché au-dessus de notre deuxième succursale dans un quartier vibrant, le Plateau Mont-Royal, Le Bed & Cocktail accueille ses invités dans une communauté décontractée où ils peuvent partager et connecter dans un espace soigneusement conçue et tenue par un gars pas mal cool qui s'appelle Dave.
​
#livetogether

Porto City Hosts is a tourism team. We receive our guests with professional quality and local charm. We make guests feel well accompanied during their stay and we help them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences with the confidence of having a team focused on their well being!

We are also passionate about travel and new places! We like to know new cultures, landscapes, palates and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, share new sensations with our suggestions, lived in the first person.
There are walks by the sea, boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river, walks through the old streets of Oporto. You can listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, where the Harry Potter writer was inspired, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat Francesinha, tripas à moda do Porto, bacalhau or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the idyllic Porto.

host_location: Surry Hills, New South Wales, Australia
host_about: I bought the building in 1996 in a very run down state. It was originally a grand Victorian Terrace and had been divided into 5 flats with shared bathrooms.  I embarked on a full renovation with my builder and later employer Michael Wagstaffe which included building another level on top where I now live. I decided to trial Airbnb in mid 2017 in the smallest apartment which has been very successful. In December 2017 apartment 5 became vacant so I upgraded  it for Airbnb to be ready for NYE. I   have installed double glazing and acoustic flooring to make my guests stay as comfortable as possible.  My building is in  vibrant Surry Hills so you can step out the door and find restaurants and bars a plenty than come back to peace and quiet. I try to give the best service possible to my guests.

Why stay in a hotel when you can enjoy the space and amenity of a designer home?

Luxico manages designer and luxury homes across Melbourne, Sydney, Palm Beach, Byron Bay, Noosa and the Mornington Peninsula with many new locations coming in 2018.

All Luxico homes are  fully equipped with 5-star linens, towels, luxury toiletries, gourmet welcome hampers, free Wi-Fi and all the essential items that you will require during your stay.

Luxico's Housekeeping and Concierge Services teams are on hand to assist with airport transfers, grocery deliveries, catering, extra cleaning and anything else you might require.

Guests travelling with children can request toys, activities, travel cots and high chairs, whilst pet owners have a number of great properties to choose from with doggy beds, water bowls and other items provided to minimize your luggage.

Hello, we are Carolina and Mike. I am from Buenos Aires and he is from London. 

We live in Barcelona because we love how arty, multicultural and lively it is. A big plus is the weather, 300 plus days of sun a year makes our experience even better! We also enjoy having the beach and the mountain so close as we love being out in nature. 

Mike is a plant-based chef and I am a health coach. We have a nice home that reflects tranquility, harmony and good energy. 

We enjoy cooking healthy tasty meals. Sharing delicious and flavourful plant-based foods is one of our most enjoyable hobbies. "By doing what you love you inspire and awaken the hearts of others" is our motto.

We speak fluent English, Spanish and can understand some Italian and Portuguese :)

We are currently renting a single room in an amazing location. The room is quiet and cozy and would fit perfectly any solo traveller. We like to offer an atmosphere of tranquility and happiness at home, as any kind of tip and help during your stay. 

Looking forward to hear from you soon!

Hoping you have a wonderful stay in this vibrant and amazing city... Welcome! 

Best regards,

Caro and Mike

My team and I at The Apartment Service are proud to have been helping people with short and long stay apartment rentals across Sydney since 1989. 

Property professionals say location is everything and we believe that a convenient location is essential, especially in the rental market. We can offer you some of the best locations accross all the major areas of Sydney, and all of our  apartments are carefully selected for their proximity to cafes, key business and retail districts, public transport, and tourist hotspots.

Furnished apartments are a cost-effective alternative to five star hotels and have the added advantage of feeling like you are staying in your own home with separate lounges, kitchens and laundries, and modern appliances.

We've found Airbnb to be a perfect fit for our apartments and we're proud to have achieved a high volume of 5 star reviews consistently since joining. 

Please don't hesitate to view our 150+ properties listed on Airbnb across all areas of Sydney, and do get in touch for quick and friendly assistance.

Aloha, My name is Brandyn. I am so blessed to offer people from all around the world the chance to experience the breath taking scenery and beautiful culture of an island paradise I have called home for my entire life. My family has been in the vacation rental business for over 30 years and it all started with my grandmother Kay (hence Kay's Ali'i Vacation Rental). Now myself, my mother Brenda, my wife Kristina, and my aunt Lucy have taken over the reins and are continuing the legacy my grandmother started. 

Our families journey in the vacation rental industry started with one small simple unit and slowly evolved into something special for generations to come. We now we have 3 vacation rental properties in Kailua with multiple units on each. Our goal is to offer parties of all sizes the chance to visit our island paradise without having to break their bank accounts. We have 2, 3, & 4 bedroom units for larger groups or extended family getaways. We have 1 bedroom units & large studios for our guests who are traveling with their immediate family and we also have a private rooms for those of our guests who want to get away by themselves or with their significant other to relax and enjoy our beautiful Hawaiian weather. No matter what group size you have we can accommodate you. Take a look at our listing and feel free to message us. We look forward to hearing from you soon. :-)

host_about:
We are a couple of little if not no dislikes about anything, anyone or any place. We are Business Entrepreneurs and we find ourselves at home most of the time. We love to cook. Harumi in particular is a great cook and can whip up a great meal in minutes from scratch. She can cook a variety of ethnic dishes from japanese, chinese, filipino, as well as american and european dishes. We love the outdoors, we spend much of our spare time doing things like surfing, hiking, golfing driving around the island. 

From time to time we would fly to neighboring islands on impulses. We do many things at the fly of our pants. We are always on the go, but always have time for each other and our guests. Dinner is our most important meal of the day, because it is a time where we all get to sit around the table, have a wonderful meal, give thanks to God and pretty much share how our day went.
