ALOHA and WELCOME to Waikiki, Honolulu on Oahu!  Thank you for your interest in one of our vacation rentals.  We are a TEAM of professionals who manage individually owned condo apartments for the owners when they aren't using them within several different condo / hotel buildings in Waikiki.   We offer a range of accommodations types from small studio apartments (with or without kitchenettes) to 2 bedroom residences with full kitchens.  

We want your stay to be an enjoyable one and finding the right match for you is key.  As a general guideline, there are many different types of buildings and hotel-type of arrangements.  For those doing Hawaii on a budget, studios offer the best of both worlds providing a clean, private place to stay within walking distance to the BEACH at affordable prices (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities).   For those looking for nicer or larger accommodations, then you should target $150/night off season to $250/night peak season (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities, building amenities, parking included).  If you are looking for an Ocean-front experience, then target $350- $400/night and for a luxury experience, $500 to over $1000/night.  Hawaii offers something for everyone at every price point!  

Our vacation rental units are privately owned and managed.  We offer an alternative to the hotel experience allowing our guests to “live like a local” in paradise whether be for a few days, a few weeks or a few months.  Our units are well maintained, repaired when necessary and treated routinely with pest control services.  We try not to interrupt our guests during their stay, and if the unexpected happens, we do our best to resolve it quickly with the least inconvenience to our guests.   Upon arrival, we try to meet all our guests personally to register, check-in, and answer any questions.  And if you’re running late don’t worry, we can make arrangements no matter the hour and register you in the office the next day.  

Stop by our real estate office, ground floor of Kuhio Village.  We are there daily to assist and share this incredibly beautiful island, local eateries, activities and entertainment found in Waikiki and around the island.  We look forward to hosting you in one of our vacation rental units and helping to make your stay a fantastic one.  A hui hou (until we meet again)!

Aloha & Mahalo nui loa (Hello/Goodbye & Thank you very much),
Hawaii Dream Realty Team, Hi’ilani, Luise & Theresa
Hawaii Dream Realty LLC RB-19373, Theresa Harden PB (R) RB-19372

Comunicativas, alegres e muito dispostas a conhecer pessoas, VIAJAR E EXPERIMENTAR NOVAS CULTURAS, proporcionando  experiências agradáveis nos assuntos que mais nos interessam, que são : lazer, gastronomia, esportes e eventos.

Four friends, a lot of dreams, a common path

Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends: Rosa, Tania, Igor and Nuno. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privelege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Quatro amigos, muitos sonhos, um caminho em comum

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos: a Rosa, a Tânia, o Igor e o Nuno. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

Here at Molokai Vacation Properties, we have the widest selection of legal oceanfront homes and condos available for you vacation rental needs. 

We have a large variety of ocean view condos located on Molokai's sunny west end at the Kepuhi Beach Resort, Ke Nani Kai  and  Paniolo Hale Resort.  All are just steps or minutes away from beautiful white sand beaches. The west side has the best surf on Molokai during the winter months and the best swimming in the summer months. 

Molokai's tropical east side and majestic mountains create a lush backdrop for the Wavecrest Resort located 13 miles east of the main town of Kaunakakai. The east side of Molokai has wonderful snorkeling year round and gorgeous views of waterfalls. Another options is the Molokai Shores condos which are centrally located just 1 mile east of Kaunakakai. A variety of private vacation homes are available throughout the island. All are either oceanfront or have a view of the ocean. Come See!! Come Stay!!

Hi everyone!

We are Eva & Jacques and we work in the travel and tourism industry. Our company is AB Apartment Barcelona. What we aim to do is offer each of our guests the best Barcelona experience, from start to finish. So as soon as you begin to book your stay right up until the moment you leave Barcelona, my team and I will be available to help you with any questions you might have, or even just to offer you some friendly advice. 

We have one office open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, meaning you can contact us anytime you want, day or night. We speak many languages between us, and we’re all tourism professionals. Plus, we know all the best places to go in Barcelona, from sights and attractions to bars and restaurants (including where the locals go) so we can help you make your time in the city the most memorable with our insider tips ;)

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through me, you’ll be in safe hands.

We looking forward to meeting you soon!

Hi there,

My name is Enrique and I am a Barcelona Local. I have always loved traveling myself, but also sharing the beauty and wonders of Barcelona with others, so a few years ago I started renting out 2 apartments to travelers coming to the city, always meeting everyone in person so I could share my insights and hidden secrets about Barcelona :)

Now I rent out a few more apartments and it is no longer just me, but we are a small team of people managing the apartments together, but with the same focus on personal and attentive services in authentic apartments that allow for the genuine Barcelona feel for your trip! We call our little team Stay U-nique, because of this focus on a unique feeling when staying with us.

If you have any questions, want to hear about an apartment or just say hi, don´t hesitate to reach out :)

Have a great day!
Enrique

A happy goes lucky person, love travelling, meeting and making friends worldwide. I have been to 11 countries by myself so far around the world. Most of the time, I stayed in Airbnb, most of the hosts and hostess are very nice and friendly...now it’s my turn! 

The place I am renting out is my home office! A brand new renovated well-furnished open studio, the spacious brand-new living room is your bedroom and the brand new comfy VIMLE IKEA 3 seats couch (102 x 240) which is bigger than the single bed is your bed, and you will have your privacy after the curtain down. I am living here, so FEMALE SOLO TRAVELER ONLY to book my place!
I am a hard-working person, basically I stay-in to work most of the time, and I will be always at your service whenever you need me in the house. However, I won’t disturb you much as most of the time I am with my work at home. I am an easy-going person, but also have the house rules, kindly please stay quiet at home after your happy journey outside...please no shoes at home,  and pick up your felt-off hairs from the sewage after hair washing and showers (I came across many times in Europe Airbnb homes, the sewages were stuck!! I dont want this happen in my home, hope for your kind understandings and respect). For other rules, kindly please ask if you are not sure, I am always happy to be at your disposal! ;) ...

I could show you around if I am not that busy, even though, I am always more than happy to provide any information within my knowledge, even for jobs or business, just hoping to make your stay more pleasant! 

Actually, the album photos in my listing is the guide book for you where you could go around while you staying with me..;) Easy and close to everything!

Welcome to Hong Kong and hope to see you soon!

Porto City Hosts is a professional tourism management team.
All our collaborators are committed Porto citizens who receive their guests with professional quality and local charm. We make guests feel well accompanied during their stay and we help them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences.
We are also passionate about travel and new places! We like to know new cultures, landscapes, palates and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, to share new sensations with our suggestions, lived in the first person.
There are walks by the sea, or boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river, walks through the old streets of Oporto, also UNESCO site, listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, influence for Harry Potter, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat francesinha and tripas or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the Port wine.

I am a female residing in Sydney who enjoys traveling, music, culture and language, art, dancing, festivals, food & wine.

I have lived in my neighbourhood for many years and have enjoyed living in Ryde.  The new regional shopping centre offers cinemas, cafes, restaurants, boutiques, food stores, etc., at walking distance.

I am offering a room for those staying in Sydney requiring a clean, pleasant room in a family orientated home style living.  It is a large room with timber floor boards, lots of light and comfortable living area with free WiFi, functional kitchen and bathroom.

The Art Deco character home is conveniently located on bus route and walking distance to the ferry service to Circular Quay or Darling Harbour.  The Ryde Aquatic Centre is about 200 metres away and the regional shopping centre is a short 12 minute walk.

A minimum of one month to long term stay - we will require you to discuss this further.

I hope to be hearing from you soon..

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Meu nome é Daniel, eu sou francês e moro no Brasil desde 2014. Tenho vários apartamentos que gero por conta de proprietários que também são amigos. 
Antes de me contatar, favor respeitar estes pequenos pontos para eu puder responder a todos da melhor maneira :
1 - Não pedir troca de contato ou vísita antes de reserva confirmada
2 - Favor verificar e atualizar seus dados de pagamento antes de mandar pedido 
3 - Não aceito pagamento por boleto
4 - Os valores são atualizados, favor não pedir desconto, sobretudo para estadia pequena

Por conta própria desde 2017, respondo rápido e tenho contato fácil para discutir com respeito e tentar acertar todas as partes. Podemos conversar em português, inglês, francês e espanhol.

My name is Daniel, I am French and I live in Brazil since 2014. I have few apartments for the account of owners who also are friends. 
In the aim to help people and to avoid confusions, thanks to agree between you before consulting me. In this way, I can help you and others persons better and deal faster :
1 - Don't ask ou give contact or visit before reservation confirmed
2 - Thanks to verify your payment form before to send offer
3 - I don' accept Boleto payment
4 - The prices are actualized, thanks no ask discount,above of all for short period

With own account since 2017, I answer quickly and I have an easy touch to discuss with respect and try to find best solution. We can talk in portuguese, english, french and spannish.

Je m´appelle Daniel, je suis français et je vis au Brésil depuis 2014. Je gère divers appartements pour le compte de propriétaires qui sont aussi des amis. 
Dans un souci d´aider le plus grand nombre et d´éviter confusions, merci de déjà vous accorder entre vous avant. De cette manière, je peux vous aider plus facilement et finaliser sans interférence :
1 - Ne pas demander ou passer de contact avant une réservation confirmée 
2 - Merci de vérifier et d'actualiser vos données bancaires avant d'envoyer une demande
3 - Je n'accepte pas de paiement par "boleto"
4 - Les valeurs sont actualisés, merci de ne pas demander de décompte, surtout pour courte durée

Pour compte propre depuis 2017, je réponds rapidement et j´ai le contact facile pour discuter dans le respect et tenter de répondre à vos demandes. Nous pouvons discuter en portugais, anglais, français et espagnol.

We are Robbie and Kay and we work in the real estate industry. The name of our company is AB Apartment Barcelona and what we aim to do is offer all of our guests the opportunity to live in Barcelona whether they are settling in the city, starting your own business, moving jobs or looking forward to start a new life. 

Unfortunately renting in an apartment in Barcelona can be a difficult experience, but with us you are in good hands :). Combined we have over 15 years of experience in the industry and our agency AB Apartment Barcelona manages over 400 apartments. If you have any problems finding accommodation, we will surely be able to help you!

Apaixonada por viagens e conhecer pessoas. 
Amo a minha cidade "O Porto" onde nasci e vivo, tenho também um carinho muito especial por Praga onde vivi 6 meses como estudante Erasmus.
Já tive oportunidade de conhecer vários locais do mundo, das melhores passagens que já fiz até hoje foi a Indonésia e Brasil.
Tenho um gosto especial pelo mundo da moda e tudo o que envolve nossas tendências, bem como a área de design, marketing e decoração de interiores.
A arte de criar é algo que me fascina no meu dia a dia. A criação deste projecto foi para mim algo muito muito especial. Toda os pormenores, cores têm significado para mim e espero que em todos eles se retratem de alguma forma e sintam bem estar. 
Gosto de acolher pessoas de outras cidades, países e culturas e partilhar experiências.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: Hello! I'm a young artist who loves to paint, photograph, draw... you name it. I love to go jogging, be outdoors, and hang out with my dog. I'm pretty relaxed when I'm around the house, but tend to stay pretty busy between work and my art.

Dear All

I am Maria, an active, travel-lover, sociable, friendly, gentle, open-minded and fun young woman originally from Valencia but who lives also some months in Barcelona. I love to travel and discover the rest of the planet… See other countries, find out about their culture and most of all their people.

 I am also a huge fan of photography, cinema, books, nature, decoration, Yoga, fitness, swimming and music.

I have a bachelor in law and currently have a managerial position in an important Spanish company related with turistic apartments.

I would like to rent out my flats and flats of other owners because I would like to think that people can visit Barcelona or Valencia and enjoy them through my apartments. As a fellow traveller I am proud to be part of this whole concept which provides and exciting alternative to standard mainstream travelling.
I would like to offer my flats preferably to families or couples wishing to know Barcelona or Valencia and its surroundings, its architecture, monuments, cuisine, their people and their habits. 
 
If you feel my places meets your requirements please do not hesitate to ask all the information you might need. Looking forward to hearing from you.





Hola a todos. 

Mi nombre es Maria, soy una persona activa, viajera, inquieta, sociable, amable, divertida y risueña. Me encanta conocer el mundo, otros países, su cultura, sus costumbres y sobretodo sus habitantes. 

Mis hobbies son, además de los viajes, la fotografía, el cine, la lectura, la naturaleza, la decoración, el yoga,  la natación, el fitness y la música.

Soy licenciada en derecho y me dedico a gestionar mis apartamentos turisticos asi como los de otros propietarios que necesitan mi ayuda.

Mis motivos para alquilar mis pisos son, aparte del económico, el poder compartirlos con otras personas para que ellas puedan disfrutarlos, el formar parte de una comunidad viajera que busca formas alternativas de viajar y poder conocer gente de otros países así como sus costumbres.
Preferiblemente deseo alojar a una familia o una pareja que deseen conocer  Barcelona o Valencia o sus alrededores, sus paisajes, sus monumentos, sus costumbres, su cocina, su gente etc..

Si necesitas saber algo más sobre mis apartamentos no dudes en ponerte en contacto conmigo y preguntarme.

I enjoy meeting new people!  Whether traveling, staying at Hostels or via AirBNB,  I like learning different cultures and point of views, by visiting other countries or hosting in Montreal. My goal is to travel and run my business from anywhere in the world soon.

Aloha! 
We are Carl and Edna.  We have been coming to stay here at this property for almost 15 years, and then our adult children persuaded us to finally buy. We were very fortunate to find out that the unit we had been renting for many years came up for sale. So, of course  we bought and put our stamp on the unit that was already  filled with many happy Hawaiian memories for us both.

Carl and I come here from December through to end of March every year.  We meet the other winter-returning unit owners  (snowbirds) and thoroughly enjoy the winter Hawaiian Family that keeps us coming back year after year!

Returning to Hawaii is our focus dream every year. We want our kids to enjoy it as we enjoy it, and therefore you too.  Hawaii is calling - answer the call:)

Thank you for choosing our little piece of Paradise - we wish you as many happy Hawaiian Memories as we have created over the years!!

Mahalo and Aloha
Carl and Edna.
I love to meet with different people of the world.

We (my family and myself) also live on this property, aka the ranch...its 27 acres. 
The two house are very far apart, the cottage is fenced in and has its own entrance.  On the ranch we have cows, bulls, calves, horses, goats, lots of peacocks, and three dogs. They are all fenced in and wont bother you....except the peacocks, they are shy, harmless, and beautiful, and they may come in your yard and scratch for food in the grass. 
We are so lucky to live here and we love it....and we love to share it.

I have always worked on multicultural environments. At first, as representative in Europe of portuguese textile companies; then, as owner of a textile decoration company where I had the opportunity to meet pleople from every part of the globe, as Fabric Purchasing Manager of a US-based company, and presently as owner of a translation & webdesign company which clients are located worldwide. First Island Realty has been managing properties on the Big Island of Hawaii since 2005. We specialize in paradise and have a diverse portfolio ranging from multi-million dollar luxury homes,  estates, and vacation rentals to multi-family properties.

Mark Trahan, Property Manager

Originally from Lafayette, Louisiana, Mark received his Bachelors in Accounting from the University of Louisiana @ Lafayette in 2005 after serving 6 years in the U.S.Air Force. Having worked for Fortune 500 companies in New Orleans and Dallas, Mark brings a depth of accounting experience that will build trust and ensures smooth transactions. With his southern charm & hospitality, each guest can be assured that their needs will be served in a friendly manner – leaving one with a sense of Ohana and ALOHA! 

Lori McNeel, Concierge Services

A Texas native, Lori moved to the islands over 15 years ago first to Maui then the Big Island.  Lori comes to us with a wealth of experience in the hospitality industry.  Past experiences include VIP concierge for Starwood and the Hyatt regency.  Lori has an in-depth knowledge of the Big Island and will assist you in creating the vacation you have always dreamed of.  From wedding planning to personal concierge services such as activity planning, she is your girl!

Laure McElwee, Broker

As a long term resident and real estate broker in the state of Hawaii, Laure McElwee's focus has always been on providing the best service to buyers and sellers alike. Consistently a top producer both regionally and nationally for over 10 years, Laure loves the challenge of finding you the perfect property in paradise and assisting with the transition to the Big Island!  She is honest, dedicated, hard working, and many buyers and sellers have become her dear friends. She brings knowledge, experience, integrity, and a "can do" attitude to the table. Laure is a fun loving, high energy, and a driven realtor.  Currently on the West Hawaii association board of realtors grievance committee and a member of the Hawaii association of realtors. Laure is also a 100 tons boat captain, a dive instructor, and an avid paddler.

Since venturing to the Big Island 15 years ago, I've always been drawn to the volcano, warm springs, and rainforest. I feel fortunate to have a home located minutes from all my favorite sites and love having the opportunity to share the experience.

I hope to see you soon!

Mehmet

I am a 26 year old student at McGill University. After several experiences with AirBnB, i realized that not only is this the new way to travel, but it is also an excellent opportunity to network with different people from all over the world! I love travelling, and the prospect of meeting new people from around the world makes AirBnB an awesome experience for myself and my roommates.

One of my best trips so far was a roadtrip across the United States. I have made this trip twice and it's amazing to see how peoples' lives vary across the country. We met many travellers along the way through AirBnB, which really inspired me to set up something similar in my own home.

Most recently, I travelled to the United Kingdom as an exchange student and during the weekends, I backpacked around Europe. My experience here was completely different from my previous travels in the United States and in Asia. It really provided me a different view of the world, not simply the North American view, and this has allowed me to communicate better with people who don't speak fluent English. Most importantly, there is an instant bond/connection that is made when I meet someone who is either from a city I have travelled to, or has been there as well! 

I hope to hear about where you are from, and some of the places you have visited, to help give myself a better idea of where I want to travel to next!

Our only objective is to ensure that your stay is even better than you imagined. We are Oscar from Barcelona and Maria from Girona, we married in 2013 and we have 2 wonderful children. Also, together we started Flateli, a little group of properties we love to manage to host our guests and make them feel like home. Ask anything you need and we will make our best to get it for you!

I've often thought that one of the best things about traveling the world is getting to meet new people with exciting stories and backgrounds. Hosting on Airbnb gives me the chance to do that every day!

See you soon and safe travels! 

-Mark

Our strength lies in a close relationship with our customers: We can satisfy just about any request with more than 33.000 online bookable holiday homes and apartments in more than 31 countries. Hi, I'm Dave and I'm from Sydney. My wife and I are new to airbnb but loving it so far. We just listed our home on airbnb so that people can come and share the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney with us. We also plan to do some travelling later on in the year to Europe and look forward to using airbnb for the first time!

We love travel and recent highlights have been New Zealand, Fiji, Vietnam, England, France and Spain. We also love to travel around Australia too, as we live in one of the best countries around.

When we travel we like to do it the Anthony Bourdain way. Food intertwined with culture is one of the things we like most about travelling.

We look forward to seeing you on our travels, or hosting you when you visit.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Olá, 
Comecei a hospedar profissionalmente a pouco tempo, mas tenho certa experiencia, pois hospedei em minha casa, muitos amigos e familiares ao longo dos 20 anos que resido no Rio de Janeiro.
Sou gaúcha, nasci do RS e mudei para a cidade maravilhosa a 20 anos. Amo minha terra, meu sul, mas me apaixonei perdidamente pelo RJ. Cheguei aqui muito novinha, decidi ficar, trabalhei bastante para isso e consegui! lembro me que assim que cheguei, por mais que eu trabalhasse e não tivesse muito tempo para diversõe, estava sempre com a impressão de que estava de férias, acredito que pela proximidade do mar e pela descontração dos cariocas.
Estudei, me formei aqui ( Direito), e toda a minha vida construi nesta cidade. Sempre gostei de hospedar e hoje, fazendo isso profissionalmente posso dizer que é sempre um prazer, adoro idéias e culturas diferentes. Tambem sou uma viajante, sempre que posso tento conhecer novos lugares, minha última viagem  foi a Turquia, uma viagem inteiramente inusitada, mas que adorei. Por esse motivo tento me colocar no lugar do hospede, procuro dar boas dicas de diversão e locais interessantes na cidade maravilhosa.
E por falar em cidade maravilhosa, essa realmente é uma cidade maravilhosa, temos belezas naturais, gente bonita, temos a descontração e a simpatia do povo carioca e adoramos receber turistas que, normalmente se encantam e retornam diversas vezes ao RJ.
Bom, tento ser pontual ( não esquecendo que estamos no RJ e as vezes o transito nos castiga bastante), cumpro com o prometido, sou uma pessoa correta, prezo a palavra  e gosto que sejam assim comigo tambem.
Essa sou eu, um pouquinho de mim!

Hello Everyone,

We are a professionally run company, who offers fully furnished apartments in Calgary, Edmonton and Montreal. 

All of our suites have full size kitchens with appliances & supplies. The spacious living rooms have flat screen TV’s, DVD players & work spaces. Starter supplies are provided as well as linens & towels, iron, ironing board and so much more. 

We welcome free suites tours prior to booking, provide a personal meet & greet on arrival for all guests and provide free housekeeping. 

WIFI, cable TV and a personal telephone with local call & long distance calling in Canada, are all included.

Each property has various amenities. Suite decors vary as we have a number of units in the properties we have listed. There are also other buildings not listed on this site so if you do not find something that suits your needs, contact directly.

Our family loves to travel and we especially love the Hawaiian Islands. We have spent time on each island and love each one for it's own unique qualities.  When we had the opportunity to purchase a beautiful home on Kauai, we excitedly did so.  We now have a home base there as well as the opportunity to share this gem of an island with friends and visitors.

We like the touristy stuff but our real love is to explore and experience things that most visitors don't.  Our family is a little bit 'foody' too.  We love trying new places off the beaten path.  Some of our best meals are found that way.

We'd love to share what we've learned with you as our guests.  We have made our home very comfortable and nice so you feel right at home during your stay.  We love getting to know our guests and work hard to make everything perfect for their stay.

Destination Residences Hawai’i offers an exclusive collection of premium vacation residences and villas in seven resorts in Wailea and Makena, Maui. Located along pristine beaches, lush gardens and sun-drenched fairways, guests can choose from one- to five-bedroom accommodations, each featuring a living room, dining area, fully-equipped kitchen, separate bedrooms, washer/dryer and private outdoor lanai.

Although we manage multiple properties, we are still dedicated to providing you with the same personal experience and excellent service that you expect from AirBnB rentals.

As part of your stay at any of our luxury villas and condo rentals, the following services are also included at no additional charge for Destination Residences Hawaii guests:

+ Welcome Lei Greeting
+ Shuttle Service between our resorts and anywhere in Wailea
+ $160+ in spa and dining certificates
+ Maika'i Grocery Discount Card
+ Housekeeping Service
+ In-room coffee maker with Welcome Packet of Maui coffee and condiments
+ Bathroom Toiletries
+ Use of Beach Towels
+ Destination Taste of POG - Passion/Orange/Guava juice blend
+ Destination Discovery Experience Cards
+ Printing of Boarding Passes
+ Unlimited Local Calls

host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal
host_about:
I am a person of age 64, retired from my main occupation, and taking advantage of the fact of living in this beautiful city of Oporto, decided to provide a high quality space for all to visit the city.
When I sought this space, I put as conditions that were located in the historic city, which was comfortable and modern, which have public transport links nearby and accessible, which have good accessibility to the airport and had high quality equipment.
Upon discovering this brand new apartment in the historic area in front of a beautiful garden, where there was tour buses and trams and it also has its own garage, i do not hesitate to choose it.
With my wife, i've equiped it with modern, comfortable and functional furnishings, and refined taste.
Just happened to be a pleasure to welcome people of all nationalities who wish to visit this beautiful city of Oporto that we love.

I am an easy going person with a great passion for nature and travelling.. I love to be with and around people, I think I can learn something new from every person I meet.. I am curious to explore other cultures and ways of life..
currently I live in Montreal but have visited many places when I got the chance.

host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
I live in Bondi Beach with my husband Johnny and our beloved Maltese Max. Having lived in Bondi Beach for 35 years I am a true local and love welcoming our guests to this wonderful part of the World.I have a Media Buying agency and work from home.We enjoy traveling, exploring new places and having adventures. We love good food, snorkeling and anything to do with the ocean. Peace and serenity are important to me.I believe in being thankful and making the most of everyday. 
Life is Beautiful!

Elite Pacific Properties is the leading luxury real estate brokerage and vacation rental firm in Hawaii, with over 100 agents statewide offering everything from luxury residential property sales to multi-unit projects/developer sales, to luxury vacation rentals. Elite Pacific Properties was founded in 2005 and is the only luxury real estate firm with staffed offices on each of Oahu, Maui, Kauai, and the Big Island.

Elite Pacific Properties is a member of Who’s Who In Luxury Real Estate, an exclusive organization of the top luxury brokers in the world; has been named to Inc. Magazine’s prestigious national  “Inc. 5000” list for both 2013 and 2014; and been ranked by Pacific Business News as the 9th fastest growing company in Hawaii on its 2014 Fastest 50 list.

Our Vacation Rental Division reflects our high standards of excellence. With over 70 professionally managed luxury homes available for vacation rentals throughout Hawaii, we are committed to making sure that our vacation clients experience the very best in quality, delivery and outstanding service.

Active Member of:
- (VRMA) Vacation Rental Managers Association
- (NAR) National Association of Realtors
- (HAR) Hawaii Association of Realtors
- (HBR) Honolulu Board of Realtors

Bahar

host_location: Forest Lodge, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
Hello,
I am a graduate student at the University of Sydney, and travel overseas quite frequently. I make my studio apartment available for accommodation when I am away.

A Montrealer, a biologist and currently finishing my masters at McGill in PR & Philanthropical studies. I am very passionate about travelling, meeting new people and helping others. I have almost travelled the world, and in each voyage I did, I tried to make a difference and help in any way i can. I started my own foundation/movement called "The Globe Jumpers" it's a social and non profit movement that tries to make an impact in small communities, by turning dreamers into jumpers, one adventure at a time. You can (Hidden by Airbnb) it if you have a minute, or else when we meet up, I can tell you all about it. I speak French, English, Arabic and Español, and I love meeting new people. I hope to meet you or host you very soon :) Keep Jumping!!

Early 40's, laid back guy. I am from South America and now live in Barcelona for the last seven years. My job includes customer service and support for a large life entertainment company. I love what I do, although it is extremely challenging.

Hi I'm Laia,

I'm from Barcelona; as were my  parents, grandparents and great-grandparents, as far back as I remember! I am a lover of my city, but of the original city of Barcelona, the whole gothic and Eixample area is spectacular!

I worked previously in communication and creativity, but for some time now I decided to use all my creativity in creating furniture and decoration. Restore anything that people do not want as they think it is useless or old or broken, I look for new uses for them so that they don’t die and remain among us.

I am delighted and 100% available to give directions and suggestions about my city! Here I´ll give you the first, advice... watch your bag! Catalans are very good people, but we also have one or two thieves…well, many actually !
 
I hope you ll feel at home in my apartment and enjoy very much the city!

See you soon!!
Laia

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
A Ipanemaforrent, prestando bons serviços no ramo imobiliário, seja no âmbito de vendas, bem como nas locações e administrações por temporada.
Desde a sua fundação, a Ipanemaforrent prima pela excelência na prestação de seus serviços, sempre com muita idoneidade, profissionalismo, clareza e transparência, visando alcançar a satisfação de seus clientes.
Visão
A Imobiliária Ipanemaforrent diferencia-se no mercado imobiliário por sua idoneidade e conduta ética e profissional, na assessoria para a execução dos negócios imobiliários. Ética profissional; Capacitação técnica; Transparência ; Compromisso; Ipanemaforrent, vem prestando bons serviços, sempre com muito prestígio de seus clientes, que ao longo dos anos, se monstram satisfeitos pelos bons negócios realizados.atuando no ramo de vendas, locações e administrações de imóveis, residenciais, em toda cidade de Rio de Janeiro, com ênfase na zona Sul.

Olá,

Estou no Airbnb desde (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) e foi quando comecei alugando um quartinho na minha casa, onde pude receber pessoas de todos os cantos do mundo e compartilhar com eles a minha paixão pelo Rio. 

O sucesso foi tão grande que passado o tempo, meus amigos e amigos de amigos, passaram a me pedir para que administrasse os seus apartamentos. Topei o desafio, e os apartamentos foram se multiplicando... larguei a Faculdade de Geografia e decidi empreender, me dedicando exclusivamente aos meus hóspedes ! Foi a melhor decisão que tomei na vida. 

Depois de alguns anos fundei a minha própria agência, a Omar do Rio, especializada em Aluguel de Temporada e hoje administro inúmeros apartamentos de temporada na cidade. Me auto realizei por poder trabalhar com uma atividade que tanto amo, que tanto agregou a minha vida. 

Meu objetivo hoje, com a minha agência, é proporcionar uma estadia segura, tranquila e de qualidade, para que meus hóspedes possam desfrutar ao máximo a experiência na Cidade Maravilhosa. 

Contem comigo e minha Equipe para obter todo o suporte e as melhores dicas que você pode ter na cidade. 

Nos vemos no Rio !

Omar


Caso deseje visitar a minha lista de apartamentos entre no link: 
https://www.airbnb.com.br/wishlists/152530987



_________________________________________________________________


Hey,

I have been on Airbnb since (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , when I started renting a small room in my house, where I was able to receive people from all around the world and share with them my passion for Rio.

The success was so great that after time, my friends and friends of friends, 
 came to ask me to manage their listings. I accept the challenge, and the number of apartments was multiplying ... I left the University of Geography and decided to dedicate myself exclusively to my guests ! It was the best decision I ever made.

After some years I founded my own agency, Omar do Rio (Omar from Rio), specialized in Vacation Rentals and today I manage innumerable seasonal apartments in the city. I realized myself by being able to work with an activity that I love so much, that added so much to my life.

My goal today, with my agency, is to provide a safe, quiet and quality stay, so that my guests can enjoy the experience in the Marvelous City.

Count on me and my Team to get all the support and best tips you can have in town.

See you in Rio!

Omar


If you want to visit my list of apartments enter the link:
https://www.airbnb.com.br/wishlists/152530987

I am hospitality professional, who genuinely cares about creating great vacation experiences for our guests. Prior to assisting with vacation rentals, I worked for high end, well known hotel chains and private hotels for over 17 years. Hospitality is my passion, to ensure that our guests have a great booking and stay experience is always my priority.  
We offer discounted rental car reservations, travel insurance and concierge services to help you make the most of your Maui vacation. Our team of guest experience specialists consists of Paige, Carine, Taylor, Jennifer and Tim, they help me connect, respond and assist our guests 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. I am so proud that we are able to offer warm, friendly, professional and resort quality services in an un-hotel setting for our guests. 
I love to engage in all different forms of art in my spare time, I draw, dance and aspire to play the drums. I love Maui, it would be hard to imagine living at another place, other than paradise.
Mahalo for reading. I hope we get the opportunity to assist you with your next Maui vacation!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Olá,

Estou no Airbnb desde 2011 e sou um grande fã da Plataforma. Tudo que conquistei foi graças ao sucesso no Airbnb!

Minha experiência começou quando recebi um flat da minha avó através de herança (em vida!!), investi pesado na reforma do apartamento para poder oferecer o maior conforto possível aos meus hóspedes. Comecei a administrar seu aluguel e o sucesso foi tão grande que mudou a minha vida!

Meus amigos e familiares viram como o meu “negócio” estava dando certo e começaram a pedir para que eu também administrasse o aluguel dos apartamentos deles (nessa época ainda não existia a figura do co-host). 

Topei o desafio e o número de apartamentos foi se multiplicando! O resultado foi ótimo e percebi que me sentia muito realizado com as experiências que estava ganhando como empreendedor e ao conhecer pessoas de tantos lugares do mundo! De tal maneira que decidi largar meu emprego como gestor em marketing para me dedicar exclusivamente a vocês!

Fiz um curso de guia de turismo para ter mais conhecimento sobre a cidade e abri a All in Rio, uma Agência de Turismo que oferece tours culturais, naturais e de aventura, além do aluguel de apartamentos de temporada.

Meu objetivo é oferecer uma estadia segura, confortável e poder fornecer todas as informações necessárias para você desfrutar ao máximo a sua experiência em nossa cidade maravilhosa! 

Obrigado pela atenção!

Fabio

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hi!

I've been on Airbnb since 2011 and I’m a big fan of the Platform. All I got was thanks to my success on Airbnb!

My experience began when I received a flat from my grandmother through inheritance (in life!!). I invested heavily in the renovation of the apartment to be able to offer the greatest comfort possible to my guests. I started managing the rent and the success was so amazing that it changed my life!

My friends and family noticed how well my "business" was going and started to ask me to manage their apartment’s rent too (at the time, the figure of  the co-host didn’t exist).

I accepted the challenge and the number of apartments was multiplying! The result was great and I realized that I felt very fulfilled with the experiences I was gaining as an entrepreneur and by meeting people from so many places in the world! So I decided to leave my job as a marketing manager to dedicate myself exclusively to you!

I took a tour guide course to gain more knowledge about the city and opened the All in Rio, a Tourism Agency that offers cultural, natural and adventure tours, as well as apartments for seasonal rents.

My goal is to offer you a safe and comfortable stay and to be able to provide all the information necessary so you can enjoy your experience in our wonderful city to the fullest!

Thank you for your time!

Fabio
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Comments from my guests:

“This apartment is in the most amazing location. Leblon is beautiful, safe, and packed with fabulous restaurants. The apartment is just by the ocean - couldn't really be better. Communicating with Fabio was super-easy. He was really responsive and helpful. We are missing it already!” - Ed Pilkington (UK)
“Fabio goes far and beyond the average host, my trip was a day earlier than I booked and I would have been stuck with no place to stay but Fabio personally went out of his way to get the place ready for me, great guy and will always go to him first when traveling to Rio. Thank again Fabio abs!!” - Darren Sanford (USA)
“O apartamento é lindo como nas fotos e a localização é perfeita! O Fábio é super atencioso e respondeu super rápido nossas dúvidas. Recomendo muito!” - Bruna Ferrary Deniz (Brasil)
“The apartment was better than we could have imagined. The photos don't do it justice. The place is huge, in a great location. Fabio was a very accommodating host. I would definitely stay there again.” - Jordan Giordano (USA)
“Our stay at Fabio’s place was fantastic! The apartment is simply beautiful and it made us feel at home. Super stylish and cozy. We are very particular about the properties we stay at, and this one exceeded our expectations The apartment description was very accurate! We loved being so close to the beach and all the great restaurants around. Thank you very much!”- Pablo Perez (Canadá)
“Fabio was a perfect host.  He answered promptly all our questions and is a really nice guy!”- Daniela (Brasil)
 “Fabio is the perfect host. Friendly and extremely helpful”.- Soren (Denmark)
 “It is really difficult for me to put down in words how grateful I am to Fabio! He is a wonderful host and a GREAT person!”- Justine (Dubai)
“Más que anfitriones, hicimos una linda amistad. Gracias por todo... “- Leo y Aura (Colombia)
“Fabio is a very friendly and considerate person and clearly takes great care of the apartment”.- Jonathan (Spain)
“New to Rio? You should definitely speak to these guys.”- Vitaly (Russia)
 “Fabio is an amazing host with a deep concern for his guests' comfort. We feel that we now have a good friend in Rio!”- Ali (Canada)

Robert

iTrip Vacations - Maui offers many Maui home rentals, all beautifully situated on the sparkling beaches of Kaanapali, Napili, Kapalua, Lahaina, Kihei, Wailea and Maalaea. Our Maui home rentals are beachfront style, offering activities like snorkeling, surfing, whale watching, hiking, and relaxing by the beach or pool. Not far from many of our Maui home rentals is Haleakalā National Park, an amazing destination for beautiful views, complete with a visitor center for educational information. Also near all of our Maui home rentals are a number of great shops and delicious restaurants for refueling after a long day at the beach. Aloha,
We are back after taking some time off.

My background is Counseling.  I have been producing a TV show for about 8 years called Guided by Spirit.  Hawaiian culture, Healing, working at Sacred Sites, Using your senses, Hawaiian Wisdom and Teachings based in Aloha, and people who love what they are doing.  

Reach Beyond Healing Retreat center offers classes in Hawaiian Healing, Lomilomi Massage, Reiki, and Huna (Hawaiian Traditional Spiritual Practices)  Immersion in Nature to find Balance, using "hands on skills". 

We also do island excursions to some of our special places and Sacred Sites with people who stay with us.  Seeing and experiencing Oahu from the Inside (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

Since I was 3, I have been able to hear and see Spirit.  So Psychic Readings is also something we offer clients by appointment.

Love to travel will be going to Italy again this year.  Flexible and easy to get along with.  Enjoy new cultures, traditions and sharing.


We also have healers that come to work on visitors with appointments.  Sharing some of the beloved traditions here in Hawaii.

Enjoy traveling and teaching, music, riding motorcycles, nature,  networking with people who respect and share with one another.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
AFI PROPERTY MANAGEMENT | Modern Furnished Apartments for Short & Long-Term Stays

**30 Day Minimum**
Please note: Summer Policy only:
We must book June-July-August together due to high level of requests.

AFI Property Management provides high-end furnished and serviced apartments for rent on the Upper East Side of New York. Available for stays of one month or longer, our 1-bedroom studios, 1-bedroom suites and 2-bedroom suites feature an array of amenities, offering guests modern luxury, convenience, and a unique living experience. AFI Property Management designs its own residences, aiming for a vibrant, sophisticated aesthetic and incorporating all the comforts of home. All of our services are performed in-house, allowing us to provide personal, efficient and attentive care to our tenants throughout their stay. 

Property Locations:
Our two pre-war, walk-up apartment buildings are situated on the same city block, at the heart of the Upper East Side neighborhood. Surrounded by some of New York’s best dining, shopping, specialty food stores, schools, and museums, our properties are an ideal place to live like a New Yorker and enjoy what the city has to offer. With convenient proximity to the subway and easy access to public transportation, tenants will be able to make the most out of their time in New York. 

Benefits of staying in one of our apartments:
- Stylish, modern spaces that are move-in ready and equipped with convenient amenities
- Prime Manhattan location, near subway station and bus stops
- On-site management office
- Multilingual management team 
- Key-less electronic entry system allows for effortless, 24-hour check-in
- Kitchen & bath welcome kit provided  
- Exclusive neighborhood guide filled with our hand-picked local favorites

I'm a permaculture designer and Illustrator, with a serious commitment to making my world luscious. So far, so good, thanks to the excellent people who come and stay in my house, and who let me into theirs, long before AirB&B.

I've been living and working part of each year in Australia, part in Tokyo, and little working trips all over the place.

I write a Magazine column in Japanese, 'Cecilia's Permacutlure Slow Life'. Its about creative ways to de-trap your life of wasted time, energy and affection, freeing you up to do the good work you were put on this world to do. 

For more than 10 years I've run a share-house for creative people - you can read about it on my blog Balcony Garden Dreaming.

My hobbies are Japanese tea ceremony, creative dinner gatherings and drawing illustrations of the quirky world I dream to live in, and often actually do.  

I've been a WWOOF host for many years, hosting travellers who volunteer their talents to help look after this house, garden and all its creatures.  

I don't have a life motto exactly, but when thing go wrong, I ask myself 'Whiner or Designer?'.  That gets me positive and resourceful.  If things go wrong for you I won't say it though. I'll just help where I can xx

Blackandwhitehome es una empresa de Barcelona, creada para dar respuesta primando la excelencia, a la creciente demanda de alquiler de apartamentos para estancias cortas. La empresa ha sido creada por un equipo de profesionales con amplia experiencia, naturales de la ciudad de Barcelona y entusiastas de ella. 
La empresa nace con el objetivo de convertirse en un referente en el sector y con una clara intención de diferenciación. Desde su creación la empresa se ha esforzado por reforzar este factor diferencial mediante la excelencia en todas las etapas: selección del nombre, desarrollo del logotipo, el slogan, la selección de los apartamentos, decoración, equipamiento, limpieza, check-in y servicio de atención al huésped. 
Todos nuestros apartamentos son operados en exclusiva por Blackandwhitehome. La empresa se hace cargo de todo el proceso de manera integral: desde la selección de los edificios, hasta la ejecución y supervisión de las reformas, diseño y ejecución de la decoración y equipamiento.

Installé à Montréal depuis 3 ans maintenant. Je suis ravis de vous accueillir dans mon appartement qui dispose également d'un jardin privatif a coté du centre ville et du parc Lafontaine. Pendant l'hiver il est très agréable d'aller patiner sur le lac du parc.

Je suis passionne de cuisine, cinéma, sport et le tourisme (je serai bien disposer à  vous indiquer de bons endroits à visiter ou activités à faire à Montréal et alentour). je peux être aussi de bons conseils pour les nouveaux arrivants qui souhaitent s'installer au Canada. 

J'adore recevoir et faire le maximum pour que les personnes de passages gardent un bon souvenir de leur visite. 

Je suis un hôte souple qui m'adapte, si vous souhaitez discuter et des conseils je serai disponible sinon cela ne me dérange pas d’être discret l'important étant que vous vous sentiez a l'aise comme chez vous ;)

방이 모두 6 개 인데 목욕탕 3 하고 1/2 . 아래층방 3개는 제가 사용 하고요.

host_about:
Holidays shouldn’t be one size fits all. That’s why Escape Vacations offer truly bespoke destinations and experiences.

Whatever your unique needs and wants are, you can rest assured we’ll cater to them. We know how to take care of everything from little pet peeves (like nothing in the kitchen) to bigger struggles (like an unexpected week of rain). Escape Vacations pride themselves on standardising the quality of every home they list. You won’t find a property that isn’t stocked with sustainable products from head to toe or lacks the space and location you dream of.

Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

Greetings from Team Vacasa! Yes, we're a professional property management company—but we're also real people, trusted by the owners of vacation homes to take care of all the heavy lifting like housekeeping, reservations, maintenance, and guest care. (Because, to be honest, renting out a vacation home really can be a full-time job!)

We have local teams on the ground to take care of our homes and our guests. We like to think of it as the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, only without compromising on service and convenience. You can trust that your home will be cleaned by professional housekeepers, and your calls will be answered (right away, around the clock!) by our dedicated Guest Services team. 

Check out our listings, and if you have any questions, get in touch! We'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway.

EN
We are a couple of architects who, after a few years living in several countries, realized their dream of renovating a building from the 19th Century in Porto and living in the center of this fascinating city. Here we have placed our affection and some of our stories and experiences that we share with those who visit us, under the fig tree or lying in the grass of the garden - one of the secrets of this Porto corner.

PT
Somos um casal de arquitetos que, depois de alguns anos a viver em vários países, realizou o seu sonho de renovar um edifício do Sec. XIX, no Porto e de viver no centro desta apaixonante cidade. Aqui depositámos o nosso carinho e algumas das nossas histórias e experiências que partilhamos com quem nos visita, debaixo da figueira ou estendidos na relva do jardim - um dos segredos deste recanto do Porto.

Hola, 

Apasionado del sector turístico y de ocio desde muchos años, dispongo de muchos alquileres vacacionales en España entre otros : casas, apartamentos y villas. 

Todos las propiedades son de gran calidad y les ofrecerán una estancia inolvidable en España. Todo mi equipo está a vuestra disposición antes, durante y después de su estancia. 

Loic 

---------------
Bonjour,

Passionné du secteur du tourisme et des loisirs depuis de nombreuses années, je vous propose des locations de vacances en Espagne: maison, appartement.

Loic

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Sou do Brasil, cidade Rio de janeiro. Mas atualmente moro na cidade do Porto,
desde a primeira vez que conheci, me apaixonei por tudo !
Vistas fantásticas, lindas praias, comida excelente e as pessoas que vivem aqui são muitíssimo agradáveis.
Tenho uma filha e sou casado há 10 anos.
Adoramos viajar e conhecer novas pessoas e lugares, sempre escolhendo o Airbnb para as minhas hospedagens.
Adoro música e fazer caminhadas, sendo o Porto ideal para tal.
Terei enorme prazer em receber pessoas de todas as nacionalidades em meu apartamento, colaborando em proporcionar uma agradável experiência na visita dos meus  hóspedes. 
Sejam bem vindos ao Porto !

Olá!Estes são o Vítor e a Ana!
São Mãe e Filho que pretendem oferecer a melhor estadia possível aos seus Hóspedes!
O Vítor é licenciado em gestão e adora viajar, conviver com os amigos e conhecer novas culturas.
A sua mãe, Ana, deu aulas durante 20 anos a alunos de ensino básico. É uma pessoa animada e comunicativa!
Eles dão-se muito bem sendo que começaram este projecto juntos, os seus hóspedes poderão contar com simpatia, disponibilidade e alojamento que os farão sentir em casa.

Hi!They are Vítor & Ana.
They are Mom and Son that think about to offer the best stay to their hosts!
Vítor is graduated in Bussiness Managment and he loves to travel, live together with his friends and meet new cultures.
His mom, Ana, she taught for 20 years to basic education. She's a very comunicative and lively person.
They relate well, that's why they started this project together, their hosts can only count with simpathy, availibility and one accomodation that will make you feel like home!

Hi I'm Carolina! I'm a young entrepreneur who loves to travel and to welcome travellers. 
You can trust me to make you enjoy your trip to the fullest and fall in love with the city!

Musicien et étudiant au doctorat, passionné de politique et des voyages!  L'appartement est propre,  accueillant et sécuritaire. Situé dans l'un des plus beaux quartiers de Montréal (parc Jeanne-Mance, Mont-Royal) il est aussi  à proximité d'à peu près tout (épiceries, cinémas, quartier des spectacles, théâtres, bars...). Les matelas sont neufs, la literies et les oreillers sont aussi neufs. Chaque chambre est munie d'un ventilateur et d'une télévision avec le câble. LBGT & 420 bienvenu, bienvenu à tous. 

Phd student and musicien here renting rooms in a clean and safe environment. The appartement is in the best spot in town, close to pretty much everything.   All beds are new, sheets and pillows are also brand new. Each room as a cable TV and a tower fan. LGBT & 420 friendly, welcome to my place!

host_location: Potts Point, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
I am a young professional working and living in the Potts Point area. I am passionate about food and I love discovering all the sneaky secrets that Sydney has to offer! 
My vibrant team and I work out of the Regents Court building from 8 am - 8 pm Monday - Friday and 9 am - 4 pm on weekends. We are always available to share our favourite places with you and  are here to ensure you enjoy your stay in Sydney.

Life is not just about working for me, it's mostly about enjoying the moments by doing the things I like to do. I like running, travelling, reading, dancing and to watch movies I really enjoy travelling all around the world (as long as I have a visa and money:)). I love to read detective stories, classic novels. I really really enjoy to spend every possible moment of life with the company of the music(the kind depends on my mood). 

I don't consider myself just as a host. If I am avaliable at that time, I would help you through where to drink, eat, go in Istanbul. 

My life motto : 'Work if it's necessary, travel if it's possible.'

Hola!  I am passionate about travelling, meeting new people and getting to know about other cultures. 
Proud of my city, there is no better feeling that helping those who come visit to have an amazing time discovering it and making their stay as enjoyable and hassle-free as possible!

My name is Ana Quelhas, and I decided to start renting my long time family apartment in the city of Porto. 

Our staff have many partners and contacts in house renting in the city, so we always find a solution when the reservations are full. 

Please, don't hesitate to aks tips when you are traveling around Portugal!
Sou carioca e amo minha cidade. Adoro curtir o dia, ir a praia, e praticar esportes ao ar livre. Meu maior lazer é ouvir um bom samba junto dos amigos. Gosto de futebol e sou Fluminense !!!

Dear guest, Daniel here! I'm an Engineer who is investing in Real Estate, particularly on Airbnbs. In my free time (which is little, unfortunately) I play the guitar and go out with friends!

I just love the concept of having a home everywhere you go and that's why I'm attracted to the Airbnb life. I want to let you know that all is well planned for your stay and that I keep perfecting my systems everyday, exploring new technology and ways to communicate, in order to improve my guests' experience!

I am an avid traveler myself, so I know that we all want a nice place that feels like home while we are away. Count me in to make this experience as close to that as it can be.

All I ask from you in return of my hard work in preparring a home for you is: 
1. Please read my listing carefully.
2. Book only if my listing suits you. Better to be slective first, than disapointed later!

Thank you!
Daniel

Veterinaria,gusto de las mascotas, vivo en un ambiente muy tranquilo, especial para desconectar de la rutina y disfrutar de la playa, practico yoga y meditacion
"En el silencio encontrarás lo que tu alma ya sabe"
I am Veterinary, i like the animals, I live in a very quiet environment special to disconnect from the routine and enjoy the beach, I practice yoga and meditation.
"In silence you will find what your soul already knows"

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Olá, seja bem-vindo! 

O Airbnb tem sido uma excelente experiência de vida para todos nós. Iniciamos em Junho de 2016 alugando um quartinho na nossa casa, e hoje administramos outras propriedades de amigos e vizinhos.

Amamos praia, viajar, cinema, leitura, conhecer diferentes culturas , fazer novos amigos e compartilhar experiências. Adoramos uma boa culinária, um bom vinho, boa música e filmes... Nós gostamos de ter a nossa casa cheia de alegria e amigos, acolhendo pessoas agradáveis, com boas vibrações, interessantes e honestas!

Teremos muito prazer em tê-lo como nosso convidado!

-----------------------

Hello and Welcome! 

Airbnb has been a great experience in our lives. We started in June/2016, renting a small bedroom at our house, and now we take care of friends and neighbours properties.

We love to go to the beach, travel, reading, experience different cultures, make new friends, share experiences and values. We love good food, good wine, good music and movies...

We like to have our house filled with joy and friends, welcoming nice people with good vibes, interesting and honest!

We look forward to have you as our guest! 

Be my guest and live like a  carioca!

Nice guy, airline crew member. I have been traveling as an airline crew member for a while. I can say I started to feel the needs of a traveler and with  my job I can also put everything I learn about being a good host in practice. 
I do my best to give my guests the best 'from home to home' experience. 
And when I'm traveling, I can be a good guest. :-) 
I live in Sao Paulo and Rio de Janeiro  and have two places available in these cities. 
Graduated from Anhembi University - São Paulo.
Open minded and a nice person.
All communities are welcome :-)

Hello there! I'm a young professional and a lover of the world :) I speak french, english, vietnamese and get around quite comfortably in spanish. I enjoy outdoor sports, the sea, the sun and all of life's creation! Always looking forward to meet new people and make friends from all around! Hopefully, I will meet you soon ;)

Hi!

We are the lucky owners of these beautiful properties and penthouses in Ipanema and a luxury Mansion in Gavea.
We had the chance to host 300+ guests on Airbnb!

We  love to travel and try to do so as much as possible and we're excited to be a part of the airbnb community!

Please feel free to contact us should any questions arise. 

We are very open to your inquiries and will do our very best to make your stay in Rio fun, easy and comfortable! 

Best wishes and safe travels!

I'm an easy going person looking to meet new people and broaden my perspective. I see Airbnb as a good opportunity for this.

I live alone in a three bedroom flat and I've decided to open up to guests. Feel free to ask any questions you might have.
I look forward to hosting you at my home.

As a guest, I'm cheerful and always willing to try new things. As a solo traveller, I am adventurous and like to spend most of my time exploring the city.

I love coffee...

Gosto de viver em Alta Performance, ser Feliz e ver os outros Felizes.
Adoro viajar, mas quanto mais viajo, mais gosto das minhas cidades de coração: Porto e Vila Nova de Gaia.
Sou apaixonada por música, pintura, fotografia, cinema, literatura e dança.

Hello everyone! I'm Adriana Mateos and I'm part of BRUC 6 BRUC GUESTHOUSE  team with Wildelys, Daiane, Luciano, Vanessa, Josefina.

We have been working in the sector for 5 years with a clear objective: to offer our passengers rooms with all the comfort and cutting-edge technology at competitive prices. We guarantee quality and the friendliest treatment to make the stay unforgettable. 
We currently have 3 hotels in the heart of Barcelona and we are in a continuous search for better offers and amenities.

Bruc & Bruc  Guesthouse team is young and dynamic and will welcome people who speak Spanish, English and Italian. We always offer personalized attention to all our clients from 09:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.

Of course, we are experts in tourism so whatever you doubt, let us know we will be happy to help you prepare your stay! We will offer you all kinds of tips and suggestions, the best places to eat, essential visits, ... all the information that may be useful! We want your stay with us to be really fantastic, our house is your home! We will wait for you! 

¡Hola a todos! Soy Adriana Mateos y soy parte del equipo de BRUC & BRUC GUESTHOUSE con Wildelys, Daiane y Luciano, Vanessa, Josefina.

Llevamos 5 años trabajando en el sector con un objetivo claro: ofrecer a nuestros pasajeros habitaciones con todas las comodidades y tecnología de vanguardia a precios competitivos. Garantizamos la calidad y el trato más amigable para que la estancia sea inolvidable.
Actualmente tenemos 3 hoteles en el corazón de Barcelona y estamos en una búsqueda continua de mejores ofertas y comodidades.

El equipo de habitaciones de Bruc & Bruc Guesthouse es joven y dinámico y dará la bienvenida a personas que hablan español, inglés e italiano. Siempre ofrecemos atención personalizada a todos nuestros clientes de 09:00 a.m. a 10:00 p.m.

Por supuesto, somos expertos en turismo, por lo que no dude en comentarnos, estaremos encantados de ayudarlo a preparar su estancia. Le ofreceremos todo tipo de consejos y sugerencias, los mejores lugares para comer, visitas esenciales, ... ¡toda la información que pueda ser útil! Queremos que su estancia con nosotros sea realmente fantástica, nuestra casa es su hogar. ¡Esperaremos por ti!

Estar con las personas que me importan, música popular brasileña, buena comida, ir en bici y hablar pt-portuguese son las cinco cosas que me mueven!
La playa es mi Norte, aunque me gusta la montaña en otoño.
Mis libros favoritos son los de cocina, si pueden leer y pasarlo bien además de ayudar a prepara buenas recetas; pero también me gustan las novelas históricas!
Me interesan los viajes culturales y gastronómicos, entornos intimistas y auténticos, preferentemente descubrir la belleza local mas que el puramente turístico.

J'habite Montréal depuis 2010 et j'adore ma ville d'adoption. On y retrouve l'ambiance chaleureuse des capitales européennes sur le plateaux et l'intensité des grandes villes américaines au centre-ville. J'aime le multiculturalisme qui brasse les personnes du monde entier. On peut goûter la cuisine de tous les pays du monde en une seule place.
Lorsque je voyage, j'aime pouvoir découvrir la place ou je vais et vivre à la manière des locaux. C'est ce que je veux offrir aux voyageurs que j'accueil : un endroit agréable, confortable propre et ou on peut passer un bon moment après une intense journée en visite.

Olá, meu nome é Cecilia, sou do Rio de Janeiro, mas atualmente moro no Porto, em Matosinhos. Outra cidade maravilhosa para conhecer!
Sou casada e tenho uma filha. E gosto muito de viajar com a minha família e utilizo o Airbnb também.
Será um prazer receber os hóspedes. Sejam bem- vindos!
Passionné de voyages, de films, de musique, de livres, de sports. Je travaille et étudie en réalisation cinématographique.

Mahalo!

Hi everyone!

We are Eva & Jacques and we work in the travel and tourism industry. Our company is AB Apartment Barcelona. What we aim to do is offer each of our guests the best Barcelona experience, from start to finish. So as soon as you begin to book your stay right up until the moment you leave Barcelona, my team and I will be available to help you with any questions you might have, or even just to offer you some friendly advice. 

We have one office open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, meaning you can contact us anytime you want, day or night. We speak many languages between us, and we’re all tourism professionals. Plus, we know all the best places to go in Barcelona, from sights and attractions to bars and restaurants (including where the locals go) so we can help you make your time in the city the most memorable with our insider tips ;)

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through me, you’ll be in safe hands.

We looking forward to meeting you soon!

My wife and I purchased the "Kona Coffee Condo" a few years ago now! We have learned a lot about how to be hosts in those years. We have perfected our approach and learned that communication is key! We have done our very best to create an affordable, clean and comfortable place for those seeking an alternative to the common and expensive route of the all inclusive resorts of Hawaii's Big Island! 

Our goal? to share our Island home, making the ahh inspiring slender of The Big Island accessible to hard working families. We hope you will have a look and see how affordable Hawaii can be with out giving up anything the Island has to offer. Drop us request! Let's do this!

I came from Hon Kong 19 years ago to study at Brigham Young University.  I met my husband here who was also from HK.  We felt in love with the Aloha spirit and the county living style in Hawaii so we decided to stay for good.  

I am a stay at home mom with three lovely children.  I love to eat different kinds of food, but my favorites are raw fish and Thai.  I love to watch Korean dramas and I love to read. 

I like to travel.  I've been to some Asian countries but never been to Europe.  I am dying to go there someday with my family and friends.  I love to see the architecture  and learn about their cultures.  
I've hosted some students from the Asia and I found that I love to meet new people.  That is the reason why I join Airbnb.

Honest and hard working, Rod is native to Australia while Lynsey is Scottish...they met in Sydney when Lynsey was on a gap year in 2005.

We enjoy watersports and spending time by the pool/at the beach or camping.  

Lynsey spent the first 14 years of her life in Malawi (C. Africa), then lived in Scotland.  Rod lived in Scotland with Lynsey and his son Brandon for a couple of years (exposed to the coldest winters we've experienced during 2009/2010), before we all decided to move back to Australia for the warmth!

As hosts we want you to have a comfortable and enjoyable stay with us.  We open our home to you as guests.

Love to travel around the world !

Morador do Rio de Janeiro há mais de 20 anos, sou entusiasta do turismo. Acredito que viajar proporciona às pessoas conhecimento do mundo e de si mesmo. Como brasileiro, gosto de passar o tempo com os bons e velhos amigos e ainda ter tempo de conhecer novos. 
A minha motivação de ser um anfitrião Airbnb é oferecer um pouco do cotidiano carioca a todos que desejam desfrutar das maravilhas que o Rio possui, sem depender de guias oportunistas ou agências de turismo.
Morando na casa ao lado, terei a disponibilidade e o prazer de não só receber mas também ajudar com roteiros e dicas locais.

Sinta-se a vontade para entrar em contato e tirar qualquer dúvida!

Venezolana, Dietista deportiva, tengo una empresa de catering y take away saludables.
Me encanta la playa, la música y la buena lectura. Te encontrarás grandes libros en mi casa que podrás disfrutar durante tu estancia, también podrás disfrutar deliciosos platos que no te harán sentir culpa.
Estarás muy cerca de la playa y puedes irte con un delicioso y saludable pic nic.

Me encantará darte recomendaciones gastronómicas de la ciudad y lugares que visitar que no suelen estar en las listas más famosas y que valen la pena.

Hello, I am Robeen, a retired flight attendant with Qantas International.  I loved my job withs its regular opportunity to look after people and share their travel experiences.  I also love to travel myself and am always ready to give and receive any travel advice or suggestions.  When I travel I love to absorb the local culture, and I do hope that through Airbnb I can provide a good experience for those who might be new to our State or Country.  Having lived out of a suitcase for so many years, I do know the enjoyment it can bring to have a warm and welcoming place to stay, and I am doing all I can to make my property such a place for visitors.  An earlier Airbnb venture was most successful and enjoyable, and it was so good to read of my guests pleasure and appreciation.  I hope I can achieve this standard once again as I welcome guests in 2018......I will certainly be doing my best to make every stay a great experience.

Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.

Hi!
I am Steve Esselink, a Dutch guy that lives for almost 10 years in Rio de Janeiro now. My Brazilian wife Cassia and our two kids Gleiciane (15) and Joaquim (5) are happy to show you the Carioca way of life. We love going to the beach to surf, play futevolei or just relax, hike to waterfalls in the Tijuca Forrest, go to the samba schools or pagode concerts and go out eating (Japanese, Arab or Brazilian). Come and enjoy Rio with us!

Hello, I'm Rui Lé Costa.
I have created this project with the aim of showing Oporto to the world.
In its multiplicity of angles, this experienced and intimate city vibrates in secret places, landscapes, stories and events. Who lives there or passes by, feel it deeply.
Then, FEELPORTO passes through the common interest of the larger community of those who inhabit the city, also in the heart.
And because Oporto is part of the heart of the north of this country, its community expands through and beyond its borders. Therefore, this project is open to all interested in approaching this sense, promoting their ideas and interests on a regular basis.
This way, it can provide all visitors experiences and emotions parallel to the usual and special itineraries. I propose, therefore, that are also the unconditional city lovers, from north to south of Portugal and beyond, to be a part of this community FEELPORTO ... Because Port is Beautiful.

350+ great reviews and Airbnb SUPER HOSTS for 8 straight years!!  

Wow!  'Ohana Nui owes it all to the 1000+ great guests over the last 8 years that have come with a fun fresh and positive outlook on their travel and vacation.  Thank you everyone for making 'Ohana Nui what it is.

Aloha!  We are Brendan and family, and we enjoy sharing our beautiful three story home, 'Ohana Nui, with respectful travelers from around the world.   Brendan, single father of 2, is retired from construction (early) to be a full time dad, world traveler, and Airbnb Host.  He loves to "talk story" and Stand Up Paddle Surf.  The kids, though not here all the time, are two well-behaved, respectful children (ages 11 and 12) who love meeting all the "Uncles and Aunties" in the house.

Our newest addition to the team, Colin, is a career driven full time student, and now co-host that takes care of many of the day to day aspects of Ohana Nui and Ohana Nui Motors in Brendan's absence.  What more can we say about him, Colin is Awesome!

We keep our home smoke-free and drug-free.  We also keep everything clean and tidy.  We do not have a party house by any means, just a nice place to relax and make new friends.  

The name of our home, 'Ohana Nui, means Big Family, which is what we aspire to be to our guests.  Our family is as rich and diverse as the colors of our flag and we show aloha to all.  We strive to provide everyone with all the comforts of home; with safety, quality, and affordability; and to provide every guest with a great local feeling and local experience, all the while, just outside of Waikiki.  

Aloha!

I am an easy going person with a great passion for nature and travelling.. I love to be with and around people, I think I can learn something new from every person I meet.. I am curious to explore other cultures and ways of life..
currently I live in Montreal but have visited many places when I got the chance.

Our names are Matthew and Danielle and we moved to this beautiful Hawaiian island over six years ago.  We count our sea-change to Hawaii as one of the best things we ever did and we absolutely love this place!  Surrounded by wild beauty, turquoise waters, bright sunshine, friendly towns, pristine beaches, epic sunsets, gleaming waterfalls, warm water, lush mountain ranges, and the sound of tropical breezes rustling through the palm trees, how could we not?
Matt and I have been married for almost 13 years and have two sons:  Ryker, who is at the very fun, adventurous age of 4, and Finn who is at the loveable age of 2.5. We also have high hopes to add more kiddos sometime in the future.  
A little about us:  we LOVE Hawaii.  The beach is our favorite playground; building sandcastles with the boys, surfing, cruising on our SUP boards, joy-riding waves to shore, exploring the underwater world with mask and snorkel, kayaking, hiking- we just can’t get enough.  
Feel free to contact us with any questions:
 (Email hidden by Airbnb) 

Blessings!
