Dear travelers, 
Many years ago we moved from Austria & France to Barcelona for professional reasons. I am an architect and my partner/wife Aurélie works in tourism. 
We feel that Spain is a fantastic place, so we would like to offer you memorable stay. 
You can write to us in English, German, Spanish or French. 
Please do not hesitate to contact us, should you need any further information, we will be more than happy to assist you.
All the properties we manage comply with the law and are registered as rental properties, our flats and laundry are professionally cleaned for upmost quality, hygiene and comfort. 
We thrive to provide you with the best quality service and we will go above and beyond to make sure you enjoy your stay in this wonderful city!

Welcome to Midway Realty, we are a licensed full-service real estate management company and Travel Agency specializing in high-quality destination vacation rentals in Waikiki on the beautiful island of Oahu.

Our objective is to help you create a memorable vacation where you and your Ohana (Hawaiian for family) will make new memories… rejuvenate, relax and refresh relationships by providing you with a complete Hawaiian experience and atmosphere full of quality time in Hawaii Nei (beautiful Hawaii).

- No surprises! Plenty of photos of each rental unit on our website. You accurately know what to expect before you arrive.

- All units are fully furnished, all properties provide dishware, cookware, bed linens, towels, and initial start-up supplies (toiletries). Enjoy the comforts of home in paradise.

- Dedicated Property Manager for each condo we manage. If you have questions, problems or concerns, you will always have someone to contact at any time during your stay.

- All units are professionally cleaned prior to your arrival by our superb housekeeping staff.

- We take pride in providing superior rental properties. We take great care in maintaining our high standards and attention to details.

I am hospitality professional, who genuinely cares about creating great vacation experiences for our guests. Prior to assisting with vacation rentals, I worked for high end, well known hotel chains and private hotels for over 17 years. Hospitality is my passion, to ensure that our guests have a great booking and stay experience is always my priority.  
We offer discounted rental car reservations, travel insurance and concierge services to help you make the most of your Maui vacation. Our team of guest experience specialists consists of Paige, Carine, Taylor, Jennifer and Tim, they help me connect, respond and assist our guests 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. I am so proud that we are able to offer warm, friendly, professional and resort quality services in an un-hotel setting for our guests. 
I love to engage in all different forms of art in my spare time, I draw, dance and aspire to play the drums. I love Maui, it would be hard to imagine living at another place, other than paradise.
Mahalo for reading. I hope we get the opportunity to assist you with your next Maui vacation!

Bonjour,

Française installée à Montréal depuis quelques années, je travaille dans l'informatique et vit dans mon appartement du Vieux port que mes amis appellent le "chalet". J'aime les gens positifs, cultiver le bonheur et comme beaucoup, voyager !

host_location: Kalapana SeaView Estates, Pahoa, Hawaii, United States
host_about:
Aloha!  Marylove is an active, fun, vital, semi-retired Tutu (grandma) who loves include music, gardening and the ocean. Marylove enjoys travel, meeting new people, organic gardening and cooking, hiking, biking, creating art, and almost any activity in the ocean.  I can offer many suggestions for nearby hikes, snorkeling, whale watching, surfing, etc.  Marylove is an RN as well as a nationally certified interpreter for American Sign Language, working throughout all the Hawaiian islands.  I am delighted to be your host since 2013!

Life is sweet here in the Kalapana area of Big Island, which is a place of amazing serenity and beauty.  Happy to share a slice of it while you visit!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
I'm 43 years old and I work in the IT Industry (Information Technology) in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. I've always lived in Rio. My partner is called Neto, he is 37 years old and work as a Lawyer. We like to travel a lot. We enjoy going to the beach, movies, running, gym and outdoor sports. We also want to have friends and people from all around the world at our place. You are welcome!

Tenho 43 anos e trabalho com TI no Rio de Janeiro. Sempre morei no Rio mas gosto muito de viajar. Meu companheiro se chama Neto, tem 37 anos e é advogado.  Nosso prazeres preferidos são ir a praia, ir ao cinema, correr, ir a academia e fazer esportes ao ar livre. Gostamos de  amigos e pessoas do mundo todo. Você é bem-vindo!

Tengo 43 años y trabajo con TI en Río de Janeiro. Siempre he vivido en Río, pero me gusta viajar. Mi pareja se llama Neto, el tiene 37 años y es abogado. Nuestros placeres favoritos son ir a la playa, ir al cine, correr, ir al gimnasio y hacer deporte al aire libre. Amamos a los amigos y personas en todo el mundo. ¡Eres bienvenido!

I have recently left my full time position in the corporate world to be a full time host so I can better my work life balance as a new mother to a very active baby girl! 

I now work with the most amazing team managing multiple locations in Montreal's charming Little Italy, historical Old Port and scenic Mont-Tremblant.

I'm an avid skier and traveller who loves Montreal and it's surroundings. When I am not in Montreal's Jean-Talon market area you can find me on the picturesque Mont-Tremblant mountain hitting the slopes! Another favorite is a night on the town in the always action packed Old Port right by the Notre-Dame Basilica.

I love meeting people from different parts of the world and I look forward to connecting with you as a host or traveler. I will do my best to make your stay as comfortable as possible or being a good guest, depending on my role.

Maui resident for 24 years, now I live in San Diego but I come back to Hawaii every 4 months for business.  I'm committed to provide you with a great stay at my new place.  Since most of the time I am not in Maui, my friend Lila is my on island contact, she holds a real state license, has experience with hosting and is super kind, she will be in contact with you for any inquiries.

I am  from Istanbul, but was born and raised in Copenhagen. Studied High School in Turkey and for University was Italy and Spain. Love to travel and meet new people, enjoy to be a host in this great city.

Somos unos apasionados de los viajes. Tanto, que ¡nos hemos convertido en profesionales! 
Estamos muy orgullosos de haber empezado alquilando apartamentos en Barcelona a viajeros nacionales e internacionales. Llevamos más de una década alquilando apartamentos a familias, grupos de amigos, parejas... y realmente siempre ha sido una experiencia muy gratificante para nosotros. Cuando viajamos con nuestros niños, o cuando podemos escaparnos un fin de semana solos, es la opción de alojamiento que más nos gusta. Tenemos independencia, comodidad, conocemos muchos anfitriones nos enriquecen con sus historias y consejos sobre la ciudad y vivimos la ciudad casi casi como un local más.

Nos gusta sentirnos a gusto cuando viajamos, por eso es lo que intentamos ofrecer siempre a nuestros huéspedes. Tenemos un pequeño equipo que nos ayuda para lograr una mejor atención y que se esfuerza por hacer de la experiencia lo mejor posible. Son Belén, Mayte, Marta y Anaí.

Esperamos verte pronto! Y no dudes en contactarnos para lo que necesites. 

Hebe & Ezequiel

Famille de 5, Caroline, Thierry, Mila 6 ans, Gaël 4 ans et Romain 2 ans, nous sommes tous les 5 de vrais urbains. Notre quartier nous comble par ses cafés, ses restos, ses boutiques, ses parcs, ses pâtisseries, ses piscines, ses musées. Nous avons un chat qui reste ou quitte selon les invités et leur envies, il a adorable, affectueux, vraiment un amour de chat. Nous avons envie de vous recevoir chez nous pour que vous essayez notre petit coin de quartier, jasiez un brin avec nos voisins pendant qu'on se délie les ailes un peu quelque part dans un coin de la planète qui nous change d'air. Chez nous vous aurez de la farine, des oeufs, un pinte de lait, un kit de départ ! bienvenue à Montréal !

Bienvenido a Yurbban Passage, soy Marc! Queremos que la experiencia de vivir la ciudad como un auténtico nativo no solamente pase por cuando el viajero se adentre en ella. Apostamos por el talento, los productores y la gastronomía local. Desde el fotomatón y la mesa de shuffleboard hasta el Local Store donde encontrarás piezas únicas elaboradas por productores locales.


Así como una apuesta por la gastronomía de aquí, un típico desayuno catalán o una carta como la de nuestro restaurant D’Aprop elaborada con productos de alta calidad.


Estarás alojado en un hotel que era un antiguo almacén textil, donde se han respetado estructuras como el rosetón de la fachada con las iniciales de Joan Cirici, quien en 1878 creó el pasaje de las Manufactures que atraviesa el hotel.


Welcome to Yurbban Passage, I'm Marc! We want you to experience the city as a true native. We bet on talent, producers and local cuisine. From the photo booth and the shuffleboard table to the Local Store where you will find unique pieces made by local producers.


As well as a commitment to gastronomy, a typical Catalan breakfast or our restaurant D'Aprop.


You will be staying in a hotel that used to be an old textile warehouse, where structures such as the rosette on the facade have been respected with the initials of Joan Cirici, who in 1878 created the passage of Manufactures that runs through the hotel.

I am part of a local team that manages holiday apartments in Barcelona.

Who are we? 
Habitat Apartments is a professional vacation rental agency with 16 years of experience welcoming guests to the city.
We have been awarded, 4 years in a row, "​​Spain's Leading Serviced Apartment Brand" at the World Travel Awards.

How we do it?
- We work with a professional cleaning & laundry company so you will find the apartment well prepared for your stay. We also work with a professional ​maintenance company available at any time.

-​ ​We are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year so you can rest assured that you will be taken care of in case of an emergency during your stay in Barcelona.

-​ ​We know the city so well because it's our home so you can ask us anything you need before & during your stay.

We want you to love our city as much as we do and go home with the best memories​​!

Hello, I believe that travelling allows you to find your best self. When I was 19 I went overseas for the first time for four months and the experience provided me with the courage to follow my dreams - two degrees later and 20 years of working experience I set off on a gap year. This experience helped me find the courage to start my own unpaid project.  In that year I stayed mostly in air bnb and it allowed me to experience the culture of the place first hand. Now I'm opening up my own studio.  I hope people get to love Redfern and Sydney as much as me :)

Hey travelers ! My name is Amine

I live and work in downtown Montreal. People usually describe me as a smily and a very friendly guy.

I traveled in nearly 50 countries around the globe and far from stopping there. There is so much to discover and to learn. 

What I like from travelling is the feeling of excitement to discover a new place, trying to communicate in a new language, meeting new people, trying new exotic food and learn from the others. It's great to break the routine and leave it's comfort zone.

Now that so many great Airbnb  hosts opened their doors to me, I feel it is my turn to open the door of my condo in downtown Montreal to other travellers.

Looking forward meeting you or hosting you :)

Amine

Hello, I'm Rui Lé Costa.
I have created this project with the aim of showing Oporto to the world.
In its multiplicity of angles, this experienced and intimate city vibrates in secret places, landscapes, stories and events. Who lives there or passes by, feel it deeply.
Then, FEELPORTO passes through the common interest of the larger community of those who inhabit the city, also in the heart.
And because Oporto is part of the heart of the north of this country, its community expands through and beyond its borders. Therefore, this project is open to all interested in approaching this sense, promoting their ideas and interests on a regular basis.
This way, it can provide all visitors experiences and emotions parallel to the usual and special itineraries. I propose, therefore, that are also the unconditional city lovers, from north to south of Portugal and beyond, to be a part of this community FEELPORTO ... Because Port is Beautiful.

We are a Catalan and Venezuelan couple with 3 daughters and we started using airbnb as our personal account. But since we were getting more apartments to manage we founded our small “family agency” called “Acomodis”. We are part of a happy team and we all work full time managing short term rentals and organizing cooking activities. We absolutely love what we do and we are more than happy to meet amazing people from all around the world and ensure our guests enjoy this incredible city. We are happy when our guests are happy!

ACOMODIS APARTMENTS - Self-catering apartments in Barcelona - The easy and secure place to book quality vacation apartments. Always great deals, always great service from Acomodis!

Hola amigos,

In order to help you, I and my wife offer a wide variety of apartments in Barcelona to make it easier for you to enjoy a pleasant stay and experience.

In addition to trust us in regard to housing, we believe the most important is to have a nice experience and maximize what Barcelona has to offer. That's why we invite you to apply for any information you need before and during your stay to enjoy as ever. 
Also, if you want to enjoy a very special gastronomic activity do not hesitate to ask for information.

We speak English, French, Spanish, Catalan and on the telephone.

We are happy because we love what we do!

I was born in California and raised in Hong Kong. Went to college in the states and returned to Hong Kong a few years ago.  I absolutely love travelling around the region but Hong Kong has always welcomed me home and I look forward to showing off my home town and sharing all the little insights and local specialities with all my guests!

Hi there,

My name is Harry and I'm new on the Airbnb platform on recommendation of my friends.  Born & raised in Hong Kong I like to meet new people and cultures. So feel free too contact me if you like to explore Hong Kong and l love to show you what this beautiful country has to offer.

As a "foodie" I like to explore all kinds of cuisines and I also like to walk around in Hong Kong to discover all new restaurants and bars. Delicious food, a nice drink and a great conversation is a great way to enjoy life.

If you wish to stay in Hong Kong for a reasonable price in a new, modern and elegant apartment choose one of my apartments and you will be satisfied from the comfort, peace and silence you find in it. 

Don't hesitate to contact me, it is always nice to meet new people and/ or to help you to have a great time in Hong Kong.

I am Safa. My passion is putting together beautiful & functional living spaces. I love the beauty of natural materials and recycling old or antique items.
 
 Other than that cooking, eating and traveling all in a care free manner is what puts a smile on my face ;-)

I am from Big Island. A world traveler and I live off the grid growing a lot of my own food. A variety of fruit trees and such. I went to Clown College and was in show business most of life. These days I am working as a transformational life coach and toy inventor. I am easy going, a fantastic communicator and facilitator and life/transformational coach.  I enjoy a wide variety of food and music and art. My favorite places to visit so far is, underwater reefs, Amsterdam and Morocco, New Orleans and the Canadian Rockies. Big into backpacking and have been involved with a global men's group (Mankind Project) for over ten  years where we initiate men into what it means to be responsible, accountable, emotionally literate and compassionate. I am a playful and inspiring soul. I look forward to connecting with you. 
You will be hard pressed to find a spirit as unique as mine as I am a W.O.W. Wizard of Whimsy. Playful, engaging, inspiring, thoughtful, insightful. I can offer one-on-one sessions to people who are looking to shift their perspective in their lives and access the dreams they always wanted to live. I am a change maker, innovator, creative soul. With aloha....

Greetings from Team Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hawaii, LLC! Yes, we're a professional property management company—but we're also real people, trusted by the owners of vacation homes to take care of all the heavy lifting like housekeeping, reservations, maintenance, and guest care. You can trust that your home will be cleaned by professional housekeepers, and your calls will be answered (right away, around the clock!) by our dedicated Guest Services team. 


Check out our listings, and if you have any questions, get in touch! We'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
I live between Rio de Janeiro and the San Francisco bay area in California.  I am a public radio DJ with a Brazilian music radio program for the last 30 years.  I am also a story teller and have a knack for making people laugh. 

I love the outdoors and especially cycling up to the Christ statue or in the hills above Silicon Valley.  I am very familiar with the musical scene of Rio and can be your guide or give you the information you need.

I am a native English speaker and speak fluent Portuguese and passable Japanese.  I also can make myself understood in Spanish.

My philosophy as a host:  My parents were very successful small business owners with a carnation farm and later a flower shop. They had their business listed in the best of Silicon Valley and even had local TV coverage.  Out of hundreds of similar businesses, they were able to differentiate themselves on how they treated and interacted with their customers.  They worked hard to give that little extra that made people want to come back.  My goal as a host is to treat as you my parents would have.  Let me show my definition of hospitality.  

Moro entre o Rio de Janeiro e nos suburbos de San Francisco, em Califórnia. Sou um DJ de rádio educativo com um programa de Música Brasileira para os últimos 30 anos. 

Eu gosto de pedalar na floresta da Tijuca subindo para o Corcovado ou nas colinas de Silicon Valley em California. Conheço bem a cena musical do Rio e possa o seu guia ou dar-lhe as informações sobre o que você deveria fazer na Cidade Maravilhosa.

Eu falo inglês e português fluentemente. Eu também entendo bastante espanhol e japônes para comunicar.

Minha filosofia como anfitrião: meus pais eram proprietários de pequena empresa muito bem sucedido com um sítio de floricultura e depois uma loja de flores. Eles tinham seus negócios listados no melhor de "Silicon Valley" e até tinham cobertura de TV local. Das centenas de empresas similares, eles conseguiram se diferenciar com o atendimento único aos seus clientes. Eles trabalharam um pouco mais para fazer os clientes sempre voltar. Meu objetivo como anfitrião é tratar como você teria os meus pais. Deixe-me mostrar minha definição de hospitalidade.

Aloha & Welcome to Maui Resorts at Sullivan Properties, offering affordable Vacation Condo Rentals on the tropical paradise island getaway of West Maui, Hawaii. We have been providing visitors and residents with the best Maui Vacation Condo Rentals, Real Estate Sales, Property Management Services, Activities and Car Rentals for over 20 years. We can provide you with the best quality, selection, value and service on the "West Side" of Maui. We specialize in properties located in the: Kapalua Resort, Napili, Kahana, Mahinahina, Honokowai, Kaanapali, Lahaina, and Olowalu areas of West Maui.

We offer tastefully furnished and spacious accommodations at all of Sullivan's managed resort properties. Enjoy complete kitchens that offer home-like conveniences. Golden sand beaches, championship golf courses, gorgeous sunsets and pristine views of both the West Maui Mountains and the Pacific Ocean are all part of the vacation experience.

Bir yanında Yeşilçay, diğer yanında Göksu dereleri, yeşilin binbir tonunu içinde barındıran ormanları ve Karadeniz'e bakan altın sarısı kumsallarıyla adeta bir yeryüzü cenneti, Ağva. Yeşilçay ve Göksu'nun denize döküldükleri yerde oluşan küçük bir delta üzerine kurulu olan şehir, Latince'de "iki dere arasındaki köy" ve "su" anlamlarına geliyor...
İstanbul'a sadece 97 km uzaklıktaki Ağva, şile ilçesine bağlı bakir kalmış yerlerden biri. Şehrin karmaşasından, süratinden, gürültüsünden yorgun düşenler için ideal bir dinlenme, nefes alma yeri.Ağva beldesi, Roma, Ceneviz,Bizans egemenliklerine girmiştir. Osmanlı döneminde önemli bir Rum nüfusu varmış. Milattan önceki yüzyıllarda, M.Ö 5. ve 7. yüzyılda, Ağva ve yakınlarında yerleşim bulunduğuna dair kanıtlar ele geçmiştir. Kalıntılar; Hitit ve Friglerin de bölgede yaşamış olduğunu gösterir. Başta Yeniköy olmak üzere çevre köylerde, Roma ve Bizans dönemine ait kalıntılar bulmak mümkündür.Ağva'nın tarihte bilinen ilk konukları Hititler olmuştur. Daha sonra Frigler, Romalılar, Bizanslılar ve Osmanlılar gelmiştir. Tarihi M.Ö. 7. yüzyıla kadar uzanan Ağva'da, Hititler'e ve Frigler'e ait kalıntıları, ayrıca Roma ve Bizans döneminden kalan kilise kalıntılarını, mezar taşlarını görmek mümkündür.Ağva otelleri

Choisis principalement pour leur emplacement et leur luminosité, nos appartements Casa Cosi ont minutieusement été rénovés afin de préserver leur caractère tout en leur apportant un maximum de confort : double vitrage, climatisation et chauffage central, salle de bain modernes, cuisines fonctionnelles, meubles et literie de qualité, équipements complets : TV, électroménager, vaisselle, linge de maison et bien sur une connexion internet avec wifi....

Nous avons choisi des emplacements centraux pour que touristes ou en voyage professionnel, vous puissiez profiter d'un quartier vivant qui vous ouvre les portes de la ville mais aussi bénéficier d'une grande offre de transports.

À Barcelone, notre quartier de prédilection est l’Eixample. Un quartier central, animé proche des Ramblas, du Passeo de Gracia, de la Plaça de Catalanuya et plaça Universitat. Un quartier à l'architecture moderniste dans lequel les commerces, les restaurants et bars à tapas sont nombreux. Un quartier à partir duquel on se promène dans la ville.  

Notre structure de taille humaine nous permet d’être proche de vos attentes. Nous vous accueillons à votre arrivée pour vous présenter le lieu et le quartier, et restons joignables tout au long de votre séjour pour vous orienter et répondre à vos éventuelles demandes. N'hésitez pas à nous contacter.

Welcome to Casa Cosi !

I am a real estate entrepreneur specializing in short-term rental accomodations in New York City and San Francisco. I started this business after tiring of staying in small, cramped, expensive hotel rooms.  During a subsequent visit to NYC, I stayed in a short-term rental apartment and decided that staying in an apartment was the only way to have a true and satisfying experience in a major city.  I don't regret my decision - we host guests from all over the world.  We enjoy providing high-end, luxurious accommodations for travelers looking for an authentic but luxurious experience.  Almost without fail, we get a "Wow!"  each time a guest arrives at one of our apartments.  Satisfied guests make it all worthwhile.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

Hey, I’m Aymeric!

I’m a French expat from the vineyards of Bordeaux with a love for animals and traveling. At 18, I moved to the USA for 10 years and lived in Boston, Miami Beach and San Francisco while exploring most of Canada, Central and South America. For the past 15 years I’ve lived in Sydney, Australia, mainly because of the beautiful beaches here. On weekends in summer, you can find me volunteering as a surf lifesaver on Tamarama beach.

I work for MaisonNets, a boutique agency specializing in short-term rental management. The MaisonNets portfolio has over 125 properties, encompassing mid-range to luxury apartments and houses in Australia’s capital cities, as well as country homes and a villa in Bali.  

Our properties are all specifically selected for their amenities and prime location - the accommodation of choice for urban sophisticates, professionals, couples and families looking for a uniquely comfortable experience.

With a focus on organic products, MaisonNets offers unparalleled personal service and attention to detail ensuring that you, our valued guest, have a wonderful stay with us.

Eric Vökel,

Rentals Maui Inc. is a Vacation Rental management company located in Kihei, Maui. The company is locally owned and managed, and has been doing business on Maui for the past 20 years.  It is a Real Estate company fully licensed by the State of Hawaii and is insured and bonded.

Currently Rentals Maui Inc. manages 275 properties in the Kihei and Wailea area of Maui. They strive to give visitors the best possible vacation experience on Maui.  The office is located in the heart of South Maui making them always available to their guests. If you have any questions during your stay they are available day or night for your needs. They have emergency services, an amazing cleaning crew and the staff is helpful, knowledgeable, and friendly. The goal of Rentals Maui Inc. is for their guests to love Maui as much as they do.

Dear Sir/Madam,

Hello all way from İstanbul, Turkey.
ı welcome anybody who wishes to enjoy the comfort of staying at a nice apartment just in the very center of İstanbul in my apartment. As a traveller, ı both had the chance experiencing  the luxury and the comfort  at the same time during my trips araound the world  and somehow ı found my self running my apartment after completing . i believe everybody would agree with me that what feels great is to pay less for housing but enjoying the city you travel by spending more on other things rather than paying high cost hotel fees. Being aware of this, ı want my guest feel the same and enjoy being İstanbul as much as they can.
ı guarantee nice and clean accommodation, low cost recommendation, anything about the city and Turkish hospitality.
We would be pleased to welcome you here. my apartment is located in the Ayasofya-Sultanahmet area and only 5 minutes walking distance to the sultanahmet area.


Best & Kind Regards.

I am an international chef and caterer. 
I have been around the world nine times. Meeting people and experiencing new cultures is my passion.

Rio is one of my favorite cities and so I chose it for my holiday home. The spectacular setting, the people, the music, and the food make it one of the worlds great destinations. Whenever I choose a place stay, my first consideration is the location. I like to be in the center of the most interesting part of town.

I believe in offering value for money with no surprises. I think you will enjoy your stay in this beautiful apt.

Love Hawaii Villas is a full-service boutique vacation rental marketing and management firm, specializing in exclusive luxury oceanfront condos in the Ko Olina Resort on West Oahu. As an authorized Rental Agency (RA) at the Beach Villas at Ko Olina, on Lagoon 2, the Team at Love Hawaii Villas is committed to delivering the best available vacation rental accommodations experience available. 

Featuring 2BD and 3BD luxury oceanfront condos as well as private, gated oceanfront homes a short drive from the Resort, Love Hawaii Villas is your island connection for beautifully furnished and decorated Hawaii oceanfront resort condos and golf course frontage homes. 

The leadership Team at Love Hawaii Villas has more than three decades of combined experience with Hawaii vacation rental management and looks forward to helping you experience "A better way to stay!"

我是中国女士,老公是英国人,我们都是热情善良的人

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
I work with Communications and I love what I do.  I live alone as I am single, I don´t smoke and I have a lot of friends all over the world. I love traveling and I speak  Portuguese, English, Spanish and a little French. Although I travel  a lot, whenever I have an opportunity I love enjoying all the attractions Rio has to offer. I enjoy going out with my friends, specially to Samba clubs and to Lapa, playing drums in “blocos de Carnaval” and whenever is possibile go outrigger canoeing in Guanabara Bay.  I love running or riding my long skateboard in different areas of the city and of course, I enjoy  a lot the beaches and the city parks with their waterfalls. It will be a pleasure to show you a bit of what Rio has to offer.

Yo trabajo con Comunicaciones y me encanta lo que hago. Soy soltero  y vivo sólo, no fumo y tengo un montón de amigos de diferentes partes del mundo. Me encanta viajar  y hablo portugués, Inglés, español y un poco de francés . Viajo bastante pero siempre que tengo la oportunidad me encanta disfrutar de todas las atracciones de Río. Me gusta salir con mis amigos, especialmente a las ruedas de samba y a la Lapa, tocar em la batería de  "blocos de Carnaval" y siempre que possibile ir en canoa outrigger en la Bahía de Guanabara. Me gusta correr o andar em mi skateboard  en diferentes zonas de la ciudad y, por supuesto, me encantan las playas y los parques de Rio con sus cascadas. Será un placer mostrarte un poco de lo que Río tiene para ofrecer.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about: Sou gaucha e agora depois de 30 anos  de Rio ja posso me considerar cariucha.  Moro na parte da floresta da Tijuca, onde convivo com gambas, ourico do mato, micos, morcegos, tucanos e uma variedade sem fim de passaros. Preciso ser muito esperta pra recolher as bananas maduras antes dos miquinhos me carregarem todas. ADORO ler,  cinema e viajar. Sou nazarena e acredito num DEUS que esta no mar, no ceu, em nos. Tenho 4 cachorros que me ocupam a vida e gosto muito de receber.

We have been managing over 30 wonderful apartments in Barcelona for many years, and have hosted guests from all over the world. Hi,大家好我是Visnon. 

我们喜欢旅行,爱住当地的老房子,逛当地的市场,喜欢色彩浓郁的国度,探索奇葩的民风! 

我们改造了一些老房子,并加入了有趣的想法｡ 
在分享前我们都会试住几天,确保一切安好,并在细节上做更人性化的调整｡ 

因为是老房子,它有温度又有些局限,希望能体谅它｡Visnon坚持选用五星酒店出身的专业管理团队来打理房间,使用星级酒店的床品,希望我的每个客人都能感受到放心和舒适｡ 

快来香港找我们玩吧! 
Visnon会在能力范围内Do my best for you! 
愿大家都有一个美好的假期回忆~ 

*请大家在预定的时候告诉我入住人数,大概的入住和退房时间,是来旅游还是本地居民,会不会有朋友来玩,是否带宝宝哦!

I've been a camper from the age of 6! I used to go camping with my parents on a scooter. Every summer, me and my family used to go travelling through Europe on a caravan. Recently I upgraded to a campervan as it is a more sustainable option and is easier to drive and park. I love the freedom it provides for a touring holiday or escaping into Nature and my mission is to share this experience with fellow travellers. 

Our campervans provide freedom on wheels. So guests can travel with no restrictions and no ties. With no need to book hotels, no arrival schedules to limit you, no pre-paid programs to follow. It is about total freedom of choice and use to explore or relax.

You can get closer to Nature. Fall asleep under the starry sky, wake up in the middle of the mountains, have breakfast by the sea. The perfect companion for outdoor activities surrounded by Nature. Pick up your gear and go explore!

We are locals with a passion for travel and gastronomy keen on giving advice and proud of their travel library! We can suggest travel itineraries. We are specially keen on the North of Portugal region as its varied landscapes, heritage and people make it a fabulous destination that all travellers love!

Looking forward to providing you with the adventure of a lifetime!

Graça Ferreira
Manager

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I have been home-sharing for about 10 years now and have met many interesting people. I view visitors more as short-term roommates than I do as guests.

Home-sharing truly has been a blessing for me. It's helped me to pay the rent and still given me the flexibility to have the place all to my own when I'd like to do so. That's a huge benefit!

As a guest, I have used Airbnb to travel to Tokyo and spent a few weekends staying at a farmhouse outside New York City. We watched films on the side of a barnhouse. Very cool!

I am a relatively easy-going guy. I drink socially and do not smoke or use drugs. I definitely like to have fun, especially if it involves doing something new and it doesn't cost a ton of money. I love deals!

While I tend to be easy-going, I do have my pet-peeves. For example, a shoes-free home means just that. With that said, I ask that you please review the house "rules" before you book with me.

Either as a host or a guest, I'd be up for hanging out some time. I like to meet new people and explore the city together. If you'd like to hang out during your visit, then let me know in advance. My work schedule is pretty unpredictable and I often do work from home. I can get pretty busy, but if you give me some advance notice I'll make sure we have time to spend together. Otherwise, I generally assume that guests want independence.

If you prefer to do your own thing, then that's totally fine too. Don't worry I won't be offended. I can certainly appreciate that you may have a pretty full itinerary when you come to NYC.

I'm a former journalist, PR guy and worked for a non-profit in the sustainable agriculture / environmental field for many years. I started my own coaching/consulting business a few years ago and would be interested to find out more about what's going on in your life. Perhaps I can help you out in some way?

My guests have included a combination of tourists and business travelers. Whichever category you fall under, you're welcome to stay with me. I have an extra room and I'd be happy to provide you with an opportunity to step into the shoes of a New York City resident for a while. Who knows? Maybe you'll like the East Village so much that you'll want to find your own apartment and never want to leave.

I host singles and couples, but you should note that there is an added fee of $30 per night for all additional guests over one person.

The most common things I hear from guests are:

"The room is so much bigger than I thought based on the photos in your listing,"

"This is a really cool room/place!"

"I love the natural light that comes into this room!"

"It's such a comfy atmosphere in here that I really hate to leave!"

Guests really love the location! location! location!

On the flip side, I sometimes hear people remark that walking up five flights is "telling them that they need to get into better shape."

If nothing else, I hope that you'll find your visit with me to be enlightening (that's a joke because the bedroom is well-lit and I am a life coach ;)

Look forward to meeting you!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Sejam bem vindos amigos. Sou carioca da gema. Nasci, cresci e vivi toda a minha vida no Rio de Janeiro. Adoro esta cidade. Já estou aqui neste site como anfitrião há muitos anos. Durante esse tempo, conheci muitas pessoas e culturas diferentes. Já aluguei esse apartamento para pequenos ou grandes grupos que vem passear ou trabalhar aqui, e pelo que pude constatar todos gostam muito do lugar pelas facilidades que encontram: metrô, transportes variados, supermercados, hortifruti, comércio de todo tipo, praia no melhor trecho do bairro entre os postos 3 e 4, diversões, surffing, bodyboarding, kite surf, games, enfim, tudo muito pertinho numa rua tranquila e segura. O apartamento como constatam e todos podem confirmar nos comentários dos hóspedes, além de confortável, espaçoso, bem ventillado, contém todos os eletrodomésticos, internet, tv a cabo, wi fi, cozinha completa e todos os cômodos de sala e quartos tem ar condicionado. Além disso, ele é disponível totalmente para o uso e a privacidade completa dos meus hóspedes. Saibam que não tenho nenhuma restrição e preferências por cor, raça ou gênero e recebo com prazer todos aqueles que venham em paz e desejosos de se sentirem verdadeiros cariocas nesta famosa cidade chamada Maravilhosa. Venham se hospedar no meu apartamento e com certeza vão querer voltar sempre. Um grande abraço e boa viagem.

Welcome friends. I'm from Rio de Janeiro. I was born, raised and lived all my life in Rio de Janeiro. I love this city. I've been here on this site as a host for many years. During this time, I met many different people and cultures. I have already rented this apartment for small or large groups that come to stroll or work here, and from what I could tell, everyone is very fond of the place for the facilities they find: subway, various transport, supermarkets, hortifruti, commerce of all kinds, beach in the best part of the neighborhood between stations 3 and 4, amusements, surffing, bodyboarding, kite surf, games, at least, everything very close and in a quiet and safe street. The apartment as you can see and everyone can confirm in the guest comments, in addition to comfortable, spacious, well ventillated, contains all appliances, internet, cable tv, wi fi, full kitchen and all rooms and living room contains air conditioning. In addition, it is fully available for the full use and privacy of my guests. Plus, know that I have no restrictions and preferences by color, race or gender and I welcome with pleasure all those who come in peace and desirous of feeling true Cariocas in this famous city called Maravilhosa. Come and stay in my apartment and you will definitely want to come back again and again. A big hug and a good trip.

Sean bienvenidos amigos. Soy carioca de la gema. Nací, crecí y viví toda mi vida en Río de Janeiro. Me encanta esta ciudad. Ya estoy aquí en este sitio como anfitrión desde hace muchos años. Durante ese tiempo, conocí a muchas personas y culturas diferentes. Ya alquilé ese apartamento para pequeños o grandes grupos que vienen a pasear o trabajar aquí, y por lo que pude constatar a todos les gusta mucho del lugar por las facilidades que encuentran: metro, transportes variados, supermercados, hortifruti, comercio de todo tipo, playa en el mejor tramo del barrio entre los puestos 3 y 4, diversiones, surffing, bodyboarding, kite surf, juegos, en fin, todo muy cerca, en una calle tranquila y segura. El apartamento como constatan y todos pueden confirmar en los comentarios de los huéspedes, además de cómodo, espacioso, bien ventillado, contiene todos los electrodomésticos, internet, televisión por cable, wi fi, cocina completa y todas las habitaciones tienen aire acondicionado. Además, está disponible totalmente para el uso y la privacidad completa de mis huéspedes. Sepan que no tengo ninguna restricción y preferencias por color, raza o género y recibo con placer a todos aquellos que vengan en paz y deseosos de sentirse verdaderos cariocas en esta famosa ciudad llamada Maravillosa. Viene a alojarse en mi apartamento y seguramente van a querer volver siempre. Un gran abrazo y buen viaje.

Hi I'm Alejandro, architect and pasionate apartment owner and manager. I work with my team to offer the best experiences in Barcelona and Pontevedra.
Under Archsense Apartments and ArchSense Barcelona brands, we are a young and dynamic company that is dedicated to personalized management of tourist apartments and houses in two diferent areas in Spain. In Barcelona  (Catalunya) and Pontevedra (Galicia).

Our management comprises different phases, from the initial search of clients, reception and accommodation in the apartment until his departure. We also take care of the apartment all clean and conditioning time, and to resolve any issues that may arise during a guest's stay.
The main goal of our management is twofold:

- Provide the owner a full service under which you can forget about the worries and concerns the operation of holiday rental, knowing that the investment in the business will bring greater benefits than the option of "traditional" rent.
- Get the highest customer satisfaction, ensuring their comfort, in order to make your stay in our apartments result in all the most pleasant time possible.

Our differences with other organizations dedicated to the tourist apartment sector lies in providing special pampering to the customer, feeling to be at their own home and have at all the time a "friend" of reference in the city. This person (me or some of my collaborators) speaks your language, and will help you to solve any questions or problems and looking for suggestions of leisure in the city. 
All this expertise  has allowed us to grow gradually, as the viral marketing has proven to be our best advertising tool, and thus many customers and many others have repeated recommend us to their family and friends. As an architect, different owners have also recommended us to their friends to transform their properties for holiday apartments.

Welcome 2 Porto is a professional tourism management team. All our collaborators are committed Porto citizens who receive the guests with professional quality and local charm. We make guests feel well accompanied during their stay and we help them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences.
We are also passionate about travel and new places! We like to know new cultures, landscapes, palates and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, to share new sensations with our suggestions, lived in the first person.
They are walks by the sea, or boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river, walks through the old streets of Oporto, also UNESCO site, listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, influence for Harry Potter, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat francesinha and tripas or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the Port wine.
I believe work is toil but also a joy. I am an IT professional who is practicing to love God. I love beautiful landscapes and lovely stories.

I and my  colleague Omer studied Business Administration  at the same university and we both worked for Deloitte for years as a financial auditor. It will be a great pleasure to host you in our lovely city , Istanbul.

We always go to the beaches around us ( Copacabana, Ipanema, Arpoador and Leblon), We usually receive friends at home to play music ! We love cooking and eating out. We don't have car because we can easily walk everywhere and find everything very near us.

host_location: Wan Chai, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong
host_about:
I love to meet different people and visit to other places, visiting the local farmer's market and experience and live like a local using bnb.  

I have been airbnb host since 2011 for 7 years already.  So Glad to have over 670 guest reviews!!  We work so hard to keep happy guests but only 20% of guests spend their precious time to write reviews :-)  CHEERS to all supportive new guests, return guests and referred guests.  I hope to serve you better.  Please do give us private feedback anytime and I valued your feedback and will improve my apartments.  I am so glad many of you appreciate all the hard work and bare with the occasionally 1% silly mistake / fault / defect I have made.  Thank you so much for your patient.  

Again, should you need anything during your stay, don't be shy, please do let me know via calling or email me.  I am more than happy to provide suggestion / immediate assistant / support as soon as possible.

*********************************************************************************
FOR NEW airbnb user, below are some of the FAQ links for your perusal (questions & answers useful for new user). Please do let me know if you have any problem, my response would be faster than airbnb support team as sometimes their hotline as very busy (but I only can help you on general question).

GENERAL FAQ for guests before booking 
www.airbnb.com/help/topic/traveling

FAQ: What are Airbnb Service Fees? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/104

FAQ: For How to Book 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/85

FAQ: For How to make a payment / reservation 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/126

FAQ: For How to Contact Airbnb Support 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/9

FAQ: How and when do I make a payment for my reservation? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/92

FAQ: How can I view or print a billing receipt or itinerary for my trip? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/100

FAQ: How are cleaning fees added? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/58

FAQ: How does the Airbnb payment system work? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/51

We strongly recommend reviewing all cancellation policies before making your reservations: www.airbnb.com/home/cancellation_policies?guest_fee_policy=grace_period_48_hours#strict-with-grace

FAQ: When do I pay for my long-term reservation?
www.airbnb.com/help/question/245

Due to the reason that Sep-Apr is peak season, you are advised to make your reservation earlier.   I can only do first book first serve basis, where I won't cancel current booking just because other guests have a longer / bigger booking.  Due to strict cancellation policy, I haven't cancel guest booking so far, except from time to time having guest need to cancel or amend their booking due to different reason and we will considerate case by case (so far only full refund to 1 group of guest as they are able to provide document to proof that their immediate family member need emergency operation). 

Max Capacity is cater to big group consists of family n kids with standard asian size.  If group with members with huge body size or some members prefer to have a bed by their own, not sharing with other, then please split your group into two apartments for more comfortable stay.  I have tried my best to write the apartment description as detail as I could. Please spend time to read through before you book.  I am definitely happy to answer any question that is not in the apartment description.


Contact Number and Email Information will only be released until a booking is made. 

Below is the FAQ on airbnb “Why can’t I call or email a host before booking?”: www.airbnb.com/help/question/111

Hope this helps you get to know how airbnb works :-)

Welcome to Hong Kong, such an amazing city! But please be aware of the size of apartments here, thanks to the space constraints and population density. Once again, thank you for the interest and looking forward to host you soon!   :)

We are Sweet Inn and we offer a unique hospitality experience. We have over 500 stylish apartments for vacations and business trips in 10 incredible European cities. We’ve hosted thousands of guests since 2014 - so rest assured, you won’t have any unpleasant surprises. Spoiler Alert: Our apartments are professionally designed for the ultimate comfort - heavenly beds, the fluffiest towels, toiletries by Nuxe, a Nespresso machine, super-fast WiFi and tons of other perks; trust me, you’ll notice the difference. Two more things you should know about Sweet Inn: We have a City Lobby and a local team in every city that will take the best care of you; we’ll even personally meet you at the apartment to show you in. And we’ll help you make the most out of your stay in Barcelona with tips only a local would know. We also offer incredible services to upgrade your stay - airport transfer, housekeeping, full fridge, private chef and many more. One last thing, download our App after booking, it’s really great; it will make your experience so much smoother.

host_name: 天熙高级商务公寓(深圳丹枫白露店)
host_about:
阳光,热情,好客,有过5年酒店,2年公寓服务经验
HELLO 我是天熙高级商务公寓(深圳丹枫白露店)
日租､月租､季租､年租的管家,
也是生活梦开始的地方!
一段时光,佳期如梦;
一个房间,冬日暖阳;
我想做一位生活的工匠,
找一处静谧的地方,
安静而又极致,
做一件纯粹的事情｡
天熙高级商务公寓,
提供的不仅仅是睡眠的地方,
更在乎的是,让客人有非一般的良好体验和愉悦程度;
让客人有一个美好记忆及不时的念想｡
天熙品质,尊贵享受,
方寸之间,自有天地 ｡

Chase ‘N Rainbows (CNR) Real Estate, Inc. is a Maui-based, family-owned company established in 1980 with two divisions: vacation rental management and real estate sales. For the past twenty years, CNR has been offering visitors and Kama’aina alike, affordable and luxury accommodations at a very competitive price. All of its vacation rental units are carefully selected, meticulously inspected, attractively furnished and well maintained to the highest standards. CNR is committed to providing the finest product and unsurpassed personalized service in the industry. These condominiums come highly recommended by leisure, business, and family travelers with distinctive tastes. A significant number of satisfied, return guests speak for the company’s service commitment and quality product. Chase ‘N Rainbows is a proud member of the Hawaii Visitors & Convention Bureau (HVCB), The American Society of Travel Agents (ASTA), Maui Visitors Bureau (MVB), Hawaii Association of Realtors, Maui Chamber of Commerce, and Vacation Rental Managers Association (VRMA).

Repeat visitors from the U.S. mainland, Canada, Europe and Asia trust Marina Hawaii Vacations for convenience, great quality and prices. Greetings from Team Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hawaii, LLC! Yes, we're a professional property management company—but we're also real people, trusted by the owners of vacation homes to take care of all the heavy lifting like housekeeping, reservations, maintenance, and guest care. (Because, to be honest, renting out a vacation home really can be a full-time job!)


We have local teams on the ground to take care of our homes and our guests. We like to think of it as the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, only without compromising on service and convenience. You can trust that your home will be cleaned by professional housekeepers, and your calls will be answered (right away, around the clock!) by our dedicated Guest Services team. 


Check out our listings, and if you have any questions, get in touch! We'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway.

We are Sweet Inn and we offer a unique hospitality experience. We have over 500 stylish apartments for vacations and business trips in 10 incredible European cities. We’ve hosted thousands of guests since 2014 - so rest assured, you won’t have any unpleasant surprises. Spoiler Alert: Our apartments are professionally designed for the ultimate comfort - heavenly beds, the fluffiest towels, toiletries by Nuxe, a Nespresso machine, super-fast WiFi and tons of other perks; trust me, you’ll notice the difference. Two more things you should know about Sweet Inn: We have a City Lobby and a local team in every city that will take the best care of you; we’ll even personally meet you at the apartment to show you in. And we’ll help you make the most out of your stay in Barcelona with tips only a local would know. We also offer incredible services to upgrade your stay - airport transfer, housekeeping, full fridge, private chef and many more. One last thing, download our App after booking, it’s really great; it will make your experience so much smoother.

Hello Everyone
We are very please to welcome you in one of our apartments in the amazing and wonderful Barcelona.
After working many years as sales director and account manager in a travel agency we decided to manage our own apartments and take care of our own guests. We really appreciate this new life.
We hope you will enjoy your stay in one of our apartments, selected carefully for you...

Bonjour à tous
Nous sommes très heureux de vous accueillir dans l'un de nos appartements au coeur de cette magnifique ville qu'est Barcelone. Après avoir travaillés pendant plusieurs années comme directeur des ventes et account manager dans une agence de voyages spécialisées sur internet, Nous avons décidé de gérer nos propres appartements afin de faire profiter de Barcelone à nos hôtes en direct. C'est vraiment plus agréable et nous ne regrettons pas un instant ce choix de vie. Nous espèrons que vous profiterez pleinement de votre séjour dans l'un de ces appartements rigoureusement sélectionné pour vous.

Hola
Estamos encantados de recibirles en unos de nuestros apartamentos en esta increíble ciudad , Barcelona. Después de trabajar años como director en una agencia de viajes online y como account manager, decidímos lanzarnos y gestionar nuestros propios apartamentos. No hay un día que nos arrepentimos de haberlo hecho. Estamos muy contentos de atender nuestros propios huéspedes en estos apartamentos seleccionados para su estancia. Esperamos que disfruten de Barcelona desde unos de estos modernos y cómodos apartamentos.

Un abrazo a todos
A bientôt
Cheers

J'habite Montréal depuis 2010 et j'adore ma ville d'adoption. On y retrouve l'ambiance chaleureuse des capitales européennes sur le plateaux et l'intensité des grandes villes américaines au centre-ville. J'aime le multiculturalisme qui brasse les personnes du monde entier. On peut goûter la cuisine de tous les pays du monde en une seule place.
Lorsque je voyage, j'aime pouvoir découvrir la place ou je vais et vivre à la manière des locaux. C'est ce que je veux offrir aux voyageurs que j'accueil : un endroit agréable, confortable propre et ou on peut passer un bon moment après une intense journée en visite.
Persona responsable que respecta a los demás.

See you soon and safe travels! 

-Mark

Hello, we are Ash and Nanni, we are very nice friends, Brazilians, we are living in Barcelona since 2012 sharing the same apartment.

We are DJ and music producer, we love sports, eating healthily, work, party, learn, friends, arts, movies, cooking, dance, photography, cinema but most of all we love music. We like to talk and we can do in English, Spanish, Italian and Portuguese! We think that we are receptive, open minded and funny. =)

host_about:
Dear:亲爱的你
Hey,好久不见｡我们想和你品一壶好茶,听一首老歌,看一部老片,下一盘棋来一场博弈,玩一玩超级玛丽通关打怪,我们也想和你聊聊旅行的趣事,介绍我们的美食等等等等…
所以…我们设计了它-黑金厂民宿精品酒店,自由､有趣是我们的宗旨,环保､舒适是我们的理念｡
这是我们想赠予你的一份礼物,请注意查收｡

{请点击我的头像查看其他房源噢}

A world traveller. Investment banker by profession, an Airbnb host by passion :-)

Welcome to Hong Kong, such an amazing city! But please be aware of the size of apartments here, thanks to the space constraints and population density. The apartments are way smaller compared with Western standards. It is very common that a family of 4 lives in 250-300 sqft apartments here in HK. 

Once again, thank you for the interest and looking forward to host you soon!   :)

Aloha, 
We are Condominium Rentals Hawaii. We have been managing condo rentals in Hawaii for 35 years now and love welcoming our guests to the islands. We manage over 375 vacation rentals on Maui and Kauai and have been serving AirBNB guests for over 5 years now.

We encourage you to read our 300+ reviews left by AirBNB guests to learn more about our service and condos! 

If you have any questions about surf breaks, golf courses, restaurants, or tours on Maui, we can absolutely help you out. Maui no ka oi!

host_about: I feel privileged to live in such a beautiful country and I love being around nature. Barra da Tijuca, for instance, is a famous beach in the east side of Rio de Janeiro City. host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
My Wife and I are both artists and college professors. My primary medium is photography but I also am a writer and performer. I have lived in NY for nearly 20 years and I relish the moments when I can get away from the frenzy. 

I am not on any social media because I am pretty old fashioned. I still call people on the phone. 

My wife and I have been together for 11 years and are both quiet respectful and clean. We are very self sufficient and more then anything love to cook and enjoy a glass of wine. 

We keep an immaculate apartment with only the most beautiful objects and furniture we can find. We have an amazing art book collection and welcome our guests to enjoy them while they stay.

I live in Istanbul.I have been working upon tourism for six years.I like to visiting other countries which has historical backgrounds. This is the reason behind living in Istanbul. Also I have been to many places in Europe such as London, Italy, Serbian, Croatia, Austria. I like to discovering new places in the world, particularly on the top of nice places for accomodation.

I am retired from Bell Laboratories as Software Engineer and Dorinda is a retired Electrical Engineer.  We love spending time in Kauai in the winter and Colorado in the Summer splitting our time between the two locations.  We bought our first condo in Kauai in 1999 and our second condo in 2005. We enjoy the hiking, water sports, music events and markets on Kauai but most of all we like the people and enjoy meeting up here with our friends.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Casa 48 is situated in the bohemian and colonial district of Santa Teresa, in the centre of Rio de Janeiro. The story began in 2009 when Raphaël and Axel arrived from France to do an exchange program, later Valentin and Clément joined them to take part to the adventure. Step by step, the 4 of us have been improving the house to turn it in a nice 7 bedrooms guesthouse in front of the Sugar Loaf. 

Axel and Valentin are living in the house, Valentin is in charge of receiving you, he will give you the keys of your room and of Rio! Axel is always around and he is an oficial tour guide, you can rely on him to discover Rio from all angles. 

Raphael and Clément live in France, they come often to take part of our new projects and to enjoy Rio. 

We speak english, french, spanish and portuguese, we are in our thirties and we have been experiencing Rio for many years. We are very pleased to make you sharing our passion for this amazing city, we will give you our best tips by day and night so you can really feel the Carioca way of life. 

Axel, Valentin, Raphael, Clément
Soy un chico sociable, agradable y con don de gentes.

Soy Argentino y vengo de la hermosa Patagonia, he vivido en distintos lugares del mundo y hace 10 años que he cumplido el sueño de radicarme en Barcelona, donde tengo un Piso con privilegiadas vistas y una inmejorable ubicación, el cual compàrto ocasionalmente con mas gente, viejos y nuevos amigos y amigas que vienen por unos pocos dias a conocer esta hermosa ciudad o a quedarse por una temporada, Si hay tiempo llegaremos a conocernos un poco, y puedes contar conmigo para lo que necesites
Un saludo!
Jóse
I'm Argentine and I come from the beautiful Patagonia, I have lived in different parts of the world and since last 10 years I have fulfilled the dream of living in Barcelona, where I have an apartment with spectacular views and an unbeatable location, which occasionally I share with more people, old and new friends who come for a few days to explore this beautiful city or stay for a season, if we have time we will get to know a little, will be a pleasure to help you with whatever you need
A greeting!
Jóse

Our ohana (Hawaiian for home) and the general ambiance of this space is the essence of relaxed and peaceful.   It is easy to enjoy the best of any destination, if you meet nice people, see interesting sights (from temples to museums), or simply enjoy the coast, swimming, sunbathing, walking or snorkeling.  
Personally I prefer having every opportunity of meeting people from all walks of life, eating healthy but tastey food, and experiencing culture.  For these reasons me and my ohana live in Hawaii.
We certainly hope that you will share our joy of where we live and enjoy our Aloha :)

Hi my name is Cesim Altan I am from Istanbul, Turkey. I am married and got 3 kids. I love working in this field and I love hosting travellers from around the globe. 

I have been working in Tourism and Hospitality Management field since 27 years. I love this job it is my priority number hobby, passion and part of my life of course. I enjoy working with people from culturally and linguistically diverse background. 

I’ve learnt a lot from my job and met many people from all around the world. Due to this passion I am always happy thus I sleep certainly delighted. 
If you wanna a home away from home you are welcome to stay at my place..

I host Airbnb folks all year-round in our Brooklyn duplex. NYC residents for over ten years, I know the city very well, and I'd be happy to help you make the most of your stay.

CREATIVE FLATS
Le concept est créé en 2000 pour servir une clientèle grandissante
qui cherche à louer des espaces meublés, luxueux et agréables, au design actuel.

Reconnues pour leur sens de l’innovation en matière de design,la propriétaire-fondatrice
Nathalie Bouchard et sa collaboratrice, la directrice artistique-styliste Annie Horth effectuent
une recherche de style et d’authenticité pour chaque résidence. Le talent avec lequel elles
collectionnent les objets et meubles de différents styles et époques, assure que chaque détail
est parfaitement choisi pour l’espace.

L’art, la mode, l’histoire et les voyages, une approche multi-culturelle qui constitue leur
propre vocabulaire.

Un vocabulaire qu’elles déclinent dans ces lieux sophistiqués et contemporains.
Easy going :)

Hello Airbnb Community, 

My name is Carolina and I am... a little bit.... gypsy. I love to travel, to learn new cultures, study languages and people, get to know new people and new ways of living. I am currently living in Hawaii, studying to be a midwife, working as a doula (Angels who help sister deliver babies) and managing a few projects in Rio. So although I visit Rio for 3 months a year, Im based in Hawaii and also get to travel around the globe. 

 I can say I am a people's person and love to make people feel good, from hosting to cooking, to massage, thru teaching yoga... etc. I just love to share the things that make me passionate about life in this world. 

That's why I love to talk about Brazil, travel around Brazil and to share the features of this amazing country I am proud to be from. Brazil is my home and Rio is my heart. I am born and raised in Rio, and have experienced this city in a lot of different ways. Here I have been a Law student with long downtown areas and party scenes at night, I've been a nature seeker with long trail/nature hours and good sleep at night, I've been an artist with long days dancing and knowing the theatre/circus scene, I explored Rio as total tourist living in a hostel, and now I have been exploring it while working with education as a citizen and cultural productor. I grow up and its seems that Rio grows up with me. Its always different and better, everytime I come home.

When I travel, I like to feel like I am from there. I like to feel like I am doing what the locals do, feel that I am interacting with the place and its people in its fullest, and so I am a very open traveler. When I host, I like to understand peoples needs, a person who comes to Rio for a bussiness journey, will have different expectations of a person who is traveling for tourism. Or a person who is traveling with family, thinks different than someone who wants to enjoy the party scene in Rio, etc. So, I do love to hear from you, and I will do my best to accommodate your needs. 

Since I don't live full time in Brazil, and because together we can reach places we could never reach alone, I have lovely a co-host who helps me with this. Together we want to create unique ways for our guests to feel welcome.

That's why, we want to hear from you, your opinion is very important to us on this new journey. Our ideal is that the world can be only one, we are one and can live likewise, with love. A big community of people that altogether we can do beautiful things for ourselves, our community, our planet. We want to show love to people, and part of it, we will do by hosting you on the best way we can. 

What is your ideal? How can you feel home? What are things that could improve your experience in a new country? How do you like to meet people? What are your intentions with your trip? If you could choose something, anything, that would make your trip the most memorable, what would you envision? 

Love,

Carolina

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------







Olá Comunidade Airbnb,

Meu nome é Carolina, e eu sou... um poquinho... "cigana". Eu amo viajar, conhecer culturas diferentes, estudar linguas e pessoas, entender e conhecer pessoas e novas formas de viver.

No momento, me encontro no Havai, estudando para ser Parteira, trabalhando como Doula (Anjinhas que ajudam mulheres a dar a luz.) e gerenciando alguns projetos no Rio. Eu moro no Rio metade do ano, uma outra parte no Havai e alguns meses consigo viajar, quando meus desejos sao realizados. 

Eu posso dizer que sou uma "pessoa de pessoas", porque gosto de fazer pessoas se sentirem bem. De hospedar, a cozinhar, massagens, professora de yoga, etc. Eu simplesmente amo dividir com pessoas todas as coisas lindas que me fazem ser apaixonada pela vida nesse mundo. 

Por isso eu amo falar sobre o Brasil, viajar pelo Brasil e poder dividir essas experiencias por esse pais maravilhoso, o qual tenho orgulho de ter nascido em. O Brasil é minha casa, e o Rio meu coração. Aqui ja vivi diversas fases e conheço cenas diferentes. Desde de uma estudante de Direito com longas horas pelo centro, e conhecendo as festas de noite, á uma naturalista com longas horas no mato e em trilhas e dormindo muito a noite, á artista com longas horas de dança, teatro e circo, já fui turista por completo morando em um hostel, e agora tenho explorado o Rio com projetos pessoais, trabalhando em educaçao e as vezes produtora cultural. Eu vou crescendo e parece que o Rio cresce comigo, é sempre diferente e melhor quando volto pra casa. 

Quando viajo, gosto de sentir que "sou de lá". Gosto de viver a cultura e interagir com os lugares e pessoas ao maximo. Por isso, sou uma viajante muito aberta a experiencias. Quando hospedo, gosto de entender as necessidades pessoais de cada um, uma pessoa que procura meu apartamento para uma viagem de negocios, tem expectativas diferentes de alguem que veio á turismo. Pessoas viajando com familia, tem planos diferentes daqueles que vieram a procura da festa perfeita ou etc. Logo, eu gosto de escutar voces, e entender as suas necessidades, vou fazer o meu melhor para acomoda-las. 

Como não moro constantemente no Brasil, e como juntos chegaremos aonde jamais conseguiriamos chegar sozinhos, conto com a ajuda da minha Co-Anfitria. Juntas  nos queremos que os nossos hospedes se sintam em casa, o maximo possivel, queremos inovar e trazer experiencias lindas e diferentes pros nossos hospedes.

Por isso, queremos escutar voces. A sua opiniao é muito importante pra a gente nessa nova jornada.  Nosso ideal é que o mundo é só um. Somos todos um, e podemos viver assim, com amor. Uma enorme comunidade de pessoas que juntos, podemos construir coisas linda pra nós, nossa comunidade e nosso planeta. Queremos distribuir amor para as pessoas, e parte disso fazemos quando hospedamos nossos hospedes da melhor maneira que podemos. 

Qual é o seu ideal? Como você se sente em casa? Que coisas poderiam melhorar a sua estadia em um pais diferente, ou em uma cidade? Como você gosta de conhecer pessoas novas? Quais são suas intenções nessa viagem? Se você pudesse idelizar alguma coisa, qualquer coisa, que faria sua viagem inesquecivel, qual seria sua visão? 


Amor,
Carolina

We are from Barcelona, Spain, and Dallas, TX.

Hi, I’m Luis, born and bred in Porto and a true tripeiro (the nickname given to the people of Porto who, during the Discoveries in the 15th century, gave the ships sailing off to the New Worlds all the best meat, and kept only the tripe for themselves). That means we love our city and are very proud of it, perhaps especially its football team – the best in Portugal! It’s also evidence of how friendly and hospitable we are, and I’ll do my best to make your visit to Porto really enjoyable. Advice on where to go, the hidden gems that most tourists never get to see, the best places to eat, the best bargains and ways of getting around on a budget – just ask.

I used to live in this apartment, but when my daughter was born, 10 years ago, I moved around the corner. That means I’m readily available to help all I can – it’s what I do for a living, so you’re sure to get my undivided attention.

I may have lived in Porto all my life, but I’ve also travelled a fair bit, to the United States, to Asia and, of course, to other parts of Europe, so I understand what travellers need, and will always do my best to make your stay go smoothly.

Somos Stefanie y Joan y nos gusta viajar por el mundo. Joan nació en Barcelona y Stefanie es de Alemania. Cada vez que visitamos Barcelona, ​​disfrutamos mucho de nuestra estancia allí. Bonitas playas, un montón de ocio y cultura y muchas cosas que ver. En caso de que quieras reservar el apartamento estaremos ahí para darte un consejo de la ciudad y las llaves de este recién reformado piso con una excelente ubicación, cerca del Parque Güell.

Está situado cerca de barrio de Gracia (a 10 minutos) y tiene todo lo necesario para disfrutar de la estancia ... incluyendo las mejores vistas de la ciudad y el mar.

¡Disfruta de Barcelona!

Parlons voyage :) !! Voyager est pour moi la meilleure façon de s'enrichir, de se découvrir et de s'inspirer ! host_location: Hong Kong / London, Manchester, Oxford / Vancouver, Toronto / New York
host_about:
Hello everyone and an advance welcome to Hong Kong. I love to travel, explore and meet people around the world. Airbnb allows me to achieve all that and when I don't have time for work, I love to host, so I can continue to meet people. I turn my guests to friends, so I know the key ingredients of a perfect stay. I am looking for guests who are friendly, easy going and respectful.

Your safety, security and comfort are my top priorities, so once your reservation is accepted; rest assured, you are in the safest hands. I treat my guests like long lost friends, so expect a warm welcome from me when you check in.

I respect religious freedom; however, my place will not cater for any special religious worship or practices. I will also not cater any rude guests, guests with hotel expectations and guests who do not agree with my house rules. Thank you for reading and we wish you all a safe and pleasant trip ahead.

Looking for a perfect stay with a host that understands your needs? 

Welcome to Loftel and Simplissimmo, Montreal based companies established over 10 years ago, that are operated by young and motivated team with a strong and valuable hospitality experience. 

We manage more than 200 properties and are fully dedicated to make every client’s stay unique and memorable. We’re always there to help, answer questions and provide the best services. So don’t hesitate and go ahead, and challenge us :)
Female , 33 years old

We have lived in Sydney for 14 years, started our family here and live happily in the Eastern Suburbs. We have 3 girls and enjoy our beachside suburb lifestyle. We love eating out, the beautiful walks and our little dog.

G'day, I'm Duncan.
I'm in my 30's, Australian and work in the Maritime Industry.
I've travelled all over NSW by motorcycle, been to every state in Australia and OS a few times. I've also done a few good camping trips around NSW by car.
Originally from rural Australia, I made Sydney City my home roughly 15yrs ago. 
In the past, I spent a lot of time interstate staying in hotels for work and know how monotonous it can become. 
There's nothing quite like coming "home" to a real kitchen, lounge room, bathroom & bedroom when you're indeed away from your normal residence.
My experience hosting has been great! 
If you're looking for somewhere clean that has everything you need with someone who can give you a few good traveling tips, look no further.

英語が苦手､ﾀﾞﾒな方もご心配いりません､お気軽にご連絡下さい｡

ただ一つ､予約後はair bnbのｱﾌﾟﾘの更新をした上で操作の確認をすることを忘れないで下さい｡予約ﾍﾟｰｼﾞの閲覧の仕方が頻繁にｱｯﾌﾟｸﾞﾚｰﾄﾞしています｡

空港から私のｱﾊﾟｰﾄまでの位置確認､下記参考にして下さい｡

•ｻﾞﾊﾞｽ(市ﾊﾞｽ)
$2ﾄﾞﾙ75ｾﾝﾄ､(十九､二十番)で乗り換え無し､約1時間でｱﾊﾟｰﾄに到着です｡
ﾊﾞｽ内にお釣りはないのでご自身で用意するのをお忘れなく｡
大きなｽｰﾂｹｰｽをお持ちの方は乗車出来ませんが､機内持ち込みｻｲｽﾞで来られる方はﾊﾞｽで来れたら格安です!ﾊﾞｽは寒いので上着必須｡

空港発ｱﾊﾟｰﾄ行き
(7:00-8:30に乗車の場合)
ｱﾊﾟｰﾄ前発 空港行き 
(15:30-18:00に乗車の場合)
途中通勤ﾗｯｼｭに巻き込まれるので確実に1時間以上はかかります｡私もこの時間は運転しないように気をつけています｡


空港発ｱﾊﾟｰﾄ行き降車地点
 "Kuhio Ave and launiu street" 
ｸﾋｵｱﾍﾞﾆｭｰ ｱﾝﾄﾞ ﾗｳﾆｳｽﾄﾘｰﾄ (ﾘｯﾂｶｰﾙﾄﾝ目の前)
運転手にﾘｯﾂｶｰﾙﾄﾝに行きたいと伝えたらｽﾑｰｽﾞです｡目の前のﾊﾞｽ停で降りて下さい｡

ｱﾊﾟｰﾄ発空港行き
"Kuhio Ave and Launiu street"
同じくﾘｯﾂｶｰﾙﾄﾝの道を挟んだ向かいにﾊﾞｽ停が設置されています｡だいたいﾊﾞｽ停は登り､下り､道を挟んで対に設置してあります｡

ﾊﾞｽ停から歩いて30秒でｱﾊﾟｰﾄ発見､到着!ﾊﾞｽに乗り慣れていない方も一度試してみてはいかがでしょう~｡

ﾊﾞｽを降りてﾋﾟﾝｸの3､4階建の建物(個人的には一番の目印にしております)が見えたら､その角がﾗｳﾆｳ ｽﾄﾘｰﾄです｡必ず分かります｡
ﾊﾞｽ道を背に一軒先に行った左手にあるのがこの建物 414 launiu streetです｡

•ﾀｸｼｰ
荷物の積み下ろしやﾁｯﾌﾟだのでだいたい30分かかります｡ﾁｯﾌﾟ入れて$35-$40が目安でしょう｡

•ｼｬﾄﾙﾊﾞｽ
$17くらい｡
ﾜｲｷｷ行きはﾎﾃﾙで降りなければいけないことがおおいのでその際に､ﾎﾘﾃﾞｰｲﾝﾜｲｷｷｴｸｽﾌﾟﾚｽがｸﾞﾚｰﾄﾞ的にも降りても差し支えなさそうなﾎﾃﾙ(個人的意見)｡3分くらいでｱﾊﾟｰﾄに着きます｡もしくはｺﾝﾄﾞﾃﾙのﾌｫｰﾊﾟﾄﾞﾙはｱﾊﾟｰﾄの真向かいなので､停まってくれるならとても便利)

•ｳｰﾊﾞｰ､ﾘﾌﾄ
$21からと記載されています｡(変わっている可能性あり)
ｱﾌﾟﾘにどこで拾ってもらうか記載してあるので必ずその位置へお進み下さい｡
空港にはﾙｰﾙがあり､その位置に行けない場合はお迎えは断られます｡

I have been living above Kealakekua Bay on the Kona Coast of Hawaii's Big Island since 1994. I live on Iand I developed and named Tara Farm, where I grow Kona coffee, ulu (breadfruit) and white pineapple among other fruits. 
This property is also the site of beautiful Tara Cottage. 
 I was born and raised in the Washington, D.C. area, moving to San Francisco  in 1978 to take the job of Audiologist for Alameda County; and later Director of Audiology for the Hearing Society in San Francisco. After 13 years in the SF Bay Area I moved to Kauai in 1991 and hosted a  B&B there for 3 years. The move to the Big Island followed in 1994 where I managed another beautiful B&B near Kealakekua Bay while developing my property and building Tara Cottage upslope at its  950 ft elevation. I moved onto the property full-time in 1998 and have been privileged to live here ever since.
My interests include swimming and snorkeling, playing the piano, cinema, reading and traveling.
I am from Catalunya and I have experience already in hosting, will love to list my rooms.

Sou  Assistente Social, trabalho numa Câmara Municipal nos arredores próximos do Porto.
Atenta aos problemas sociais, fundei e sou sócia n.o1 de uma Associação de Solidariedade sem fins lucrativos, de apoio a grávidas, mães adolescentes e seus bebés, tendo uma Casa de Acolhimento onde recebemos essas mães com os seus bebés e lhes ensinamos as competências necessárias para que possam criar estrutura emocional e pessoal para saberem cuidar dos seus filhos, trabalhando-as para a autonomia de vida futura. Temos ainda uma Creche, um Centro de Estudos e um Gabinete de Apoio à Integração de imigrantes. Para mais informações ver (Website hidden by Airbnb) ou no (Hidden by Airbnb) - Socialis Ipss.
Gosto de viajar para conhecer a cultura e tradições do país, para além das curiosidades e gastronomia. Sou sociável,de confiança e gosto de ambientes tranquilos, limpos e acolhedores. Gosto pelo conhecimento; àvida em apreender novas culturas, absorver as características inatas da região que visito, pois tento aproveitar o tempo, de forma a tirar o melhor proveito e conhecer o máximo de locais; até porque sempre penso que posso não voltar ao mesmo local! Gosto de viver com qualidade e respeitar o outro.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about: carioca da gema, mother of two, love for travel.

Hello! 

I´m a very active AirBnB user, both as a hostess and a guest, so that allows me to (try to) be a good guest and a good hostess.  

My job has the advantage that some days I work from home, and some days I travel for work. Even though I enjoy my home greatly, I really like the idea of spending time in other places, particularly if they are warmer! 

I have two dogs I love very much. Sadly for you, they are not included with the apartment... :) I take them with me everywhere I can so you may get to meet them if you host us. They behave even better than me, but they´re hairier. But then again, I clean after them constantly, so we´re the perfect team. You must know, I´m particularly clean. OK, fine, I´m a clean freak. But I suppose it´s a good quality for a hostess, let alone for a guest! 

I spend most of my time outdoors, whether it´s exploring new and old territories, or in my backyard, which I enjoy immensely. I try to make my home a comfortable, warm and cheery place, where I can concentrate on my work during the day and a good book in the evenings. And when I feel like people-watching, giving my stove a break or enjoying the hustle and bustle of the city, I just have to turn around the corner and voilà! Everything is within walking distance. 

I consider myself a lively person, but I need my peace and quiet at home. And I´m a light sleeper so I am looking to host guests who look for a quiet spot to recover after exploring the city. And as a guest, I look for quiet spots as well, as I usually travel for work and I need to sleep well before and after a long day. 

Airbnb is made up of very different individuals and places, therefore communication, consideration and courtesy are key, and I hope you will find that in me.

Happy travels, everyone.
