Hi, I am a semi retired childcare educator of 25 years. I am now offering room rental accommodation in my home to guest who are looking for a "Home Away from Home" type of accommodation. My home is a quiet beautiful sunny and spacious stone brick triples building. My homestay residence is located within 10 minutes walking distance to the new MUHC Hospital and Vendome Metro Station.

I have hosted international students through schools and universities, as well as vacationers/backpackers, professionals and interns who comes to our lovely city to attend busines seminars and completing of their internships.

I am also vibrant outgoing person with a great sence of humor. I thorougly enjoy travelling and meeting people who are open minded, and respectful. I also enjoy learning and experienceing other culture, such as the food...hmmmmmlol! history, sightseeing, dancing, cooking, shopping and going to the movies and attending cultural events.. I have travelled  extensively throughout Europe and the Caribbean and the USA and thoroughly enjoy doing so. I also enjoy sharing my Caribbean culture as well.
My Homestay offers guest a bit of independence as the rooms are all located on the top floor and has a separate entrance leading to the 2 top floor, and Myself as the host resides exclusively on the main floor and are available to offer assistance should the need occur.

As for things that I can't live without hmm, I have to admit I have not given this much though. All I can say is that I can adapt easily to changes. How did our ancestors survived? We are here aren't we?:)

My life motto is: Cry a little! Laugh a lot! Live life the best way you can always!!  Come and visit with us! You too will enjoy your stay!

Cheers!!!:)

I live alone, so you will be sharing the apartment with me. This is one of the most popular regions in the city, 5 minutes away from Bebek and 15 minutes from the heart of the city (Taksim Square). The apartment is near the bosphorus where the summer nights are full of joy and peace. Within 2 min on foot you can reach the seaside.

I have two bedrooms for the guests. Each has a double bed and enough space to store your luggage. Fresh towels and bed sheets will be provided. My guests are welcome to use the kitchen and relax on the sofa in the living room. This is a comfortable place to stay and rest in Istanbul.

There are public transports from both airports which take you to the city center. From there you can take the bus to get to my place.

For detailed information please send me a message.

Cheers.

host_location: Yau Tsim Mong District, Kowloon, Hong Kong
host_about:
Hello everyone on Airbnb! My goal is to have my footprints in all the countries in the world. (How big a goal it is!) I have been to Australia, the UK, Italy, France, Monaco, Holland, Hungary and Korea for travelling, and to the US, China, Taiwan, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand and Cambodia mainly for work. I lived in China, Thailand and Mexico for years and now living in my hometown Hong Kong. I enjoy every single moment travelling from one place to another. It's the best time for me to overlook the world and to empty my mind. It is said that the world is becoming smaller and smaller. We are on the southern hemisphere in the morning and appear on the northern in just some hours. The best way for me to feel home anywhere is to meet local people! I listen to their stories and learn their cultures, respect their traditions and share mine with them. This is what travelling means to me.

Thanks to Airbnb, it provides a platform for people to meet friends and look for accommodation at reasonable price. Star-rated hotels are great, but local hosts can give you warm welcome and make you feel home.

I have years of experience hosting foreign guests through couhcsrufnig (CS), but stopped hosting since 2 years ago. After I returned from Mexico to Hong Kong in 2014 to start this hotel business, I found that airbnb is one of the best platforms which combines couhcsrufnig and business into one. Look forward to seeing you, my new friend!

My name is Anna Irish Price and, along with my husband Russell, am the proud owner of this villa. We are in the corporate aviation business and that requires us to live overseas and travel for work extensively. After several years of Asian living, we are currently located in the Middle East  (so we really enjoy the tropical lushness of Hawaii!). When we are on our downtime, we are either checking off our "bucket list" of worldwide places to explore, visiting family in New England or relaxing in the Big Island's embrace, where we enjoy the Aloha spirit and much of the Hawaiian culture. While Hawaii can bring many exciting experiences, being in Hawaii gives us a peaceful, relaxing and rejuvenating feeling that few other places in the world can offer, and our villa also adds the feel of Balinese serenity.

The Big Island has a special place in our hearts, as this was where we were married. This is the place that makes us the happiest, so we decided to finally own a piece of this paradise. We want a place to come home to and to call our very own.

In the meantime, we are sharing this home now with our family, our friends and our guests. 

We enjoy our visits to our villa. We are confident you will, too, and I pledge to assist you to make your dream vacation a reality.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Hi and welcome to your apartment in Rio.  

I love to travel and to meet new people.  Hosting through Airbnb has allowed me to to do both.  

On my free time I like spend time with family and friends, travel and read - biographies and art are my favorite topics,   I also love history, interior decoration and photography.  Lately I have had a growing interest in reading about natural food and natural healing through meditation and yoga.  So I have been spending a lot of time cooking and attending to my herb garden.

I have lived most of my life in Rio. so I know the city well.   Since the 80´s, when I came back from a small liberal arts college in the US where I majored in History and Political Science, I started hosting friends vacationing  in Rio.  I have started hosting visitors from college  every year.   Some were coming for the first time, others came every other year.   This experience has enabled me to see the city through the eyes of new comers.  

It will be a plesasure to host you in RIO.

Llevo una vida tranquila y me gusta viajar sin grandes lujos para conocer tantos sitios nuevos como sea posible.  
El haber viajado me ha hecho descubrir esas pequeñas cosas que te hacen sentir cómodo cuando estás fuera de casa.
Me encanta conocer gente de otros países, compartir experiencias y de paso practicar el inglés.
Siempre que puedo participo en cualquier actividad propuesta por Airbnb o los miembros de su comunidad en Barcelona.
Un par de datos más sobre mi: Me encantan los perros y disfruto cantando en coros de música gospel.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about: “Happiness comes of the capacity to feel deeply, to enjoy simply, to think freely, to risk life, to be needed.”  Storm Jameson

We are a young, romantic and fun loving  couple with an optimistic vision of the World and life itself.  We have lived in Barcelona for more than 7 years.  We believe in people...we believe in destiny...

Ernesto:  I cannot live without sun, without hopes, without Sonia nor her potato salad.  One of my favorite destinations is Punta Sal in the North of Honduras… a mixture of jungle, delicious white sand and the light turquoise sea.
Amongst my favorite books are: Treasure Island and Top of the World.  I love reggae!!!
Sonia: I cannot live without the sea, music…not without dreams nor seafood!!  I´m a passionate reader and love to try new things, food and experiences at least once…!

Our Casita del Mar is a mixture of vibrant colors in which as soon as you come in your entire self will become full of positive vibrations.

"Happiness is a journey...not a destination…"

********
Somos una pareja joven, romantica y soñadora con una visión optimista de Mundo y de la vida.  Hemos vivido en Barcelona por más de 7 años.  Creemos en las personas...creemos en el destino...

Ernesto: No puedo vivir sin el sol, sin ilusiones, sin Sonia ni su ensalada de patatas. Uno de mis destinos favoritos es Punta Sal en el norte de Honduras. Una mezcla entre jungla y deliciosa arena blanca y mar azul turquesa. 
Entre mis libros favoritos están La Isla del Tesoro o El País de las Sombras Largas. Me encanta el REGGAE.
Sonia: No puedo vivir sin el mar, sin música, sin sueños y sin mariscos!!! Soy una ávida lectora y me encanta probar nuevas cosas, comida y experiencias por lo menos alguna vez en mi vida.

Nuestra Casita del Mar es una mezcla de colores que en cuanto entrés por la puerta te llenarás de pura positivad!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
INTERNATIONAL REPUTATION

Latin Exclusive has been recognized internationally in the media for our unmatched quality of service and our stunning selection of properties. We have won awards and acclaim from the media as well as the endorsements of our exclusive clientele. When you choose Latin Exclusive, you are choosing the company with the best reputation and a history of outstanding results in Rio de Janeiro.

UNRIVALED SELECTION OF PROPERTIES

We pride ourselves on having the most luxurious properties in Latin America. Our expansive network of local connections and the personal relationships we have built with our partners over the years has given us access to properties that no other company can match. Our exclusive portfolio makes us the only company capable of delivering the quality of results that the world’s most discerning clientele expect.

BEST SERVICE AND SUPPORT STAFF

Latin Exclusive has recruited the best talent from around the world. Our reliable, efficient, international team can provide service in English, Portuguese, Spanish, French, Italian, German and Russian. Latin Exclusive is the only real estate company in Rio de Janeiro and in Bogota with its own in-house staff team of maintenance and professionals dedicated to keeping our properties working perfectly for you.  With a full team of handpicked service and support staff you have the security of knowing our team is ready to support your every need during your stay with us.

CHOICE OF THE WORLDS’ ELITE

We are the only company in Rio de Janeiro, Cartagena de Indias and in Bogota to offer properties and services, which provide the quality of 5 star hotels with the privacy of your own home. We are the choice of tourist, executives, diplomats and international celebrities when they come to Latin America. We are the only company with the patronage of such exclusive clientele.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Hi, 
These are Shushma e Nityam - Nityam is my son and together we manage quite a few properties in Rio.

I was named Shushma by my Spiritual teacher, Satyaprem, and this is how I wish to be called. My previous name was Lakini and for sometime you will still see reviews for my old name.
Nityam is my son and his name was also given by our teacher Satyaprem.

We live in Rio de Janeiro and we love this city!

Rio is a wonderful place to be, the nature, the beaches, bars, restaurants, the "carioca's" laid back style, the music, the dance , there is so much charm to it!!

We are advertising a few places here at AirBnB, so people can come and stay  in Rio according to their personal preferences, demands, needs and naturally to their own budgets.

Get in touch with us and our agency, Hot Spot Homes and we will do our best to help you find the right accommodation whether it is for your family, friends or other travel companions.

Airport pick ups, tour guides, house cleaning and babysitting can be arranged upon previous requirement at additional cost.

We are into meditation, healthy lifestyle, Arts and Traveling.
Nityam is a photographer and gymnast.

At work we enjoy making sure you get a nice, comfy and clean place to stay, we love welcoming people to our city and to our country. 
If you book one of our Hot Spots you will receive a list of suggestions of places to visit and tips how to make the most of your trip in Rio. 
We love decoration and providing a homy atmosphere to wherever we go.
Looking forward to be your next hosts in Rio ;)

Thank you!

Warm regards,

Shushma and Nityam



Dear guests, 

Please, make sure you get the correct rates for Special seasons, holidays and special events in town. Sometimes the rates may not be updated in some of the apartments, so please, inquire first.
NOTE: rates vary according to the different seasons.

Bank Holidays, New Year's, Carnival, summer days and Olympics have special rates. 
Please, keep this in mind!

Please, inquire before sending reservation requests. This is very important. Most apartments are being advertised on other sites too, unfortunately we do not have a tool to keep all the dates updated in all of them.

I will be glad to help you find the best suited location for you, your travel companions and family.

Warm regards from Rio de Janeiro,

Shushma

We are both from the mid west and bring strong values and genuine hospitality. Friendly, outgoing, and resourceful so our guests feel welcomed and appreciated.

I am an easy going friendly gay guy. I love the beach, travel and keeping fit. I have traveled all over the world with my work and enjoy hanging out with other well traveled souls. 

I like to live in a clean environment and enjoy hosting people. I am happy to share my inside tips on Sydney and the Eastern suburbs or I can leave you to your own devices if you prefer your privacy. I have a great 'welcome to Sydney' itinerary for those want to be wow'd by my beautiful home city.

nice and friendly brothers who love meet people from different countries. 
we will do our best to make guests feel as at home
we love travel

host_location: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
host_about:
I'm originally from Kent, in the southeast of England, and have been living abroad for 6 years now - including in New York and most recently the great city of Washington DC!

I'm in my mid-30s and work in international development. AirBnB has been part of my life for some time now, and I am looking forward to hosting some wonderful people at my new house.

I take pride in providing you with a great environment for your stay, and sharing some local info at the same time.

For people who meet me for the first time, I usually look cold and cocky. Actually I consider myself quite fun and caring most of the time but you have to get to know me a little until you see these features:)
I also think that I respect other people's personal space and need of privacy, which are the basic elements in personal relationships.
I have travelled to a few countries so far and my favorite destination was Hamburg. It's such a dynamic and alive city. I could actually live there:)
I'm a positive person who likes to travel and listening music a lot.

Hi there!
My name is Irem. 
I love to travel, to discover new places and to meet new people.
I will be glad hosting you on your trip to magical Istanbul...
Luxury furnished accommodations provider for extended stay requirements

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: Young professional working in interior design.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Moro em um lugar lindo, amo abrir minha janela e ver o Pão de Açucar e a Baia de Guanabara, onde o sol nasce formando um cenário de tirar o folego.
Gosto da natureza e suas belezas e quero muito dividir isso com outras pessoas, Gosto de Hospedar e dividir conhecimento e cultura. Já viajei para varios lugares do Brasil amo esse pais. Sou alegre, comunicativa, organizada, gosto de manter a casa limpa e gosto de interagir com as pessoas. Posso indicar lugares lindos para se conhecer no Rio, já que trabalhei com turismo. Estou aberta a negociação de preços. Sou tranquila e calma. E gosto de viver em paz.

Living in the Inner City suburb of Sydney. Sydney's inner city suburbs are surrounded by cafe cultures. Love eating and living in the inner city buzz without living right in the middle of the city either. My fave cafés and restaurants are in Newtown, Enmore, Leichhardt and Surry Hills! 

I love to travel to eat and shop. I have travelled around Europe staying with many "Airbnb" accommodation so understand the importance of being a good host. Plus I do genuinely enjoy giving advice to guests. It is also a very rewarding feeling when I hear my guests having a good time because of my advice. :)  However, my husband and I do lead incredibly busy lives and because we lead such busy lives, when we do have downtime, we love to have a chat with our guests, catch up for supper etc to wind-down. We have gained friends through hosting and I do believe that hosting is like "hosting my friends that I haven't met yet!" I treat all my guests like I would my longtime friends so I do hope my guests treat me back the same way by being polite and respectful of my house.

When I am a Guest at an Airbnb accommodation, I will always treat the house like it is my own and respect it. And when I am a Host, I will try to add a personal touch by personalising the experience to each individual that visits as I know each individual guest is different.

My life motto? "Treat others the way you would like to be treated"

I am a Financial and an tax advisor, lived in the Usa for over 9 years. moved back to Turkey couple years ago. 
My motto, while you stay at my place to have a perfect time, and enjoy İstanbul without any hassle.

Hello Everyone
We are very please to welcome you in one of our apartments in the amazing and wonderful Barcelona.
After working many years as sales director and account manager in a travel agency we decided to manage our own apartments and take care of our own guests. We really appreciate this new life.
We hope you will enjoy your stay in one of our apartments, selected carefully for you...

Bonjour à tous
Nous sommes très heureux de vous accueillir dans l'un de nos appartements au coeur de cette magnifique ville qu'est Barcelone. Après avoir travaillés pendant plusieurs années comme directeur des ventes et account manager dans une agence de voyages spécialisées sur internet, Nous avons décidé de gérer nos propres appartements afin de faire profiter de Barcelone à nos hôtes en direct. C'est vraiment plus agréable et nous ne regrettons pas un instant ce choix de vie. Nous espèrons que vous profiterez pleinement de votre séjour dans l'un de ces appartements rigoureusement sélectionné pour vous.

Hola
Estamos encantados de recibirles en unos de nuestros apartamentos en esta increíble ciudad , Barcelona. Después de trabajar años como director en una agencia de viajes online y como account manager, decidímos lanzarnos y gestionar nuestros propios apartamentos. No hay un día que nos arrepentimos de haberlo hecho. Estamos muy contentos de atender nuestros propios huéspedes en estos apartamentos seleccionados para su estancia. Esperamos que disfruten de Barcelona desde unos de estos modernos y cómodos apartamentos.

Un abrazo a todos
A bientôt
Cheers
Carioca

I love Hong Kong.

Hi my name is Tam, Australian, Thai background who works professionally in cancer therapy field. I am a very easy going and respectful. Whenever I am free I like to watch movies, listen to music, go to gym and just simply catch up with friends for lunch or dinner .. not party often as I used to :-)

My personality trait is shy but I enjoy getting to know new people to broaden my friend networks. I highly value respect and honesty and it think it is a general thing that everyone should be. Personally I am very clean and tidy and expect the same when I have a guess over :-) If you have any questions about myself please feel free to ask :-)

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: A journalist based between NYC, Oxford, and the Caucasus.

Frustrado aficionado al golf, sigue disfrutando de juegos como MW o PES. Compartir el tiempo con mis amigos en situaciones similares a los hermanos Marx es la tónica

Resolver cualquier tipo de incidencia, mejorar el día a día de la empresa es mi principal objetivo.

Aloha, If your reading this it means you decided to stay in my beautiful Hale (home in Hawaiian). My property manager Martin has been the one who has been answering your questions and in communication with you.  He takes care of my home and bookings while I am away at sea for work.  It is strange to write about myself but here goes.   I am a bit of everything, but at heart I'm a sailor. By being a sailor I can do the things that I love the most. I like to travel the world on my time off. To see, smell, feel and experience what I don't know and sometimes don't understand .  I am an avid reader and a complete science fiction freak, I actually subscribe to sci fi/fantasy magazine. Reading is my zen to chill and relax. I love exotic and different food while drinking yummy wine.  It helps loving the outdoors because I can burn off what I eat. I enjoy, hiking, camping, surfing, snorkeling, diving. Anything that is on or surrounded by ocean or forest makes me happiest.  I make friends easily and love spending time with cool and interesting people.  What drives me, is moving forward and always learning something new.  "you can never cross the ocean unless you have courage to lose sight of the shore."
We love helping travelers plan their vacations!

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: I'm an entrepreneur and attorney based in New York. I spend a lot of time abroad -- normally several months every year -- and love to share my neighborhood with other travelers from around the world. Please send me a message if you have any questions!

Born and raised on O'ahu Hawai'i and spend much time between home and San Francisco, California.

Ho'okipa (hospitality) has been a part of my family and culture since the beginning.  I pride myself on sharing my ike (knowledge) of my islands whether it's our culture, history, the land or the ocean.

Hi, my name is Maria and I'm from Porto.
I like to travel and go for long walks in my beloved city.

Aloha! My husband Duke and I run an online business. We have two beautiful children. We love to travel (whenever we can), eat, and revel in great company.  

We purchased this condo so that our family can enjoy a piece of paradise. Although we'd love to live in Hawaii, we call Huntington Beach, California our home.  We take great pride in creating a memorable experience for our guests.  We hope you will find our condo your home away from home.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I've lived in NYC for 15 years and have worked in Advertising over the last 10. I spent a great deal of my early years working on big broadway shows, and enjoy New York's wonderful theatre and art scene.  

I enjoy learning about culture, I'm deeply inspired by Asia, and am well traveled.  I spent over a year living in Hawaii, several months in Taiwan, 6 months studying in Paris, and  I use to work for a School based out of Sweden and have spent a great deal of time there as well.  I love the world and I enjoy getting to know new parts through the people I share my home with.

I head into work every morning around 9AM and come back to the Apt around 6PM each night.  I like to bike there each day if i can, and try to do a 6 mile run every night after work.  I'm active and love NYC and the waterfront.  I spend most of my free time just running, walking, or playing in the river parks by my house.

host_location: Kingston upon Thames, England, United Kingdom
host_about: 21 year old Graphic Designer and Photographer studying in London, originally from Ireland. Looking to spend my summer in New York with some relaxed and easy going people. Hoping to get a part time job, along with some internships/ placements at studios to keep me occupied during the day.

Aloha! 

My wife and I were born and raised in California, fell in love with the aloha spirit of the islands and moved to Hawaii to raise our two precious children. We are so happy to open our vacation home to visitors and share our little slice of paradise!
) I will always try to meet your expectation and even go beyond the expectation of your stay. If you have suggestions for me, please let me know! 
Some great features I have are due to the inspirations of other guests that stayed with me and had interesting ideas. So please don't hesitate to let me know your thoughts. Feel free to communicate with me! 
Aloha - Hope to see you soon, Glen

Hi there,

My name is Enrique and I am a Barcelona Local. I have always loved traveling myself, but also sharing the beauty and wonders of Barcelona with others, so a few years ago I started renting out 2 apartments to travelers coming to the city, always meeting everyone in person so I could share my insights and hidden secrets about Barcelona :)

Now I rent out a few more apartments and it is no longer just me, but we are a small team of people managing the apartments together, but with the same focus on personal and attentive services in authentic apartments that allow for the genuine Barcelona feel for your trip! We call our little team Stay U-nique, because of this focus on a unique feeling when staying with us.

If you have any questions, want to hear about an apartment or just say hi, don´t hesitate to reach out :)

Have a great day!
Enrique

host_about: I am a filmmaker and my husband is a retired journalist.  We love New York but we also love to travel.  I lived in Italy for 6 years working on feature films and traveled all over Europe, the Middle East, Asia and later Latin America where I made several ethnographic films.  I met lots of great people and hope to continue doing so now.  Our daughter now lives in Vermont  so we have an extra bedroom.  We still travel "low budget" because I think that is more fun! I speak Italian, French and Spanish and my husband tries!  We have a big house upstate New York and spend a lot of time there gardening and farming.

I do need to say that you are lookıng into Galata which is one of the best oldest neighborhoods of Istanbul, and important cultural center for local people and foreigners that located at the North of the Golden Horn, towards Taksim Squere that includes Pera and Beyoglu. I want to let you know about myself, my job and my home studio. Firstly,  I was born in Bursa, Turkey in 1979. I have been living in Istanbul for 15 years. I have got my Bachelor Degree in Istanbul, Bilgi University, department of  Photography and Video (P.O.V.). As you see I am really interested in art and I love creating. I do my job freelance, because I belive that I need to feel free to create more and express better. I have had my own studio before I have decided to have my own home-studio. Now, I do not only love working and living here becouse of the location, but also because of the atmosphere of my place. I mean there are beautiful old houses , buildings, cafes, museums, galleries, historical places, all kinds of restaurants and all kinds of transportations options. Further more, it really helps me to  let go of anxiety, stress and feel more confortable, that is peacefull and relaxing. For instance I am able to listen loudly music whenever I would like, or I do not hear any other’s in here.  Lastly, at these days, I am planning to be a part of one art collective or collaborate with some young artists . If you like, you  can bring you ideas, creativity and art into my collaboration.
Young professional currently living in Hong Kong.  Originally from the US.  Love to travel and explore new areas!
Well travelled couple who proudly call Sydney home. Enjoy all the delights the our inner city location allows and want to encourage others to do the same!
Aloha! I would love to share a piece of paradise with you.

Newtown Sydney Australia.  

 In the afternoon I like to lie around in the sun like a cat.  My houses are always sunny and filled with light.   I am very social and like to get amongst it.  My housing reflects this being close to everything.

I like food, cinemas, dancing and laughter.   And there are plenty of these things in Newtown.

Poète, performeuse, animatrice d’ateliers et chargée de cours, je suis diplômée au baccalauréat en éducation (2009) et à la maitrise en création littéraire (2014). Je fais présentement un doctorat en études et pratiques des arts (je travaille sur le récit de voyage au féminin).

Grosso modo je fais des livres et des spectacles, ce qui veut dire que je passe mes journées à lire, écrire, dessiner et répéter mes poèmes. Je sors souvent au musée, au cinéma et dans plein, plein d'évènements  littéraires (lectures, lancements, colloques, spectacles, tables rondes, micros ouverts, etc.).

Bonus: je connais les cafés, les microbrasseries et les librairies indépendantes de la ville par coeur!

Péesse: j'ai beaucoup voyagé et j'ai de nombreuses expériences avec couchsurfing et airbnb.

I am French, in my thirties and I moved to Sydney 5 years ago with my husband to enjoy the Australian lifestyle! We are working-professionals respectively in Corporate Strategy and Marketing. We are easy-going and accessible and will do our best to make your stay as nice as possible.

host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
I’m an Airbnb newbie, but I'm looking forward to sharing my home with holiday makers like you. As a host, I hope the accommodation meets your expectations during your stay as it's clean, safe, comfortable, functional and quiet.

I live in an apartment with amazing views of Sydney’s iconic Bondi Beach and it's surrounds. I work during the day and some evenings I play tennis or catch up with friends.

I'm a happy, energetic, organised and social person who enjoys life. Living in Sydney is a treat. Before or after work you can have a surf and during the evenings or at weekends you can enjoy the nightlife at the hip bars or nightclubs Sydney has to offer.

You will love your stay here in Bondi and enjoy the peace and tranquility of the ocean at your door step whilst only being a few minutes from all the action.
Airbnb makes travel so much more personal and allows everyone to get the ‘local experience’ so I’m really pleased at the prospect of playing a part in someone’s dream holiday!

I’m pretty enthusiastic about my little part of the world so always happy to give advice or point you in the right direction! 

Happy travels!

I am a friendly and easy going person.  I love the outdoors, sailing, swimming, cycling and walking, hence my love of the northern beaches. I live in Mosman and love the vibe and location of this gorgeous Sydney suburb. I enjoy the cosmopolitan lifestyle Mosman offers with its vast array of boutique shops, restaurants and cafe's. With it's own beautiful Balmoral Beach, Taronga Zoo, local cinema, library, Mosman Markets, and an array of parks and waterside walking trails, I truly believe this location to be idyllic. Above all Mosman's close proximity to the city means I can be 'at the office' in 10 mins!

I love classical music and enjoy being around creative people. I think I have the perfect job in my capacity as Orchestra Manager of the Sydney Symphony Orchestra. I am lucky to be able to call the Sydney Opera House my place of work, and daily enjoy the vibrancy and excitement of this iconic Sydney venue along with it's sublime location on Bennelong Point.

In addition to my work with the orchestra, I run my own business which specialises in providing classical musicians, ensembles, orchestras, singers and entertainment for a large variety of public and private events. These include weddings, corporate events, TV commercials, concerts, recordings, cruise ships etc

I love travel and have a particular interest in European countries, history and cultures. I also enjoy meeting people, making friends, exchanging stories and generally interacting with others.

I am really excited by the unique travel experience that Air B&B makes possible for travelers, and look forward to welcoming Air B&B guests to Sydney and to my beautiful home.
Rachel

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I am a designer/entrepreneur based in New York City. I live with my partner in crime, Hugo, the sweetest little pooch. Both of us have restlessly curious minds, which is probably what lead us to travel almost 6 months out of every year. Besides thinking about my next meal, I probably spend the most time thinking about my next travel destination. 

I was born in the US, raised in Taiwan, moved to the UK at age 17, then Italy for school. Before airbnb was made popular, I was a frequent couchsurfing host/guest. From a young age I started sharing apartments with other housemates, many of which became my close friends. Now I am really glad to be hosting on airbnb. I tend to treat whomever I meet like a friend, without unnecessary formality or customs.

As a person I'm quite levelheaded, affectionate, with a pinch of cynical humor I guess. Anthropology, linguistics, art, and music are some of the things that I'm most passionate about. I love to explore new places through the local people I meet, as well as the food and night life scene.

We are Home in Montreal, a team of 4 (Joanna, Catalina, Jeanne and Joel). We are passionate about offering the most beautiful and well located apartments to tourists and business people visiting Montreal. "Home in Montreal" was started in 2012 and has now welcomed over 1000 guests from all over the world in their 13 short term rentals in Montreal.
Please, have a look at all our apartments by clicking on the "see all my listings" button.

We LOVE our city and its amazing neighbourhoods and we would LOVE to share our passion with you! We welcome you in French, English and Spanish and we can't wait to be your hosts in Montreal.

Honaunau Farm Wellness Retreat is a place where we can engage with people and share in the abundance of a co-creative conscious lifestyle.  We love meeting people from all over the world right here on the land we call home.  We enjoy engaging conversation about travel, spirituality, holistic living, healthy food and current affairs.  We find people who use airbnb to be great guests and it is a pleasure to be a host in Hawaii because we have the opportunity to extend the magic and beauty of the island to all of them in unique ways.  We love our life and we love to share it.

Over the last two years, we have had our CBD hemp business, Mana Artisan Botanics, take off.  So we are now traveling often for work and have our guest experience hosted by our retreat manager, Ashley.  She shares our love of people and holistic living and is a gracious hostess should you need anything during your stay.

I am a resident of Kauai.  I purchased two vacation rental 10 minutes away from our house as college investments for our two children.  We love living in Hawaii and are very happy to share that experience with visitors.

Hi  
I am both a Super Host and traveller, so my places are designed for absolute comfort with discerning travellers like myself in mind!

As a long standing Australian Super host, I strive to offer fabulous, unique, sparkling clean accommodation in the vibrant Sydney suburb of Newtown just 3km from the CBD, walk to Sydney Uni and RPA Hospital.  I have been offering accommodation for 17 years, before Air BnB I was listed on more commercial sites.

My point of difference is I have a ABN and my business is run to a professional standard with correct insurances etc. There are no common shared spaces. You are not squeezing into someone else home! My places are your home away from home.

Having returned from travelling, 3 times to Santa Barbara in 2018, and in 2017  (kayaking in Antarctica and exploring Chile) and having worked in Geneva and NYC, I strive to offer guests what I need myself, a very comfortable bed, quality linen, quiet but interesting environment and a place to eat and work (a real table and chairs!), a couch, outdoor space and Wifi!

Much of my time is spent travelling  and hosting and I also have my own Clinical and teaching mental health practice so I am busy!

Here's my hosting story:

In 2000 I purpose built Studio Q as a stand alone Studio in my garden in O'Connor, a sought after leafy inner suburb with cafes a easy 10 min walk away.  The City is 3km away and ANU a 15 min walk.  This property has been sold but Simon is now hosting Studio Q.

In Newton (Sydney) I have 3 fantastic apartments in the same complex with a roof top garden.  3 mins to the train and on "the strip" of restaurants, cafes, bookshops, movie and live theatres.  Please read more under Newtown Mews listings.

You will find my favourite local tips in each unit (i.e. best local cafes, great walks and the best the area has to offer).  I am a non intrusive host, and available by phone or email between 9-7pm,  I do not offer a 24 hr Concerige service but reviews conclude I am helpful and available in reasonable hours.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: We are thrilled to welcome people into our house.  It's just the kind of place that we would want to stay if we were visiting New York! We enjoy meeting interesting, creative and passionate people from around the world and sharing our love of Brooklyn and New York City with them -- the history, food, art, architecture, and music. What we offer is a room in a beautiful house. We are relaxed and welcoming. We ask that our guests make themselves at home (and we do all we can to make them as comfortable as possible). Staying with us is like staying with friends or family (who can cook well). We do not have locks on room doors (although we do fully respect our guest's privacy). This is not a hotel or a bed and breakfast "business" (no teddy bears or pot pourri). It is sometimes elegant and sometimes casual. We like vintage furniture, street art, local food, and all kinds of music ...  an urban sensibility. It's 'real life' in this house -- we have dogs who are enthusiastic greeters, teenagers who are in and out and friends who stop by. That said, we try really hard to make each guest's stay wonderfully memorable. Please read our reviews. We have had amazing guests!

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I'm from Brazil and I live in NY since 2006. I worked in the financial market for 20 years to reach really one goal: Fund my dreams :-)

This apartment in NY is one of my dreams come true. I really love to travel around the world for surfing, snowboarding and tastings of wine and food. Now I'm into the lodging and wellness segments as an entrepeneur, building boutique hostels with a focus on wellness.

My husband Rob is an architect/developer and I am recently retired from working in IT at a large northern California utility company. We knew each other in our early teens and remained friends into our 20s. In 2004 we ran into each other completely serendipitously and a few years later were married in our garden in Berkeley, surrounded by friends and family. We are both interested in art, architecture and music, where his tastes are classically inclined and mine tend more towards the Grateful Dead and lately, everything ukulele.  We love hiking, reading, traveling and good conversation.

My first trip to Kauai was in 1975 and it was love at first sight. Smitten, and haunted by memories of green and blue and rainbows and Bali Hai, I moved there in 1977, just in time for my twin daughters to be born at Wilcox Hospital in Lihue.  We ended up moving back to the mainland a year later, but in the intervening years, we vacationed there many times as a family. One of the twins eventually heeded the island's call and in 2012 moved to Princeville with her husband and family. (You could probably count on one hand the number of days they have not been at the beach or on a wave since moving!) I hope to persuade my city-loving husband to consider retiring to Kauai. So far he has promised me a month per year.  That's a start.

We hope your stay in Hale Nani or Hale Nani Iki is a pleasant one.
Artist and art professor. I recently decided to rent the apartment because I like to meet other travelers and it is the way I can pay for my own trips too.  I hope you enjoy your stay here!

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: I'm from a suburb of Sacramento Ca, called Folsom. My mom has owned a dance studio since I was 3 so I grew up tap dancing and that's what I'm still doing today. I've lived in New York for 8 years now and have done Broadway, Cirque du Soleil, and national and international tours and will probably continue to do so as long as these feet keep tappin'. I have a love affair with New York City but sometimes I need to GET OUT! I've stayed at many B and B's in the Hamptons and New England, but AirBNB seems to be the way to go these days! What else? I'm an avid snowboarder, semi expert dart player and play in 4 different NYC softball leagues, from the Broadway Show league to competitive men's leagues. I love the Boston Red Sox, The Green Bay Packers and the Sacramento Kings. (Odd combination, I know)

Hayatın kısa olduğunu ve her anını değerlendirmek gerektiğini geç farkedenlerdenim ben de.


4 yıllık hostel işletmeciliği ve 3 yıllık dijital pazarlama deneyimimden sonra kendime daha fazla zaman ayırabilmek, yeni insanlarla tanışıp yeni tecrübeler edinebilmek adına AirBnb'de hostluk yapmaya başladım.

Yolculuk yapan insanlarla tanışmaya bayılıyorum.

Kendime ayırdığım zamanlarda bol bol geziyorum, İstanbul'un çok da bilinmeyen yerlerinde kamp kuruyorum, bisiklete biniyorum ve fotoğraf çekiyorum.

Çok önemli bir sıkıntı olmadıkça misafirlerimle yüzyüze de tanışmaya gayret ediyorum.

Yolculuk yapmayan insanların hep bir yanlarının eksik kaldığını düşünüyorum.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
International Drummer & Fashion Designer based in Brooklyn, NY. We love food culture, the arts and exploring the world with our son. 

Favorite recent travel destination? Amsterdam!

Elijah and I raised our daughters in both Alaska and Hawaii.  Our company, Chilkat Environmental is hired by AK Tribes to clean up contamination on their lands. In 2015, we became the grateful owners of Puna Rainforest Retreat.  We work hard everyday  in efforts to make this place awesome.  We love Hawaii and even though we were only a couple miles from the 2018 eruption we wouldn't trade this place for anywhere. 

Elijah is a mt. biker, engineer, and fixer of all the things that break around here.  I am a dancer, gardener and cleaner of all the dirty stuff.  We are so thankful for our neighbors, Patrick and Beverly who take care of this place when we are away.  

Mostly, we are delighted to share this magical place with all the guests who are drawn here to experience the peaceful beauty and soothing sounds of nature.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Hello,

Our names are Cristina and Grady and we're excited to share our home on Airbnb.  Cris is from Girona, Spain and I'm am from Kansas and met each other down the street from our lovely apartment.  We both work in the neighborhood and enjoy going to all the amazing restaurants, shops and bars that make Lower East Side so unique and vibrant.

Professional  semi retired Stanford Grad interested in swimming, 
yoga, anti-aging, fitness, and meditation.
As a guest  I am pretty  quiet and relaxed, and
usually on my computer.
I am a nonsmoker., vegetarian

I was born the 6th of February 1973 in a small village in the north east of Italy, between the Alps and the Adriatic sea. I love travelling, sharing cultures, cinema, music, outdoors activities, food and wine. I have been living abroad for long time and I finally found home in Barcelona. Since I have been enjoying Airbnb as a guest and after I was made redundant I became an host and I do my best to make my guests happy too. If you cannot travel make the TRAVELLERS come to you!  
I Welcome you to come to my place and share it with me, I will give you good tips more as a traveller than a tourist and I will take good care of you. You will live a local experience but just keep in mind that my house IS NOT A CHEAP HOTEL and that I will love you more if you respect my way of living when you are here.
I HATE WASTING so please take a good care of everything I borrow you and do not throw away things we can still use: unused tickets, maps, leaflets, travel guides and recycle as much as possible. Don't waste energy, water, paper, food, etc and keep it clean and neat. If you like consumerism, wasting, do not like recycling and sharing I think this is not the right place for you.
Finally I live in the red light street, so if you don't like to see prostitutes in the street please don't choose my place or if you come do not give me a bad evaluation for the location, location is perfect and they were here before me and you. I am a certified Thai massager do not hesitate to ask me one!
I organize an hike in Montjuic if you want to join book it: Mindfulness walk through Montjuic! Or ask me before because if you book it in a date when I have already bookings I will give you 5 euros back https://www.airbnb.co.uk/experiences/137199
If you like running you can also join us here https://abnb.me/jA2LbbytgM
Nous sommes le couple sympathique qui habite le Rez-de-chaussé!!

I love growing my own food, travelling and singing :)

ALOHA, I am the President & CEO of Derek Daniels Productions & Entertainment Company.  I am also own 5-condos in Waikiki offered on AirBnB, a free-lance interior decorator, a real-estate stager and a personal property manager.  I am world-traveled master hula instructor, a professional Broadway dancer, choreographer, entertainer and costume designer.  I’m fluent in Japanese and French due to world travel.

Being in the entertainment industry, I am a people person and love meeting new people.  I was born and raised in Hawaii and I love to help my guests of “where to go and what to do” from a locals point of view and what Hawaii has to offer.  
 
I take my hosting very serious and offer only clean, safe, comfortable and beautiful accommodations to my AirBnB guests.  

I look forward to your staying and enjoying my home will in Paradise. 
Mahalo Nui Loa,
Derek

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I'm a data strategist and web designer and have been living in NY for 8 years now. Favorite airport is MIA because Priority Pass' restaurant per diem. Favorite city is Paris.

I'm a pretty chill and honest person who likes to keep clean and is very respectful of other people's space. I love traveling and have stayed at many friends' couches internationally before as well as domestically and always appreciate a homey place to stay. For those that visit me I try to make sure they're as comfortable as possible! 

I'm working on refurnishing the downstairs to make it easy for visitors to come, friends, family, and airbnb'ers alike. If you do stay here please give as much feedback as possible. I'm hoping to provide everything necessary to make you feel like you're at home. Don't worry about offending me. You can tell me if the furniture is in the wrong place or if the paint is ugly. I really have terrible interior design skills and just wish someone would magically fix that for me.

Hi, my name is Burcu!
I love all creatures with 4 legs but especially dogs and cats. I don't like to party at home, when I am not working, most of my time I am out with my Joy.
I'm a 34 year old female, I work at a pub but also in a dog training facilitiy and wish to rent one of my rooms to a responsible, tidy and reliable person (male or female).

There is a good, fast & UNLIMITED wi-fi connection, a very clean recently renewed bathroom, a fully-equipped kitchen (oven, microwave, stove, fridge, plates and all the other stuff..), 24/7 hot water, washing machine in the apartment, etc etc.

The room is fully furnished (single bed, wardrobe, bedside drawers, table & chair etc.), you need to bring your personal items only smile ifade simgesi, big enough for one person, not dark but I can't say sunny.

The flat is in a secure location, only 5 mins away by foot to Istiklal Street (the main center of interest in Taksim, with great cafes & bars) and 10 mins to Sishane metro station. Located in Tepebasi very close to Flas TV and Kasımpaşa Stadium.

I live with my 2 lovely cats and a very cute dog so you MUST LOVE animals! wink ifade simgesi 
Other wise please DO NOT BOTHER!
And i also want you to be respectful to the neighborhood and the other tenants in the building.


*****If you are interested PLEASE write me a short descrpiton about yourself!!! 
Where are you from? What do you do in here? How old are you? How long you intend to stay!*****

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I have been an AirBnB host for slightly over three years now, and I absolutely love it! I have met so many amazing people from all over the world. In my first year, when both rooms were rented out, the two guests fell in love and are now living together in Europe! (Can’t wait for that wedding invite :) They send us pictures from time to time of their adventures!
We keep in touch with a lot of our guests through (Hidden by Airbnb) and have made some wonderful friends and connections. 
I am an original New Yorker, but left when I was 18 to attend Tulane University in New Orleans. I then went to graduate school at Griffith University in Australia, then went back to New Orleans for work until I moved back to New York to be closer to my family.

Hi Everyone! I am Bermal. I am a student at Boğaziçi University. My department is international trade. I am learning Chinese and Portuegese. I love traveling and making new friends. I have been the U.S, Brazil, China, Azerbeijan, France, Italy, Spain, Germany, Bulgaria,Belgium, Nederland and Serbia. I travel whenever I find a suitable time. I really enjoy with new cultures and new food. I have hosted many from all over the world in my place. If you need, I can be your guide in Istanbul or can pick you up from the airport. Hope you have a great time in Istanbul! 
Ps: Please do not hestitate to ask anything comes Your mind!

2004 - SÜLEYMAN DEMİREL ÜNİVERSİTESİ BİLGİSAYAR TEKNOLOJİLERİ VE PROGRAMLAMA BÖLÜMÜNDEN MEZUN OLDUM.
İSMEK kurslarında çalışmaktayım. Ayrıca özel dersler vermekteyim, bilgimi ve tecrübelerimi sizinle paylaşmaktan mutlululuk duyarım.

Verdiğim Eğitimler; Ofis Programları - Word, Excel, Power Point, İpad Dersi
1 saatlik deneme dersi (ücretsiz) yaptıktan sonra dilerseniz devam ederiz.
Programları Kaç Saatte Öğrenebilirim?
**Excel Programını özel ders ile 6-7 saat gibi kısa bir sürede (Formüller Dahil).
Word Programını özel ders ile 3-4 saat gibi kısa bir sürede.
Power Point Programını özel ders ile 2-3 saat gibi kısa bir sürede.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
About Florence.
I am a French communication consultant, traveling between Paris and Harlem. 

About my husband, Peter.
I am a restaurateur, designer and artist working primarily in New York City. I've lived here for the past 30 years and have always considered this great city my home.
When you can't find us  in Manhattan we're either on Vieques or in upstate New York, where we a lovely historic Dutch stone house.

Life is about paying attention and how you choose to experience every moment, one day at a time.

Come hang out with us!

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: I’m a freelance designer . We ownes the house and have been living here for over 10 years.

I am a Montrealer born and raised and in love with this city!  By day I run an urban beekeeping company in Montreal called Alvéole and spend my summers looking after beehives and gardens on rooftops all around the city. By night I study art at Concordia University specializing in textiles and fibre art - I love every minute of it!
Montreal is an incredibly culturally rich city, avec nos deux langues officielles - with our two official languages - and our prominent music and art scene, I am happy to help share Montreal with anyone and everyone! Whether it be hitting up the festivals, taking in sunny Mont Royal, finding the best croissants in the city, attending art vernissages or going out for dinner and drinks on St Laurent, I'm happy to help you find your way around!

I love nature - walking, cycling or just being. Generally, when I travel, I come with my husband, Glen, and sometimes our son, Alex. We are all very much into the outdoors, peace and wildlife. 
At the same time, we enjoy great food and different cultural experiences. Glen and I lived and worked in Vietnam together, and I've lived in a few other countries, including Canada, the UK, Malaysia and Austria.
Alex is a very well-behaved well-travelled boy (not just saying that!), who has been with us to Europe and South East Asia. 
We all have itchy feet and love to travel and meet different people and experience different cultures, whether near home or far away.

As a family-operated company, we try to offer an unforgettable experience to our guests, with a personalized attention to the welcoming and the assistance during the stay. All of our apartments are equipped to cover all of our customer’s needs, relax, leisure or business. 

For all people who want to visit Barcelona, we love our city and we are sure you will love it too!!!

We enjoy to live in Porto and experience what the city can offer. We enjoy going to art shows, to dance,to the cinema and the theater. The house is from 1869 and is where we work. My main profile picture shows the Tiare Tahiti, a flower also called the Tahitian Gardenia.  It smells great...   One of my favorite flowers

I'm an artist with an MFA from the University of Hawai`i, but I became a real estate broker in order to support my disabled husband of 57 years.  I manage these thirteen great condos, all in the Waikiki Skytower, only three short blocks from Waikiki beach.   I own a small real estate company, DW Realty, so if you want to buy something here, I can help with that too.  I have helped a lot of people find their special place.  

I love helping people find a great place to stay on their vacation.

I love living in Hawai`i, and I live in Waikiki, so I'm close to the vacation rentals I manage.  I'm pretty much always available...

For three years, in the 1960s, before GPS, my husband and I sailed around the South Pacific on our 38' sailboat--no kids then, just our cat.  Finally, we came to Hawai`i, and we have pretty much been here ever since.  Both our kids were born here.  All of us are Hawaiians at heart.

Hello everybody!
My name is Marcelo and I'm from Patagonia, Argentina.
After a long stay in Andalucía, Spain, I decided to move to the multiethnic city of Barcelona, where I'm spending my third wonderful year. I'm an hand - made artisan. I like to create, read, listen to music, spend time with people and share my experiences with them. I also love animals, so pets will be welcome! I really love to cook and I'm always glad to offer my guests the possibility to try my dishes (as an extra service). 

Airbnb give us the chance to meet people from all around the world so that we can share our life experience in Barcelona and joy of living!!
I will be glad to make your stay enjoyable and memorable and I hope that you will fell like at home. Do not hesitate to contact me for any further query.

Hola a todos!
Mi nombre es Marcelo y soy de la Patagonia, Argentina.
Después de una larga estancia en Andalucía, España, decidí mudarme a la ciudad multiétnica de Barcelona, donde llevo viviendo ya tres fantásticos años. Soy peluquero y artesano, me gusta crear, leer, escuchar música, pasar tiempo con la gente y compartir mis experiencias con ellos. Adoro a los animales, así que todas vuestras mascotas serán más que bienvenidas! Me encanta cocinar y siempre estoy encantado de ofrecer a mis clientes la posibilidad de probar mis platos (como servicio extra).

Airbnb nos da la oportunidad de conocer a gente de todo el mundo para que podamos compartir nuestra experiencia de vida en Barcelona y la alegría de vivir!
Estaremos encantados de hacer su estancia agradable y memorable y deseamos que nuestros huéspedes se sientan como en casa. Os esperamos!

Ciao a tutti!
Mi chiamo Marcelo e vengo dalla Patagonia, Argentina.
Dopo un lungo soggiorno in Andalusia, Spagna, ho deciso di trasferirmi nella multietnica città di Barcellona, dove vivo giá da tre fantastici anni. Sono  artigiano e parrucchiere, mi piace creare, leggere, ascoltare musica, trascorrere del tempo con le persone e condividere le mie esperienze con loro. Amo gli animali, quindi tutti i vostri animali domestici sono i benvenuti! Adoro cucinare e sono sempre felice di offrire ai miei clienti la possibilità di provare i miei piatti (come servizio extra).

Airbnb ci dà l'opportunità di incontrare persone provenienti da tutto il mondo in modo da poter condividere la nostra esperienza di vita a Barcellona e la gioia di vivere!
Saremo lieti di rendere il vostro soggiorno piacevole e indimenticabile e speriamo che i nostri ospiti si sentano come a casa. Vi aspettiamo!

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
Otimista nata! Comunicativa, extrovertida, dinâmica! Objetiva e compreensiva. 

Adoro ler, descobrir novidades, estar em contato com pessoas e com a natureza. 

Gosto de receber e reunir pessoas. Amo viajar!!! 

Acho que é por isso que tenho tanto prazer hospedando, pois descobri há um tempo, que de uma certa forma, tão bom quanto viajar é ajudar alguém a planejar e a realizar seus sonhos de viagem!
Além do que, curto compartilhar descobertas! 

Como hóspede sou cuidadosa, organizada e procuro seguir as regras e horários dos anfitriões. 

Quando anfitriã.... ah ....quero que meus hóspedes sintam-se em casa,  confortáveis e seguros sabendo  que há alguém  zelando por eles.

Se por um lado primo por estar em conformidade com o contratado, por outro, atender e superar expectativas é meu foco!

Para mim tudo é uma questão de dedicação, perseverança e uma grande dose de boa vontade!

Meu lema: Impossível? Impossível e nem tentar!

I live with my husband Steve and our Jack Russell Terrier Buddy who is 1year old. We have both traveled extensively and do a few o/s trips each year. Therefore we know that travelers have different needs , some want to be left to themselves others like a bit of guidance.  We love meeting people and love Sydney and sharing its pleasures.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
5 min walk to Times Square!  and we are located in center of Hell's Kitchen neighborhood

Adjacent to the theater district, Hell's Kitchen has long been the home of actors and arts organizations. Pre- and post-theater crowds from nearby Broadway, tourists from Times Square and workers from office high-rises jam the international restaurants, bars and pubs along 8th and 9th avenues. Farther west, along the water, Hudson River Park has landscaped walkways.

Nearby subway stations are all in 5-8 mins walking distance. 

We hope to have you at our place!

I want to share my apartment with you, as a great opportunity for you to see the city from a different perspective, other than staying in a hotel.

My name is Sena. I live in Kadıköy where all the cultures mixed up. I think my place is the heart of the city. Im an English teacher who loves her job so much. I studied in England, lived there for seven years( considering its a long time)  I sometimes confuse my nationalty :)  I love music both listening and making. I play violin and guitar and besides Im a dance teacher too. I am a nature person who runs away to the mountains and lakes and camp there in her tiny spare time. I work busy hours because ı only work with business people.

My place is very central which is in a walking distance to all puplic transports and easy to get to and find. We have three bedroom in my big flat and ı sometimes I invite my students in the living room for lessons but very rarely. If you see people laughing around dont be surprised :) The building is not pretty new as nearly all flats are the same in Kadikoy area.  My neighbourhood is very safe and everybody knows eachother here and all of them are lovely people. I used to have a dog in the last years as you read in the rewievs but my friend  took her from me to a lovely farm where she is free and happy. House will be very clean when you checked in and I dont do a deep cleaning until you leave so try to be nice and tidy :) There are no rules in this house!!! I love people who treats this area as their own place. 

I have been hosting people on Airbnb for three years and had lovely friends and unforgetable experiences. Some of them stayed for a day and some of them stayed for three months bu we still keep in touch with most of them. I love meeting new people, listening different stories, learn abour their culture. Maybe Ill ask you to go out together if we have or play a game or even a long chat if you want ofcourse.

Hello-
  My family lives in Alaska. I am a stay at home mom. I grow a big ,organic garden for my family. We choose Hawaii as a place to visit yearly, and enjoy our trip to keep our place looking wonderful.

  This home, built by my husband, David, was built off the ground with open beam construction, to enjoy the cool breezes that Hawaii has to offer.  Powered with hot water solar, we hope to eventually go to solar electric. 

  I hope you enjoy it as much as we do.

Kirsten, David, and Pacific

Colorado native who loves to travel.  After living in India for a few years, I'm excited to make NYC my new home.

I am a music teacher and work in a Waldorf school teaching general music and choir.  I also teach private voice and piano.  

In my free time, I love to cook, listen to podcasts, hike, hula hoop, and play board games.  I sing with a few choirs in Manhattan as well.  I enjoy exploring new places and experiencing various food and cultural activities.

Aloha!  My name's Bekah and I'm lucky enough to call paradise my home.  I love living by family and friends.  I adore being in the ocean.  I live with my husband, two tweenage girls and my mother in law Pammy.  Pammy's Place has always been a gathering spot for old friends and new friends alike.  It seems natural to extend her hospitality to everyone who would like to visit.  We're a busy family, but we always make time for fun.  As our guest, you are always welcome to join us for a bbq at Waimea, kayaking Kahana,  or a Saturday waterfall hike.

Kurt

host_about: Cali raised creative living in NYC for almost 14 yrs. Laid back with an appreciation for good food, good music, and meeting great people.

Hello from Luke and Paul in Sydney, Australia. 

We both work in the creative industries and love to travel whenever we can. Having also lived overseas (in Japan and Italy respectively), Luke and I have travelled through much of Europe, the US and Asia. Our favourite cities include New York, Paris, Rome (I know predictable)... and when it comes to Italy, we can never decide on just one favourite spot...

We love to fully experience a city/country, and immerse ourselves in the culture, eat the local food, and mingle with the locals for a genuine travel experience.

We have stayed at some great Airbnb places on our travels, and decided to take the plunge and do the hosting. Sydney is a great city and we would love to welcome you to all it has to offer. & we look forward to connecting with people the world over on our travels.

Talk soon,
Luke & Paul

I am a traveler at heart who is highly motivated, active and inspired by people, places and most importantly, nature! I love meeting new people going new places and experiencing new situations! I am a yoga addict, runner,gardener, who knits, draws and travels a lot and believes in travel=education and wisdom! I love anything fermented. I am a big time foodie of anything healthy, organic, and high quality! I love adventures, sailing and having a lot of great laughs! I am very laid back, but like things tidy and organized. Low maintenance kinda person.

Aloha!

Welcome to Secret Falls Retreat in Kapaa, on the island of Kauai in Hawaii.

We are a permitted Homestay with the County of Kauai!:).

Use Permit No. U-2015-14
Class IV Zoning Permit Z-IV-2015-15

This property formerly called Mohala Ke Ola, has been running as a BnB for over 25 years. You will find it listed in the old Kauai guide books, we renamed it in 2011 when I purchased the property. You can really hear the water falls roar on a quiet night after the rainfall, and you can hike to the falls from the back deck. Hence, what a better name than Secret Falls Retreat!. 
We were closed for a while as we did many renovations and upgrades, but are up and running 100% now and look forward to hosting you and receiving new reviews soon!:).
 
I am origainlly from California, grew up in Northern British Columbia, Canada. 
I love the outdoors and am a workaholic, always busy! Tim was born and raised in Hawaii, so you have all the local inside information you need:). We have 3 children ages 8, 12 and 15 that attend a private and public school here on Kauai.  They help out with the BnB when time allows between their studies and extracurricular activities.  We enjoy the beach, hiking, horseback riding, paddle boarding, beach Volley Ball, fishing, and soccer. 
As we love music, we also own an event company called Hawaiian Muzik Factory, so we do weddings, anniverseries, baby parties, graduation parties ect. We also have large event tents, tables, sound systems, lights, and live bands.  Between the kids, the BnB and the Muzik Factory, it is a busy fun life in paradise! We look forward to meeting you!

Our property has a solar heated salt water pool and jacuzzi. Located right in the middle of the island, so you can go to north shore or south shore in 45 min to an hour either way.  No need to bounce accomadations to see the whole island! We live on the property and are available for assistance most of the time. Some of the best restaurants, beaches and shopping is only minutes away. Hiking trails on the Sleeping Giant are within walking distance. We offer a continental breakfast that varies depending on availability of local produce and fruits ect. We do not have breakfast on Sundays and Holidays as that is our family time:). We are a family run operation and look forward to hosting you:).
Mahalo,
Darcy and Tim

Welcome on my profil ! I'm from France and grew up in Asia, Singapore and China. Hope you will feel good at my cozy little place :) 

Have a nice time !

Laure

Ofrecemos una amplia selección de apartamentos turísticos y estancias de corta duración en Barcelona . 
Contamos con una amplia experiencia en alquiler de  apartamentos y con un experto  servicio de atención al cliente.
Estaremos encantados de recibirte en nuestros apartamentos, dónde podrás descubrir  desde una perspectiva diferente, la ciudad y sus vecinos barceloneses, con sus costumbres y fiestas populares.

Nuestros apartamentos están diseñados , amueblados y equipados con el máximo esmero. Son ideales para estancias de ocio,familia, pareja o amigos, así como para viajes de negocios.

Nos apasiona nuestro trabajo y te ayudaremos en todo lo que necesites, sólo preguntanos.

We offer you a variety of apartments for short and long stay in Barcelona. We have extensive experience in renting apartments and an expert customer service.
We will be happy to welcoming you in our apartments, where you can discover from a different perspective, the city and its neighbours from Barcelona, with their customs and popular festivities.

Our apartments are designed, furnished and equipped with the utmost care. They are ideal for leisure stays, family, couple or friends, as well as for business trips.

We are passionate about our work and we will help you in everything you need, just you need to contact with us and we will be very happy to help you.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I'm a theater artist - 50, mature, non-smoking, easy to get along with. I live in New York City with my wife, Johanna Meyer, choreographer and Pilates instructor extraordinaire, and our son, Harold (9), denizen of The Earth School Thompkins Square Park, and other locales. We own a small apartment in the wonderful East Village. 

I travel a lot for work - sometimes to teach, sometimes to perform, sometimes to direct a play. I often use AirBnB to save money on housing costs when I go. 

Johanna and I are native midwesterners, and have lived in New York for 25+ years. We love it here. We know how to live with it's pace, and withdraw into quiet corners when we need to. Our home is evidence of that. Full of patterns, comforts and books.

Enjoybcn offers a range of carefully selected apartments and vacational rentals, from elegant and modern to economic and functional, owning several apartment buildings spread through different neighborhoods.

Our company along with our experienced and qualified team are dedicated to giving you, our guests, the best possible experiences in Barcelona.

We look forward meeting you in your next visit to Barcelona!

En Enjoybcn disponemos de una gran variedad de apartamentos, desde los más elegantes y modernos hasta los más económicos y funcionales. Somos propietarios de varios edificios repartidos por distintos barrios de la ciudad.

Estamos a tu entera disposición para encontrar el apartamento que mejor se ajuste a tus necesidades. Además, disponemos de un exclusivo servicio de emergencias 24 horas que te garantizan la máxima tranquilidad durante toda tu estancia.

I am friendly, festive,and I like to get know new people.  I teach English over the internet and yoga in person and have many years of contemporary dance experience.  I have a cuddly, chubby black cat named Didier after my boyfriends old roommate.  I like to talk about everything from art to politics, and share stories over a glass of wine.  I have traveled through a lot of Europe and South East Asia.  I love beach destinations but city life always calls me back.  What else can I say.... I love skiing, swimming, hiking, scuba diving, all kinds of music (electronic, Swedish pop, hiphop), curious objects, The Wire, Wes Anderson movies,  plants, composting, good coffee, poutine.

host_location: Sant Pere de Ribes, Catalunya, Spain
host_about:
Dear visitor, I honor your curiosity.

I'm an emotional shaman in love with this beautiful land that surprises us generously with so many beautiful expressions of the most striking beauty.
I am a spiritual warrior armed with a multicolored laser illuminating the deepest darkness.
I am the carrier of a germinating seed of Love to help our Beloved Mother Earth creating a better world.
I honor the liquid that rocks the creative essence, by the rhythm of the waves of the immense Big Blue.
I have the courage to imagine the Paradise on Earth. Do you dare with this vision?

Believing is creating, we are Humanity, waiting for you ...

Estimado visitante, honro tu curiosidad.
Soy un chamán emocional enamorado de esta hermosa Tierra que nos sorprende generosamente con tantas y tan hermosas expresiones de la mas sorprendente belleza.
Soy un guerrero espiritual armado con un láser multicolor iluminando la oscuridad mas profunda.
Porto una semilla de Amor germinando para ayudar a nuestra Amada Madre Tierra creando un mundo mejor.
Honro el líquido que mece la esencia creadora al ritmo de las olas del inmenso Gran Azul.
Tengo el coraje de imaginar el Paraíso en la Tierra. ¿Te atreves con esta visión?
Creer es crear, somos la Humanidad, te estamos esperando...

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Hey hey-

We are a Brooklyn couple with a baby (fear not: the bedrooms are far apart) who work as theater artists in the city and love to garden and BBQ in our tranquil and magical back yard. 
Stephanie is originally from Sweden, but came to the US to study theater and to meet her San Franciscan husband Andrew, who is a freak for jazz, gardening and good food. He works as an actor, producer and bartender. Stephanie is currently mothering their new baby, acting in films and making theater. She likes to hike and swim in the wild. We both love to watch movies and eat ice cream. 

We love living in New York and are happy to share our knowledge good food, interesting theater and cultural events. 

Whatever your NYC trip may be, our place is ideal as it is both an easy ride to Manhattan and located in one of the most interesting, diverse and fastest changing neighborhoods in New York. 

Welcome!

"Greetings from Team Vacasa! Yes, we're a professional property management company—but we're also real people, trusted by the owners of vacation homes to take care of all the heavy lifting like housekeeping, reservations, maintenance, and guest care. (Because, to be honest, renting out a vacation home really can be a full-time job!)

We have local teams on the ground to take care of our homes and our guests. We like to think of it as the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, only without compromising on service and convenience. You can trust that your home will be cleaned by professional housekeepers, and your calls will be answered (right away, around the clock!) by our dedicated Guest Services team. 

Check out our listings, and if you have any questions, get in touch! We'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway."

host_location: Surry Hills, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
Born and raised in the suburbs of southern Sydney I've lived here all my life. I've travelled to countries in South America, Central America, US, and Europe plus one or two other places.  Loved every minute of travel and found I always had a better time when I was staying with locals. So if you're staying with me I'll do my best to make you feel at home, provide you with tips and advice and generally try to help you get the most out of your holiday.

Skills: cooking skills, running skills, language skills (falo algum portugues), tour guiding skills, 'girls only want boyfriends who have great skills' - N Dynamite

Likes: Australian Rules Football (it'll take some explaining, maybe we should go to a game), getting down to the beach, good food with friends, ice-cream and chocolate, red wine over white, 

Sense of humour: Satire and black - Jon Stewart, Stephen Colbert, Ricky Gervais, Doug Stanhope etc

Reading list: Any non-fiction - my favourite author is Michael Lewis, newspapers (but not Murdoch papers!),

host_about:
Hello, my future guest! Let me first introduce myself, i am Aracele and love welcoming people and exchange with them our cultures, lifestyle etc.. I am organized, friendly and without vices. Regarding my job, i am owner of the tax consulting company (small) and sometimes i need to work in home office. My apartment is locate in a great place: two blocks from the beach and in front of the Station Subway General Osorio. Nearby my apartament there are a lot of restaurants and fun bars where you can have a great times. The guest´s bedroom is cute, cozy, clean and comfortable. Important mention that in my apartament there is one exclusive toilet to the guest and doorman 24 hours. I hope you have amazing times in my home and in my City! Hugs, Cele.

Olá, meu futuro hóspede. Deixe-me primeiro apresentar-me, meu nome é Aracele e adoro receber hóspedes e aproveito esta oportunidade para trocar diversas experiencias, seja a nível cultural e estilos de vida! Sou hospitaleira, organizada, simpática e sem vícios. Sou sócia de uma empresa de consultoria fiscal e, por vezes, trabalho em home office, dessa forma, a interação com o hóspede fica até mais fácil. 
O apartamento fica em uma excelente localização. A duas quadras da praia,  em frente ao metrô da Estação General Osório. Em frente ao prédio estão localizados diversos restaurantes e bares. Você poderá encontrar tudo nas imediações (farmácia etc). O quarto é bem aconchegante. O ambiente é bem cheiroso, limpo e confortável. Importante mencionar que o apartamento dispõe de um toilete exclusivo para os hóspedes e possui porteiro 24 horas.
Seja bem vindo ao meu lar e aproveite ao máximo esta linda cidade! 
Abraços, Cele.

I am hospitality professional, who genuinely cares about creating great vacation experiences for our guests. Prior to assisting with vacation rentals, I worked for high end, well known hotel chains and private hotels for over 17 years. Hospitality is my passion, to ensure that our guests have a great booking and stay experience is always my priority.  
We offer discounted rental car reservations, travel insurance and concierge services to help you make the most of your Maui vacation. Our team of guest experience specialists consists of Paige, Carine, Taylor, Jennifer and Tim, they help me connect, respond and assist our guests 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. I am so proud that we are able to offer warm, friendly, professional and resort quality services in an un-hotel setting for our guests. 
I love to engage in all different forms of art in my spare time, I draw, dance and aspire to play the drums. I love Maui, it would be hard to imagine living at another place, other than paradise.
Mahalo for reading. I hope we get the opportunity to assist you with your next Maui vacation!

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about: Along with Ed (my better half, pictured on the right), I strive to build a growing base of happy and loyal AirBnB clients. We're both fairly quiet guys: I have a doctoral degree and enjoy researching/writing, and Ed is a retired dentist now working in Manhattan real estate. We're very tidy, laid back, and respectful of guests' desire for the same. We're also very proud of New York City and are always happy to share our knowledge of the city's history and offerings. Traveling to world capitals and exotic places is our passion: I speak French and Portuguese fluently, and Ed speaks Spanish. We absolutely love hosting guests from all over the world, and we're always happy to interact with guests as much or as little as they like, so conversation over a bottle of wine is always welcome!
