Hi There, My name is Omar  Farouq Tekin and I'm the owner of SUFI APART SUITES. I was born and raised till university in central Turkish town of URGUP which widely known as CAPPADOCIA. Being from this spectacular land of nature and history and as a member of a family which now for three generations dealing in art works and antiquties has helped me to built an esthetic understanding for interior decoration, thanks to this I was able to give unique touches  to my apartments in order to cheer up my guests' not only accomodation comfort but visual taste as well.
As a husband, a Father and a constant traveller, I have the ability of foreseeing A travellers' concerns. Therefor I always take necessary  measures in order to provide utmost safety and comfort. 
My main field of interests are philosophy, history, nature, art and the anthropology. I consider myself as a very lucky person since  I've been  living and  working in places which helped  to enjoy and develop my fieslds of interest on daily basis. Oh and yes definately Culinary as well :-))) I LOOOVE to cook and am a sea food expert as well, so if you care about fine local food too then you are in the right place my friend. Just ask me  or even better, Join me! :-)
I am hoping to see you all in my place to exchange cultural knowledge and have woderful friendships with sweet memories.
WITH ALL MY BEST WISHES TO YOU
OMAR FAROUQ TEKIN.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about: Hi there! I love to travel. When I visit new places I like to feel and live the real vibe. To do so, I believe Airbnb is an excellent choice 'cause you are able to live like a local, outside the hotel bubble. I enjoy heading to a local market, bakery... to have authentic ingredients and meals. As a marathoner, I also enjoy taking a time to run in a local park.

Hello, this is Güner, welcome to our Family-run business, BERRY LIFE APARTS & ISTANBERRY :)

We are owner of this whole property and also managing here with our family members. We are also working in the two offices left and right side of the apart building entrance door.

Our sensitivities:
1) Cleaning (The most important one. Confirmed with our awards and reviews)
2) Security (Secure with easy-remote alarm system)
3) Working Discipline (No overbooking. And the apartments will be ready in the check-in hour for sure)
4) Solving the Problems (We instantly take an action about your problems during your stay)
5) Enjoying our Work (You will see our energy and positive approach when you arrive)

Let me introduce ourselves :)

*** GÜNER (Me) ***

I was born in Istanbul and I lived in this beautiful city during my whole life. I am a totally local Istanbul citizen, so I hope I can answer all your questions about Istanbul easily :)

I graduated from Marmara University in 2005 and worked for Finansbank Project Finance Department more than 7 years. And then I started working in our own business and quit from bank.

I will be always replying your messages and emails instantly (If I am not sleeping). And also if you need anything or want to ask something or have any problem (Before & during & after your stay) you can contact me, I will be happy to help :)

My office is in the right side of Berry Life Aparts entrance door. You can see me here whenever you want (The blue door).

*** BERİVAN (My Wife) ***

She was born in Düsseldorf and come to Istanbul while she was a baby.

She graduated from Istanbul University in 2005 and she was working in Citibank Credits Department with her 8 years’ experience. And then she started working in our own business and quit from bank.

She is designer of our concepts. We won creativity award in 2012 thanks to her :) She chooses all the furniture and fixture, pictures on the wall, colors of the wall, carpets, curtains etc. If you have any suggestions about the visual issues, she will consider every single one :)

She is also managing real estate office with expertise on furnished rentals. If you are moving to Istanbul and will need long term rentals, she is the correct person to ask :)

Her office (Which is also our reception office) is in the left side of Berry Life Aparts entrance door and open 24 hours.



*** ERDAL (My Mother-In-Law) ***
Honorary Chief & Cleaning Inspector 

She was born in Kastamonu City, and lived there for many years. Then she came to Istanbul.

She was a carpet designer, but when she gave birth to her daughter (My wife), she quit, and only take care of her :) And now, with her great experience, she is taking care of everything and helping us running here :) She is inspector of the cleaning services and we thank her for our famous & awarded cleaning quality. But she can’t speak English very well.

She is also in our reception office during day.

We all will be glad to welcome you :)
Güner & Berivan & Erdal

Backpacker, and now trying to devote my time and energy for helping people discovering who they are and what they truly want in life - still trying to figure out how to do that, but I can share with you how I found mine. :) Some other keywords: meditation, spiritual development, travel writer, marketing and PR, NGOs, dance - modern/contemp/ballet. Interested in meeting new people from around the world! Speaks fluent English, Mandarin and native Cantonese, just started learning French, speaks very very very little Japanese. Lived in Beijing for 2 years, and a super frequent traveler to Taiwan - know these two places just like my 2nd home(s)!

Oh and life is wonderful, isn't it? :) Can't help but see beauty in everything, including dark moments in life.

Sharon and I built this beautiful, spacious home on 7 acres in 2003 to fulfill a dream of living in Hawaii. Our home takes advantage of an incredible view 5 miles north of Hilo on the Hamakua coast, up slope from the scenic drive and Hawaii Tropical Botanical Garden.
Come share our neighborhood with the farms, local horses, space and quiet while you appreciate what we feel is the best of Hawaii.  You are close to many of Hilo’s local activities, and within easy traveling distance to the Volcano sights, waterfalls and lush vegetation and attractions of our coast.
We offer an extremely spacious main living house area that mirrors the space of our outside view, and an ohana next door for a smaller living option.  We love the sunrises over the water, the constantly changing weather, and the sunsets over the mountain.  We hope you enjoy this place as much as we do.
Mark

Stay in Barcelona like a local

I want to be more than a host, I want to be your local buddy :)

We are a huge accommodation in a quiet & central location of Barcelona. It is a main door, ground floor and first floor holiday rental close to many Barcelona main attractions. We can easily accommodate Small and Big groups of people, starting from minimum 1 person  to maximum group of 50 people . We rent it as a Full Apartment, Private Floor, Private Rooms,private compartement, Single Beds in Shared Room depending upon the guest requirements (terms and condition apply) . For more information feel free to contact us anytime (our lines are open 24/7 and 365 days a year)

The accomodation offers 367, 90 square meters of space with 2 grand living area, fully equipped modern kitchen, huge terrace, internet café, walk in shower rooms and balconies . It has 9 King size bright & spacious private rooms and 2 huge dining space . All the rooms have access to Balcony,Terrace,Patio, Living room, Kitchenette , Separate Bathrooms and Smoking area  

Accomodation is furnished with an assortment of mid-century & contemporary home comforts. The House is very close to Plaza de Espanya ,Barcelona Beach, Sant Jordi , Sant Montjuic and Main City centre Plaza Catalunya . The living room has a folding dining table that sits twenty to twenty five people in case you want to entertain or dine. There is a  big screen TV and CD player and a handful of DVDs and CDs for you to use. It has very good natural lighting and high ceilings, the living room feels very spacious and airy.  We also have special room on the ground floor for disable or for guests with mobility issues

We offer 24 hours reception service for our guests to ease the check in and check out process. The accommodation makes a great base to discover the area's much loved, such as independent bars, restaurants and shops . On few minutes away, you can find many night life and clubbing areas , cinemas, theaters, gyms, galleries, museums. Also you'll be few steps away from the all mode of public transports such as metro, bus, airport connections etc to explore other parts of the Barcelona City

Local area: 

- Main city centre Rambla Catalunya street (10 minute walk) 
- Quirky bars, restaurants, shops (2 - 5 minute walk) 
- Large Codis supermarket (1 mins walk)
- Famous Plaza Espanya (less then 5 minute walk)

Transport: 

- Barcelona underground metro station, Poble Sec few steps away 
- Barcelona Sant train station & Barcelona Nord Bus station (30 min walk ) 
- City Buses just around the corner to take you to all the famous attractions
- Taxi rank (5 mins walk from flat)

Our Guests also have access to :

- 24 hours Reception
- 24 hours Laundry
- 24 hours Cleaning
- 24 hours Kitchen & living area
- 24 hours Mini supermarket
- 24 hours Language storage facilities and Safe Deposit 
- 24 hours Taxi and public transport connections  

Looking forward to welcome you  !

I am an urban planner with architecture and computer science qualifications.
I love to travel and work and am interested in international business. My favorite travel destinations abroad are Greece, South and North America at the moment.   
I am married and a very happy father of two children. I try to travel with my family as long as my son is on holiday and not goes to the school. We all are interested especially in good food, new places and nature. 
This property you are viewing now is located very central in the historical Peninsula so called Sultanahmet and was my home for about 6 years. After I moved to another district I remodeled the house and have now 17 rooms with en-suite bathrooms to rent. Public areas like terrace, breakfast room and a lounge are also available for all my guests. Our location is just perfect in case of being so close to the major sights and security. The standard of the rooms are high and my colleagues working in this property will do their best 24/7  to make you feel homey and get information about the city.  I am sure you will love this property as your home in Istanbul.
My Motto is share everything you can and be thankful for all you have.

I enjoy traveling and learning about other countries. In the past three years I have hosted international students from 10 different countries and it has given me the opportunity to meet some of the sweetest and brightest young ladies. I am passionate about architecture and interior design. I enjoy event planning, and I often volunteer to help charities with their special events. I love cooking healthy meals, and have recently developed a huge interest for integrative nutrition. On my free time I like to go to the beach, explore new hikes, and go shopping. My favorite shows include; Shark Tank, Zoo, Empire, Modern Family, and ANTM.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I am happily alive and well and have made New York City my home long ago.
My interest in arts and theater brought me here and the city has fullfilled some of my dreams, some of it is in the gutter to be picked again when the time comes. New York is a home for the homeless wanderer, my motto, however, is: 'to find the home within'. In that note: I welcome all my guests to feel at home in my little home in New York.

Active lifestyle!!  I grew up on Maui and my passion is the outdoors:  Surfing, biking, hiking, you name it.  And I love to travel.  Surf, snowboard, hiking and biking trips as much as possible.  I bought and remodeled the house in Hana for quick Maui staycations to surf and play in the rainforest hikes with family and friends, and the design of the home and cottage is to my type of lifestyle, indoor/outdoor living, comfortable furnishings, and ample room to prepare meals and relax.

Some of my favorite travel destinations are Canada and Colorado for the boarding, camping, hiking and biking, houseboat trips to Lake Powell, and, if time/money allow, the southwest of France for the surf, food, wine and culture.

My travel style has modified over the years.  It used to be budget all the way.  Those years are behind me, now I prefer a reasonable price, a clean place, with amenities, and convenience to the happening spots in the area, which is exactly what I want to provide for others in Hana as an Airbnb host.

It's a big world out there, set aside some time for yourself and explore!!

Aloha,
Brook

I am interested in using AirBnB as I think it is a good way to create a win win situation where owners and "tenants" benefit from a mutual agreement. I love reading, cycling, skiing, meeting people from different countries and cultures.

Easy going, optimistic, spontaneous, creative and adventurous person. After former corporate life that propelled me to explore what life has to offer outside of what many people see as an attractive 'career path', I have been happily living an unconventional life experiencing it to the full.

I'm quite active, I love ocean swimming, riding my motorbike, go hiking, skating or long walks to enjoy the outdoors. I go dancing from time to time (tango or salsa) and I channel a fair bit of energy through my creative outlet in photography. I love to travel, even though I haven't been to nearly as many places as i wished to, but each and every travel experience brings immense joy, learning and friendship that I value. 

I enjoy meeting people, I especially love spending time with those who are positive, easy going, adventurous, open minded and passionate in following their dreams.

Recently i have swam the English Channel (yes UK->FR) and am now working on my next challenge (and a few of them too :)

I am a Canadian teacher living in Turkey. I have been living in Turkey for several years now and have a flat with a fantastic view. My home is perfectly located in the heart of Istanbul - close to many of the tourist attracttions that Istanbul has to offer in an eclectic neighbourhood. I am easy-going and friendly. I am ready to guide you through my adopted city.

host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host_about:
*French version below 

We host international business & leisure travellers since 2009 - vacation and corporate housing.

Renato is the architect (responsible for the 5-story house design) and Louri is your main host, as well the manager of the place. We are the owners.

If you like outdoors sports, biking, running, swimming, hiking, climbing, stand-up paddle (SUP), or just want to try Rio in a different and original way, we are waiting for you.

Architecture & Design can connect us, as well. if you are interested to know more about architecture in Rio, we could take you deeper in this world. Renato has some cool projects in town and he will be more than happy to give you some information and guide you, if you are interested, of course.

We are Smoke-Free/Drug-Free/Drink Responsibly

Every aspect of your stay is important to us and we can tailor any request to your individual needs ensuring you have a unique experience in Rio.

We are available in English, French, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.

Nous accueillons des voyageurs internationaux depuis 2009 dans le cadre de leurs déplacements professionnels ou touristiques.

Renato est l'architecte à l'origine du design et de la conception des 7 suites et Louri votre interlocuteur et manager des lieux. Nous sommes tous les deux associés et propriétaires.

Si vous aimez les sports extérieurs, vélo, course à pied, nage, randonnée, escalade, stand-up paddle ou si vous souhaitez tout simplement découvrir Rio différemment nous vous attendons!

L'architecture et le design à Rio peuvent également être des sujets d’intérêts en commun que nous pourrions vous faire découvrir plus en détail. Renato pilote actuellement plusieurs projets dans la ville qu'il serait plus que ravi de vous expliquer, si bien entendu cela vous intéresse.

Nous sommes non fumeurs, non consommateurs de drogues et peu consommateurs d'alcools.

Chaque aspect de votre séjour est important à nos yeux; c'est pourquoi nous nous efforcerons de répondre à vos attentes afin que votre expérience à Rio soit unique et inoubliable.

Nous sommes à votre disposition en Anglais, Français, Espagnol et Portugais Brésilien, bien entendu.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
NYC city designer living in the best neighborhood the city offers: the new art and music scene in Brooklyn.
It's hard to tear me away from here, but my work requires some travel often.  I like to share the place.
Hope you enjoy having some wine on the patio during a sunset as much as my husband and I do. He works long hours so you may not get meet him, but everyone loves him. We often travel together for work.

My brother lives nearby which is so nice for me, and also handy if you need anything while staying here if I'm traveling. I usually work just 5 blocks away so feel free to bug me if need something while I'm at work. I can pop back to the apt to help. As a designer, the schedule is really flexible. Please don't hesitate to ask me any questions if you need to know anything about me or the place. Thanks!

host_about:
We have 3 rooms equipped with 3 bunk beds for single back packer. They are clean and secure. 
We are located in Jordan - the Heart of Hong Kong. Our place is absolutely easy and convenient.
You can take airport bus A21 directly to the back of our building or take railway and transfer by free shuttle bus K1 that stops exactly in front of our main door. We are 100% accessible to all tourist spots in HK as well. Very convenient!
Of course, you may do some research how to enjoy being in Hong Kong. I may suggest few really amazing place that you should not miss! For sure, you must like it! I love to talk and share whatever I know. So long as you have time and really to sit down with me, we may exchange our cultures and experiences. Why? It is simply because I love travelling as well.
Come and feel what s home and friendly place we are!

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
I am an easygoing Michigander who moved to Brooklyn from a small town in Montana (1500people) 5 years ago. I love it! There is so much to see and do. 

I am just starting my second year as an airb host and I only have fond memories of my first! I like to think I specialize in hosting foreign guests, but my honest, straightforward, mid-western upbringing keeps me well rounded. Just ask my Mother:) I was fortunate to have traveled the world in my 20"s and 30's and now I really enjoy having the world come to me. I genuinely love being a host! A guest (and now a friend) from Northern Ireland wrote, "This guy embodies the spirit of AirBnB" I'm flattered by this and I hope it is true.

I recently graduated from Brooklyn College and I'm now certified to teach kindergarten through the 6th grade in the state of New York. I'm looking forward to the challenge!

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Hello and welcome to our home!

We're Stelian, Deanna, Hudson and Hazel. We've traveled extensively as a family and enjoyed staying in short-term rentals throughout Europe and the States, often finding it to be the most comfortable and interesting approach. When the opportunity came up for us to move abroad again, we decided to share our home in Brooklyn with other families and travelers. We've put a lot of thought and hard work into our home, starting with a fairly dilapidated brownstone and restoring as much of its historical grandeur as possible, while incorporating modern amenities. 

We've entrusted Jessica and her team to manage our property while we're away and hope you enjoy your stay!

英語が苦手､ﾀﾞﾒな方もご心配いりません､お気軽にご連絡下さい｡

ただ一つ､予約後はair bnbのｱﾌﾟﾘの更新をした上で操作の確認をすることを忘れないで下さい｡予約ﾍﾟｰｼﾞの閲覧の仕方が頻繁にｱｯﾌﾟｸﾞﾚｰﾄﾞしています｡

空港から私のｱﾊﾟｰﾄまでの位置確認､下記参考にして下さい｡

•ｻﾞﾊﾞｽ(市ﾊﾞｽ)
$2ﾄﾞﾙ75ｾﾝﾄ､(十九､二十番)で乗り換え無し､約1時間でｱﾊﾟｰﾄに到着です｡
ﾊﾞｽ内にお釣りはないのでご自身で用意するのをお忘れなく｡
大きなｽｰﾂｹｰｽをお持ちの方は乗車出来ませんが､機内持ち込みｻｲｽﾞで来られる方はﾊﾞｽで来れたら格安です!ﾊﾞｽは寒いので上着必須｡

空港発ｱﾊﾟｰﾄ行き
(7:00-8:30に乗車の場合)
ｱﾊﾟｰﾄ前発 空港行き 
(15:30-18:00に乗車の場合)
途中通勤ﾗｯｼｭに巻き込まれるので確実に1時間以上はかかります｡私もこの時間は運転しないように気をつけています｡


空港発ｱﾊﾟｰﾄ行き降車地点
 "Kuhio Ave and launiu street" 
ｸﾋｵｱﾍﾞﾆｭｰ ｱﾝﾄﾞ ﾗｳﾆｳｽﾄﾘｰﾄ (ﾘｯﾂｶｰﾙﾄﾝ目の前)
運転手にﾘｯﾂｶｰﾙﾄﾝに行きたいと伝えたらｽﾑｰｽﾞです｡目の前のﾊﾞｽ停で降りて下さい｡

ｱﾊﾟｰﾄ発空港行き
"Kuhio Ave and Launiu street"
同じくﾘｯﾂｶｰﾙﾄﾝの道を挟んだ向かいにﾊﾞｽ停が設置されています｡だいたいﾊﾞｽ停は登り､下り､道を挟んで対に設置してあります｡

ﾊﾞｽ停から歩いて30秒でｱﾊﾟｰﾄ発見､到着!ﾊﾞｽに乗り慣れていない方も一度試してみてはいかがでしょう~｡

ﾊﾞｽを降りてﾋﾟﾝｸの3､4階建の建物(個人的には一番の目印にしております)が見えたら､その角がﾗｳﾆｳ ｽﾄﾘｰﾄです｡必ず分かります｡
ﾊﾞｽ道を背に一軒先に行った左手にあるのがこの建物 414 launiu streetです｡

•ﾀｸｼｰ
荷物の積み下ろしやﾁｯﾌﾟだのでだいたい30分かかります｡ﾁｯﾌﾟ入れて$35-$40が目安でしょう｡

•ｼｬﾄﾙﾊﾞｽ
$17くらい｡
ﾜｲｷｷ行きはﾎﾃﾙで降りなければいけないことがおおいのでその際に､ﾎﾘﾃﾞｰｲﾝﾜｲｷｷｴｸｽﾌﾟﾚｽがｸﾞﾚｰﾄﾞ的にも降りても差し支えなさそうなﾎﾃﾙ(個人的意見)｡3分くらいでｱﾊﾟｰﾄに着きます｡もしくはｺﾝﾄﾞﾃﾙのﾌｫｰﾊﾟﾄﾞﾙはｱﾊﾟｰﾄの真向かいなので､停まってくれるならとても便利)

•ｳｰﾊﾞｰ､ﾘﾌﾄ
$21からと記載されています｡(変わっている可能性あり)
ｱﾌﾟﾘにどこで拾ってもらうか記載してあるので必ずその位置へお進み下さい｡
空港にはﾙｰﾙがあり､その位置に行けない場合はお迎えは断られます｡

Somos unos apasionados de los viajes. Tanto, que ¡nos hemos convertido en profesionales! 
Estamos muy orgullosos de haber empezado alquilando apartamentos en Barcelona a viajeros nacionales e internacionales. Llevamos más de una década alquilando apartamentos a familias, grupos de amigos, parejas... y realmente siempre ha sido una experiencia muy gratificante para nosotros. Cuando viajamos con nuestros niños, o cuando podemos escaparnos un fin de semana solos, es la opción de alojamiento que más nos gusta. Tenemos independencia, comodidad, conocemos muchos anfitriones nos enriquecen con sus historias y consejos sobre la ciudad y vivimos la ciudad casi casi como un local más.

Nos gusta sentirnos a gusto cuando viajamos, por eso es lo que intentamos ofrecer siempre a nuestros huéspedes. Tenemos un pequeño equipo que nos ayuda para lograr una mejor atención y que se esfuerza por hacer de la experiencia lo mejor posible. Son Belén, Mayte, Marta y Anaí.

Esperamos verte pronto! Y no dudes en contactarnos para lo que necesites. 

Hebe & Ezequiel

Greetings! Despite how unnatural it feels to try and "describe" a human being, especially one's own self, let's give it a shot. I'm an independent game developer, which is a fancy term for "a human who's chosen not to earn as much money as he could be earning in order not to be told how to do things". Having lived in almost every part of Istanbul (and therefore having seen its lowest as well as its highest) I found myself unable to move away from the Galata area and eventually settled here.

As a host, I'm doing Airbnb for the sake of meeting with new people and having an excuse for drinking more beer. Being into this sort of a thing solely for the purpose of having an extra income is, tho I respect that choice as well, just not for me. I'm more of a "eh, let's be off with the fake pleasantries, fake smiles, fake impersonations and hit the damned pub!" person, being much more into conversations and interactions where all sides are genuine and not parts of self-made scripts. 

There's something lovely about knowing that I've helped someone enjoy their trip more. It's not always easy getting a taste of the local life in Istanbul since authentic cities such as this are also usually hyper-touristy. What's more is that the understanding of a "local life" will differ from one part of the city to another, it's as non homogeneous as it gets and that's why I love helping my guests around - so that they can experience how we "the Galata area people" live.

51 year old semi retired. I love to travel and have been to 35 countries. My passion is in renovating old homes,  bringing them back to life. Darlinghurst is my sixteenth major renovation. I love gardening and cooking and I hope you will enjoy my home as much as I do.

host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
My wife and I have 2 kids 16 & 13. We moved home to Bondi Beach after 10 years running our company, gDiapers in Portland, Oregon. 

We have a ton of fun running the business which allows us to travel to the US, Canada, UK, France, Germany and Spain. 

I enjoy running marathons eating Indian and Thai food and the odd movie. 

We love using AirB&B to get a different take on the cities we visit and as host want to reciprocate after fantastic experiences in Rome, LA, New York and London.

Hello! 

I am from Morocco and been calling Montreal our home for years now.
I am bilingual, and I can kick it in Arabic and Spanish as well.

I work in communications, advocacy and policy, mostly on  migrants and refugee matters. I read and write a lot. I'm a passionate and avid napper as well. In another life, I was an economist and a dancer.

I'm an active, community minded recently divorced single parent. I live in with my children in our family friendly home in a great suburban location in Sydney. My home is conveniently located close to shops, parks, transport in a quiet leafy street, very centrally located and close to hospitals. 
I have listed my home as I share the care of my children with their father and I travel frequently for work, and Airbnb seemed like a great opportunity for my family to help cover costs. 
I've previously hosted overseas students and always found it a really positive experience for both myself and my kids. We are a welcoming happy family who like to enjoy all our beautiful city has to offer and we look forward to welcoming you and your family.

I moved from Berlin to Rio in 2012. Davi and me bought this big old house that needed a lot of work to be done. We renovated it completely and tried to keep it as original as possible. We did most of the work ourselves, so it took about 4 years to complete it. Since we had more space than we needed, we decided to give Airbnb a try and it's being a really good experience since. We have been lucky to have nice guests that share many common interests and have a fun time in the city.

I work also with photography (artistic, street) and some graphic design. Davi works as a carpenter building furniture. Most of the house's furniture was made by him. If guests share these (or other) interests, we are always open to show and hand out, what we know about brazilian culture, habits, photographers, artists and etc.

Hi, we are Nadia & Sean from from Sydney, Australia.  We love meeting new people and are a friendly and respectful couple.

Aloha! Maili Cove blends two must have's for us perfectly - it sits right on the beach & is close to our family for all the birthdays, bbq's, and FUN!  I moved from California to Hawaii in 2006 and was able to transfer with my job & this is HOME now!  Lucky to Live in Hawaii and do what I love to do.  I am a child psychologist.  Love working with kids, teens, and families!  Putting together each perspective and being challenged to figure out how to make things better!  I have a private practice in town and have worked for 15 years for one of the major hospitals.  We love to travel. Italy, Greece, and an Alaska Cruise were our last vacations - - Next up London!  Can't wait!  As a host - I am personable, respectful, professional, and dependable! Value friendships and family.  Love to be active - enjoy hiking, tennis, & beach time!  When we do "stay-cations" - one of my favorite things is to check out a NEW BEACH every day - really take in the island!  Relaxing! Beautiful! & really "re-sets" you! Hope you have an Amazing time on Oahu!

host_about: I work as a Conservation Ecologist to restore, study, and encourage balance to conserve natural areas, remaining habitat, and resources in New York City for indigenous species of flora and fauna. I enjoy tall tales, short tales, adventurous tales and just nice, friendly people that have love in their heart and that are salt of the earth.

Hello and thanks for taking the time to read my profile. I am a roaming New Zealander now settled in Australia's most picturesque city of Sydney. I am delighted to become an Airbnb host of apartment/condominium/self-contained/flat style of accommodation right here in Sydney. 

45 years old, I have been a travel agent since my early twenties, this job experience coupled with my own extensive travel around the world (including many successful stays booked via Airbnb) plus meeting my travel client expectations has armed me with extensive knowledge base of what guests require of their stay.

Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions you may have in regards to the property you will be staying in, transport, activities, events, Sydney itself, I will be very happy to help with any information I can.
Believe in Karma

I was born in Barcelona and I have been lucky to live in this beautiful city all my life. I am married with children and we both love meeting people from all around the world. We love food and cooking, traveling... we enjoy sharing experiences with people and help you with everything you could need in Barcelona.

We started hosting on Airbnb about 3 years ago and the experience has been amazing. Its great to have the opportunity to meet new people every week and help them have a perfect stay. That have been incredible years!

As we have young children and sometimes it is difficult to manage everything with a baby at home, our friend Ewa is giving us a hand! She is from Poland and has been living in Barcelona for many years, so she is also happy to meet a lot of people from all around the world and give you some tips about our great city!
